1.content: Let's get the beginning choices outta the way first alright?
1.title: Let's Start!

11.content: Let’s start off with the ladies of the show
11.title: Totally Spies!

choices: Perhaps a World of Tiny People?
121.title: Sora

1211.content:
Sora wandered through the woods in the world of Wonderland, "Man it's been awhile since I was here...." Sora commented to himself. This was a journey he made alone after he and Riku had returned to their home islands after defeating Organization XIII.

He was curious...he remembered how the strange fruit in this forest had made him huge...it was only for a few moments that he was permitted to enjoy the view and new size though.

But he never forgot how cool it felt,.towering over the tree tops..too bad Donald rushed him to get back to normal. Sora sighed and folded his arms behind his head and sighed, "Darn...am I lost? I can't find that dumb tree with the fruit!" Sora complained...before the fruit itself was thrown down to clunk him on the noggin by none other than the Cheshire Cat.

"Ho ho ho ho ho! You're quite a long way from home! Like poor Alice..." The whimsical voice of the pink and purple cat said from the top of the tree.

Sora rubbed the now sore spot on his head and frowned up at the cat, "What was that for?!"

"It is the fruit you seek...though you must be careful to--" Cheshire Cat began to explain...but Sora quickly began tearing into the fruit, mouthful after mouthful.

"Oh my...you might have overdone it..." The Cheshire Cat giggled before vanishing.

"What's the worst that could happen?! URRRRRP!" Sora belched loudly as he polished off the rest of the fruit.

Mere seconds later...he felt a tingling throughout his body..and his line of sight was soon over the tree tops!

"Hheheehehe! I'm sooo huuuge!" Sora's voice thundered, scaring birds from their roost.

How big does Sora get?
1211.title: Sora's Growth

choices: Sora decided to mess with them
12113.content:
Sora grinned as he saw the top of the trees and scattering birds. The teen laughed as he looked out into the horizon of wonderland.

"Ah quite the excitement. But I must say, that many bites will lead to a rather large complication~", Cheshire's head appeared next to Sora's ear and giggled before vanishing.

"Hm, what do you mean by that...", Sora's sentence was cut off as the tingling returned.

The trees became furthur from the spiky haired boy's eyes. A series of crunches rang out as the giant black shoes of Sora crushed them into the ground. He gasped slightly as the sky began to turn darker, soon he blinked open and found himself floating in a strange void.

"Huh what the, where am i?", Sora called out looking around. Multiple colorful orbs were scattered in patterns all around.

What Sora didn't know was that these were in fact multiple worlds now smaller then his feet. Despite close observation, Sora couldn't figure out what they were.

What happens next?
12113.title: Tera Sora

121132.content:
Sora drifted through the void over to the closest orb, which happened to be that of Disney Castle. Sora's gigantic eyes scrutinized the little orb as chaos ensued down below.

"YOUR MAJESTY!" Donald quacked at Queen Minnie and King Mickey as he rushed into the throne room. "Donald! What's going on?!" Mickey inquired frantically.

Before Donald could answer, a deep rumble of thunder caused everyone to clap their hands over their ears....it almost sounded...like a voice?

"Sora...?" Goofy gulped as Donald and the others whirled around to the Captain of the Guard: "What!? What about Sora?!" Chip hopped up and down.

"Fellers! Ya gotta take a look at this!" Dale hopped over to a screen connected to a satellite of sorts that monitored any incoming threats.

Everyone crowded around the monitor and saw that Goofy was correct...it was Sora!

"PPpfpghhew...." Donald blubbered as he fainted dead away on the floor.

"How....what-...." Mickey was at a loss for words as the thunderous voice of their colossal friend rang out once more.

"Wait...I recognize that little castle!" Sora gasped slightly as on his shoulder the Cheshire Cat appeared. "Indeed! Your size is quite impressive! Your mere toes would dwarf any and all worlds now!"
121132.title: Sora looked closer

1211322.content:
"That's so cool!", Sora beamed as he took in the true scale of his size.

Unfortunately, everyone felt the ear booming voice of the now ginormous teen. Sora gleefully looked at the numerous orbs around him. One in particular caught his attention as it was right between his big and second toe. The spiky haired boy giggled at the sight, he felt so big and powerful.

"Man, I never thought I'd be this big!", Sora grew a toothy grin as he put his arms behind his head.

Cheshire hummed as he layed on the hairline of Sora. "You clearly are enthusiastic about all this. But I wonder, just how long intill your glee affects others?"

Sora rolled his eyes up confused. "Huh, what do you..." the boy stopped as the cat once again vanished. "Man, I wish he'd stop being so cryptic."

Pouting a little, Sora looked back at his toes. At this size they could do some real damage, with one flex it would become toe jam. But he wouldn't do that.........right?

Sora shook his head and looked back at Disney Castle, his friends be fine with his sudden titanic size. It'll just take some getting used too.

Soon...
1211322.title: A Titan's Joy

choices: Sora Gets his Point Across... perhaps via His Toes?
Sora puts Donald in his place another way
12113222.content:
The Gummi satellite hovered in front of Sora's gargantuan face. It looked like a big tv screen..until the angry quacking form of Donald appeared on it.

He would notice they were all wearing gas masks...Disney Castle must be the world down at his toes. Sora giggled at the thought of a whole world being fumed by his potent feet.

"WAAK! SORA WHAT DID YOU DO!?!" the grumpy duck demanded. "I just ate that fruit in Wonderland! Now look how big I am!! We'll never have to worry about Heartless again!" Sora gleefully informed them.

Communication via the satellite was for his friends benefit since they could all hear the deep rumble of his voice anyway.

"Gawrsh Sora... ain't this kinda dangerous? You being so big around the worlds and all..."

"And knowing how reckless you are...this is a disaster!!" Donald scolded.

Sora frowned, Donald never gave him respect...
12113222.title: Contact was made

121132221.content:
A smirk grew on Sora's face as he relaxed more and chuckled. "Ah come onnnn what's the worst that could happen?"

As he said this, Sora started waving his toes back and forth. This send a sea of panic as any moment one of those gargantuan appendages could wake the world and obliterate it. A subtle issue rose however as the stench from the teen's toe gunk came out in sudden burst of waves. The cheesy odor increased and coated the Disney Castle in a thick aura.

The scent was increasing very quickly and got so intense that it was beginning to seep into the masks everyone wore. Donald waved the air around his mask frantically as the thick stench clogged it.

Sora closed his eyes and hummed as he stretched his does apart.

"Don't worry, I'm in full control!"

What happens next?
121132221.title: A Toe's Uses

choices: Riku and Kairi's Point of View as Sora Visits!
Keep the Focus on Sora as He Visits his Home World!
1211322211.content:
Sora grinned cheekily as he heard all the coughing and gagging from his friends down by his toes. It was so funny that he burst out laughing! Unfortunately due to his godly size, Sora's laughter hurt everyone's ears and rattled the very foundations of Disney Castle!

"HA HA HA HA HA! YOU GUYS'RE SO FUNNY! DO MY FEET SMELL THAT BAD?" The rumbling voice of the childish teen rumbled.

His response was everyone across the planet yelling through the communicator: "YES!!!" Which only caused Sora to laugh even harder.

The boy had never felt such a feeling of pure authority and power before...and while he didn't want to hurt his friends...he couldn't help but enjoy being so large and in charge.

"Well don't worry guys...I'm gonna go for now! I wanna show off to Riku!" Sora boomed as he wiped a mirthful tear from his eye.

Pulling his barefoot away from the world he adjusted his floating position and scanned the sea of worlds for his home.
1211322211.title: Sora messes around more

12113222112.content:
As Sora floated he looked at the various brought orbs floating around his ginormous body. The spiky haired boy giggled as he wiggled his toes, remembering how he held the world of disney castle between his big toe and second.

Sora wasn't sure where he'd go from here or when/if the fruits's effects would wear off. But he was more focused on the thrill of being so big! It was so funny how everyone reacted to his feet.

Soon the gigantic teen came to a familiar orb. Sora toothily grinned as he recognized the orb as Destiny Island, he could show Riku and Kairi his new size.

Meanwhile on the beaches of Destiny Island, a certain purplenette and redhead sat enjoying the sunset.

"Sora's been gone for a while.", Kairi asked worriedly looking at her friend.

Riku smiled. "Don't worry he's more then capable of taking care of him self."

"Still.."

The two teens suddenly grasped thier ears as a loud noise rang out. Strangely it had a sense of familiarity and sounded as if it was saying...

"HEY GUYS!"

Suddenly....
12113222112.title: A Big Visit Home

choices: Sora Uses His Cheesy Feet To Mess Around Again!
121132221121.content:
The two slowly looked upward and saw a colossal blue eye filling the sky. "Wait....no way....is that...." Riku recognized that voice...and now combined with the cheerful looking blue eye he had a strange feeling that Sora was back.

"S-Sora?!" Kairi gasped out in shock. The duo clasped their hands on their ears again as a giggle rang out,

"Yep! It's me! I went to Wonderland and ate this weird fruit!" The voice boomed. Riku couldn't help but feel fear....knowing how reckless Sora was...if he was dwarfing their entire world then that put them all at risk.

But another more selfish reason was currently at the forefront of Riku's mind as well. That being that he'd always beaten Sora in pretty much everything and Sora never beat him in the old days when they would swordfight. But now he felt drastically inferior to his pretty much god-like friend.

"Sora...y-you're huge!" Kairi said in awe and shock. Sora gained a cheeky grin and folded his arms behind his head in his trademark pose.

"Hehe! Yeah I'm pretty impressive, huh?" Sora said with a slight blush. The boy's gaze focused on Riku, it seemed his hearing and sight had adapted to his newfound size!

"So...you think you can beat me now Riku?" Sora boomed playfully.
121132221121.title: A BIG Chat

choices: Sora lays off the foot fun
1211322211211.content:
Riku grunted, annoyed that Sora was flaunting his new god like size. "Hey don't mess around!"

Sora felt his lips smirk as his question was confirmed, who could beat a giant?

The spiky haired teen got an idea as he remembered the previous usage of his feet. Leaning back, Sora brought his left foot up to the glowing orb giggling as he lightly wiggled his toes.

Riku and Kairi were confused as the blue eye disappeared from the sky. Sora's voice boomed not as intensely with his giggles blasting the air. Soon a strange hit their nostrils and got stronger as the sky filled with a peach wall. The two covered their noses as the strong smelt much like that of a smelly foot.

Riku widened his eyes as he realized this was the smell of Sora's chessy feet. He remembered when he would fall asleep on the beach and wake up to the brunette stomping his face with his plump and sweaty feet while pretending Riku was a bug.

"Hehe, I'm not messing around I'm having fun!"

What was next?
1211322211211.title: Familiar Feet

choices: "Okay! Sure! Lemme call that weird cat!"
12113222112111.content:
Riku cringed and grew agitated, Sora's feet always stunk...but this was insane! "Sora! Stop it! Your feet smell too bad!"
Sora's voice rattled their eardrums as the innocent boy roared with laughter, "Are you admitting..De-FEET, Riku?" The voice boomed.

Riku's eye twitched in annoyance at the horrible pun. Kairi coughed and gagged, she'd always scolded her friend about his foot odor..she doubted that would have much effect now. "Soraaa! My eyes are watering!" Kairi choked out.

The laughter was heard again, "Bet you can't yell at me for my stinky feet now, huh Kairi?" Sora joked in his godlike voice.

Kairi hacked and wheezed along with Riku who shouted out: "Sora!! Why don't you give me some of that fruit!?"

Kairi's eyes bulged, "What?!" These two boys were still obsessed with outdoing each other!?

Sora thought about it and...
12113222112111.title: More Foot fun

choices: No (Sora has to resort to eating space stuff)
121132221121111.content:
"In your dreams! This universe will only be FEET-uring one God and that's me" Sora said as his laughter once again rattled the whole planet. The people continued to cough and gag as they covered their ears.

Riku was still annoyed that he was stuck at his size amongst other things. Kairi then decided to call out on her own as she said "Please stop this Sora! You don't need to do this. I know you still have a good heart deep down.

"I'm able to breath in space and hear the people, but do I have other powers?" He thought to himself. Sora then heard his own stomach growl.

He decided to test his powers by trying to make food big enough to satisfy him appear. Sora concentrated hard as he thought about delicious food big enough for him to eat.

Was he truly a God now?
121132221121111.title: "Nah!"

choices: Sora messes with the small Riku
Sora makes Riku his pet. Perhaps he’ll grow Riku if he behaves
Sora picks Riku up and teleports to Twilight Town to find Roxas and Axel
1211322211211111.content:
A large burgers suddenly appeared in Sora’s hand. He smirked while eating as his powers were real. Upon finishing the burger, Sora heard Riku calling out to him again. Sora thought to himself. He knew Riku wouldn’t let his order get the best of him, so how to mess with him. With an idea, Sora snapped his fingers and immediately appeared before Riku and Kairi. However, he was now 20ft with bodybuilder like muscles.

“You called, Riku?” Sora asked with a cocky smirk.
1211322211211111.title: Sora can do anything he wants

choices: They see who has the more stinky feet
121132221121112.content:
"Hey Ches-", Sora began to call out for the purple and pink cat, only for it to suddenly pop down from above his eyes.

"You called~"

Sora gave a toothy grin and he looked at the orb. "I need another one of those fruits for Riku!"

Cheshire chuckled before his body vanished and his head winked at Sora. "Will do, also I prefer strange to weird."

Meanwhile Riku and Kairi where still struggling not to breath the chessy air. The redhead jumped in surprise as the cat suddenly appeared before them fruit in his paws.

"Your large friend asked for this. Quite the stir he's causing, though why not make it double~"

Riku eagerly grabbed the fruit before running across the beach. Kairi called out only for Riku to turn and smirk.

"Just watch, I'll show him who's bigger.", Riku began to devour the fruit. Once eaten, the purplenette wipped his lips and quickly kicked off his shoes

"I think you two are taking this to-", Kairi was cut off as she watched Riku start to drastically grow in size. His feet crushed a palm tree before he stepped into the ocean and made a large splash. Soon Riku stretched into the sky and floated out of Destiny Island and continued growing.

"Quite the friends you have." Cheshire hummed at Kairi who could only wonder what would happen now.

Sora grinned as he watched Riku grow intill he was floating in front of him. Sora placed his hands behind his head while Riku crossed his toned arms over his chest.

What did they try and outdo now?
121132221121112.title: Two Giga Teens

1211322211211121.content:
"Heheheh! Nice of you to join me!" Sora said with a big grin.

Riku smirked cockily, "Couldn't let YOU have all the fun. In fact now I'll show you who's better around here!" Sora pouted in return, "Oh yeah?"

"Yeah, and we'll start by testing who has the worst smelling feet." Riku said confidently. "ME! Obviously!" Sora put his big foot in Riku's face.

Riku cringed at the cheddary funk but leaned away, "Can't just use OURSELVES as judges dummy!"

"Huh? Why not?" Sora asked innocently. Riku sighed, "Cause there's only two of us and we'd just vote for ourselves."

"So what do we do?" Sora asked with a thoughtful face.

"Just so you're aware..." The Cheshire Cat's voice said as the pink and purple feline was now hovering in front of them.

"There is another set of worlds who are none too pleasant in terms of inhabitants. Not too far from here, actually." Cheshire said slyly.

"What do you mean 'none too pleasant'?" Riku asked suspiciously.

"I meaaan...they're allied with the forces of darkness. So you should not feel too guilty about perhaps..using them as unwilling judges for this contest?" Cheshire replied with a teasing eyebrow wiggle.

"Whoa! If they're bad guys then they've got it coming!" Sora declared firmly. Riku nodded and had a devious grin.

The cat pointed with a paw and Riku and Sora floated in that direction. They were careful not to knock or damage the worlds of their friends of course as they practically swam through the void of space.

"It's kinda like Neverland! We can just float around!" Sora giggled.

Riku nodded and was cruising along when they found a cluster of worlds that were all similar in architecture and shape to the World that Never Was.

"Looks like we've found em'!" Sora cheered.

Riku smirked, "We'd better let em' know what their new job is."

Riku and Sora's voices rumbled throughout these dark worlds as the inhabitants saw the colossal beings floating above. They were practically deities!

The two teens announced their intentions loud and clear: "You runts and your puny worlds are going to be the judges in a little contest we came up with." Riku said in a sinister tone.

"Yeah! You're gonna tell us whose feet...and maybe other parts...smell the worst!" Sora's voice was gleeful and joyful, but somehow that made it all the more chilling for his would be victims.

"We'll start with our feet..and go from there." Riku bellowed.

Now..who goes first?
1211322211211121.title: Foot Stink Contest!

choices: Sora stinks up the worlds more
12113222112111212.content:
"Let me show you how it's done!", Sora excitingly said as he brought up his humongous feet.

Rather then immediately throw his toe chesse at them, Sora placed his plump soles on each side of about three world's. The inhabitants began to panic as it seemed Sora was about to sandwich them between his meaty soles. The spiky brunette kept his feet in place however, flexing his soles to spread the natural musk.

"Heh, I already feel I got the better stink!", Sora toothily grinned at Riku. The purple head smirked at the remark. "Hey don't act like your the only one who doesn't wear socks!"

While the titans squabbled, the tinies started to get the force of foot stench. The bitter salty sweat mixed with a tinge of cheddar. The result of Sora's feet cooking in his shoes and natural hot weather.

Sora turned back to his stompers and giggled before asking Riku. "Should I give them the full course?"

Riku's smirk grew. "Yeah show those bugs what a god smells like!"

The keyblade wielder moved his feet and spread his toes before inserting both between them. The chessy aura clouded the worlds as the sky darkened and was filled with the gunky toe crevice. Everyone tried to keep out the thick suffocating odor that made them gag as the raunchy odor penetrated any coverage.

Sora laughed. "Think you can beat this?"

Next....
12113222112111212.title: Sora Goes First!

121132221121112121.content:
"Yeah, without a doubt!" Riku chuckled confidently as he clenched his own toes and felt their moisture.

Sora giggled and hoisted his foot which held the trio of worlds in his big toe crevice, onto his knee. The people screamed and wailed as they saw a colossal blue eye appear beyond the void of toe jam.

"Yuck, you little guys have it baaad!" Sora boomed with a giggle.

"Push it deeper...and make sure they get the message from your booming voice about how puny they are." Riku licked his lips, this was all quite exciting...in more way than one!

Sora grinned widely, "You got it!" Preparing his enormous finger, he began to gently force the three minute planets deeper into what was effectively a quicksand swamp of built up sludge.

"You little people suuure aren't able to put up a fight against big ol' me, huh?" Sora taunted.

"I bet you little guys are smaller than ants! That's just how HUGE I am!" Sora's voice boomed in their eardrums. He was so childish and naive that it never crossed his mind the horror that he was inflicting upon what very well might be innocent people...after all the Cheshire Cat might be lying!

In Sora's mind this was all fun and games though, and he was able to play rougher since these guys were probably aligned with Maleficent or Organization XIII!

Down on the three worlds, it was absolute chaos as those who were still alive were now struggling to stay that way in a sea of toe grime that was little by little absorbing their worlds.
121132221121112121.title: Sora's Stink Fest

1211322211211121211.content:
"Ok time for me to show these runts how puny they are!", Riku smirked as he took sight of the worlds that up intill now had been free from Sora's fun.

Luckily, stepping in the ocean back on Destiny Island didn't wash away any of his foot's musk. If anything the salt may contribute to the salty odor of Riku's soles.

Bringing up his foot so it loomed over two orbs, Riku chuckled as he lowered and raised his foot again to make it look as if he was going to stomp out the insects. Unlike Sora's foot, Riku had more rough soles as he was barefoot and walked on the sandy beach and rocks meaning if he did end up crushing these nats it wouldn't be cushioned like Sora.

Riku flexed a bicep as he hummed and lowered his foot. The unaffected tinies now got blasted with salt and sand musk that burned and watered their eyes. There was also a tinge of vinegar as the salty sole had previously been cooking in Riku's shoes. Everyone panicked as the scent plagued the air, Sora giggled.

"Aww it's like mine, they don't appreciate my stink." The spiky brunette stuck a tongue out.

Riku's eyes turned cruel as he smirked with his teeth. "You bugs should be glad I'm just drowning you in my musk, I could crush you and you'd be nothing but lint!"

The purplenette lowered his sole and brought up the other, opening his moist toe gaps. "In fact, why not become lint!"

Using his finger like Sora, Riku stuffed the orbs into his gunk. The tinies now got a overwhelming musk of chesse but doubled with salt against the soft yet rough gaps consuming them like a black hole.
1211322211211121211.title: Giga Riku

choices: "Take a big whiff..get your nose in there!"
"Push some planets deep into my pit with your fingers!"
12113222112111212111.content:
Riku and Sora grinned, just pausing to enjoy their power and how awesome this all was. "Well..I think we should let our judges decide a winner now." Sora suggested.

Riku chuckled darkly, "If any of the maggots are left alive that is..." With that, Riku and Sora as carefully as they could, dug the planets out of their toe jam.

Placing them relatively in the spots they had been in before, Riku and Sora's mirth filled faces filled up the skies.

"So..whose feet are worse?" Riku asked, his cruel grin filling the tinies with terror.

"Yeah! Pick me!" Sora said excitedly.

"You can't just tell them to pick you." Riku rolled his eyes.

"Sora!"

"S-Sora!"

"Sora!"

"Sora!"

"Sora!"

The voices of the survivors on the planets all cried out in a unanimous decision.

"ALRIGHT! I WIN!" Sora's loud booming voice was heard.

Riku scowled, "Stupid insects..." He grumbled, the tiny populations wondered if they had just incurred the wrath of the more cruel of the two.

"Aww...don't be sore, Riku! It's your own fault you don't keep your feet as cooped up as mine..and put them in the ocean before ya got all big!" Sora laughed as he folded his arms behind his head casually.

Riku scowled but relented with a sigh, "I guess so...but since I lost you gotta do something for me!" Riku grinned deviously.

Sora raised an eyebrow, "Seriously...?"

"Yeah, then we'll be even." Riku chuckled darkly.

With that, Riku raised one of his sleeveless muscular arms and pointed to the armpit...
12113222112111212111.title: Winner of the Contest

121132221121112121111.content:
Riku grinned as he threw his buff arms over his head, opening up his steamy and wet pits. The purplenette took a whiff before chuckling.

"I want you to take a whiff, smell my mighty sweat!"

Sora's nose crinkled as the sweaty musk reached him. The brunette pouted as he found something Riku had him beat in, his pits weren't as sweaty. Granted Riku had more muscle so that meant more weight for his body to support and heat up.

"What's wrong Sora, my pits too much? Maybe you should join the bugs in worshipping me!", Riku playfully smirked as he flexed his biceps.

Sora's gaze hardened. "Hey I can take your rank pits!", Sora then quickly floated over and looked at the wide pit. The firm muscle had little purple hairs glued down by the sweat.

Throwing his head back, Sora quickly stuffed his face in the large armpit. His nostrils tingled as the strong onion and salt odor was already invading his nose. The wet moisture covered his face as the wide slimy pit heated him up and tickled him with the pit hairs.

Sora held back a cough as he took a deep whiff and the overwhelming stench clouded his nostrils. Riku closed his eyes and smirked as his friend breathed in his pits, he'd been working out more and made his muscles produce ripe sweat.

"Make sure to get in good, I want you to smell every inch!"
121132221121112121111.title: Riku's Reward

1211322211211121211111.content:
Sora groaned at how demeaning this was, he wasn't about to back down though! The spiky haired brunette began moving his nose around to different areas of the intense smelling armpit. He gave deep whiff after deep whiff, Riku moaning all the while.

"At least Kairi isn't seeing this...I hope we're not big enough to be seen all the way out here anyway..." Sora thought as his face was turning slightly green from over exposure to Riku's manly stench.

Riku licked his lips as he noticed Sora cringing, "Hah, I thought you were tougher than that Sora! You're looking a little grossed out." The older boy teased.

"N-no way! You just...really stink." Sora murmured that last part.

Riku laughed loudly, "If you think it's that bad...then I guess this is payback for that foot stunt you pulled back at the island!"

After a few more moments and sniffs, Riku sighed and allowed Sora to pull his face out. Sora yanked his now greasy face and nose out of the rancid area and began furiously wiping his face off with his short sleeve. "Ugh..." Sora grumbled.

Looking over at the array of planets, Sora chuckled as he saw Riku glaring at the orbs. "If you want...I think it's unfair that I'm the only one who had to sniff your pits!" Sora grinned mischievously.

"Oh really?" Riku slyly grinned.

"How about I get some volunteer worlds for those pits of yours...Mighty Riku?" Sora giggled.
1211322211211121211111.title: Riku's Powerful Pit Smell

12113222112111212111111.content:
Riku smirked at the thought of the tiny orbs being completely consumed by his raunchy armpit. Bouncing his pecs, Riku chuckled.

"Yeah those runts should get the might of my pits!"

Sora grinned as he thought of the inhabitants getting the same greasy pit surrounding them. Turning towards the freed orbs, the brunette grabbed three between his fingers tips. The tiny inhabitants still coughing on the chessy stink from Sora's toes, paled as the teen gave a toothy grin from the sky.

"My friend here whats to share his pits with you. You could take his kind offer....or spent some more time in my toes!", Sora playfully smirked.

The inhabitants immediately yelled out agreement for the offer. It couldn't be worst then being jammed in the chessy cavern. Little did they know, they were in for something much worst.

Riku licked his lips as Sora held up the worlds to him. "Glad you bugs are eager to feel my stink, we might not crush you for such fun."

Sora giggled as he brought the orbs to Rikus open pits, the worlds were like mere dots on the wet skin. Using his fingers, Sora pushed the bugs into the squishy yet firm muscles. The tinies were squashed into the musky skin and force to once again breath the salty stench with onion. They'd be mistaken for mere hairs as they were greased up in the moist skin.

Riku smirked as he felt the faintest of movements. These orbs were such bugs, he felt such a surge of power at the new size and how these insects were so easy to put in their place.
12113222112111212111111.title: Riku Agrees Wholeheartedly!

choices: Taunt them Some More With his Booming Voice!
121132221121112121111111.content:
Sora giggled, making sure not to put TOO much pressure behind his finger as he pushed the planets in even deeper. Riku licked his lips, "You're doing a good job, if I didn't know any better I'd think you liked my pits, Sora." Riku teased.

Sora blushed and shook his head, "It's fun to make other people smell it! Not when you're making me smell your stinky pits!" The spiky brunette pouted.

"Haha, okay..whatever you say, man." Riku leaned his head back and sighed in content. "Think they're deep enough?" Riku asked as he closed his eyes.

"Oooh yeah! They're all glued DEEP in your GIANT pits!" Sora boomed as he floated backwards and admired his work.

To a casual observer, it would look like Riku's underarm was littered with three tiny dots. The planets could easily be mistaken for dirt given the raunchy smell coming off the youth's pits. But these were fully inhabited worlds, subject to the cruel games of these two teens...turned gods.

"Haha! They look like pit dirt!" Sora guffawed childishly. Riku grinned smugly, "They might as well be..their lives are meaningless in the eyes of us gods! Their worlds exist only for our fun!" Riku boomed, his green eye peering in at his billions upon billions of victims.

What does Riku do now...?
121132221121112121111111.title: The Pits of a God

1211322211211121211111111.content:
Riku sneered down as he looked at the specks of dirt glued to his odorous pit, the specks of dirt were actually just the worlds so pathetically small to the purplenette.

"Their pathetic, not even worthy of getting stomped to dust. All you runts deserve is my pits musk!"

Sora toothily grinned as he saw his friend taunting the pit dirt. "Hehe you guys aren't even bugs, that's how puny you are!"

The toned arm of Riku flexed as he smirked. "Yeah actually bugs would eat you runts up for lunch. Your just gnats, filth that only us gods can crush!"

The many small inhabitants were in tremendous despair. The sour odor of Riku's reeking pit was spreading like that of hurricane winds, in some areas the musky sweat was flooding the streets. Chaos came with each verbal lash of the giant Riku.

Riku could spot some specks on the ground, in a sort of bowing motion. This made the godly teen lick his lips.

"Sora these runts think begging is gonna help them.", Riku chuckled to his fellow giant who laughed. "Push em in a little more, I want them to see the punishment for acting even more pathetic!"

Sora grinned. "On it!", the spiky haired giant added pressed the orbs in furthur, just enough to where he didn't obliterate them.

Riku smirked as his squishy pit consumed the specks of dirt even more. "Let this be a lesson shrimp, not even begging is gonna spare you from our godly fun!"

Next...
1211322211211121211111111.title: Godly Taunts

choices: Sora Removes his Shoes and Shows off Those Stinky Barefeet!!
1213.content:
https://i.imgur.com/4KOfIHk.png


Sora groaned slightly as he started to stir awake. The last thing he remembered was flying the gummi ship out to investigate a new world on behalf of King Mickey....and a strange light blinding him and causing him to veer off course. During the bumpy ride, he must've hit his head and fallen unconscious.

Who knows where he was now? Possibly drifting through space...with no fuel or supplies in the ship! He almost hesitated to open his eyes..but a sharp object poking at his cheek caused his lovely blue eyes to flutter open. Looking down to see what had prodded him in the face, he gasped slightly as he saw a tiny person holding a spear!

"Giant! What do you want with Lilliput?!" The tiny being demanded. It wasn't just one tiny person either, as Sora looked down at his body he would see dozens of the tinies who appeared to be wearing tribal warrior garments, scurrying to and fro across his immense form.

What's more, he appeared to be be tied down by loads of tiny, and easily breakable, strings! Sora couldn't help it, he had to laugh! What a thing to wake up to!

His laughter hurt the tiny warriors ears and his movements sent several of the tinies tumbling off of his torso. This caused them to start trying to stab him with their spears!

Bad move...it only succeeded in tickling the youth. "Ha ha ha ha ha! Cut it out!"

When his bellowing laughter finally subsided, he looked back down at the tiny who had woke him up in the first place. "So...where am I?"

"You're on our world: Lilliput! And you are to leave immediately!" The man threateningly held the spear at Sora's face.

Sora frowned, "Well that's kinda rude...I just got here!" Sora started to sit up, sending the man tumbling off of him and causing the threads to snap from his body. "Ha ha, you guys thought you could tie me down like this? That's kinda cute. Anyhow, is everyone here as tiny as you guys?"

Sora got to his feet, the ground quaked with his steps. "Whoa...!" Sora said in childish wonder as he saw that he indeed towered over not only people, but the entire landscape!

"I'm huge! This is soo cool!" Sora gleefully declared, his booming voice echoing for miles.

"Fire!" The chieftan yelled, hundreds of arrows and spears harmlessly bounced off of Sora's legs and shoes. "Huh? Aw don't be like that! It's not very smart to try to attack someone so much bigger than you ya know!" Sora crossed his arms and grinned mischievously.

The trip here had been hot and stuffy in that ship...he hadn't bathed in a couple days he remembered..and he wiggled his sockless toes with a squelch inside his shoes.
1213.title: Sora In Lilliput!

choices: Sora lifted his foot and lightly stomped the tinies!
The tinies suddenly started worshipping Sora's feet!
12131.content:
Lifting up his right black and yellow shoe, Sora positioned it in front of his left one. The tiny people backed away in fear as the treads of the shoe passed over and shook the ground with it's landing. Stepping down onto the heel of his right shoe, Sora pulled his sweaty foot out of its cavern. Bending down, the blue eyed boy held his left shoe down to pull out that foot.

Sora's feet matched his shoes, in the sense that they were very large. Being stuffed in those big shoes with no air really upped the stink level, if looking closely you'd swear steam was coming out of the shoes. The spiky haired teen could feel dirt starting to stick to his feet due to the wall of sweat coating his plump soles.

The tiny people suddenly were hit with the powerful aura of Sora's feet. The salty sweat made thier nostrils tingle and clench as the bitter smell entered. To boot was also the natural chessy odor of his smelly feet.

Sora giggled and wiggled his large toes, causing mini earthquakes.

Suddenly.....
12131.title: Large Shoes For Large Feet

choices: Sora Let's Them Know He was Joking..at least at first!
121311.content:
Sora grinned childishly as he admired how enormous his feet were, even moreso than normally, compared to the tiny folks. "Wow...my feet sure are huuuuge huh little guys?" He said as he folded his arms behind his head in his trademark pose.

Lifting his left foot, his enormous bulbous toes wiggled dozens of feet in the air as the tiny people were encased in the shadow of the large ped. The stink of foot cheese was all consuming as the foot slowly lowered onto them and pinned them beneath the plump and thankfully marshmallowy sole.

Sora's giggles echoed in their ears as the people squirmed and lightly tickled that foot of his. "Haha! My feet are so big you all can fit under there! This is awesome!" Sora gleefully exclaimed.

Feeling mischievous and a little playful, Sora grinned and made his first demand. "You all had better kiss the great Sora's foot if you don't want my GIANT FEET to stomp you out!" He joked, not that the tinies knew he was just playing around!

To Sora's surprise, he felt hundreds of tiny lips smooching his foot sole! It actually felt pretty good and made him feel pretty superior!

What now?
121311.title: Sora's Foot Show

choices: Sora decided to be a bit more mean
Sora gave the tinies a break
1213111.content:
Feeling more powerful at the tinies's obedience, Sora decided to test how dominant he could really be. Lifting his humongous left foot, Sora laughed as he brought his foot up and saw a few of the tiny people had stuck to his sole!

"Haha! I guess you guys really like my foot huh?"

Using his fingers, Sora plucked each of the tinies out of his sole and placed them back on the ground. The spiky giant took a step back and shook the island before lowering his body to the ground, making a crater with his butt. Sora then crossed his feet at the ankles and eagerly wiggled his toes.

"My feet are feeling a little sore, do me a favor little guys and give them a rub.", Sora said with a toothy grin.

The little people hesitantly all walked up to the towering soles. If the giant could fit all of them under his feet and had the potential to squash them, they'd rather not anger him. Entering the aura of cheese again, the now tiny foot rubbers started to kneed the large plump sole. Every rub did squelch out more salty sweat which dripped onto them. Even with all of them rubbing they could only reach the heel and some had to climb the wet sole to rub the higher parts.

Sora giggled, all the tiny hands tickled a bit but also felt good. His worn soles were little by little relieved of any tension.

After a little.....
1213111.title: Sora Is Boss

choices: Sora Demands His Feet Be Praised and Worshiped!
12131111.content:
Sora narrowed his eyes and chuckled, he decided to play a bit more into the 'mean giant' role. He grinned and did his best evil laugh, it rattled the already intimidated tinies to the core...even though to most it would sound really fake.

"Mwa ha ha ha ha! You puny bugs are sooo small compared to these BIG feet! I bet if I wanted to I could crush all of your houses under my soles!" Sora boomed. The tinies squeaked fearfully, causing Sora to giggle harder as they rubbed his feet with renewed vigor.

"Mmmm..hope you lil fellas like my foot cheese!" Sora cackled in his pretend evil giant voice.

Cheese was accurate, Sora's feet reeked of moldy cheddar...his feet were moist and soft to the touch but that stench was something else!

What happens now?
12131111.title: Big Bad Sora

choices: Is content and wants them to continue
121311111.content:
"Hehe, you know I'm not really feeling the love. Insects I want you to treat my feet as your god!", Sora cackled out while wiggling his toes.

The tinies looked at Sora from between his feet, looking to see if he was joking. Judging by the toothy smirk as he crossed his arms, it's safe to assume he's serious.

"Hey come on already! I don't wanna have to turn you guys to mush!", Sora threatened while keeping his cocky gaze staring at the bugs.

"I could put on a shoe, but I gotta warn you being crushed under that is gonna hurt a lot more then being squashed under my sole.", Sora said in a malicious tone.

The tinies immediately began to move. A row in the back got on thier knees and began bowing while muttering up random prays. The ones at the front resumed rubbing only to be interrupted by Sora.

"You've done enough rubbing, I want my feet licked!", Sora smirked as he flexed his large feet.

Although mortified that they would have to taste the rank feet, the tinies realized it was either tasting the foot cheese more becoming a red splat. The front group began running thier tongues over the expansive sole and cringing as the chessy moisture invaded thier tastebuds along with the salty sweat.

Sora....
121311111.title: Sora The God

choices: Timeskip to Sora having Solidified his Role as God
Sora is attacked by incoming soldiers!
1213111111.content:
Sora sighed in relaxation, who knew having your feet licked by a bunch of tiny people would feel so good? Sora was not a particularly malevolent or mean boy...but even the most innocent youths would have trouble not taking advantage of this situation!

So in that regard, Sora was going to milk this for all its worth. He remembered playing giant monster with Riku when they were younger, this was like that times a hundred. There was something about being so big compared to a bunch of people who you could now boss around and intimidate...that was so appealing.

Sora relaxed back with his arms folded behind his head, he had a big fat grin on his face and was looking very smug and pleased with himself. "Keep on licking, little guys. You're making your new gods feel good!" Sora boomed and gave his toes a playful wiggle.

Upon closer examination, Sora spotted bits of dirt and crud between his plump toes...and hatched a devilishly disgusting idea that was sure to be entertaining!

Tilting his feet forward a bit, the tinies began to panic as they thought the gigantic boy would surely crush them into paste beneath those meaty soles..only for their descent to stop when his toes were perfectly aligned with the miniscule people.

"Hey runts, check this out!" Sora grinned widely and spread his toes to unleash a hellish concentration of his cheese stench into their faces...accompanied by a wave of steamy heat.

"See all that crud in there?" Sora smirked as his toe crevices were exposed right in their faces.

"That's gonna be your meal!" Sora could hardly contain his laughter....this was priceless!
1213111111.title: A Contented Youth

12131111112.content:
Just as Sora felt the soothing feeling of the tongues licking his toe gunk, he felt a light tap on his cheek. Tilting his head up and grabbing whatever landed on his face, Sora saw it resembled a cannonball.

"What the...", just as Sora sat up he saw a ship appearing on the shores to the island. It looked to be a mile (or step to him) away.

"What's thier deal?", Sora said as he look down at the bugs near his feet.

One of the tinies that was bowing gulped before speaking as loud as he could. "Those are probably soldiers, from the island of Blefuscu!"

Sora quirked an eyebrow. "Well why are they attacking now?"

"They have been trying to take over for a while, we've been able to hold them off. But they have superior weapons and it's been difficult!", the chief explained as he paused in his licking.

Sora took to his thoughts. He was having fun messing with these bugs, but this seemed like a serious issue one only he could solve. Pulling his feet away, he stood up and towered over the people worshipping his feet.

The spiky hair boy gave a toothy smile down at the people. "Heh, don't worry your gods will take care of it!" He then picked up one of his back shoes still emitting a little steam. "Just in case I have to get serious."

The tinies watched as Sora stepped over them and towards the beach, making the ground quake.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
As Sora stepped onto the beach and felt the sand on his moist sole, he took a look at the ground. On the beach were a few tinies dressed differently then the other tinies. These ones were dressed in military like coats, colored red and white. More were located on thier ship in the water, looking up in shock at the giant teen.

Sora smirked before raising his left foot and releasing a rain of sand. The soldiers below gasped as they saw the boy's face covered by the sole as it approached.

Sora laughed as he leaned onto his foot. Unlike before, he stepped down hard and felt the bodies being squashed by his plump sole. Lifting his foot back up, the three people he stomped stuck to his sole luckily not as red paste but twitching from the flesh holding them prisoner.

Feeling light taps, Sora saw the ship firing thier cannons at him and the soldiers using thier rifles. Sora simply laughed as they only tickled him. The keyblade user smirked as he slipped his right shoe back on.

"Can't have the water wash the sweat away!"

The soldiers on the ship soon understood the statement as they were covered in a shadow and thier sky was filled with the treads of Sora's shoe. Quickly everyone abandoned the ship just as the black shoe came down and completely crushed the ship into the water and created a large wave.

As the soldiers from Blefuscu resurfaced, they saw Sora raise the foot with thier comrades squished into the sole.

"I suggest swimming back to your island, unless you wanna get squished like your friends!", Sora threatened wiggling his toes.

The soldiers quickly began swimming away as fast as possible. The ones in Sora's foot couldn't even speak as they were squashed again by Sora walking back to the others.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Arriving back to the others, Sora looked surprised when they began to bow immediately.

"Thank you giant!", the chief yelled out.

"Huh."

All the tinies looked up with determination in thier eyes. "We will worship you!"

Sora giggled before slipping off his now soaking wet shoe. "Alright little guys, but first you might wanna take care of these bugs.", titling his foot up, Sora flexed his sole to release them.

As the three popped off they were grabbed by the others and hauled away. Sora lowered himself and shook the ground as he sat. "Alright, now that we're good how about we resume that toe meal?"

The tinies quickly started again, wanting to please thier gods.

After a while.....
12131111112.title: Eliminating A Problem

choices: Sora Shows off For his Fans!
The Kids Want an Autograph maybe?
121311111122.content:
Sora took notice that some of the tinies were looking a bit wore out...probably not helped that his feet were pretty hot and sweaty either. Sora just wanted to have fun as a giant, he wasn't cruel or heartless...so he spoke up: "Hey lil guys, you can take a break. Your gods'll be here when you get back!" Sora smiled kindly.

The tinies bowed and some even had tears in their eyes...it must be overwhelming to encounter such a generous and even kindhearted giant. Sora chuckled and relaxed his arms behind his head, "It's no big deal...I don't want you guys hurt or anything." He said nonchalantly.

"You're such a kind hearted giant!" They cried out full of emotion. Sora blushed and grinned widely, "Hehe, thanks!"

"We shall build statues in your honor! We devote ourselves to you!" They cried out.

Sora chuckled, this was pretty cool...being loved and looked up to...literally!

A sudden grumble emitted from Sora's belly, and he placed a hand over his abdomen. "Hey uh...you guys mind preparing a feast for a big guy like me?"

"Of course! We will do anything for you! Our king is hungry!" Most of the tinies scurried off toward the town nearby to begin cooking a feast fit for a giant.

"Heh, King Sora...has a nice ring to it." Sora smiled, remembering how he wanted to be king of Pride Rock back when he visited Simba's world.

Looking down beside him, Sora saw several wide eyed tiny kids looking up at him in awe.

Looks like Sora has some fans...
121311111122.title: Sora gives a break

choices: The kids and Sora play a game
Sora goes to visit the other inhabitants
1213111111222.content:
Sora smiled as he watched the younglings bow thier heads quickly. Some ended up tripping over thier feet before quickly standing back up to bow. The giant teen giggled at the kids scrambling to try and mimic the adults. Sora slowly kneeled onto his right leg, the keyblade wielder then laid down his right palm in front of the kids.

The younglings looked wide eyed at the palm before gazing up at the giant. Sora smiled and nodded while lightly wiggling his fingers. The kids slowly crawled onto the fingerless gloved palm, about eight of them fit in the center. Sora curled his fingers slightly to secure them before rising again to his titanic height. He then brought the palm to his face.

A boy looking to be the oldest at around ten, approached Sora's wrist. "Ummm...we wanted to thank you your majesty! Everyone was working really hard to protect our home and you got rid of the meanies really quick!"

Sora warmly smiled and chuckled. "Hehe, hey no problem! Also you guys can just call me Sora, K?"

The kids nodded and grinned as they saw the giant's friendly nature. A few of the younger one's stepped forward and held up stone tablets.

"Um mist-Sora, could you please sign this?", one timidly asked.

"When you look up to someone strong you usually ask them to sign a tablet.", the other finished.

Sorry gave a toothy grin at the request. However, this would prove difficult. Both because he wasn't sure how to write on stone and that being a giant would prove fruitless in writing on something that small. After rubbing his chin for a bit, Sora grinned as a lightbulb went off in his head, turning to the youngling Sora brought a hand to his head.

"Well I'm sorry I can't really sign, but I can give you something!", Sora smiled before wincing as he pulled a strand of his spiky hair out. He then gave it to the two youngest.

The two kids looked in awe at the hair given to them. At thier size, the strand was like that of a light rope. They smiled and bowed again.

"Thank you very much!", they said in synch.

Sora gave a close eyed grin as he laughed, happy that the kids were happy.

Sora chatted with the kids for a good while, telling them about his adventures and getting to know them.

Soon....
1213111111222.title: Small Admirers

12131111112221.content:
"Um...Sora?" The oldest boy spoke again. Sora raised an eyebrow, "Yeah? What's up little fella?"

"Um...can we play with you?" The boy asked softly. Sora grinned widely, "Sure! What kind of game?"

"Giant monster!" The kids chorused excitedly. Sora smirked, "Really? Well I guess it's pretty obvious to pick that..." Sora said sheepishly.

"Your feet sure are biig, Sora!" Another of the kids praised. Sora grinned proudly and wiggled his plump toes down there, "Hehe, yeah..thanks for noticing! Perfect for stomping bad guys!" He shared a laugh with the kids.

"And they smell REALLY strong too!" One of the kids waved a hand in front of his nose jokingly. Sora smiled smugly, "Yeah! Back at the islands where I live...people would run for cover from these bad boys' smell!"

The kids were placed on the ground before Sora's titanic feet, he stood back up straight and put his hands on his hips..gaining a cocky grin. "Well well! Look what we have here! A bunch of puny humANTS ready to squash!" He slowly lifted his foot, showing off that wide sole which stunk like cheddar cheese and salt.

The kids giggled and pretended to scream as they darted away in all directions.

Sora gave a pretend evil laugh and stomped after them, making sure to put extra force into his stomps.
12131111112221.title: A Giant Game

choices: The kids find out a way to win!
121311111122211.content:
Sora rose his hands in a villianus manner as he grinned. "Heh just try running, you can't escape Sorazilla!"

The teen slowly stepped across the ground, looking at all the scattering dots. The ground thoomed beneath Sora's large feet. A few kids ended up in his sole's shadow, though he simply wiggled his toes and lowered his foot slow enough that they could run out of it's chessy aura.

Sora chuckled. "Hey come on little ants, my feet can't smell THAT bad!"

The kids giggled as they called out "They do!" And presumed thier evasion of the massive feet.

One boy end up tripping and falling down onto the ground. As he got up he found the area around him darkened and looking up he saw the tan sole filling his sky. It stretched so far and the toes even looked bigger then him. The plump sole soon came down and the cheesy smell increased intill finally the kid was lightly pinned and covered in the cheddary foot flesh.

Sora laughed as he felt the small body underneath him, the small body was like a mere ball of lint. He made sure not to add pressure to avoid hurting the kid.

"MUHAHA! I've squished one of you, no one can escape my monster feet. Now onto the rest!", Sora spoke in a mocking villian-like manner.

Taking his foot of the boy, the kid adjusted to the sudden light before looking up to see Sora's giant form grinning down at him.

"Nice try, but it looks like you lost! Go relax intill the game is done ok."

The child pouted before nodding and running towards a tree, sitting down to watch the rest of the game.

Sora put on a cocky grin as he resumed stomping his feet around trying to step on the kids. "Hehe, run little bugs before the mighty Sorazilla and his feet of destruction!"

The game resumed with Sora being quicker in his steps and catching more kids. He noticed a few intentionally stopped to get stepped on and looked disappointed when Sora took his foot off. Soon only three remained uncaught, the oldest out of their group.

Soon....
121311111122211.title: SoraZilla!

choices: Sora and Riku have Fun While Riku's Throne Is Built
Timeskip to The Palace's Grand Opening!
121311111123.content:
Soon after his toe gunk had filled the bellies of the now grateful and very much obedient tinies, Sora let them have a break. Pulling his shoes back on he winked at them, "Gotta keep them nice and stinky, and build up some more food for you fellas!"

The tinies cheered and scampered away to begin building monuments to Sora's glory and perhaps even a temple which would be the spiky teen's home.

Sora stood up and flexed his toes within the squishy insides of his shoes. "Well...since I crashed my ship here I guess I should get used to staying..." He thought to himself with a pang of sadness. His best buddy Riku would surely miss him...and he currently missed him as well!

With a slight sigh, he set off to explore the world he now would call home.

Sora came upon an expansive city that resembled an Incan or Aztec society...not that Sora knew about those. "Wow...these guys can sure build some neat stuff!" Sora squatted down over the main gate and poked at it...accidentally causing it to fall over.

"Oops...sorry!" Sora said with a sheepish chuckle. "It's no problem, your majesty!" The tiny voice of someone standing next to Sora's colossal shoe squeaked up.

Sora grinned, "Your majesty? You guys want me to be your king?" His eyes sparkled brightly.

"Mhm! You are our savior and our ruler after all! Your palace is nearly complete, my lord!" The tiny person scurried off, carrying supplies.

Sora's ego swelled and he giggled, "So I get a palace...I'm king of the tiny people!" He said with pride.

"I wish Riku could see-" Sora moped, until a group of tinies rushed up to his shoes. "Your highness! Another giant has arrived! He is being looked after by our top medics but we are not sure if he poses a threat!" They called up.

Sora's eyes widened, "Make sure everyone is safe...I'll go check it out!" They nodded and went into the process of securing the city.

The ground quaked as Sora went over to the beach where a certain young man without sleeves and a head of silvery hair lay and just beginning to stir.

"Riku? RIKU!" Sora yelled happily, Riku's eyes shot open as the giant spiky haired boy leaped onto him. "S-Sora? I've been looking for you everywhere! Your communicatons went dark!" Riku said as he lightly shoved Sora off of him.

"You're never going to believe this...!" Sora said with a bright smile.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sora and Riku walked along the islands after Sora had explained everything. "So you're a king of these tiny people? Heh, I almost feel bad for them..." Riku said with a teasing grin.

Sora pouted and crossed his arms, "What's THAT supposed to mean?"

Riku chuckled and shook his head, "Nothing...nothing. So you said you've been making them worship your feet like gods? And making them rub them and lick them? Ick...your feet always were infamous...at least now you've got some people to torment with their stink besides me."

Sora stuck his tongue out playfully, "Like you're one to talk! Though your armpits are your thing mostly...your feet are still bad!"

Riku grinned proudly and folded his sleeveless arms behind his head, exposing his moist armpits. "You know it."

They approached the city from before, and Sora announced that Riku was safe and wasn't here to invade. "My goodness! TWO giant kings? We'll have to make some adjustments and add in a second throne!"
121311111123.title: Familiar Face

choices: A different kind of worship is needed
1213111111232.content:
"My fellow Lilliputians, we are here to welcome and honor our new rulers! The giant beings called Sora and Riku!" , a tiny announced to a gathered crowd before the two titanic teens.

The citizens cheered as the declaration was made, Sora simply smiled and waved while Riku gained a smug grin and crossed his strong arms.

"Please your majesties, take your place on your throne.", the announcer called up to the looming boys.

The thrones in question were quite impressive, as two fitting seats made out of stone had been crafted in such a short time. Supposedly craved from a mountain.

The two giants took a seat on the surprisingly comfortable thrones. Sora wasted no time in slipping off his shoes, followed by Riku. The silver haired boy had feet almost as large as Sora's, with sweat dripping down the paler soles. Both placed thier feet on thier heels to fully show the plump soles

Riku felt his body jolt in surprise as a strange sensation came from his feet. Leaning forward, Riku saw a group of tinies had already began to rub his feet. It felt good, not only did Riku get a good foot rub but he gained a boost in his ego.

Looking over to Sora, Riku saw the boy's tan feet being attended to by another group and leaning into his throne with a relaxed face. Riku soon followed suit, relaxing and wiggling his large toes to enjoy the tinies servitude.

Soon....
1213111111232.title: Timeskip to The Palace's Grand Opening!

122.content: What happens involving Riku and size antics?
122.title: Riku

choices: Riku puts his sopping wet and reeking underarms to good use!
Riku needs to air out those feet!
1221.content:
https://i.imgur.com/yWh5VoB.png

"You want me to do what?" Riku had bluntly asked King Mickey, his mouse-eared friend whom had been with him on adventures and through his infiltration of Organization XIII.

"I know it sounds...er...odd....but it's what Master Yen-Sid said. You're to go to this world and deal with the villainy going on there. He wouldn't tell me much more than that...only that you'd enjoy being able to 'cut loose'." Mickey shrugged with a sigh.

Riku frowned, it was an odd request....wiping out a world was usually something considered evil and the doings of the darkness and Heartless. But the teen was intrigued, he had mere days ago received the title of Keyblade Master after completing his Mark of Mastery exam, Sora hadn't passed and was currently training elsewhere.

And now it seemed he was being permitted to go on what sounded like a break of sorts...disguised as a genuine mission. Riku sighed, "Whatever I guess, I'll head out now." Riku turned around and headed out to the docking area in order to get in a gummi ship.

"The journey will take about a week-!" Mickey yelled, causing Riku to flop over comically on the floor. "Wha-a whole WEEK to get there?!" Riku blurted in disbelief.

"Yep, Yen-Sid made sure to uh...mention that you'll be stuck in that cramped stuffy cockpit with no change of clothes, no shower available...he said it had something to do with the world." Mickey shrugged.

-One Week Later...-

"Finally! This stupid world!" Riku flopped back in the cockpit of the stuffy gummi ship. The insides of the ship now stunk of Riku's body odor and as instructed...the silver haired boy hadn't removed his shoes or socks in this whole time.

"I got no idea what to expect...but it better be worth this trouble." Riku grumbled as the ship went in for a final descent.

The landing gear was deployed, and the ship came to a rest on a landing pad....which was floating slightly off the ground in defiance of gravity itself.

Riku hopped out of the ship as it powered down, looking around skeptically...he realized he was standing on the outskirts of what appeared to be a model futuristic cityscape that stretched as far as the eye could see.

Raising an eyebrow, he saw millions and millions of miniscule people scampering around the streets. Jolting him out of his stunned state, his smartphone rang in his pocket.

Pulling out and seeing Sora's grinning face on the screen, Riku answered. "Hey, Sora...what's up?"

"Hey Riku!! I wish I could be there with you!! The King said you're getting to rampage in a tiny city like a giant monster!" Sora said excitedly with bright enthusiasm.

It finally dawned on Riku the reason for all this...the sweat and stink buildup, the lack of bathing or changing his clothes...the tiny city of villains...oh yes...he indeed was going to enjoy this.

"Yeah, it's pretty awesome...better get to work!" Riku said, clicking the phone off, knowing Sora would pout for a bit but he'd understand.

Looking down at the city, Riku licked his lips.
1221.title: Riku's GIANT mission!

12211.content:
Multiple ideas of how to go about his rampage plagued Riku’s mind. The familiar sour scent of his underarm caught his attention. Smirking, the purple head lifted his strong arm to view his armpit.

He had small purple hairs stuck to the pit from all the sweat. To him it was sweat, but to the bugs it would be torture.

Looking down at the city, Riku found a group of people staring up at him. Unlike the rest they approached the giant and gazed up in awe at his looming muscular body and his handsome face peering over his pecs down at them. The giant licked his lips as he crouched down, darkening his shadow and placing his hands on his knees.

“Aw did you bugs come as a offering?”, Riku smirked and asked in a mocking voice. The giant lifted his arm and sniffed his pit before bringing his cocky gaze back to the bugs.

“How about I give you bugs an up close look?”

Reaching down, Riku scooped the specks up into his palm. Without giving so much as a warning, he planted the vermin against his armpit. Closing his armpit, Riku hummed as he felt all the pathetic squirming.

Opening his pit back up, Riku saw the bugs tangled in his armpit! Some of the specks had become red splats, while others still struggled against the smelly prison. With a smirk, Riku sealed them back into his armpit.

What was next?
12211.title: Riku’s Sweaty Prison

choices: Riku Uses the Building as Deodorant!
Riku Holds it Near His Pit to Fumigate it!
122111.content:
Looking back down to the masses of people at his bare and quite odorous feet, Riku saw the terror and disgust on their faces and chuckled. "Hah, what's wrong? You should've expected something like this...I mean after all...a stud like me not wearing sleeves...I got to take advantage of this!" Riku mocked and gave his bicep a flex.

The people were in full blown panic mode, a sweaty teenage giant with seemingly no remorse was here to destroy them and everything they knew...you'd be terrified too!

Riku leaned down to a crowded apartment complex and literally picked it up right off of its foundations...bringing it up to his eye level to peer in at the tiny terrified occupants.

Riku lifted his opposite arm to reveal that armpit once more...
122111.title: Riku's Armpit Fun

1221111.content:
The teen looked through the window to see all the terrified tinies. To all the inhabitants all they saw was the blue-green eye peering in at them. As Riku pulled his face away, they all saw his handsome face smirking as he lifted his arm over his heat to expose his sweaty pit. The teen looked down at all the specks running around his fuming feet.

"I guess since you bugs are bothered, I'll need to put on some deodorant!" Riku looked back at the crumbling building in his left hand with a malicious grin. "You vermin outta do the job!"

Riku brought the building over to his empty armpit. Immediately the structure broke upon impact and caused havoc for the people inside. A few luckily flew out the windows unscathed, only to land on the slimy skin of Riku's pit. The salty stench attacked them and encased them in a prison of rank odor mixed with the salt and oniony musk

The bugs could only watch helplessly as the building's remains were smeared over the vast pit and were crushed with those unable to escape.

Riku hummed, the wreckage itched his squishy pit and he could feel the pathetic squirming of those still alive.

What was next?
1221111.title: Deodorant For A Giant

choices: Riku Decides to go on a Stinky Footed Rampage
12211111.content:
"Heh, looks like you little vermin and your pathetic hiding spot didn't do ANYTHING to make my pits more fresh. Ah well, my bad." Riku snarked as he looked down at the tinies around his bare and still quite sweaty feet.

"Looks like you runts'll have to put up with my b.o. for awhile longer...until I crush you all!" Riku venomously said, striking cold fear into the entire populace.

Lowering his muscular arm over his still delightfully squirming victims, Riku licked his lips as he felt them compressed along with the rubble of the building along his squishy pit flesh.

Lowering himself down now, he plopped his muscular rear end clad in his jeans down onto the edge of the city...devastating the areas that found themselves beneath his rump...not that he cared.

He now propped his sweaty and long feet up on their heels, flexing his muscular toes in anticipation. The stink of vinegar and salt pervaded the air and caused the tiny citizens to cough and gag.

Riku smirked, "Something wrong? Like I said before, I've been stuck in that gummi ship for over a week...just to come see you maggots! Show some appreciation for your new god's smell." Riku reclined back and fanned his toes back and forth, fanning vinegar tinged foot odor everywhere.

Closing his eyes and drinking in their fear and his power...Riku spoke..
12211111.title: Riku's Fun

choices: Riku decides to crush them anyway
122111111.content:
Riku had on a cocky grin as his sweaty soles towered over the pathetic specks. The teen showed his superiority to the bugs just by being in thier presence, time to really show who's boss.

"Alright insects, I don't want to repeat myself so listen!", leaning onto a demolished building, Riku put his hands behind his head. "Your god needs a good footrub after having his feet contained for so long. So use those puny bodies and put them to use!"

The various specks looked shocked at the order. The salty and vinegary soles were as high as buildings and the heels looked to go up to fifteen feet tall. Riku narrowed his eyes as he saw the bugs gawking at his feet rather then worshipping.

"Hey, hurry up and get to it. If any of you runts want to just stand and gawk, then I'll squash you flatter then a pancake!", Riku smirked wiggling his smelly toes again.

The bugs quickly rushed to crowd around the heel to start the worship. A good number stayed at the body kneading the rough heel while others began climbing the sweaty sole to reach the soft part and begin rubbing the large sole. The sweat leaked on the bugs and drenched them in its salty odor and burned thier eyes, they dared not show any pain. If Riku saw thier distaste, no doubt the sole would have red splats decorating it.

Riku sighed as he felt the numerous tiny hands pressing into his feet. It was hardly a foot rub, but it fueled the boy's ego and sense of power.

What was next?
122111111.title: Worship Or Get Squished

choices: Riku Takes His Time Making an Example Out of The Boy
1221111111.content:
"Hmmm...I think I want to feel your tongues just so I know how devoted you are to your God." Riku smirked devilishly and wiggled his enormous toes once more.

The tinies couldn't help but be horrified at the demand..it was bad enough to smell these gargantuan feet at such close proximity and get themselves coated in gross foot sweat...but now they were going to TASTE it?!

"N-No! You can't do this to us!" A spirited tiny youth called up in defiance. The other tinies scrambled to clamp their hands over his mouth..but the damage was done.

Riku sneered down at the tinies around his feet, "Alright..who's the wise guy?"

The tinies whimpered but gave no response, the lad was just a boy after all...surely he could be forgiven.

Riku narrowed his eyes but shrugged his muscular shoulders, "Guess you'll all just have to die then..." He said casually, it wouldn't be anything to him to crush them clearly.

At this threat, all ideas of protecting the young man went out the window as they practically thrust him up toward Riku's toes so he could be seen.

The boy found himself within the immense toe gap between Riku's big and second toe on his left foot. He visibly gagged, this was most clearly seen by Riku.
1221111111.title: More worship

choices: Riku uses his muscles to torture the boy
12211111111.content:
From the slimy toe crevice, the young man coughed from the thick putrid odor of Riku's vinegary and chessy scent. The tiny however froze as he brought his gaze up and saw Riku staring directly at him with a cruel smirk.

"Heh, so bug you think your mighty huh?", Riku said mockingly as he could see the small speck between his toes. It was such a pitiful sight, a bug trapped between his smelly toes. "Well then, feel honored your god will show the others what awaits thier disobedience!"

The next thing the boy knew, the big and second closed in on him. The squishy walls squeezed him to keep him encased in the salty odor flesh. Riku laughed, he felt the pathetic squirming as he clenched his toes. Closing his eyes, the purplette leaning back onto the weak building, crushing it more.

"This little ant is gonna spend some time getting crushed by my toes, everyone else get to licking.", Riku ordered as he relaxed, ready to punish any bugs ready to give him lip.

The bugs stood in fear as they watched the young man get consumed by the mighty toes. With no other option, they began to lick the humungous sole. Eyes clenched as the salty sweat filled thier tastebuds and stung thier nostrils, filling the mouths with sweat.

Riku hummed and licked his lips. The wet streaks running over his sole and made his feet feel more plump from the service. He rubbed his toes to squish up the boy and remind him of his place.

What was next?
12211111111.title: Punishing A Bug's Disobedience

choices: Riku Takes his Time And Gently Smooshes Them In!
122111111112.content:
Riku spotted a couple runts who were doing a less than satisfactory job of rubbing his feet. Scowling at first, he soon gained a cocky grin as he realized he now had an excuse to punish them...not that a giant like him had to have a 'reason'.

"I see you are slacking off!" Riku's voice thundered as he reached forward and plucked up the microbes between his forefinger and thumb. They squirmed and wailed, pleading for mercy. "Please spare us! We were just trying to stop coughing!" They sobbed.

Riku held them before his colossal face and sneered, "You should be grateful to breathe in my foot air! It's a privilege to be so close to the feet of GOD!" Riku roared.

Riku glanced down at his exposed left armpit, this arm was still folded behind his head. "Maybe I should see how you deal with another of my smells...." Riku said slyly and slowly lowered the microbes in front of his enormous and steaming pit.
122111111112.title: Riku punishes more bugs

1221111111121.content:
"Take a good look runts!", Riku smirked as he saw his expansive plump flesh awaiting decorations. However, Riku wanted to show what happens when his feet aren't given worship. Rather then just make these bugs splat Mark's he was gonna make them be alive.

Pressing his thumb and finger into the steaming skin, Riku moaned as the specks littered his pit. They may be small but the feeling of power rose from thier microbe bodies. The bugs felt stuck by the glue like oniony sweat and purple hairs tangling.

Riku cooed at the specks and smirked. "Aw, how nice you bugs are trying to enjoy my pit. Here let me help you~"

Lifting a finger, Riku placed it on one of the dots. Swiveling his finger, Riku smooshed the bug into his slimy pit. The sweat and odor was shoved into the tiny's nostrils and nose as the weight on his back presses him into the put with a SQUELCH.

The other tinies watched horrified as one of them was being squashed into the pit. The finger lifted and stuck to the ground was the bug thankfully not crushed. It seemed Riku wanted to keep them alive to give them full torture.

Riku grinned smugly as the runt was glued like lint to his pit. Lowering his eyes to the others, the purple haired boy smirked and rose a finger.

"Dont worry you'll get a turn!"

What was next?
1221111111121.title: Gentle Torture

125.content: Perhaps some of the Kingdom Hearts 3 versions?
125.title: others

1251.content:
https://i.imgur.com/XiJ4Zf2.png

Okay so what happens with our spiky protagonist?
1251.title: Sora (KH3)

choices: A Giant Sora in OUR World?!
Giant Sora in an Original World!
12513.title: Is In a Tiny World?

125131.content:
https://i.imgur.com/XiJ4Zf2.png

*SPOILERS FOR THE ENDING OF KINGDOM HEARTS 3*

---------------------------


Sora had done it, he'd used the Power of Waking to save Kairi. He was able to see her safely home to Destiny Islands and spend a day with her...before vanishing forever.

Such was the cost of the Power of Waking. Sora had misused it six times to save his friends and change the outcome of their final battle. But utilizing it a seventh time to save Kairi after she had been murdered by Xehanort...had cost him his existence.

Or so everyone had told him.

Sora was surprised to open his eyes once again, as if he'd fallen asleep on the ground. He'd been warned over and over by multiple people that once he overused the power...he'd be gone for good.

Blinking a few times, Sora saw nothing but bright blue sky...and a few clouds. "Huh...?" Sitting up quickly, Sora saw he was in some sort of field...and adjacent to him was what appeared to be a dollhouse of some sort.

"Weird..." Sora said, leaning down to the 'doll house' and peeking inside one of the windows.

******

The occupant of the home was a young man whose parents were out of the country for a business trip, leaving him in charge of the house. It was noon, the boy had just woke up after sleeping in late.

He startled to see a gigantic sky-blue eye peering in at him, dwarfing the window itself. Young Gregory could scarcely believe it...then he finally started screaming.

Sora was surprised to see a tiny person inside the model house! Wait...tiny person...tiny buildings. "Woah, am I back in that weird Timeless River world?" Sora crossed his arms and closed his eyes to think it over.

"Hmm..can't be! Everything isn't black and white." Sora resolved that he'd better stand up and try to figure out where he was.

Gregory meanwhile was panicking as the entire house shook as Sora got to his feet...the giant boy's shadow fell over the entire property.

"WOW! I'M EVEN BIGGER THAN I WAS BACK THEN!" Sora's voice rumbled down, causing Greg to clutch his hands over his ears.

Gregory didn't want to stick around for whatever this gigantic freak was going to do. But if he ran outside he might get crushed!

Crouching down over the house, Sora looked back inside. "Hey uh...I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm kinda lost. Can you tell me where I am?"

"Y-you're in America! New York! ....Planet Earth?" Came the shrill squeak of a reply.

"Hmmm...never heard of any of those places. Can you come out here and tell me more? I'm not going to hurt you." Sora said kindly. "My name's Sora."
125131.title: Giant Sora in a Strange Land

1251311.content:
Gregory sat behind his bed in panic, a giant as big-or even bigger then a skyscraper looming over his house wasn't what he thought he wake up to! Still the boy seemed friendly, had he meant any harm he would've simply torn into his home and grabbed him.

"Y-you promise not to eat me right, i don't taste good!", Greg said peeking over his bed at the large eye.

Sora lightly giggled, trying not to shake the house with his voice. "I promise, i don't want to hurt you. I just need some help on where i am, so please don't be scared.

Gregory blinked before taking a breath, slowly standing up he walked down the stairs of his house. Opening up his door, the boy gulped as on both sides of his house were the large shoes of the giant, looking bigger then his home.

Sora looked in awe as the tiny walked out of his house, he was so small. No wonder he was scared...

The brunette rubbed the back of his head. "Sorry about scaring you, guess i didn't think how someone so tiny would react.", Sora smiled sincerely before bringing his hand down. Gregory backed away slightly but calmed down when Sora placed his palm down before him.

Sora gave a friendly smile. "Could i pick you up, just so that i can see you better?"

The tiny felt more at ease by the careful approach by the giant, so he slowly climbed onto the warm palm. He fit like a pea right in the center, being smaller then Sora's thumb.

"Man hes like a Kaiju, i bet he could give Godzilla a ran for his money.", now that he was relaxed Gregory found himself more in awe with the sheer might of Sora's height.

Sora slowly lifted up his hand, not wanting to shake up Gregory. He smiled as he brought the young man to his face finding the tiny sitting in his palm kinda adorable.

"M-my name is Gregory.", the tiny said slowly. Sora smiled as he curled his fingers slightly to keep the little guy secure. "Hi Gregory like i said before I'm Sora."

"Soooo are you an alien?", Gregory suddenly asked.

"Huh?", Sora blinked tilting his head at the sudden question, Gregory's eyes sparkled in curiosity as he sat up on the gloved palm.

Gregory thought about everything possible, every fictional story or conspiracy on beings that could be like Sora. "Are you an Old one, do you know about the fish people?!"

Sora pouted at that. "Hey I'm not old and I'm just like you...well except bigger hehe", he chuckled. "Back where I'm from you might've been as big as me. But could you maybe tell me about you and what exactly New York is?"

The tiny hummed. "Well right now were in the upstate part, most people know it for the city but my parents moved here some time ago."

Sora listened intrested to the tiny's words. "Ohh so this world is called New York!", he said slightly blasting Gregory with his warm breath. Clenching his ears, Gregory sweatdropped at the assumption.

"Um no New york is just a part of this world, we actually have a lot of cities and countries. And what do you mean world?", Gregory asked curiously.
