Sora frowned as he remembered everything that has happened. "Well...i wanted to save my friend and i had used this power called Waking, i managed to save her but it was too much for me. We got to spend the day in peace then the next thing i know i woke up next to your house Greg."

Gregory looked sympathetically at the giant, waking up after thinking you vanished couldn't be a great feeling. Crawling over to the large thumb, the tiny slowly rubbed it in a comfort attempt.

"I'm sorry that happened to you Sora. You did a good thing if you wanted to ensure your friend was ok. Um...if you want you can stay here until you figure out how to return."

Sora blinked as he brought his palm closer. "Greg..are you sure, you aren't worried?"

Gregory put on a shaky smile. "N-no it's fine my parents are on a trip plus we own this land. Nobody should see you...for now at least."

Sora smiled happily as he suddenly brought Gregory to his face, hugging him to his cheek. "Thank you so much little guy!"

Gregory flushed at the sudden action before awkwardly hugging the warm cheek and patting it. "N-no problem big guy."

Next...
1251311.title: New Faces, New Worlds

choices: Sora Wanted to See this New York City Place...
Sora Has Luckily Not Gone Far...
12513111.content:
A low rumble broke through the air. The ear splitting roar sounded like some kind of terrifying beast, it was enough to make Greg become terrified all over again and start shaking. Sora held Greg in his palm and chuckled sheepishly.

"Sorry, Greg. I kind of...haven't eaten in awhile." Sora said with a toothy grin. "Oh...that was just your stomach..hehehe..." Greg chuckled, feeling relief it wasn't some sort of monster who had followed his new giant friend.

"Well...why don't you put me down and get comfortable. There's plenty of room here, I'll make some calls and get you some food." Gregory suggested.

"Wow, really? Thanks!" Sora said happily as he crouched down and placed Greg back onto the lawn.

"No problem!" Greg said as he darted back into the house. Sora stood back up to his mountainous height and looked around. "Wow, I'm so big I can see a city waaay over there!" Sora boomed aloud.

The spiky headed hero could get used to being this size. The house shook around Greg as Sora took a few steps around the property.

********

"Hello? I need to place an order for fifty buckets of fried chicken. Maybe an order of mashed pota-...hello?" Greg was met with a dial tone, they'd hung up.

"Why am I not surprised...it sounds like a prank just by saying it out loud." Greg sighed in defeat. "I'll just try some other places and pray they take me serious."

Greg never used those food delivery apps before...but boy was it coming in handy now.

Meanwhile, Sora was wandering around, feeling grateful he was welcomed by a new friend who at least had room.

One thing Sora was curious about..was whether he kept his powers and most of all: The Keyblade. Putting his hand out to summon the mystical weapon, he sighed as the familiar magic that made it appear in his grip...didn't occur.

"I guess I really did pay a price for overusing that power." Sora sighed and looked at his hands, curling and uncurling his fingers.

"Hopefully I can find a way back to everyone. But for now...this is pretty cool." Sora relaxed his arms behind his head in his casual pose, continuing to walk along.

Sora's tremendous shoes were leaving enormous footprints in his wake. So needless to say if he went too far...Greg would have a trail to follow.

Greg FINALLY got someone to take him seriously, and a truck full of freshly made pizzas was on its way. "Now I just gotta keep the big guy out of sight-" Greg looked outside and saw that Sora had apparantly wandered off.

"Oh jeez..." Greg darted out of the house and saw a trail of humongous shoeprints heading away from the house...the question is...did Sora leave the property?
12513111.title: Hungry, Hungry Sora

choices: They make it back in time for delivery
125131112.content:
Sora smiled as he continued his strool across the green countryside, enjoying the cool air and warm sun. It was a peaceful atmosphere much needed after the dark events that had transpired. Still he had a new friend and he was willing to help him until he could get home!

While he enjoyed his walk, Sora seemed oblivious to just how big he was. The bridge sized treads of his shoes sank into the grounds, creating rows to put plant seeds down.

An elderly woman watching T.V jumped as the ground outside the house shook like that of a rhythmic earthquake. "What in tarnation?!"

Wobbling to the window the woman gasped as the fields that had yet to have a tractor run through were set for planting. "BILLY COME HERE THE ALIENS CAME AGAIN!"

Meanwhile, Greg huffed as he jogged after the the boot shaped prints. The imprints looked bigger then a condo and Greg wouldn't lie when he was worried might crush something...or someone by accident!

Finally, after 20 minutes of running, Greg found the giant other worlder. It was a coastline a small beach that was empty due to the chill of the fall season. Sora was sitting criss cross and easily picking up piles of sands between his fingers.

"Sora hey!", Greg called jogging up before taking a seat to relax next to the giant knee clad in dark pants.

The spiky brunette smiled as he awkwardly chuckled. "Oh hey Greg, sorry i kinda wanted to see more of New York. I guess i didn't realize how much i travel at this size."

Gregory sighed as he regained his breath. "Its..ok i come here by foot a lot so I'm use to the walk. Plus it's only natural to wanna explore this new world. Are you ok?", the tiny asked noticing the thoughtful look on the giant's face.

Sora nodded and smiled as he looked out at the sun reflecting on the ocean. "Yeah this spot just reminds me of home. Me and my friends Kairi and Riku grew up on a place called Destiny islands it was like this beach...well bigger of course hehe."

Gregory looked out at the ocean seeing sea lions hop up on some of the rocks. "You miss them a lot huh. I know it might not be the same but when i was in middle school my best friend had to move away. I wanted to give her my number but i never put it in her goodbye letter."

The tiny pattes Sora's knee. "People might get separated but...you still have the memories of them. Keep them strong and they'll bring you back to your friends."

Sora grinned before giving a sharp nod. "Yeah your right! I'm not gonna give up on reuniting with them i swear on it!", jumping up had Gregory bounce into the air before landing with a yelp. "Opps sorry!"

Greg sighed smiling. "Its cool, still getting use to that size. Anyways the pizzas suppsed to be here in 30 minutes and i spent 20 walking. You mind giving me a lift back?"

Sora nodded eagerly reaching down he scooped the tiny into his palm. Walking back over the trail of giant footprints.

Soon...
125131112.title: Follow The Bootprints

choices: Andy Smells Rotten Cheese....and Gets Suspicious
1251311121.content:
The titan and his small friend arrived back at Gregory's home in a matter of seconds. Sora's huge feet sure made travel easier! Placing Gregory down on the grass, Sora sat down with a mighty WHUMP!

Greg wobbled on his feet from the huge quake that Sora's butt caused. Looking up towards the road, Greg's eyes bulged as he saw the huge truck headed their way! "Oh crap! Hide, hide!" Greg yelped up at Sora.

"Huh? What for?" Sora asked innocently with a raised eyebrow.

"If we let the delivery guy or anyone see you...people'll freak out!" Greg warned. "Oh...OOoooh..." Sora nodded firmly and crawled behind the house, keeping low. The large delivery truck came up the driveway, the delivery boy might've been suspicious about the hundreds of pizzas order...if he didn't know Greg personally.

The delivery boy's name was Andy, he was Greg's best friend. Parking the truck, Andy got out of the driver's seat. "You having a party or something?" Andy asked.

"No...nothing like that." Greg said nervously as he fumbled for his bank card.

"Oh. So I guess you'll be eating pizza for a few weeks...or months." Andy said.

"Yeah sure." Greg answered shortly.

"You're acting kinda nervous. Is something up?" Andy asked suspiciously. Greg gulped, "N-nervous? Me? No..nothing's wrong." Greg said with a nervous chuckle.

Meanwhile, Sora was trying to pop his shoes off. His feet might've been a lot bigger than normal...but they were sweaty and a little sore from that walk!

Trying to keep it down, he finally popped the footwear off. "Ahhh...oop!" Sora let out a booming sigh and then clamped his hand over his mouth...remembering he was supposed to be hidden.

Gently placing the footwear down, still emitting steam from within their depths. Sora rested his feet on their heels and let his gargantuan, pink and very meaty feet breathe.

Sora grinned as he decided to compare his foot's size to the house.
1251311121.title: Sora's Pizza Time

12513111211.content:
Sora grinned as he flexed his warm and plump soles, not only was airing out his feet relaxing but from his view his toes looked like they were going above Gregory's house!

Meanwhile, Greg fiddled with his bank card as he started to gather the many boxes of pizza. Andy rose an eyebrow as he gathered his own stack. "You sure you're ok man? You seem kinda on edge."

Gregory awkwardly chuckled as he led to way to the front patio where he began placing the boxes. "Yep couldn't be better! Jusst really feelin these next few months of pizzas haha!"

Andy was about to question further when a bitter stench suddenly hit his nose, it smelt like body odor. The strong scent was hitting in warm waves and had a putrid...cheese smell?

"Ugh dude did something die in your house!", the pizza man said plugging his nose as the thick smell clogged his nostrils.

Coughing into his fist, Gregory widened his eyes as he smelled the odorous wind. He had his share of used socks and this definitely was the foot cheese sweat you get from worn/baking your feet in shoes.

"Damn that must be Sora, geez who knew he stunk that much!", Gregory panicked as hiding the giant was even more difficult.

"Uhh well you know now that my folks aren't here I've kinda been leaving my socks around!", he quickly blurted out coughing as he breathed in the putrid air.

Andy looked unimpressed. "Ok there is no way your socks would be that cough! bad. Look i can call someone to take over my shift while i check whatevers making that smell!"

Greg put his hand on his friend's chest to stop him. "NO! Uh...it's fine I'll go check you just keep bringing out the pizzas k!?"

Without giving him a chance to respond, Gregory jogged around his house. He coughed as the sweaty smell of putrid cheese odor grew stronger.

"Sora what happe-MPH!", the question was cut off as Greg turning the corner directly ran into a wall of warm and sweaty heel. Like a speck, Gregory was absolutely tiny compared to the looming stompers with smeared sweat drops falling like buckets.

Gregory groaned as he was face first in the warm sole, his nose directly smelling the bitter cheddar funk. What's worse is like glue the sweat had him stuck to the warm stinky foot.

The tiny couldn't yell as he risk tasting the seemingly endless sweat shedding from the feet. The warm bitter stench squelched out as Sora flexed his huge feet.

Soon...
12513111211.title: Hiding is much more difficult

131.content: What Kind of story shall you spin?
131.title: Decisions, decisions.

choices: Other? (I just don't want to waste an choice slot)
1313.content: So Bulma got ambitious and went for an entire city. Now when does our tale take place?
1313.title: Final choices.

13132.content:
[Credit for chapter goes to https://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/v... ]

https://giantessbooru.com/post/view/2292... (This is for Size reference)

One day, a small city not too far from West City (Home of Capsule Corp.) Suddenly vanished, in the blink of an eye, the whole city had been wiped off the map as if it was never there in the first place. Theories started appearing all over the Internet as to what exactly happened to the city. Everything from Aliens to Demons and even secret government experiments were blamed, but none of them had any concrete evidence to back them up. To this day, no one really knows what had happened to this Unnamed City. No one, except a certain blue-haired scientist......

Bulma had stopped for a short breath during the final rounds of her jogging in the morning, wiping her head she look down at her watch. "One lap left...." She said to herself before she started back. She had started doing these shortly after Bulla had been born as she had gotten out of shape while she was pregnant and, well, she had a new "hobby" that was more enjoyable when she was all hot and covered in sweat.

Walking into her room, Bulma checked what everyone else was doing to make sure she wouldn't be disturbed during her "fun" "Okay.... Mom's watching Bulla today, Trunks went to go play with Goten and Marron, and Vegeta...." Bulma sighed in frustration. "Of course He's training. What else does that Meathead of a Saiyan do?" Bulma said while pushing a couple of buttons on a hidden console in the wall. "If he won't "play" with me, I guess I'll have to do it myself!" A panel in the wall slid open to reveal a hidden room! "Welp time to see how my "subjects" are doing." Bulma said with a sly smirk on her face. She had made a bunch of these kind of rooms to hid some of her more... questionable activities.

Taking a step into the room she saw her newest "project" in all it's glory. An entire city that had been shrunken! Originally it was small enough to be held in Bulma's hand, thats how she moved it with no one noticing. Now it had been regrown to big enough for her to still have fun with.
Bulma grinned as she slipped her jogging shoes off and smelt one of them "Whew! That smells awful, it's perfect!"She said with a mischievous grin

She tossed the shoe into the street and watched the tiny people reacted to the disgusting footwear. Some ran, some started vomiting on the streets others just fainted. "Aw come on guys, it's not THAT bad." Bulma said as she fit her other shoe on top of a round building, letting her foot stench permeate throughout it.

She sat down in front of the building,her legs creating wall so the people couldn't escape. Watching as the tiny people ran out to escape the smell, only to be hit by the source of the stench, Bulma's sock clad feet! "Awww what's wrong guys? They're just feet, it's not anything to be scared of!" Bulma said whilst wiggling her toes. "Here, I'll show you just how beautiful they are!" She started peeling her socks off, they were so soaked in sweat that they could've been wrung out and create a sizable pool of water.

When she finally got them off, they were dripping in sweat, like they had been dropped into a pool. The poor people at her feet were gagging at the smel
l assaulting their noses.

"Hmph! How rude, a sexy woman like me shows you her amazing feet and you start gagging!" Bulma said. The tinies look up a her in fear as they had learned in the past couple of months that you NEVER make Bulma mad, Bad things tend to happen to people that upset the Blue-Haired Woman. "In fact, I'm so mad, I should just crush all of you right now!" The people fell to their knees begging her to not kill them.

"Welllll, I could give you guys a second chance, IF you started worshiping my feet!." Instantly, Bulma felt their tiny hands and tongues on her soles, as small as they were, the sensation was refreshing nonetheless. Bulma rested her back on the buildings behind her and closed her eyes,

"Ahhhhh, A girl could get use to this...." She thought to herself, Feeling some of the people stop, she opened one eye and said: "If any of you run away, I'll stuff you all into my socks." afterwards, she felt them start worshiping even faster. "Muuuch better." she said before closing her eyes once more........
13132.title: Super

131321.content:
Bulma's large slender toes wiggled and flexed, fanning her torturous foot stink down upon her civilians made servants. Her feet were wet with sweat and glistening, they reeked like moldy cheese and the runts coughed and gagged on her powerful stench.

The tiny people whimpered and sobbed at this situation, they wished they could escape this gargantuan wicked scientist who had kidnapped them. She was a complete titan compared to them...in total control...and she loved it!

"Mmm...my feet are so BIG compared to you maggots!" Bulma thundered, it was clear she was digging this power rush.

Looking down at her toys, she noticed some of them trying to stealthily sneak away from her. "Oh? And just where do you think you're going?"
The runaways froze in fear, they knew the jig was up and they had lost all hope of getting away from this mad scientist, Before they could even react her hand had already scooped them up and had brought them to her face. "It seems you don't appreciate my lovely feet enough....." Bulma said, her perceiving eyes looking down on them. "Maybe you'll like them if you get up close and personal with them!" A mischievous smile grew on her face as she put two of them in between her big toe and the toe next to it, one for each foot. The smell was amplified much more when they were even closer to her massive toes, it almost smelled rotten!

Bulma gazed down on the final runaway as they cowered in fear on her hand. " Hmmmm, Shall I do something special with you? Or should I let you join your lucky friends?"

"P-please, I-I'm sorry-" The poor shivering boy tried to plead, but Bulma was already struck by an idea...a really cruel and nasty one.

"Hmmm....I'm pretty sweaty...and just for you tinies I didn't wear deodorant for my jog!" Bulma bragged and crinkled her nose as some of her b.o. wafted up her nose as she placed the tiny on her knee for safekeeping...while she stripped.

Bulma stripped off her shirt and revealed her voluptuous and still very nicely rounded breasts in a tight bra. "Ahhh..that air feels good...now...time to lift these arms." Bulma plucked the tiny up and lifted an arm slowly and seductively to reveal her rancid and glistening pit.


The boy's eyes had started watering as soon as she had lifted her long slender arms, it would have been attractive if it wasn't for the abhorrent stench emanating from it.He could almost see the stink coming off of the pit, it looked as though the air itself was being distorted by the stench, either that or it was steam being released from the confines of her armpit. He attempted to wiggle out of Bulma's hand but her grip was too strong. "A little eager aren't we? Then I'll skip the foreplay and let you get right to it!" Bulma said before pushing the small bug right into her pit, pressing him right into the middle of the pit.

If the boy had ever thought of what hell was like, then this was infinitely worse than anything he could have imagined. The pit was so soaked in sweat that he was coated almost immediately, he had made the mistake of opening his mouth to scream as she pushed him leading to him getting a mouthful of the vile liquid. He reflexly gagged as more and more sweat forced its way down his throat. The Wicked Scientist wasn't satisfied with just pushing him in though, she began rubbing him up and down her armpit, making even more sweat cover him.

She stopped moving her finger and moved away.... only to find that the sweat had stuck him to her flesh! "HAHAHAHAH! Thats the Funniest thing I've ever seen! You're so small and pathetic that you actually got stuck!" Bulma said whilst wiping away a tear. "Ahhhh, I've had a lot of great ideas but Shrinking this city was easily my best! I think I'll let you stew in there while I continue my fun....."

Closing her arm trapped the boy in a voidlike darkness. The stench was getting worse by the second. "God, it smells like something, no SEVERAL things have died in here!" Considering her newfound hobby, that assumption wasn't too far off.
"I gotta get out of here, or else this smell is going to.....going to..... The rancid, almost tangible smell of rotten eggs and molding bread had begun invading the boys body, soaking his skin, flowing through his mouth, seeping into his ears, and burning his nose. I gotta get out.... I gotta ge... I....I... Eventually, the oder had invaded his very mind..... The boy stopped thinking shortly afterwards...........
131321.title: Bulma's Sweaty Fun

1352.content: What happens to young Trunks?
1352.title: Kid Trunks

13523.content:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/drag...

"Mom? Why do I have to go with Jaco to get my present?!" Trunks whined. The young boy was dressed in his martial artist garb with a sleeveless blue-green gi and matching pants as well as brown colored boots. It was a hot day so his casual outfit of a hoodie and such weren't warranted...plus the young man had been being a bit lazy with his hygiene lately..something about wanting to 'smell manly'.

Bulma didn't even want to imagine how long he'd gone without changing his usually gag-inducing socks. However, she believed she had a solution and given that it was the day after Trunks' birthday...she'd prepared a special surprise that not only he'd enjoy but would let him stink up somewhere OTHER than her HOUSE.

"Because I told him to and that's the only way you're going to get it." Bulma sighed as the mother and son duo went out to the backyard where Jaco was waiting beside his Galactic Patrol issued ship.

"I don't see why I have to let your kid stink up my special elite spaceship." Jaco the Galactic Patrolman pouted. "Because if you don't I'll tell Vegeta!" Bulma snapped and clobbered the strange man over the head with her fist.

"Ow ow ow fine fine!" Jaco winced and rubbed the lump on his head as Trunks snickered. The half-saiyan and elite patrolman got into the cramped flying saucer and took off to the coordinates Bulma had given them.

"So spill it! What's the big surprise?!" Trunks demanded.

"Ugh..fine....your mom asked me to drop you off at a planet of criminals that I'm supposed to be apprehending or defeating...but you're going to go all kaiju there." Jaco casually stated.

"What do you mean...?" Trunks asked with a raised eyebrow.

"I meaaan...I'm gonna give you a device that lets you grow into a giant...however much you want...your ma said that way you can stink up everything and not her house." Jaco explained.

Trunks' eyes widened and he grinned a boyish grin, "REALLY?! This sounds awesome! Hit the turbo! Let's go let's go!" Trunks cheered.

Upon arriving at the rather seedy looking sprawling city-planet...Trunks was dropped off by Jaco and given what appeared to be some complex tv remote. "Just call me on your phone when you're done...." Jaco said uncaringly as he took off in the ship...leaving Trunks all alone in the scum and villainy filled planet.

"Heh, he thinks I'm gonna just call him to take me home? No way, I'm going to stink up a LOT more than just this dump." Trunks thought deviously as he examined the Size Remote.

"Hey kid...ain't it past your bedtime?" Trunks looked up in the direction of the voice and saw he was being surrounded by thuggish alien beings.

"Yeah...you might get mugged..or worse." A second alien sneered.

Trunks just smirked and pressed the 'grow' option on the remote...
13523.title: Trunks' Birthday Present

135232.content:
The thugs who were acting high and mighty just a minute ago, were now backing away in shock as the kid began to rise up into the sky and stretched into the sky like a mountain. Trunks laughed as his shoe grew into a building and demolished it, the street he stood in now could only fit one of his shoes. Trunks threw his arms over his head and laughed.

"Haha, Man I'm so big! Best gift ever!", as Trunks loudly proclaimed his exclaimed his joy the aura of his sweat spread and it had grown as well.

Looking down at the street, Trunks laughed as he saw the thugs. One was trapped under the toes of his boot and the others were trying to flee. Reaching down, the lavender haired boy snatched up the four aliens in his right fist. Trunks gave a toothy smirk as he brought the thugs to his face and watched as they gagged from his b.o emitting from the sweat running down his body.

"Hehe it's not my bedtime, it's playtime!", Trunks blasted the aliens with his hot breath as he laughed.

What fun did he have first?
135232.title: 100 Ft tall!

choices: Trunks Keeps his Socks On for Now
1352322.content:
"You bugs look cold...why don't I warm ya up?" Trunks snickered as he put the thugs in the bend of his elbow and did a bicep curl. The thugs screamed as they were squeezed in between the beefy muscle of the young boy. Trunks was laughing uproariously at how puny they were compared to his bicep...it really made him feel like a big man!

"Hah! What's wrong? You dorks were acting so tough a little while ago! I guess you're the type who likes to pick on people smaller than you? Sucks for you that the tables just turned!" Trunks taunted them with a devilish grin. The cracking of bones was heard followed by a crunch, Trunks blinked and saw a tiny series of blood splats on his bicep.

"Pfft! What a bunch a' weaklings!" Trunks carelessly threw his arms behind his head again, showing off those ripe and supple young armpits of his and by that token letting his stink flow out freely.

As he stomped through the place, crushing vehicles and buildings alike under his boots...he noticed something unpleasant.

He couldn't feel most of the stuff he was crushing!

He knew exactly how to fix that though, he grinned mischeviously and plopped his gargantuan rear down on an apartment building...it collapsed partway under his rump but it still made a decent seat.

Leaning down and grinning at the panicking criminal filth in the streets, he undid the straps on his brown boots and tugged them off to reveal absolutely rancid and hole-ridden socks. He sighed deeply and tossed the footwear carelessly on a row of slummy houses.

"Thaaat's the stuff....whew...I don't think mom's gonna like doing laundry when I decide to change these things..." Trunks joked as he gripped his socks and began to slowly and almost seductively peel them off of his thick and meaty feet.
1352322.title: Muscle Squeeze

13523221.content:
After his sock were peeled off, Trunks discarded them like his shoes to crush a random building. Despite thier light weight the wet socks demolished the structure and laid on top.

Trunks wiggled his free toes now that they had breathing room. The aura around the kid's feet was blurry from intense heat and the foul stench being emitted. The pent up smell of salty sweat and chessy foot gunk began flooding the streets like wildfire. Alien crooks gagged as the foul stench reached them from blocks away from the giant half-saiyan, who simply wiggled his large toes as he lightly bounced on the crushed building.

"Hope you don't mind the smell, cause I've got plenty to share!", Trunks laughed as he crossed his feet at the ankles and smirked.

Swaying his feet side to side, Trunks laughed as his foot stench spread more like a virus to infect everyone with it's strong musk.

What was next?
13523221.title: Trunks' Feet Of Power

choices: As a SS He was Sweating MORE and Smelling WORSE!
135232212.content:
"Heh, I think you weaklings should show me some appreciating for not stomping you all right here and now!" Trunks bellowed as he flexed his plump toes and fanned more stink onto the gagging populace.

"Get over here and worship my feet!" The young lavender haired boy roared as he relaxed back against another building, grinning smugly. The criminal citizens weren't having any of that, they were too prideful or too stupid to give in to some giant brat's gross demands.

So, they brandished their weapons, super-powered rifles and giant laser cannons...and fired upon those detestable soles. To their horror however, Trunks seemed unaffected...though whether this was due to his Saiyan physiology or his newly acquired size is unknown.

The oversized brat actually began to giggle! They were tickling him with lethal weaponry! "Heeheeehee! Hey! Is that supposed to be your idea of an attack?!" Trunks laughed mockingly with a wide devious grin.

He stood up to his full height, hands on his hips as he grinned smugly down at them. "Guess I should take you challengers seriously....it's only fair! Even though you're pretty pathetic." Trunks cracked his knuckles and began to charge up his energy. His voice rumbled the ground itself as he yelled as he was powering up.

In a grand expulsion of ki, he went Super Saiyan! His hair spiked up and he was surrounded in a golden aura.

"Heh! My turn!" Trunks boomed, it was then he noticed something strange....
135232212.title: Worshiping the Saiyan Halfbreed

choices: Trunks wants to get some worship
Trunks wants to crush the city flat
1352322121.content:
As his energy surge around him, Trunks noticed something else. The scent of sweat seem to increase as he not only smelt more b.o but also the cheesy stench of his feet reaches all the way from his feet to his nose. The aliens below who were blasted back by the aura of power, felt vile rise up as the cheese and b.o clouded thier air.

"Ha, cool I'm not only stronger but I've got more smell to offer!", Trunks laughed as he floated into the air and placed his wet together and launched himself at full speed towards the bugs on the ground.

A large boom and serious of crunches rang out as the area was reduced to a crater and multiple aliens crushed into splats. Trunks smirked and swayed on his heels and toes to crush the aliens more into his odorous feet. Rising into the sky, the boy looked over the area to find other settlements where he could have fun.

Soon in the distance another city caught the super saiyan's eyes as he grinned and flew over.

What was next?
1352322121.title: As a SS He was Sweating MORE and Smelling WORSE!

13523221212.content:
Trunks grinned toothily as he floated over the city. His shadow covered a majority of the old looking buildings and ruinous roads. Hundreds of aliens looked up in shock at the giant blond kid, looking very michiviously down at them.

"Heh, man can't wait to feel this one!", everyone was confused at Trunks' words, but understood soon as he clenched his fists and sent his sweaty feet crushing down.

Panic ensued as every alien started fleeing from the powerful blast. Trunks laughed as he lifted up a foot and found more splats of red and heavy debris stuck to his rank foot. He took a step forward and placed a foot on a building, he smirked as with a simple step the building was crushed to dust.

The super saiyan started stomping down the street, making a game by counting how bugs he squished. Trunks picked up one alien and place him between his bicep and arm and flexed him into paste.

Trunks rose his foot over an alien that tripped, he held in the air mockingly. Wiggling his toes, the saiyan chuckled and crushed the bug's existence.

14.title: Fairy Tail

choices: He finds someone he knows tiny
141.content: What happens to the fire dragon slayer?
141.title: Natsu Dragneel

choices: Natsu feels a small weight under his foot
1413.content:
In a world of magic, you managed to make yourself stand out. Your name was Issun and you were a wizard.

Your magic was a defect of sorts, as while inheriting your parent's magic of size shifting, a curse had been put on them. The result, you were stuck at a inch tall and only had high durability to your magic.

Dad and Mom obviously had trouble raising a tiny son and left you at the guild Fairy Tail. Growing up in the guild was like a family as you made strong connections despite the number of times you accidentally got stepped or sat on.

One in particular was Natsu Dragneel, the salamander of Fairy Tail. The pink haired teen was a friendly guy who enjoyed you climbing his muscled body and you giving very great foot rubs. Even if they were smelly.

Right now you where outside Magnolia Town on the way to Natsu's and Happy's house. It was a long trek but you were soon in front of the towering door. You let out a breath before ducking as the door opened, the bottom of the door passed over.

Standing up, a shadow covered you as you looked up to find Natsu looming over you. The row of abs and large pecs led up to the pink haired boy looking anywhere but at the ground. Some drops of sweat were glistening on the muscles which was evident as the heat had been high recently. Taking a breath, you yelled as loud as you could.

"HEY NATSU SORRY FOR THE WAI-!"

SQUISH

The tiny call was silenced and your tiny body vanished as Natsu took a step forward and stepped on you with his blank sandaled foot. You groaned as the heavy leather pushed you into the dirt, the weight of the buff teen was settled on you probably for the 100th time this year.

Natsu looked at the pathway to his house, he scratched his head as he couldn't find his tiny friend. "Man Issun's taking forever! I would've picked him up, but the squirt's so uptight about getting somewhere on his own.", the sweaty teen let out a annoyed huff and turned back to his house.

You were unintentionally grinded as Natsu swiveled his foot. As he walked into his house he would find his friend if he looked at the bottom of his sandal. You were stuck to the bottom like gum and were once again silenced as Natsu stepped down.

Next....
1413.title: The Tiny Wizard

choices: Hoisted his Muscled Arm Over His Neck...Look at that PIT!
Decides to Punish You with His HUGE Feet!
14131.content:
Natsu suddenly stopped in his tracks, picking up Issun's 'scent' with his sensitive nose.

"Huh...it's like he's right here....oh...crap." Natsu quickly lifted his sandaled foot into his hand and saw you.

"Issun! Damn, not again!" Natsu quickly peeled you off of the black sandal sole and held you in front of his eyes.

"Sorry about that, little guy!" Natsu apologized for stepping on you for probably the 101th time. You sighed as your body popped back to normal shape.

Natsu couldn't help but snigger, that cartoony display always made him giggle. You frowned and pretended to pout, "How many times do you think you can get away with stomping me?"

"I uh...I dunno..we're up to maybe...200 by now." Natsu said dumbly, scratching his pink head.

You groaned, already 200 times...your math was way off. Natsu grinned toothily, "And what about YOU? You should move outta the way of us GIANTS." He teasingly poked you.

"Oh noo...I'm sooo sorry I didn't make way for the mighty Natsu giant!" You teased back.

Natsu had a tendency to sweat a lot, and he of course used this to his advantage when teasing you..even if you sometimes weren't exactly willing to participate.

With that, Natsu....
14131.title: Issun Found

choices: Lowered his arm and kept you in
141311.content:
Natsu smirked as he lifted his arm up and did a quick flex to his bicep. You couldn't help but blush at the display, however you groaned as he put the arm over his head and opened up his pit.

The steamy pit was moist looking from the numerous drops of sweat coating the raw skin. Matted down to the hot skin were pink hairs greasy and stuck with smeared sweat.

Natsu's nostrils flared as he caught the heavy musk. "Damn I've been sweating up a storm!"

"Yeah I can see, now would you put that stink away!", you cringed as the memories of you ending up in that musky landscape resurfaced.

The pink haired teen showed his teeth with his grin. He suddenly tossed you in air causing you to yelp as your body tumbled, Natsu then caught you in a fist. You groaned as the warm flesh surrounded you from the neck down.

Natsu chuckled. "Hey what's the rush, I think we need to go over what happens when little guys aren't careful around giants!"

You widened your eyes as the fist started moving towards the open pit. There was visible steam from the hot skin and you coughed as you were hit with the heavy sour body odor.

"Come on Natsu I don't wanna smell like your pits!", you yelled as you gagged at the heavy musk.

The Salamander of Fairy Tail chuckled as he gazed at your head poking out of his fist. "Come on Issun, your big buddy wants to share some of his smells with you!"

You were then brought forward and pressed against the greasy, hot wall. The fist holding you loosened as Natsu let go and used his finger to press you into the pit, you cringed as you were pressed deeply into the squishy skin.

"ACK, man it's worst then last time! Damn it, why'd it have to be so hot today?", you thought internally groaning as you were forced to inhale the musk.

The armpit b.o was more sour then the rest of the body, additionally rather dripping down the body sweat was smeared all over.

Natsu grinned toothily as he felt your tiny body pressed into his musky armpit. Before he accidentally fell on you, squishing you under the sweaty pit. It was more fun now pressing you into his hot skin manually.

Soon Natsu.....
141311.title: The Fire Pit

choices: Natsu's Walk Continues as Issun is Forced to Endure the Worsening Stink
1413112.content:
Natsu's grin widened as his eyes gained a mischievous glint. Pressing on you harder and practically submerging you into a sweat gland, you groaned as your entire body seemed to be engulfed. Your body created a mold in Natsu's squishy pit flesh, and to the outside looking in you appeared to have become one with Natsu's greasy underarm.

Taking his fingers off of you, Natsu chuckled at his work. You didn't fall out, you were glued in there now! "Hehe, we're gonna go for a nice walk outside, buddy!" The Dragon Slayer cheekily said as he began to lower his muscular arm.

You tried your best to move, to squirm, to do ANYTHING..but you were stuck good in this pit. You felt a tremendous weight on your back push you even deeper. A firm wall of muscle was behind you and your world grew dark. You heard the doors to the guild hall swing open and whimpered a bit..knowing how hot it was today.

The sun shone down on Natsu's form, he grinned and started his walk down the cobblestone streets of Magnolia. "Natsuuuu!" A familiar voice yelled as Happy flew down to greet his best friend.

"Hey, Happy!" Natsu smiled and patted the Exceed's head. "It's really hot today!" Happy said dramatically wheezing. Natsu chuckled, "Yup! I just picked up Issun and we're going on a walk!" Natsu said as he marched onward.

"Where's he at? Wait...do I wanna know?" Happy groaned.

"I'd show ya, but I don't want him to fall out." Natsu laughed as sweat was already starting to leak down his body.

You immediately felt things heat up as the walk continued, it was like an oven in here! A wet, swampy, stank oven that you were trapped in for who knows how long. All this hot weather was making Natsu smell even worse...which you didn't think was possible after your first whiff of his pits a few minutes ago.

What happens now..?
1413112.title: A Dragon Slayer's Pit Pal

choices: Natsu did something to increase his sweat
14131121.content:
As he continued his stroll, Natsu didn't seem to take notice of the effects his body was emitting. More sweat dripped through his muscular crevices and the soles of his sandals started to adhear to his meaty yet firm soles.

Happy hummed as he thought of where you could be. Natsu wasn't stomping particularly hard so you couldn't be in his shoes. Though the pinkette was grinning as he made sure to rub his arm against his side...

"You put him in your armpit?!", Happy exclaimed with widened eyes. Natsu chuckled as he flexed his arm pressed it to his side, feeling the faint squirm from his greasy flesh. "Yep i decided to teach the squirt a lesson in looking out for giants, not to mention he didn't appreciate a dragon slayer's smell!"

The exceed cringe as just floating next to Natsu he could smell his strong body odor, Happy could only imagine the scent from your perspective.

You would yell if you could but knew better as it would result in you taking a drink of the hot sweat. Natsu grinding you into his underarm had you thoroughly squashed in, with your oxygen being converted to the hot musk engulfing you.

The flesh squelched around you as more greasy sweat was smeared over you. Your prison was turning into a sauna as the sour odor cooked with Natsu's body heat increasing, also making the sweat gland you practically fused with to squelch you with more hot sweat.

This wasn't new, Natsu did stuff you in his pits a lot. Though this heat wave had doubled the usual sour odor and rank pit, practically baking you in the squishing wall as the muscular one crushed you in.

Your nostrils and eyes burned from the powerful odor and Natsu flexing his arm made the pressure increase. This caused you to yelp and end up getting a mouthful of the foul sweat.

You gagged and felt queasy when...
14131121.title: The Musky Sauna

choices: Natsu Keeps Going, Letting His Armpit Worsen
Natsu Finally Opens His Pit Up and Checks on You
141311212.content:
Natsu gained a toothy grin as an idea popped in his head. Engulfing his hand in flames, he held it directly outside of his closed underarm. The already drenched area began to, almost immediately, pour out more salty secretions.

"Natsuuu! What are you doing?! You'll cook him in there!" Happy cried out in a horrified tone. The Salamander grinned evilly, "Ya think? Hehe, my pit could be confused with an oven right now! Hehehehe!" Natsu joked, Happy started crying comical tears. "Goodbye Issun, I knew you well!" The floating cat said dramatically.

"Calm down, he'll be fine. Little guy is tough enough to hold his own in the guild, ain't he?" Natsu said as he rather enjoyed how his pit was turning sopping wet.

While you appreciated Natsu's vote of confidence...this was truly HELL! You had all of a sudden felt the heat increase inside your prison. Then the sweatiness of Natsu's armpit was cranked up by what felt like hundreds of times. It had become like some kind of salty, greasy waterfall.

Then there was the smell, it seemed to have gone from the already powerful sour stench...to something that was like Natsu's armpit was possessed by evil. You coughed and wheezed as your nose was increasingly burning worse and worse.
141311212.title: Turning Up the Heat

choices: Natsu finally toned down the heat
1413112121.content:
Natsu smirked toothily as he felt his armpit shedding streaks of greasy sweat, consuming the tiny speck squashed into his smoldering pit. The flames he spawned showed no sign of dwindling as Natsu's whole body began to glisten more with the sweat drops dripping down his tough body.

"Man Issun bet your warm now! Probably swimming in there, more then when i usually squash you.", Natsu chuckled as he felt his sweat now holding you additional to his hot flesh.

You coughed as with the numerous greasy hot drops, you found yourself getting more of the bitter liquid in your mouth. Like a stream the sweat attempted to carry you away but Natsu's muscular arm kept you squashed to the sweat glands squeezing out the steaming sweat.

"N-natsu you sure he's ok in there!?", Happy asked with wide eyes as he could see the musky steam sliding out of the closed armpit.

The pinkette grinned widely as he flexed to press you into is armpit more. "He's fine! I would've felt him get crushed, he's still in one piece. I'm more concerned if he learned to appreciate the smell of a giant yet!"

Natsu could smell his strong powerful sour musk, it made him feel big having such a tiny speck in his foul armpit. He of course cared about you like he did with his guild family, but he also never missed a chance in messing with you. Kinda like an older brother.

As you gagged from getting another splash of hot musky sweat...
1413112121.title: Pit Teasing

1453.content: How about more than one character at a time?
1453.title: Multiple Fairy Tail characters?

choices: Lucy & Erza accept the offer..a royal welcome sounds nice!
Lucy and Erza are suspicious and interrogate the runt!
Lucy and Erza decide to have fun with Lilliput itself!
14531.content:
https://i.imgur.com/6Z978tW.jpg (Lucy Heartphilia)

https://i.imgur.com/iaDamkp.png (Erza Scarlet)




Erza Scarlet and Lucy Heartphilia had been dropped off by a carriage in the middle of a forest on one scorching hot summer day. "Uuugh...do we really have to waaalk?" Lucy complained as she wiped sweat from her brow.

"It's what the instructions said...for some reason they want us to sweat and come to them after skipping a bath." Erza said, being that she was used to long quests...she didn't mind being sweaty and a tad grimey.

Lucy on the other hand might've been more comfortable if it wasn't for the heat! "Uuugh...what kind of weird quest is this?" Lucy groaned.

Erza suddenly held her hand out to have Lucy stop in her tracks, she narrowed her eyes and peered through a bush. "I believe we've found where we are to meet up with our contract." Erza said as she turned back to Lucy...a look of slight disbelief on her face.

Lucy peered through the bush and her eyes widened, it was what appeared to be a model city...streets that were wide enough for them to walk through but with buildings that merely came up to their knees at the most.

"Uhh...what is it a toy?" Lucy asked Erza. Erza shook her head, "I've heard of this place...it's a place called Lilliput..inhabited by miniature people." Erza whispered in awe.

"Ah! There you are!" A tiny voice said from at their boots. Looking down, they saw a young man standing there without a hint of fear...as if this was all perfectly normal. "I am the head knight of the King of Lilliput...I am Sir Charles....we are to meet with the king at the castle. You will receive a royal welcome and the job will be explained in more detail to you two all powerful giantesses." The man wearing knight armor explained.
14531.title: Lucy Heartphilia & Erza Scarlet

choices: Shoved him somewhere in order to make him talk.
Tossed him to Lucy in hopes that she could get some answers from him.
145312.content:
Erza took Lucy's hand and pulled the celestial wizard aside.

"What are you doing? We're finally here, let's see what the job is," Lucy whispered.

"No. It could be a trap," Erza said.

"A trap? Those little guys couldn't do anything to us... could they?" Lucy asked as she peeked back at the miniature city.

"Every being is capable of using magic, if we step foot inside that city before fully understanding what we're doing, it would be foolish," Erza explained. "We must get the information from Charles before we make any rash decisions."

Lucy nodded in agreement before the two walked back to the tiny city.

"We will be hsppy to oblige, if you tell us what our job will be," Erza said.

"I'm afraid that I can't tell you yet, my lady, in fact, I have no clue as to what the job is myself."

Erza bent down and wrapped her hand around Charles' body, bringing the small man up to her face, giving him a serious glare.

"And why exactly would the head knight be unaware of this job?"

"I wasn't aware of the job until today," Charles explained.

In response, Erza...
145312.title: Interrogation

choices: The Entire Town of Magnolia Shrank
The Fairy Tail Guild Hall Shrank
14532.content:
Natsu and Gray had been gone on a long mission and were ready to finally return to Magnolia and their guild hall.

"That sure did take a lot longer than I thought it would, it's probably been a week since we started chasing after that dark guild master." Natsu sighed.

"Yeah, and we haven't even had time to shower, we probably smell terrible. Well, you probably don't smell much worse than usual." Gray laughed.

The two males were bickering all the way back to Magnolia, however, they were soon going to find out how things had changed since they left.
14532.title: Natsu & Gray

choices: "A Tiny Village! Let's Play with It!"
145321.content:
The entire town of Magnolia was in an uproar, it had shrank around two days ago for some apparent reason...most theorized it was due to the Dark Guild that caught the eye of their resident guild Fairy Tail.

Makarov, the leader of Fairy Tail, had calmed everyone down by reminding them that Natsu and Gray would be back soon. "Yeah..a giant Natsu and Gray aren't exactly an encouraging thought." Lucy sweat dropped.

"We got no other choice....they're our only hope right now." Happy sighed.

"We're doomed..." Elfman groaned.

Suddenly the ground started to shake throughout the entire town. Everyone looked outside their homes and up into the sky to see quite a terrifying sight:

A shirtless Gray (of course) and Natsu with his sleeveless arms...dripping with perspiration and emitting a rank odor that flowed down into the town.

They were absolutely MASSIVE. "Hey...where's the town?" Natsu's booming voice asked Gray.

"Did we take a wrong turn or something?" Gray scratched his dark hair.

Natsu just happened to glance down at that moment, and raised an eyebrow. "This thing looks like..." Natsu squatted down.
145321.title: Magnolia Shrinkage

1453211.content:
The two giants viewed the 'model' in it's entirety. It perfectly reflected Magnolia and the tallest buildings went above their ankles.

"Who would build such an impressive model and leave it out in the open?", Gray asked crossing his arms over his strong chest.

Natsu grunted in reply before stretching his body over the shrunken town, placing his hands on the other side. The residents of Magnolia were coated in darkness as thier sky was filled with the Salamander's muscular torso. Drops of sweat fell into the streets and splashed like buckets of water, spreading the salty smell throughout the town. The residents tried covering thier nose from the intense smell as Natsu didn't notice them.

"Oi, flame breath don't wreak someone else's work!", Gray called in annoyance as Natsu got dangerously close to breaking the 'model'.

Natsu looked over his shoulder with a tick mark. "Shut it ice head!"

Just as the ice mage was about to retaliate, his eyes picked up on a dot near the outskirts of the tiny city. Bending over, Gray reached for the speck.

The tiny man watched in shock as the colossal hand of Gray Fullbuster approached. The man was soon picked up by a finger and thumb, being firmly grasped within the fingers. Going up, the tiny was given a up close view of the impressive muscles of Gray before stopping in front of the large dark eyes.

"Huh, what's that?", Natsu asked standing up and looking at the dot between his rival's fingers.

Gray narrowed his eyes at the tiny object.

"It looks like.......
1453211.title: A Model To Titans

choices: Erza Makes Contact with Natsu and Gray...perhaps a bad move
14532113.content:
Gray's startling declaration caused Natsu's eyes to widen and him to yell out in his obnoxiously loud voice: "Whoa! Did we get a growth spurt or something?! We're giants?" A big fat grin formed on his face as he put his hands on his hips and laughed.

Gray raised an eyebrow, "You seem to be taking this pretty well...but anyway...shrimp! What's going on?" Gray demanded of the miniscule person between his fingers.

"I-It's Magnolia! It was shrank by the dark guild you were sent after!" The tiny citizen whimpered.

Gray and Natsu shared a look, "Naw, I don't buy it...we kicked their asses! How could they have anyone with that powerful a' magic and we never ran into em?!" Natsu sneered at the tiny person, causing him to quiver between Gray's fingers.

"For once I agree with you flame-brain. But I think this might be some kinda illusion or something...for all we know a Dark Guild decided to try to fool us." Gray glared at the tiny person as well.

"Feh! Some illusion! This is pretty awesome!" Natsu chuckled. Gray smirked, "Not every day you get to be the size of a real dragon, right?"

Natsu cackled and belched flames into the air, "Right! We might as well have fun with this! At least..before kicking whoever put this up's ass!"

Down at Magnolia's level, everyone in the city and especially those in the guild hall...were currently panicking and cursing Natsu and Gray's thick headedness.

The tiny man between Gray's fingers was tossed away to his doom carelessly as Gray and Natsu looked down at the city with menacing grins.
14532113.title: A.....tiny human!?"

choices: Playing with the tinies Natsu caught
145321131.content:
Natsu squatted down again and smirked as he reached for a group of tinies, unable to move in fear as the giant warm palm scooped them up and imprisoned them in a fist.

Gray meanwhile put his hands on his hips and grinned as he rose his right foot over a building. Lowering it, the structure instantly crumbled and was flattened beneath the black heel of his shoe. People started trying to flee as Gray grinded his foot to crush the wreckage and anyone unfortunate enough that was inside.

"Heh, that took almost nothing!", Gray gave a toothy smirk as he flexed a bicep.

"Oh I wanna try!", Natsu grinned wide as rose again and filled the sky with his black sandal.

Everyone looked up in horror, the black sole was covered in dirt and even a few squashed bugs. No doubt Natsu thinks of them the same.

"Fire Dragon's....BUG CRUSH!", Natsu grinned and brought his foot down with a BOOM that sent a wave of wind, blasting everyone not caught under the shoe back. A large crater was made, that released a series of crunches. Raising the sandal, the black now had a collection of red splat marks that to the giants were dots.

"Did you just...make that up?", Gray quirked an eyebrow.

Natsu paused in his viewing of the sole. "Yeah, so what you think you can do better icy?"

Gray sighed at his fellow giant.

What was next?
145321131.title: Time for Some Giant Fun!

choices: Natsu Teases Them a Bit..but Doesn't Shove Them In
1453211311.content:
Natsu opened his fist and held the group of quivering tinies before his smirking mug. "Heh, you're all so puuuny!~" He bellowed, nearly bursting the poor hostages eardrums.

Gray suddenly sniffed the air and cringed, "Jeez, FlameHead...I can smell you from here!" Gray insulted and fanned the air.

Natsu's grin was replaced by a scowl, chilling the tinies to the bone as they all knew about the Fire Dragon Slayer's famous temper.

"Oh yeah!? Says you! You're in your boxers and you're just letting YOUR STINK flow all over the place!" Natsu snapped.

Gray chuckled and flexed his muscles, "Not my fault you don't like the smell of a hard day's work."

"What was that?! Grr..." Natsu and Gray glared daggers at each other.

"Anyway, why don't you put those runts to use...not every day you get to be a giant...much less a stinky one." Gray smirked, hoping the flame-brain would understand what he was going for.

Natsu's scowl left his face...before being replaced by a toothy smirk. "Oooh...good idea for once, Ice-Pop!"

The smirking Natsu looked back down at his palm and his grin widened as he cast a glance at his sleeveless muscular arms. Lifting one slightly, he gave the pit a whiff.

"Phew! I'm ripe! Sucks to be tiny on a hot day like this!" Natsu roared at his prisoners.

"Heh, do it..." Gray encouraged.

"Don't tell me how to be a GIANT." Natsu roared as he lifted that arm all the way up...revealing his sticky armpit.
1453211311.title: Fairy Tail Giants

14532113111.content:
Natsu smirked at the tinies as his pit's musk clouded thier noses. The oniony smell was hanging within the sweat and pink hairs glued to the pit.

"Hope you don't mind the smell, not that you have a choice!", Natsu laughed as he slapped his palm against the rank pit, humming as the yells of terror were silenced.

The shrunken people were imprisoned by the squishy flesh and had the odor shoved up thier nose. They couldn't get a breath of of fresh air as Natsu began pushing them in and rubbing them all over his putrid pit, making sure they wouldn't be able to escape. Pulling his hand back, Natsu's pit now had multiple dots as the tinies were either enveloped by the smelly flesh or tangled in his armpit hair.

Natsu chuckled as he lowered his toned arm to keep the bugs imprisoned. "Heh, don't worry I'm sure you'll get use to it!"

However, Natsu noticed a slight tingling on his fingers and looking he saw that two tinies managed to hold onto his fingers!

"So you bugs didn't want in on my pit?", Natsu smirked. "Fine, oi Ice Head you can take these two."

Gray grew a toothy grin as the two dots were dropped into his left palm. The two small men looked in fear as Gray's eyes stared at them with malicious intent.

"Don't worry, I'm not going to put you in my armpit.", Gray paused as he began to move his right hand. "But i will put you somewhere....warm."

Using his right hand, Gray reached down and grabbed the front of his boxers and pulled it open. Darkness with a tuff of dark hair on top greeted them and a musk different then Natsu's pit began pouring out.

Using a finger to keep one tiny against his palm, Gray tilted his hand and the unsecure bug started falling into the darkness. The man yelled and grunted as he landed on something warm and somewhat soft. A blush coated his cheeks as he realized where he was and looked up only to see Gray's smirking face disappear as the boxers where closed.

Gray hummed, the tiny on his member may be small but it fueled his sense of power. The other man on his palm was shaking, well Gray decided to warm him up.

Reaching around to the back, Gray pulled his boxers back and brought the tiny around. The man watched in terror as Gray used his fingers to spread the firm cheeks and them bring him towards the crack. The next thing he knew, the tiny was being squeezed by two walls of muscle and being subjected to the smell of rotten foods.

Gray gained a small blush as he felt the pathetic squirming against his strong body. Groaning in pleasure as he grasped his growing bulge.

"Heh, I guess that was clever Ice-Stripper.", Natsu grunted as he watched his rival's method of being a giant.

What was next?
14532113111.title: Using That Giant Body

145321131111.content:
Natsu frowned as his rival squeezed his bulge which was still inflating, "Always knew you were a perv..." Natsu mumbled to himself as he sat down on the ground just outside the puny city's boundaries.

"What are you doing...?" Gray huffed as his face grew redder from the pleasant squirming on his crotch and butt.

"Gettin' comfortable..." Natsu grunted and peeled his sandals away from his meaty feet, they made the sound of a sticker being peeled off as he popped them off.

"Yeaaah...nice to set the dogs loose!" Natsu groaned and brought one sandal up to his nose..sniffing the moist footprint within. "Phew! That's rank! Haha!" Natsu laughed and tossed the sandals aside, letting them crumble a few buildings carelessly.

Natsu wiggled his big beefy toes and fanned rancid smelling odor throughout the streets of Magnolia, he delighted in hearing and seeing the people gagging in the streets just from a simple toe wiggle.
145321131111.title: More fun with the tinies

1453211311111.content:
Natsu hummed as his moist feet breathed and spread thier scent out with a single toe flex. While many of the tinies tried running away, a few were too immobilized trying to block out the stench. As they looked up, they only had a second before Natsu plucked two of them up and dropped them in his right palm. The pinkette smirked at the two dots before peering down at his feet and chuckled as an idea struck his head.

Picking up one tiny with his finger and thumb Natsu brought it to one of his plump soles. The pathetic squirming did nothing as the tiny was pressed into the rank foot with a loud SQUELCH. Muffled yells rang out as the shrunken human was squashed into the wrinkles of Natsu's hot feet.

Natsu gave a toothy grin to the other tiny. "Don't think I forgot about you!", the Dragon Slayer mage then did the same action, now having two dots stuck to his soles.

The pinkette giggled, he barely felt the specks being smothered by his feet. Natsu smirked as he rested his hands on his knees.

"How about you two kiss!"

Natsu then slammed his feet together, smooshing the tinies with his meaty feet. The pressure was immense and made them feel like they would pop any minute. The only noise heard from the putrid prison was the squishy and Natsu's faint laughter.

What was next?
1453211311111.title: Natsu's Foot Fun

choices: Gray Utilizes Those Pits of His!
14532113111111.content:
"Heh, you should crush those microbes.." Gray snickered cruelly. "I was gettin' to it!" Natsu yelled, rattling windows in the buildings below. The masses of Magnolia couldn't believe their ears, the two rowdy Fairy Tail wizards..were having no problem crushing their own hometown citizens!

Lucy and even Guildmaster Makarov were at a loss of what to do...and couldn't believe their own guild members could be so callous...regardless of whether they felt this was some mere illusion or not!

Slowly and pleasurably Natsu began to increase the pressure on both of his feet, soon feeling miniscule pops as the two poor people were reduced to red splats.

"Bwahahahaha! What a pathetic way to go!" Natsu bellowed with earth shaking laughter.

Gray flopped down on his boxer clad rear next to Natsu, shivering as he felt his own prisoner within his cheeks get reduced to a stain as well.

"Impressive what these dogs can do huh?" Natsu bragged and pointed to his thick meaty feet.

Gray rolled his eyes and...
14532113111111.title: Natsu crushes them

145321131111113.content:
While the ice mage did get annoyed slightly, he couldn't help but have his eyes wander to Natsu's plump feet still squishing the already dead bugs. In the time it taken to get here, Gray had watched Natsu stomp the grass with those large feet and put insects out of thier misery. Looking at the soft and plump soles flexing and emitting that foul odor that gray couldn't help but find....sweet.

"Oi Flame-Head hold your foot up.", Gray suddenly ordered, getting a confused look from Natsu.

"Haa, what are you on about?"

Gray let out a heavy sigh. "Just do it!"

Natsu quirked an eyebrow before shrugging, turning and creating a crater with his rear. The pinkette brought up his rank foot and gray felt the hot fumes come onto his face in waves. Under The toes was a small red splat, smeared from squash across the hot soles.

Gray slowly took the foot into his hands and began running his fingers over the wet sole. The plump sole gave into the pressure and while Natsu was confused, he couldn't help but sigh with relief as his sole was released of tension.

Gray looked at the sole in front of him before.....
145321131111113.title: Gray's Strange Attraction

choices: Natsu Clamps His Toes Around Gray's Fingers and the Tiny!
Gray LICKS Some of the Jam off His Fingers?!
1453211311111132.content:
Reaching down and plucking up some unsuspecting tiny, Gray held it before Natsu's enormous sole. "Maan, these runts sure are puny compared to your fat feet." Gray snickered.

Natsu growled, "Heey! My feet ain't fat! They're BIG! And powerful too!" The salamander crossed his toned arms.

Gray rolled his eyes, "Yeah yeah, now spread those big toes of yours."

The Fire Dragon Slayer grinned toothily, "Oooh yeah, don't blame me if you pass out from my toejam!"

Gray scoffed as the big, bulbous toes spread before the tiny, revealing a practical swamp of grime. Gray cringed, but felt himself somehow drawn to the power that the flame-head's jam now held. Bringing the tiny up to these spread toes, Gray held him there for a moment..letting him take it all in.

"Getting a good look, squirt?" Gray sneered.

"And a good sniff?! Hahaha!" Natsu bellowed with laughter. Gray nodded and pushed the squirming and screaming man deep into the big toe gap.

Fullbuster cringed as he felt toe slime oozing around his fingertips.
1453211311111132.title: Gray's Special Foot Service to a Salamander

14532113111111322.content:
Gray looked at the chessy gunk on his fingers, the gooey funk was emitting its funky stench as sweat trailed down his fingers and jam began to dry.

The ice mage was revolting at the goo coating his fingers.....but yet also intrigued. Crinkling his nose Gray took a whiff of the hot mighty foot stench, feeling his nostrils burn up from the heated odor. Gray soon narrowed his eyes at the goo and placed his fingers in his mouth.

Natsu widened his eyes as he saw Gray lick the toe jam off his fingers. He would've made a jab at his rival eating his chessy gunk like a snack but this was too shocking to comprehend!

Gray tasted the warm and slimy jam, it was surprisingly rough and felt like one drop could fill his mouth. The sweaty and bittersweet soon was swallowed down Gray's gullet, sigh as he felt the jam reach his stomach. His toungue and throat feeling like a warm paste had traveled down.

The jam was so putrid and foul yet Gray found this toe jam tasting like a sweet and chessy candy paste.

The tall, muscular blonde that was the Lightning dragon slayer ground his foot into the shorter pink haired man's face. Nastu let out a muffled groan, trying to push the wide sole off his face, but Laxus let his lightning flow through his feet, Natsu's body spasming wildly in response.

'L-Laxus, what the hell-ll!?' Nastu cried, while the standing man just gave a toothy grin to the weaker male, pinned by a single foot.

Laxus had invited Natsu to his place, seemingly as a friendly gesture, but when the pinknette had arrived, he'd found Laxus sitting in his house, shirtless. How small did Natsu get?
1453312.title: Natsu

14533121.content:
Laxus let his powers slow as Natsu suddenly became shorter than his foot. The little flame ball trapped, kicking and screaming, Laxus gripped his toes round Natsu's head, grinning. The shrunken and degraded flame dragon slayer found himself choking on Laxus' toes, no longer able to even slightly keep the baked tanned sole off his body.

Slowly, Laxus let his weight on the now silenced Natsu increase, pressing more and more of his collossal body weight into the midget, feeling Natsu struggles become more desperate.

'You feel that? That's my power. I could crush you in a moment if I wanted. And I just might... Unless you behave.'

Natsu's struggles slowed, Laxus chuckling darkly as he felt Natsu give in... Or at least begin to comprehend his situation.

'Kiss it, little fire fly. Then maybe I won't squash you...'

Natsu...
