1511.title: Ben Tennyson

choices: Ben Peels his Socks Off and uses the Ferris Wheel as a Footrest!
Ben Keeps his Socks On...For now.
15111.content:
The Rustbucket RV that Gwen, Ben and Grandpa Max were travelling in had stopped in a small city. It was pretty hot out and Ben was neglecting his hygiene AS USUAL. So that only caused friction between him and his snobby killjoy of a cousin Gwen.

"Dweeb! Get away from me! You stink!" Gwen huffed at Ben who was sitting in the booth across from her. "No way! I was sitting here first!" Ben argued. Grandpa Max had gone to look around and hadn't come back yet...leaving Gwen in charge of her 'dweeb' cousin.

"Fine! You don't wanna smell me? I'll just leave!" Ben snapped after some more words were exchanged. Both kids were irritable...Ben was hot and sticky...it didn't help that he never changed his foul socks either.

"Hey wait! Grandpa might come back any minute!" Gwen yelled out the door after Ben. "So what?! Who cares?" Ben snapped over his shoulder as he stomped away down the sidewalk.

He needed to cool off...both emotionally and physically. He began fidgeting with the Omnitrix...he came across a form he hadn't seen before.

Unknown to Ben, Grandpa Max had returned to the RV...and Gwen was so mad she lied and said Ben was in his room in the back of the RV.

Meaning as the Rustbucket took off...Ben was left in the city...but somehow Ben would manage fine on his own today...for as he slammed his palm down on the lit up alien wristwatch...he didn't transform...but he began to grow!

"Whoa-ho! I'm not an alien...I'm just...gettin' bigger! Awesome!" Ben cheered as soon he was over 60ft. tall and towering over the nearby buildings. "I'd like to see Gwen mess with me now!" Ben chuckled as he went to cause some mischief.

Spotting a carnival, he grinned wickedly as he stomped towards it. The ticket booth guy looked out and Ben squatted down with a raised eyebrow. "Am I tall enough to ride?" Ben snickered and stepped right over the turnstile.

The ground quaked with his footsteps, and Ben already had an idea on something pretty funny to do. He plopped down on his rear, and began prying off his shoes. "Grrgh!" Ben grunted, his voice causing the people around to cover their ears before..with a moist pop his shoes came off to reveal hole-ridden and sopping wet socked feet.
15111.title: Ben Grows!

151111.content:
Ben wiggled his big toe that was popped out of the hole on top. If his toe was getting air then so should the rest, and do Ben grunted as he leaned forward and grabbed the heel of his sock and started to pull of the musky cloth with a little difficulty as the sweat made it stick. The boy let out a relieved sigh as his foot was fully exposed and emitting a blurry aura of salty sweat. After the second sock was removed, Ben took a moment to flex his feet and rid them of any tension.

The people who came over to see the astounding display of a giant young boy started coughing and shielding thier eyes as the burning aura of food salt and cheese hit them in thick fumes.

Ben simply giggled at the reaction. "Come on, thier not that bad! But they are really sore."

Leaning back onto a building and putting his hands behind his head, Ben hummed and relaxed before catching sight of a ferris while by him still rotating. Ben smirked as he lifted his feet up and placed them above the ride.

"Mind if I use this?"

The heels of Ben's feet created a large dent the top as he rested his plump soles for relaxation. Thankfully no one fell out of thier carts, unfortunately they were still stuck on the ride and now directly in the same area of the musky feet.

Ben shifted left and right, making an even bigger crater. He felt hot still but relaxing like he owned everything took his mind off it.

What was next?
151111.title: A Giant's Footrest

1511112.content:
Ben groaned as his feet were airing out...it felt good...but the dogs were still sore. That was when an idea sprang to the young giant's mind. Gaining a sly smirk he lifted his heels off of the Ferris Wheel and plopped the bad boys down on the concrete. Due to his size it didn't hurt to thump his heels down, in fact it cracked the actual cement beneath them!

Giggling at the sight of so many people pinching their noses, he flexed those plump toes and cleared his throat. "Yo, runts! I could reaaaally use a foot rub right now!" His voice boomed across the carnival grounds.

Of course, no one paid him much mind...big mistake. Ben scowled and roared: "HEY! Get over here!"

This caused any tiny person in earshot or view to scurry up to the colossal and meaty feet, their faces turning green as they did so. "Good bugs, now rub em'!" Ben reclined back once more with a satisfied grin on his young face.

Soon he felt the sensation of hundreds of tiny hands kneading his mushy soles, he groaned in approval and his ego swelled. "Who needs the dumb ol' RV? THIS is how I'm gonna spend my summer vacation!" Ben cackled as he heard several people gag at his cheesy foot odor.

What now...?
1511112.title: Ben's Servants

15111121.content:
Ben was enjoying his big dogs getting some love, but there was a problem. The rubbing barely reached above his heels and he wanted all of his soles to get the same love.

"Hey squirts why don't some of start climbing I'm gonna need all of my foot tenderized!", the young boy ordered as he closed his eyes.

The park goers were in disarray as they had to climb the towering and chessy sole. The tallest people started grabbing onto the plump flesh and attempting to scale the mushy feet. A few slipped while others managed to grab handfuls of plump flesh. Ben wiggled his enormous toes and released more waves of chesse stench.

"There you go! Make sure to reach my toes and get in good or else!"

About three tinies managed to reach the cliff of the brown haired giant's toes. Open caverns that practically had stem rising from how sweaty and hot they were. The stench was unbearable and made them gag and near regurgitation. Still, they have to please the giant kid or face his wrath.

Ben giggled as he felt the tiny hands press into his toe gunk and soothe the musky caverns.

What was next?
15111121.title: Ben's Foot Demands

choices: The Boys Have a Contest to Gross Out The Tinies With STINK!!
151111213.content:
As Ben was relaxing back, enjoying tormenting and enslaving these puny park goers to his rancid feet...he was brought out of his reverie by a familiar voice.

"Hey! No fair! Why do you get to be a giant?!" A voice down on the rooftop next to Ben's head shouted.

"Hey...I know that voice..." Ben turned his green eyed gaze to see his rival and delinquent on-again off-again friend: Kevin Levin!

"Oh, look who's looking small...." Ben teased as he grinned smugly. Kevin scoffed, "Yeah right! What's the deal!? Why are you all huge and not going all alien like usual?" Kevin demanded.

"Like I'd tell you! You sure you don't wanna come down here with the rest of the bugs? Plenty of feet to go around!" Ben teasingly wiggled his bulbous toes and caused the tinies between to stumble around in his gaps.

Kevin glared, "Not a chance! Why don't you make ME a giant and I'll show you how to cause some REAL mayhem?"

Ben's eyebrow twitched in slight annoyance, man Kev sure knew how to press his buttons. "I don't even know how it'd work on you!"

"Simple! Just turn the watch to whatever selection made you huge...and I'll absorb the energy from it!" Kevin said braggishly.

Ben frowned, but the delinquent had a point. Ben brought up his wrist and turned the Omnitrix's dial to the image of a human increasing in height.

Kevin grinned widely and held his palms out, the energy flowed into his body and he groaned in pleasure. The roof beneath his boots began to crack and soon the dark haired kid shot up in height.

"ROAAaARwr!" Kevin roared like Godzilla as the building beneath him caved in...sending Ben sprawling onto his back...he had been relaxing against it after all.

"Hey!" Ben yelled grumpily as he dusted himself off. Kevin grew to match Ben's height of 50 ft and crossed his sleeveless arms with a smug grin.

"I bet I'm a smellier giant than YOU, Benny-boy!" Kevin declared, giving his sleeveless underarm a test whiff.
151111213.title: Ben's Rival Appears!

1511112131.content:
Ben gave a toothy smirk as he leaned over and reach towards his feet, plucking up a palm full. "Heh your on!"

Kevin quickly yanked off his boots and cracked the ground with his huge barefoot feet. Tossing his footwear away Kevin plopped down, not paying attention to the building wreaked by his discarded boots.

The black haired boy sighed as he wiggled his toes and spread out whiffs of cheese. Kevin smirked playfully at the terrified bugs in his rival's hand.

Ben swiveled in the crater he made to face Kevin. "Alright you take a few of these bugs and stink um up. It'll be their choice in who stinks more!"

Kevin hummed and held out a hand. "Alright give em here!"

Ben plucked up about eight bugs and dropped them in the rough palm of Kevin. The green eyed boy smirked bringing his bugs to his face.

"How about you worms judge somewhere familiar first?"

Ben brought up a sole before slapping the tinies against it. The bugs were smooshed into the plump sole and soon were drowning as Ben took his other foot and sandwiched the bugs in the stinky cheese.

Ben giggled at the puny squirming, making Kevin eagerly grin as he looked his share of bugs. Lifting up his right arm, the black haired boy took a whiff and smirked at the sweaty stench from his armpit.

"I've got a nice warm place for you runts."

Throwing his arm over his head, Kevin copied Ben and slapped the bugs against the greasy skin. Kevin rubbed the tiny bodies into the musky skin and hurred as the stench was shoved in the runts faces.
1511112131.title: A Rival Competition

choices: Ben plays the part of the giant city-destroying villain!
Ben is mad, time to squash a bug!
15113.content:
"Mmnh...rrrgh..what happened?" The ten year old Omnitrix wielder Ben Tennyson murmured as his eyes opened. Sitting up, he reached up to scratch his head and happened to spot rows of seemingly flying cars travelling overhead.

"What the-....Coool!" Ben said in awe, looking around further he would realize he was in some sort of high tech futuristic city.

It soon came flooding back, he had been battling a magic wielding villain when the fiend opened a portal and hurled him through! He lost consciousness soon after he entered a swirling void.

"I must be in some sorta other world!" Ben declared to himself as he stood up...only to bump his head on the ceiling of this parking garage he had seemingly been dumped in.

"Ow! What the heck?" Hissing and rubbing his head, he looked down to see his black and white sneakers on his feet looked rather far away down below his legs.

A strange tingling sensation went throughout his body, and he felt himself being hunched over as his body expanded outward. "W-whoa! I-I'm getting bigger!" Ben yelped as his head of brown hair began to burst up through the floor of the next parking level..causing people to scream and begin to panic.

"Oops...sorry..." Ben said sheepishly as his growing seemingly slowed at a whopping 30 ft.

"Someone call the Hero League!" People cried out, Ben noticed some of the citizens who were currently panicking were of alien descent as well as some were human.

A loud siren met Ben's ears as he carefully crouched down and stepped out from the parking garage he'd slightly damaged.

"HERO ALERT! HERO ALERT!" A robotic voice droned.

"Huh?" Ben turned around just in time to see a caped individual clobber him in the face, sending him falling backwards onto the street with a quake. "Oww! What the heck was that for?!" Ben bellowed in anger.

"I don't know what kind of young villain or monster you are...but I'm going to stop you!" The flying and caped hero declared dramatically.

Ben might've been impressed to meet a real superhero any other day..but this guy had just punched him without warning!
15113.title: Ben Grows (Alternate Dimension!)

151132.content:
He rubbed the back of his head as he glared at the superhero in the cape, he was just minding his own business and figuring out what was happening but it looks like that might be put on hold.

"Alright wise guy, I was trying to figure out whats going on but since you're acting stupid I guess I'll be beating the heck out of you." He said cracking his knuckles in anticipation as he then fiddled with the Omnitrix to see which alien could help him.

"How about some Heat Blast for ya?" He threatened to the Superhero who looked unimpressed as he watched him slam on the device only to be confused from the thing returning a negative beeping sound.

"Huh? Come on you telling me whatever this place is blocking my aliens too?" He complained as the man sighed, "Looks like I'm gonna have to come and take you in." He said as he flew towards Ben as he cocked his fist back to punch at him.

Ben was seeing no other options other than the obvious and punched him when he got into range, marvelling at the fact that the hero was promptly knocked into a building.

"Well, atleast theres this size I can rely on." He mused as he saw him get out of the hole relatively unhurt, this might take a while.
151132.title: Ben is mad, time to squash a bug!

choices: Ben goes searching for help to get home
1511321.content:
“Grr...Arrogant brat! I'll show you who's boss!” The hero flew towards Ben's face once again winding up for another punch.

“TAKE THIS!” The hero followed through on the punch…. Only for Ben to simply step aside at the last moment, making the hero go flying past.

Quickly turning around Ben brought his hand down on the hero with the palm facing down.

“Huh?! The hero looked up as a shadow came over him but had no time to react before the hands crashed down on him.

“Heh to easy” Ben said as he slapped the hero into the ground at his feet with the same action one would use to swat a fly.

“You think you've won? I'll show you!”

“Actually I think this fight is over. Since I just swatted the fly to the ground I really don't want to give it the chance to fly away.

Soo..”

Ben lifted his white and black sneaker clad foot off the ground and moved it over the hero and brought it down immediately.

The hero thinking quickly threw up his arms and caught the foot, grunting as this drove him into a kneeling position in the ground. Thankfully he was strong enough to keep the foot from ending him brutally, just barely though.


“Hmm you're made of some sturdy stuff huh?” Ben asked looking down at his foot feeling the slightest bit of resistance under the sneaker.

“Heh, I told you I'll -”

“Too bad I'm not even putting any effort into it!”

Ben started to press down harder and harder on the super hero.

The man grunted as his face pooled with sweat and turned a dark shade of red. The pressure being forced on him locked down his lungs stopping his breathing.

“Goodnight littleman!” Ben laughed and twisted the soul of his foot into the ground.

This was the last thing the hero was expecting as when the foot started twitching his grip on the hard rubber sole of the shoe was ripped free and with a final shout! He was driven to the ground below him.

Ben gave a wide grin as he felt the hero flatten under his sneaker with nice long Squiiish! Followed by several popping and crunching noises.

“Heh, that was fun!” He said as he lifted his foot to inspect is work… Only to find his entire sole splattered with blood and the hero’s remains. “Whoa.. okay that is a little gross even to me, oh well.”

Without looking down he stomps his foot back into a clear spot on the ground and scrapes it back several times to get the ‘gunk’ off it.

Not noticing the tiny kid only coming up to and inch on him right where he stomped.

//////////////////////////////////

The young kid had decided to watch as his superhero did battle with the giant monster. However upon seeing his hero slapped into the ground he decides to go to him. Completely oblivious to the true danger before him he runs forward toward the to fighting.

He runs parallel with the giants left foot to get to his hero when the giant brings his foot down on the hero.

He freezes in shock and is unable to move as he has to watched his hero get pounded into a giant red smear before him. He watches as the giant lifts his foot up but all the kid focused on was the unrecognizable smear of the city hero.

Being to focused he didn’t notice the shadow that was cast over him at first. He glanced up with wide terror filled eyes at the heel of the monsters shoe descending upon him.

A scream rose through his throat and mouth but was never even voiced before the shoe slammed into him with a quakening BOOOM! Bursting his body like a grape. Thankfully it was fast and he didn’t feel any pain as his life was removed from the world by the giant Ben Tennyson with a quick squiiish, Which went unnoticed to Ben as he was more focused on what to do next while he scraped shoe clean to notice the small life he accidentally ended.

“Okay where should I go now..?” Ben thought as he scratched his head and finished scraping the guts off his shoe.
1511321.title: The fight continues!

choices: Ben Finds Himself in a Lilliput/Gulliver's Travels scenario!
Ben is a Giant in a Futuristic Scifi land!
151133.content: Perhaps restart this plotline to where it's NOT a superhero society? Hmm?
151133.title: Other

15131.content: What happens to our dark haired delinquent?
15131.title: Kevin Levin

151311.content:
Kevin Levin leaned against an alley wall, he had faced Ben a mere day ago...and had barely managed to escape. He was frustrated and alone...having betrayed the closest thing to a friend he had...or perhaps it was the other way around.

He was tired, and hungry, and hadn't bathed in some time...he had been camping out in a construction site and recently discovered he could 'drain' the energy of nearby people. The sleeveless delinquent was still getting a hang on it..but it was better than starving and it seemed to sate his growling stomach like it was actual food.

Placing a palm on his stomach, he scowled as his belly growled. The alley he was currently in was around the corner of a deli. This deli had just thrown him out for smelling up the place.

Scowling, Kevin made a decision, if he couldn't afford regular food...he'd just make do with feasting on the life force of these dumb people!

"Who knows...maybe I could snatch a wallet or something and afford a nice cheeseburger." Kevin licked his lips at the thought.

At that moment, the deli owner caught Kevin's eye as the large chubby man walked by the alley, whistling and carrying a doggybag which had grease stains on it.

Kevin's stomach growled on cue and he went into action! Tossing a tiny pebble, it impacted the side of the man's head harmlessly.

The grumpy man turned and spotted Kevin, "Huh? You brat!"

Kevin grinned confidently, "Hey tubby, waddle your fat ass over here!"

The man's face reddened with rage as he rushed into the alleyway....right into Kevin's clutches.

Holding up a palm, Kevin began draining the energy from the man..who immediately fell to the ground behind the dumpster.

Luckily for Kevin, his victims usually forgot the events leading up to the draining and would wake up confused. Deciding to play it safe, Kevin didn't drain ALL of the man's energy.

"He's too fat to haul a body somewhere..besides, I don't need the cops snooping around." Kevin casually said to himself as he yanked the doggy bag up and opened it.

A plethora of heavenly smells greeted Kevin's nostrils. "Cheese fries AND a burger! Sweet." Kevin felt a tingling sensation throughout his body....
151311.title: A Delinquent's Growth

choices: Kevin tests out just what kind of energies he can absorb.
Kevin goes on a look out for his arch-nemesis.
1513111.content:
As he was eating his pilfered burger and fries, Kevin had felt a tingly sensation pervade throughout his body after he had finished polishing off the food, "What the...never felt this way before." He commented on what was happening to him, it felt like his body was pushing outwards like an overfilled balloon.

It was then that he looked around in astonishment and awe as he saw his perspective getting higher and higher, "No way, I'm growing?" He asked himself, his body growing in size as his feet spread along the concrete with his growth spurt, it was then that it slowed down in his growth spurt.

By the time it was done, he was about 10ft tall, practically the biggest human on the planet and probably the meanest one anyone might face, "Over already? Whatever, looks like draining people's energy makes me bigger now, heh, wait till Tennyson gets a load of me, if he tries to turn into his aliens, I'll just sap the energy from that dumb watch and turn him normal." Kevin boasted as he then took a first few steps out of the alleyway to check for anyone that might be walking out, no need for people calling the police, that'll come later.
1513111.title: He's Only Slightly Taller! (7-10 ft)

1521.content:
Hiro was the young manager of a new gaming store located in Tokyo, Japan. "Game Start" was sure to be a big hit, but Hiro still needed one more employee before opening day.

"Just one more interview and then I can finally go home..." Hiro sighed.

The door to his office opened, and a purple haired male walked in, wearing a t-shirt and shorts.

"Welcome, please have a seat." Hiro said in an uneasy tone, this guy surely wasn't looking promising with his attire and lax attitude.

"Yo." He greeted Hiro casually.

As he sat down, Hiro noticed a foul stench... it smelled like unwashed armpits, making him cringe a bit.

"Name's Urushihara" He said, relaxing back with his feet propped up on Hiro's table, giving the manager a hint of unwashed foot odor too.

"Jeez, does this guy ever bathe?" Hiro thought, but he decided to finish the interview regardless.

"So... what makes you think that you're qualified for this job?" Hiro asked.

Urushihara sighed and stood up, "I'm already bored." He rolled his eyes before holding his hand out towards Hiro.

"What are you doing? Sit back-" Hiro suddenly found himself looking up at his now giant desk.

"Sweet, it worked!" Urushihara peaked over the desk, his giant face looming above Hiro.

"W-What did you do to me?!" Hiro was shocked, stumbling back as Urushihara smirked.

"I shrunk you, obviously. I need magic, dude, and I'm gonna get it by tormenting your new pathetic, bug sized body." Urushihara's eyes gleamed before he reached down and snatched Hiro up between two fingers.

"Stop! Turn me back!" Hiro demanded.

Urushihara squeezed Hiro between his giant fingers, causing the tiny manager to squeak in pain.

"Is the little bug scared of the giant LUCIFER?!" Urushihara yelled in his face, blowing bad breath all over him.

Urushihara then lifted his free arm, letting his sleeve drop down to reveal his sweaty armpit. Hiro gagged as the smell invaded his senses, he squirmed in Urushihara's fingers in a fruitless attempt to escape.

"I'll tuck you away until I get back home, have fun being squashed under my pits, runt!" Urushihara laughed before pressing Hiro against the soft, warm flesh underneath the giant slacker's arm.

Urushihara hummed to himself as he rubbed Hiro around his pit, hearing him scream due to the nasty stench and pressure from Urushihara's finger. Urushihara left Hiro stuck to his skin, peeking underneath his arm to get a good look at him and laughed at the sight.

"Dude, you look so pathetic, better get ready for a nice squeeze. Also, you better not suffocate on the way home, I already made you invincible to crushing. Gotta make sure my little plaything doesn't break before I get to use him!" Urushihara put his arm down and squeezed it to his side, smothering Hiro in between two walls of smelly flesh.

"Now then, guess I'll be taking these..." Urushihara said as he walked out of the office and grabbed games off the shelves, feeling Hiro's desperate squirms under his arm.
1521.title: Game Over

15212.content:
It was a hot afternoon, and Hiro knew this almost as soon as Urushihara exited the store. The sun beat down upon the youthful fallen angel, and he squeezed his arms against his sides with relish. "Little runt better not drown...these pits are soaked." He murmured with a devilish grin.

Indeed, Hiro was sputtering as Lucifer walked...spitting out mouthfuls of salty, rancid pit sweat. Soon enough he got woozy, it was sweltering under the monstrous male's arm....perhaps he was suffering from a form of heat stroke.

However, soon Lucifer arrived home and while Maou was still at work...Lucifer didn't anticipate what he would find inside. Opening the door, he noticed a note on the fridge.

It was from Ashiya, "Lord Satan, I have gone out to fetch some ingredients for dinner. Urushihara, do NOT order anything and do NOT pig out on junk food!"

Lucifer grinned, "Sweet...home alone..bad news for YOU little guy.." Disregarding the note, Urushihara opened the fridge and got a soda and some snacks.

Slipping off his sneakers, his plump and very sweaty and grimy feet were unleashed. He plopped down in his usual spot and sighed as he aired the dogs out.

Placing his snacks and soda down, he fished his fingers under his sleeve and brought out his tiny victim. Hiro's body peeled off the pit with a satisfying sticky sound.

He plopped Hiro down on the floor in front of his bare feet and grinned, "So...do I get the job?"
15212.title: Arriving Home

152121.content:
"Yes! Just turn me back to normal an-"

Urushihara pinched Hiro between his massive toes, interrupting him. Hiro got a nose full of Urushihara's odorous toes as he desperately tried to wriggle out from between the sweaty digits.

"You got the wrong idea dude, I just wanted to know if I should eat you or not. Lucky for me, I got the job and a new runt to mess with." Urushihara smirked and dropped Hiro back onto the floor.

"You're not turning me back?!" Hiro stood up angrily.

"Oh I'm gonna turn you back, when I go to work. How's a bug like you supposed to be a manager? But for now, you're workin' for me!" Urushihara slammed his feet down on their heels in front of Hiro "Why don't ya give me a nice massage? Can't have my feet sore on the job can I?"

Urushihara wiggled his toes as Hiro cringed.

"This is inhumane! What are you?!" Hiro shouted.

"Inhumane huh? Too bad for you shrimp, I'm a fallen angel, I could care less about human crap." Urushihara raised his foot above Hiro, the massive sweaty sole loomed above the tiny man.

Hiro stumbled back, "Wait, don't!"

Urushihara began to lower his foot, "Don't what? Don't squish you? I don't think you got it yet runt, you're MINE now, even when I turn you back to normal for work, you still belong to me." He slammed his foot down, smushing Hiro under his nasty sole.

Hiro screamed as the weight of the foot crushed him. Urushihara swiveled his foot back and forth before lifting it up and seeing him stuck to his sole.

"Psh, you're so pathetic dude." Urushihara peeled Hiro off of his foot and tossed him on the floor "Guess I should know your name though, just cause we're gonna be working together, I mean, you'll be working as my little slave for the rest of your life." He licked his lips and narrowed his eyes.

"It's Hiro..." Hiro sighed, he'd realized how much power Urushihara had over him now, no matter what, he was never escaping the giant.

"Kay then, you got a couple of feet to massage, don't you shrimpy?" Urushihara grinned devilishly.
152121.title: "Y-Yes! Anything you want!"

1521212.content:
The tiny male looked at the two sweating feet, propped at an angle so Hiro could see the bottoms of his plump toes, looming overhead. The odour still continued to hold the air prisoner, forcing Hiro to choke it down despite being inches away. Fat beads of clear sweat rolled down the baked soles looming overhead, a large one beading up, landing heavily on Hiro's head, the manager coughing and spluttering as some of the salty, rank liquid got in his mouth.

'N-No... N-No way am I going to run your feet! They're disgusting...!' Hiro somehow found the courage to say. Or rather, stupidity.

'Something wrong with your brain, little bug? Maybe I shrank your brain too much.' Urushihara scoffed. Barely having to flex a muscle, he dropped his foot down onto Hiro. The thick sheen of sweat immediately glued to idiotic tiny on fast to the hot stomper, his face smothered completely by foul, damp flesh.

Before Hiro could even so much as struggle, Lucifer began pressing his soles together. Pushing hard against each other, trapping Hiro's entire head in a bubble of gross sweat, the fallen angel's feet grinding and dragging the hapless human back and forth. Hiro could only humiliatedly sob into his new owner's soles, Urushihara sneering at his closed feet, the tiny human not even detectable to the out side world.

Parting his rank feet, the unwashed angel dropped Hiro and his foot hard onto the ground, dragging it against the floor until his manager popped off, gasping and panting for what little air he could get through all the sweat. Hiro must of swallowed a gallon of the teen's secretions in the last couple hours!

Pushing his hallux into Hiro's chest, Lucifer sneered once more, crushing footy air out of his captives chest.

'I could do this all day. You ready to obey now?'
1521212.title: Hiro still refuses

choices: Urushihara wanted Hiro to prove his loyalty
15212121.content:
Hiro shook with fear as Urushihara suddenly set his rough heel on top of him, the skin easily covered him and applied enough pressure to let him know the fallen angel would squash him

“Maybe I should make you crushable, it’s pretty lame instead of pampering I just got an annoying bug.” Urushihara Sneered as he lifted up his foot and put more weight on his heel. “It’ll only a second to squash your puny body to nothing. So how about that rub?”

The tiny nodded frantically as he cringed from the smelly pressure.” Y-yes I’ll rub your feet master!”, Hiro yelled out gagging as the sweaty stench was shoved in his face.

The foot suddenly lifted, momentarily carrying Hiro till he unstuck from the heel, Urushihara smirked as he tilted his foot so he could see the tiny human. “Master huh? Good to know your not too stupid.”

Urushihara set both of his feet on their heels, the plump sweaty soles emitted a vinegar and cheese like stench as drops were smeared over the large feet. Hiro hesitantly placed his hands on the damp sole, gagging as the stench hit him. As the puny hands pushed into the plump soles, squelches of bitter sweat came out of the vast foot. Hiro was only half the height of the heel truly showing just how tiny he was to the fallen angel.

The neet sighed as he finally got his rub, he felt mighty not just from his smelly feet being pampered but having a tiny human submit and serve his soles. Urushihara picked up his portable console before he began to play. As his fingers danced on the buttons, he wiggled his toes and smugly grinned.

“So pipsqueak how’s the smell?”, Urushihara mockingly asked.

Hiro held back his gag as a drop of cheesy sweat splashed on him. “Very strong master!”

Urushihara hummed. “Good then maybe I’ll let you spent the night in my socks.”

The tiny paled as he began to rub higher.

Soon...
15212121.title: A Submitted Servant

choices: Hiro Gives Urushihara the Info for his Job
152121212.content:
Urushihara flexed his bulbous toes and thought up a way to improve upon this situation. "Listen up, bug. Your all powerful master wants you to prove your loyalty." Lucifer's eyes narrowed and he wore a devious grin.

Hiro coughed as those toes fanned the stink of toe funk down upon him. He didn't respond other than that of course, he knew better than to question the giant purple NEET.

"So, you're going to give these huge stinking soles of mine a nice kiss!" Lucifer crossed his arms and declared. Hiro's watery eyes bulged and he looked upon the gargantuan, plump soles in front of him. They were enormous and wide, dotted with bits of grime and leaking potent sweat.

Having learned his lesson about disobedience earlier though, the Game-Start manager gulped and went along with it.
It seemed he was taking too long pondering this whole thing, because Lucifer plopped his reeking sole into his face. Putting aside his PASTA console and reaching down, Urushihara used his fingers to push his tiny bitch deep into his mushy foot.

"Kiss, Kiss, Kiss!" Lucifer mocked with a sneer. Finally, with no choice now, and suffocating on cheddary vinegar fumes, Hiro puckered his lips and gave the sole a nice smooch.

Hanzo Urushihara grinned in triumph. This was it, the runt was truly and forever HIS.

Ceasing his pressure on Hiro's back, Lucifer peeled the now grease covered manager from his sole and brought him up to his eyes.

"Phew, you stink little fella." Hanzo joked as he crinkled his nose. "Anyway, tomorrow is the grand opening of your little game shop right? I guess I'd better get some info on what I should expect." Urushihara sighed in a rather bored manner.

"Y-yes, of course master!" Hiro squeaked. Lucifer chuckled, "When we're at work you call me master in private, but never forget that you're mine..and if you disrespect me on shift...you'll get it HARD when I get off work."

Hiro nodded meekly, "Of course."
152121212.title: A Test of Loyalty

choices: Hiro has trouble falling asleep in the chessy bed
Urushihara gets a wake up call courtesy of Ashiya
1521212122.content:
Urushihara suddenly tossed his tiny servent into the air, chuckling as he caught Hiro in a fist and saw only his tiny head sticking out. "So tell me me how tommarow is gonna go down."

Hiro pales as the fist holding him tilted and nearly put him upside down, the giant purplenette above was crawling around looking for something.

"Um...well everything is pretty much set up i was planning on working cashier you can make sure the shelves are filled after all the copies are taken. Maybe you could also help customers with recommendations master?", Hiro explained trying not to come off as demanding.

The fallen angel hummed. "Sounds easy enough, i can play the games anytime i want righhhtt?"

"Y-yes feel free to test out any games or any of your own hehe.", Hiro nervously chuckled.

Urushihara grinned as he heard everything from his toy, a job where he got to play games and check out the new titles! Not to mention it was all a bonus to the fact that his boss was his tiny slave.

"Finally, found them!", Urushihara smugly grinned as inside of his box bed was his next method of fun. A pair of wrinkly green tinted socks laid discarded.

Picking up the damp cloth, Urushihara took a small sniff and smirked as the used socks still had a strong aura of chessy funk from being pasted to his sweaty soles.

Bringing the fist to his face, the fallen angel licked his lips and narrowed his visible eye. "So squirt you think my foot scent is strong?"

Hiro put on a shaky grin. "Y-yes my master very strong and alluring."

Urushihara's smirk turned toothy as he gribbed one of the socks by the hem and held it under Hiro. "Great to hear, i think my human needs a nice smelly and comfy bed!"

The tiny soon felt the warm fist holding him release, Hiro resisted the panicked yell as he descended into the hot and fuming sock. The landing was soft, but within a second the familiar chesse funk attacked the tiny's nostrils. Tried toe lint pasted the cloth and sweat was seeped into the grey cloth.

"Let me warm you up squirt!", the sneering voice of Lucifer boomed as a darkness covered the entrance.

Hiro was covering his mouth as the odorous fumes were inhaled, looking up he grew treat as the large toes he had to worship slipped in. The funky toes pressed against his face, shoving the cheddary stench right up Hiro's nose. The sock stretched as Urushihara slipped it over his plump sole, squelches of fresh warm sweat joing the dried sweat echoed around the sole.

Urushihara sighed as he wiggled his toes feeling his plump toes rub the tiny's puny face. "So you enjoying your bed?"

Hiro decided to try and suck up to his new master, pressing his lips to the big toe and giving another sweaty kiss. The fallen angel smugly grinned as he slipped on his other sock, wanting to stink up both his socks for use.

"Alright bug off to bed, hope your feeling cheery for your store opening." Urushihara smugly said crawling into the boxes and laying down. Chuckling as he wiggled his toes and smelt his strong scent.

Having a NEET attitude meant Urushihara didn't bother taking showers, opting his time be used for games or ordering packages. But hey at least the water bill's lowered?

Soon....
1521212122.title: A Job Fit For A Fallen NEET Angel

choices: Urushihara Takes and Regrows Him at Hiro's House...for a Price!
No Deal, Hiro Is Smelling Like Feet ALL DAY!
15212121222.content:
Before the purple haired NEET knew it there was a thumping on his box that jolted him awake. "Wake up, Urushihara! You've slept long enough!" Ashiya shouted.

Lucifer groaned and stretched, catching a nice whiff of his underarms as he did so and chuckling. Maou's apartment lacked air conditioning, and it was quite hot due to the record heat. Already the young fallen angel could feel how much he'd been sweating during the night.

He flexed his feet and heard the squelches emanate from his now sopping wet socks. He snickered as he felt Hiro suddenly jolt awake. "Are you getting up or not?! Our master has already departed for his shift and for some reason he ordered me to cook you breakfast for you as well." Ashiya snootily told the fallen angel.

"Yeah, yeah..." Urushihara crawled out of his box and sat cross legged at the small table which held a meager breakfast for the NEET.

"Ugh, I'm going to have to spray air freshener in that box of yours while you're gone." Ashiya cringed.

"No way, dude! I don't want my area of the apartment smelling all girly!" Urushihara said through a mouthful of eggs.

Ashiya rolled his eyes, "You're such a hopeless excuse for a demon general..."

"Whatever, I've got a job now and I can spend my OWN money on whatever I want." Urushihara proudly proclaimed.

"AFTER we deduct some for the bills and what you've stolen from his majesty's savings to order online." Ashiya hmphed.

"WHAT?! No way! It's my money!" The emo gamer roared.

Hiro was still pasted to the bratty demon's sole and surrounded by reeking cotton as the argument went on.

Pulling on his dank and foul smelling sneakers, Lucifer stood up and put his full weight on his employer. Hiro grunted as he felt the immense pressure of the NEET and was molded into the sole further.

Stepping out down the rickety stairs on the side of the Villa Rosa Sasazuka, Urushihara dashed around the back of the building. The demonic boy checked to make sure no body was coming, and popped his foot out of his damp shoe.

Plopping down on his rear on the ground, Urushihara peeled the occupied sock away from his wide foot. Sighing in bliss, he wiggled those plump digits as the air kissed his big bare foot.

"So how was your night, squirt?" Lucifer smirked, already feeling that the runt was glued to his sole. The purplenette pulled his foot onto his opposite knee and peeled Hiro away.

"P-please master, may I get cleaned up at my house? This is the grand opening after all." Hiro pleaded.

How does Lucifer respond..?
15212121222.title: A Slacker's First Day on the Job

choices: The master and servant get into a discussion about games
152121212221.content:
Urushihara hummed before grinning. "You felt pretty good smooshed against my feet last noght, i guess I'll give you some reward."

Hiro's eyes sparkled, finally something good was gracing him after the hours of inhaling the cheddary hot odor! However, the need smugly grinned as he tilted his head.

"I'll let you wash off my stink if...i get a little bonus in my pay?"

The tiny felt a cloud over his head, of course nothing in life was free as for some mercy he had to give more money. "Yes...i understand master.", Hiro said glumly.

Urushihara slipped on his freshly sweat coated sock and fuming sneaker. Gripping Hiro in a fist, the fallen angel gave a shit eating grin. "Alright runt leave the way."

After a couple of minutes of walking around in the sunny weather which fueled the sweaty b.o coating the giant, Urushihara arrived at Hiro's apartment. Setting the tiny before the toes of his sneakers the neet held out his hand and within a second had Hiro back to his normal height.

"Alright hurry up and get washed up.", Urushihara leaned forward and smirked as Hiro flinched back. "And don't think about running, I'll find you and may have to crush a bug."

Hiro quickly nodded, unlocking his door and hurrying in. Urushihara chuckled as he leaned against the wall, putting his arms behind his head. The sour musk of his pits hit the purplenette's nose as the heat made his potent smell increase.

After about ten minutes of intense scrubbing, Hiro emerged from his home dressed in a black shirt and cargo shorts. Why get dressed up if Urushihara was gonna squish his sweat into him again later.

"Geez took your sweet time.", Urushihara grunted annoyed as he whipped sweat from his forehead.

"S-sorry master.", Hiro rubbed the back of his neck as the fallen angel began walking. The human stumbled after him still somewhat disheveled at being back to his normal size.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Welcome to Game Start, please feel free to look around!", Hiro smiled as customers floated into the store. There were around 20 people all licking around in awe at the various games and merchandise.

"I was thinking about getting this for my son's birthday. Would he like it?", a middle aged man asked Urushihara as he had his feet propped up on the counter and 'testing' the latest portable console.

Urushihara didn't look up from his gameplay. "That version sucks, they basically treat you like a freakin baby through the challenges.", the purplenette used a hand to slid a case to the man. "The PASTA version is better."

The man quirked an eyebrow before coughing into his fist. "A-ah thank you."

Hiro grinned as he made the purchese, everything was going great so far! It was almost like he actually lived normally and not as a tiny servent. But alas the day would end eventually.

Later....
152121212221.title: A Cost For Cleansing

choices: Urushihara Takes Hiro Up on the Offer
Urushihara Shrinks Hiro and Goes to Grab a Bite!
1521212122211.content:
"So...things seem to be going well." Hiro said over to Urushihara, the purple hair's eyes never leaving his game.

"Yeah, you just make sure to pay me for this."

That was when something caught Urushihara's eye. It was a game beneath the counter he currently had his feet propped up on. "Dude, no way!" The boy yelled, rather loudly and getting some people to stare. Lucifer pulled his feet off the counter and placed his PASTA aside before crouching down.

Hiro came over and looked down at the NEET who was currently eyeballing one of the discs in their sleeves. The store merely kept the cases of the games on the shelves, the real discs were kept behind the counter to prevent theft.

"You didn't tell me you had this!" Urushihara blurted as he held up the disc for Daemon's Souls 6. Hiro might've laughed at the irony of the fallen angel being so taken with the apt titled game..but he knew better.

"Feel free to 'test' it if you want." Hiro couldn't help but smile, the euphoria of a gamer was one he knew all too well.

"Really..? I-I mean...of course I will!" Urushihara grinned.

The rest of the day went by smoothly, the hours ticked by and Urushihara was so wrapped up in his 'testing' that he barely noticed.

As the last person left the store with their purchase, Hiro made sure to count the money in the register before handing a nice sum over to Lucifer.

Urushihara's stomach growled as the NEET FINALLY looked up from his PASTA. "Uurngh...I'm starving." The b.o. emitting fallen angel complained.

Hiro chuckled, "I kinda am too, how about we go grab something? My car is still here from yesterday."
1521212122211.title: A Discussion Between Gamers

15212121222111.content:
The fallen angel grinned as he put his arms behind his head, showing his sweat stained pits. "Sure you'll treat your treat your master to a feast right?"

Hiro awkwardly chuckled scratching his cheek. "Well..i can't give you a feast but i can give you the next best thing."

As the master and servent left the store, Hiro locked the entrance before leading the way to his car. The sun had begun to set and casted the sky in an orange glow. Despite the setting sun, there was still a warm humidity in the air doung it's job in making Urushihara gain more smelly sweat to utilize.

Soon Hiro reached a moderate sized car. Unlocking it he and his master got in, the neet put his feet up on the dashboard as he booted up his PASTA once more. The fallen angel smugly grinned as he loaded his new game and entered the castle.

Hiro began to strive throughout the streets, since opening a buisness he hasn't had much time to cook meals at home leading to many nights of having take out. He soon pulled into a parking lot with speakers on each side, all connected to a building ahead reading Shoyou's pizza.

"Alright do you have any toppings in mind?", Hiro asked Urushihara, the fallen angel only muttered. "Cheese is fine.", as he clenched his teeth at the boss not given him a chance to dodge.

"Hello welcome to Shoyou's pizza how may i help?", a female voice came from the speaker.

"Hello can i get a chesse and a ummm... pineapple pizza.", Hiro said getting Urushihara to pause and look up with a disgruntled face.

"Pineapple on..pizza? You humans are weirder then i i thought.", the purplenette sighed as resumed his fight.

Hiro made a whining sound as his made an OwO. "Eh, but it's really good it's sweet and saucy!", the human clenched his fist as fake tears welled up in his eyes.

Urushihara rolled his eyes as he grinned beating the boss. "Whatever floats your boat i guess runt."
15212121222111.title: Second Best To A Feast

152121212221111.content:
After a few minutes the waitress brought out two small boxes to Hiro's car. Giving payment and thanks, he passed Urushihara his box before eagerly opening his pineapple pizza.

The purple haired boy set his box on his lap before taking out a slice, eyes not leaving his game screen. Hiro widened his eyes as he watched Urushihara about to bite the fresh cheese slice.

"Wait it might be-"

"AWH!", the fallen angel yelped as the hot cheese burned his tongue, jolting in his seat making the chesse pizza topple over.

"Ah watch out!", Hiro leaned forward to catch the gooey pizza about to splatter over his car. Luckily Hiro prevented the box from falling over. Unfortunately moving forward so fast and Urushihara moving caused both of their heads to collide together with a CLANK!

Both boys rubbed their heads at the sudden pain, Urushihara frowned as he saw in addition to the sudden headache he involuntarily ended himself by walking off a ledge in the game!

"Geez look what you made me do you shrimp!", the fallen angel gave a pissed look to the human, already thinking up ways to punish his servant.

However the purple neet looked confused as Hiro made a strange whine noise while rubbing his head. The human had tears forming at the corner of his eyes as he tried to sooth the pain. "S-sorry master, I'll try sniff and make it up later!"

Urushihara blinked before raising an eyebrow, he wouldn't say it out loud but Hiro whining like this was...cute. Shaking off the thoughts Urushihara rubbed the back of his head before restarting the level.

"W-whatever just stop crying, i wasn't that far anyway.", Urushihara propped his large sweaty feet up once more before starting the level up, making sure to cool down his pizza before taking a bite.

Hiro wipped his eyes with his hand, he flushed as he thought over what just happened. While getting stuffed in smelly socks was extreme, simple things like stubbing his toe or hitting his head just made him tear up.

Smiling Hiro started to enjoy his pizza, tasting the delicious sweetness even with the b.o and chessy fumes coming from his master.

Soon...
152121212221111.title: A Chaotic Dinner

1521212122211112.content:
"So, shrimp...how much of a bonus pay you givin' me?" Lucifer grinned evilly as he paused the game. "Mfmgmur..." Hiro responded through a mouthful of pizza.

Lucifer raised an eyebrow and replied: "Swallow your food first, runt."

"Y-yesgh mafshur." Hiro replied obediently.

Lucifer smirked as the human obeyed his order without question. Even at normal size he had this guy totally wrapped around his finger...or in this case a smelly toe! Speaking of toes, Urushihara proudly wiggled those toes and felt the gunk smoosh around them.

"Maan, you're a lucky little runt...I help out your little game shop AND you get to serve an all powerful demon." Urushihara bragged.

Hiro blushed as he looked at those feet, they were repulsive in smell and sweat....but he had to admit they were...impressive. They were enormous, even at his current normal size.

"W-well from what I felt and saw at my tiny size...they were pretty soft and smushy. And...and your toes are like..perfectly rounded." Hiro said.

Urushihara laughed, "If I didn't know better I'd say you're getting a foot fetish, little one!" He grinned toothily and flexed his big toe, crossing his foot over his knee so it was right next to Hiro.

"Want some...extra cheese for that pizza?" Urushihara cooed.
1521212122211112.title: A Chat with a Fallen Angel

15212121222111122.content:
Hiro blinked as he looked at the feet, taking in the plump sole and smeared sweat droplets trailing down. Of course the large scent emitting from these glorious feet were the big toes Urushihara playfully wiggled and mashed up the gunk between them.

Pink graced the human's cheeks, now at a normal size and not in shock anymore he would admit the fallen angel was...attractive. Looks and feet both.

"Um...ok master.", Hiro meekly said putting his pizza away and turning to face the large fuming foot next to him. Grasping the large foot, Hiro lowered his face to the sweaty sole, getting a blast of cheddary fumes to the face.

Urushihara raised an eyebrow as he smiled amused, the purple haired boy sighed as Hiro started rubbing circles in his heel and ball. "Ohh nice work squirt, if i hadn't gone in for that interview I'd guess you were a professional foot rubber!"

Hiro awkwardly blushed as he drew his nose closer to his master's demonic toes. The funky cheese stench was stronger then ever and he spot the other linty jam in the gaps. Taking a big sniff Hiro inhaled the intoxicating odorous fumes from the gunky toes, he felt his nostrils burn as the think smell tingled his nose hairs.

"You like the smell? Only the best cheese for my servent.", Urushihara teasingly patted Hiro's cheek with his toes, lightly rubbing his toes under the human's eyes Urushihara whipped any remnants of tears. "Let's get rid of those, i don't any lame tears on my human."

Hiro smiled before sticking his tongue out pressing it into the slimy crevice of the toes. The warm gooey cheese scooped up onto his tongue, the warm cheese filled his mouth. Warm goo was scooped up as it coated the walls of the toes, swallowing the cheese warm cheddar residue filled his mouth.

Urushihara licked his lips as he felt the licking to his toes, not only was the feeling of power higher then ever. But the eager service felt amazing! Not to mention having willing servitude...was pretty cool to.
15212121222111122.title: Toe Worship

152121212221111223.content:
After a few moments, Urushihara decided he couldn't wait any longer and shoved Hiroy away with his funky sole. "There's tons of time to be licking my feet. Let's see if the food's cooled off." Urushihara ordered. "Y-yes sir." Hiro squeaked, hoping he didn't overdo it.

=After Pizza=

Hiro drove the car back to his place and put it in park. Before he could open up his door, he found himself shrunk once more. "Heh, thanks for the pizza and the foot worship runt!" Urushihara boomed from behind him. Hiro found himself enveloped in the sticky, sweaty palm of his NEET master.

Urushihara had popped his feet back into his steamy footwear. He gave a toothy grin as he opened up the passenger side door and stepped out into the evening air. Uncurling his fingers as he shut the car door, he grinned smugly as he saw his little human. The runt seemed to have given up hope of EVER escaping...but in the same vein had already accepted his role.

"So since you treated your master so well...I think I'll let you ride in my pocket on the walk home." Urushihara declared. Being a demon general in Ente Isla had taught him at the very least to think strategically. Not to say he was going to go soft on the bug-boy, but he knew when to ease up..especially after someone beneath him was well behaved.

"Really? Thank you, master.." Hiro said gratefully.

"Yeah yeah.." Urushihara waved him off before depositing him inside his pocket.

The sun had now set and by the time Urushihara made it to the Villa Rosa it was pitch black. "I just hope Maou and Ashiya don't yell at me for being so late getting here." Urushihara whined as he went up the steps and approached the apartment door.

"Hm? What's this?" Urushihara noticed a sticky note on the door.

"Urushihara, we went away on E. I. business. The place is yours for the next two weeks. NO ORDERING THINGS ONLINE!"

The purple haired bum gained a wide grin. Two weeks...all to himself and no having to sneak his puny servant around? E.I. was definitely code for Ente Isla, so it must've been something important and they had to leave on short notice.

"This is gonna be amazing..." Urushihara chuckled as he entered the single room apartment. Hiro gulped, he dreaded what kind of 'fun' his master had planned.
152121212221111223.title: An Evening with a Demon General

choices: Urushihara wants his sweat licked up
1521212122211112231.content:
Slipping his large and steaming feet out of his shoes, Urushihara grinned as he took a seat by his box bed. Hiro whimpered slightly as the shorts of his master pulled him against his firm thigh as well as give him the musky sweat stench of his clothes.

Reaching into his pockets, the fallen angel plucked his human out with his finger thumb teasingly rolling him luke a ball. Urushihara hummed as he looked at Hiro, looming over him.

The purple headed NEET thought over the fun he could have not having to worry about his king and fellow general being there. He could browse his computer and sandwich his servent between his rank soles but he had already had a lot of foot fun.

"Say squirt any ideas on where you should worship?", the NEET jokingly asked, sure his human wouldn't answer.

However, Hiro rubbed his chin as the large thumb and finger squeezed him. While he was growing an admiration for his master he didn't want to seem bossy out of fear. He soon noticed the underarm of the purple and white shirt, there was a dampened patch of fabric where the pit was.

Gulping Hiro put on an awkward smile. "W-well you haven't shown me your armpits master."

Urushihara rose an eyebrow before smugly grinning. "Huh your right! I had you sniffing my cheese that i forgot about my pits."

Hiro was soon set on the thigh of the general, putting him in proximity of the large musky crotch. Urushihara soon grew a teasing smile as he grabbed the bottom of his shirt and pulled it off. A wave of B.O flowed out as the sweaty shirt peeled off his sticky skin.

The tiny human blushed as his master's slim build towered over, Urushihara smirked as he plucked up his human and layed back on the floor. Putting his arm behind his head, Urushihara let his wide and sweaty pit breath.

Urushihara's pit oozed out a think and sour stench, thoroughly ripe from his neglected showers. The purple hairs were greasy and matted down by the sheer amount of sweat shedding from the glands. Hiro paled as he could already smell the overwhelming odor flowing out, a mix of fear and excitement filled him.

"Alright little one, i think your mighty master needs his pits to be worshipped. Pamper them like my feet and they'll keep you warm hehe.", Urushihara chuckled as he set Hiro in front his wide pit.

Hiro coughed as the sour odor utterly consumed him in it's raunchy scent. Still he found the smell...sweet strangely, like an onion making him tear up. Walking into the aura of musky stench, Hiro reached out and pressed his hands to the greasy wall.

Beginning to rub in circles, Hiro also made sure to take deep whiffs of the powerful stench smiling as the odor made him feel...safe. It showed how mighty his master was, how strong Urushihara was to have power over him.

Urushihara licked his lips as he felt the tiny massages to his greasy pits, feeling even mighter that his sour odor could overpower a human. He also felt Hiro pressing his nose in to take sniffs, he grinned amused as his once fearful toy was know like a cute servant.

"Looks like your enjoying yourself, i know i am.", Urushihara smirked as he stretched his arm getting it to squelch out more sweat.

Hiro almost beamed as the sour stench increase drowning him in the foul odor more.

Soon....
1521212122211112231.title: A Fallen Angel's Pit

choices: Lucifer Keeps His Finger Pressing Hiro's Face Deep In There

15212121222111122311.content:
The purple haired demon general licked his lips, his ego was swelling sky high. Grinning wickedly, Urushihara addressed Hiro in his booming voice. "Yo squirt, get that tongue out! Lick my pit sweat already!"

Hiro paled and shivered at the giant NEETs booming command. He stared at the raunchy armpit that was in his face and giving off ripe onion-tinged steam.

The tiny slave almost wondered if it would scald his tongue. Urushihara felt a lack of tongue action and lowered his face to his opened armpit. Hiro looked up to see the cruel gaze of a gargantuan purple eye scrutinizing him. "What's the hold up?! Your master gave you an order!" Urushihara roared.

Urushihara grinned smugly above, letting out a slight moan at the pleasurable, cool feeling of Hiro's tongue.

What happens now..?

Hiro awkwardly chuckled before Urushihara took out his PASTA console. Seems he....
152121212221111223112.title: No Disobedience

1522.content:
Maou sat in his apartment, bored out of his mind as his roommate, Ashiya, did the dishes. Recently, Ashiya had been more concerned with Maou's income after MgRonald's had a fire that put the place out of business for a bit, and Maou was growing tired of hearing his constant bickering. Maou wore his white tank top and boxer shorts, lazing about and trying to find something to do before he had to go back to work.

"Sire, are you certain that MgRonald's is opening again this Friday?" Ashiya asked, causing Maou to let out a sigh.

"Yeah man, I told you about twenty times this week." Maou said as he stood up and brought a dish over to Ashiya.

Maou accidentally slipped on the way, his bare foot stepped in a small puddle from the sink, dropping the dish on the floor and breaking it.

"Sire! Dishes cost money! Please pay attention to your surroundings!" Ashiya scolded.

"Look, it's just a plate, I dunno what the big deal is." Maou said, putting his hands on his hips as a faint, magic glow surrounded him.

"I just wish he's get off my case." Maou closed his eyes before opening them again.

To his shock, Ashiya was nowhere to be seen, it's like he'd vanished into thin air.

"Uh, Ashiya?" Maou walked around for a bit before stepping on something... or someone.

Lifting his foot, Maou saw Ashiya's now tiny body stuck face first to his plump sole.

"Ashiya?! What the heck happened?!" Maou was shocked, he peeled Ashiya off of his foot and held him up to his huge face.

"This is unacceptable, my lord!" Ashiya shouted.

"It's not like I meant to shrink you, I don't even know how-"

"No, your hygiene is atrocious! Your feet smell, please shower more often." Ashiya plugged his nose as the stench lingered on him.

Maou furrowed his eyebrows, "Oh, I stink, do I?" He smirked evilly before stretching his bare arm up to reveal his smelly, sweaty armpit.

Ashiya gagged as the smell of Maou's un-deodorized pit seeped into the air and sweat dripped down the bare, hot skin.

"Maybe you can help me clean up then." Maou slapped Ashiya into his giant, wet armpit "How about I use you for deodorant, I think I ran outta mine." He asked cheekily.
1522.title: Tiny servant

153.content: Which person will the giant be?
153.title: Hunter x Hunter

choices: Killua finds a person tiny! (Someone in the show?)
1532.title: Killua

15321.content:
Gon was in a hotel room in YorkNew city, his best friend Killua had recently been injured badly in a fight between the two of them and the Phantom Troupe.

Kurapika recommended a nen user with an ability that could possibly heal him. Gon waited nervously, worrying about Killua, he was supposed to be coming back today. Gon stood up before a large “BOOM” shook the hotel and almost knocked the boy off of his feet.

“What the?!” Gon heard people screaming outside of the window as the booms got closer and closer. Peeking out of the window, Gon’s eyes widened as he saw Killua… but he was gigantic! He watched as his white haired friend walked down the street casually.

Killua turned to the hotel and smiled before waving “Hey Gon!” He shouted, his now booming voice echoed through the city. Gon was obviously confused, not knowing what to say.

Killua took a couple of more giant steps, narrowly avoiding crushing a building with one foot and crushing a dozen cars with the other.

Killua peeked an eye through the window “That doctor was really something! I’m completely healed now.” He said before reaching his hand into the window and plucking Gon up.

“That’s great!.... But what happened to you? How’d you get so big?!” Gon shouted.

“Oh, this? Well the guy that Kurapika recommended I see is a specialist, he can use his nen to boost aura. So when he filled me up with too much of it… it caused a side effect. Anyway, now I’m a giant… I dunno how to feel about it yet, it’s pretty cool I guess.” Killua explained calmly “I tried to watch where I was stepping but everything is so small now! It’s annoying.” He sighed.

“It’ll be easier to find Ging now! You can get to places way faster!” Gon cheered, seemingly already over the fact that his friend was turned into a giant.

“Yep, I think it’ll be fun to be this big, I’m definitely the most powerful member of my family now.” Killua chuckled and put Gon on his shoulder.

“What should we do now? We were gonna go to that auction for Greed Island… but now that you’re so big we’re sure to find Ging a lot easier.” Gon said.

Killua nodded “Maybe I could mess around with these little people, everyone’s just so… small now.” He looked down at the crowds of people scurrying about.

“That sounds fun! And I can tell you funny things to do with them too!” Gon said happily, bouncing up and down on Killua’s shoulder.

Killua grinned and his eyes fell to the screaming population of people running around in a panic. He grinned in a predatory way, “They’re like bugs….scurrying around.” Killua licked his lips and lifted one of his feet and stomped down on a car, relishing in how it crumpled like a soda can beneath his shoe.
15321.title: Killua the Giant!

choices: Killua decides to play stomp the bugs!
