The white haired boy suddenly got an idea and began to bend down while glancing at his friend. "Gon hold on tight for a sec."

Gon nodded and grasped the giant shirt to prevent himself from falling as Killua reached down and began to pull off his shoes. The assassin let out a sigh as his feet were dislodged from the footwear.

The socks Killua wore looked glued on and damp with sweat. Over the course of events up intill now, he didn't really have time to put on new socks. With a little difficulty the socks peeled off from Killua's foot, exposing the sweaty plump soles.

Spotting another perfect car, Killua placed his large foot on and began applying pressure. The boy smirked as he now felt all the metal crushing and being consumed by his foot flesh.

"Killua be careful! You might injure your foot!", Gon yelled out concerned.

Killua chuckled and grinned at his tiny friend. "Don't worry Gon. At this size I doubt it will hurt. Plus my feet are super tough!"

The giant began stomping down the street, casually throwing his arms behind his head. Numerous cars were reduced to rubble as the giant pale foot squash them. A few people actually got stomped, but miraculously the plump sole didn't completely crush them.

After a little.....
153212.title: Killua's Killer Feet

choices: Killua Teaches this Geezer a Lesson!
1532122.content:
Killua sighed and sat his rear down onto the street, making two ass-cheek shaped craters as he did so. The white haired boy reclined back against a building and caused it to groan as he leaned up against it. Taking note of Gon dangling from his shirt, he gently plucked the visibly excited youth into his hand and held him up to his face.

"You're so cool! You make a great giant, Killua!" Gon cheerfully exclaimed, causing Killua to blush and smirk.

"Yeah well..it's pretty awesome being this big and even stronger than usual."

"Yeah! You could assassinate people just by stomping on them!" Gon said with an innocent smile. "Heh, I guess I'm the strongest in my family now...feels pretty good." Killua sighed and put Gon on his shoulder.

Killua sighed and closed his eyes as he drank it all in...the cocky boy could get used to this.

They heard sirens and saw local law enforcement vehicles headed their way. "Pfft, what do these losers want?" Killua scoffed as the sirens stopped as the cars pulled up next to the boy's outstretched tree-trunk like legs.

"You have caused a lot of damage...s-sir..." The cop was a visibly shaking and fearful middle-aged guy.

Killua had never had someone call him 'sir' before..the authority he now wielded started to sink in. "Yeah? So what, shrimp?" Killua grinned wickedly down at the minuscule officer.

"W-well I'm afraid you can't j-just destroy property and cause havoc like this...s-so I'm going to have to-" The cop was interrupted by Gon: "You're going to arrest him? Good luck!"

"Hmph, yeah...little squirts like you should know better than to act tough in front of a GIANT." Killua grinned in a predatory way at the ever more frightened cop.
1532122.title: A Giant Assassin's Relaxation

choices: Killua has more fun with the squirt
15321221.content:
The police felt a chill run down thier spines at the young assassin's killer eyes baring into them with a cruel smile. The adult began backing away towards his car, only to stop as Killua raised his left foot and passed it over the policeman's head. Resting his heel on the ground so his sole towered over the car, the white haired boy chuckled.

"Hey what's the rush, didn't we have business little guyyy?", Killua smirked as he lowered his foot onto the vehicle and slowly crushed it. Killua hummed and cruelly grinned as he felt the car get crunched into scrap.

The policeman stared in fear as with so little effort the giant flattened his car. The other car that accompanied him quickly powered up and drove away, but he was in too much fear to curse them out. Killua laughed, one bug got away but he could still crush the hope of the one in front of him.

"Heh you've got some lame friends little guy. Don't worry I got some friends for you.", Killua chuckled cruelly.

The policeman stood frozen as the ground boomed around him. The smell of musk rose him out of his shook as he saw Killua rested both of his pale feet on both sides and stood taller and was as long as a house.

"Here let me give you a hug!", Killua gave a toothy smirk as he put his hands on his knees and slapped both his feet together with a audible SMOOSH.

The policeman yelled out muffled yells as he was smothered in the plump soles enclosing him in the stinky feet. He was thrashed as Killua rubbed his feet back and forth to squash him further.

"Wow Killua your feet are so cool!", Gon called out in awe.

Killua smirked as he looked at his friend while still squishing the policeman. "Gon do you have a crush on my feet or something?"

The spiky haired boy lightly blushed as he shook his head. "HUH...no I just like how....they can crush things!"

Killua chuckled as he slightly increased the pressure of his feet and got a pained yell in return. "Whatever you say."

What was next?
15321221.title: Killua's Mighty Feet

choices: Gon and the Cop Serve Killua!
The Cop Somehow Escapes and Starts Running!
153212212.content:
"He sure is small compared to your GIANT feet!" Gon cheered.

Killua smirked, "Yeah, he's practically a bug compared to 'em." The man had begun to pathetically blubber and cry as he was being tormented by this cruel youth. He thought this was the end for him...given the look in Killua's eyes it was apparent that killing him wouldn't be out of the question.

"Are you going to crush him?" Gon asked curiously.

Killua grinned diabolically, "Hmm...well...I'd hate to have to go find another toy. But this place has plenty of bugs to choose from. And I'd hate to ruin my feet you love so much by getting bug guts all over them." Killua teased Gon who in turn blushed.

"W-well..what are you going to do with him then?" Gon tilted his head.

"Well since you're such a big fan of these big feet of mine...I was thinking you could come up with something." Killua sure was teasing Gon a lot about his seeming attraction to his big feet.

Gon stammered and blushed, "W-well...you could always make him smell them!"

Killua smirked, "Could always get YOU to smell them too." He stuck his tongue out.

"Okay! You need two people anyway!" Gon obliviously declared, causing Killua to facepalm.

Typical Gon..clueless as always.
153212212.title: Killua's Fun

1532122121.content:
"Ok if you...", Killua was about to tell Gon he could serve him. Only to find the green haired boy hopping down and running towards his still clasped feet. "Want....too"

Gon was giddy as he stood before the plump closed soles. He watched in anticipation as the feet separated and the cop gasped, now free of the crushing walls. Gon immediately ran up to the right sole and grinned as he took in it's size towering over him by ten feet. The spiky haired boy's nose wiggled as he caught the musky stench of the pale foot. Gon laughed as he jumped into the sole and made a imprint as he rubbed his face into stinky sole and sniffed up the sweet stench.

Killua sighed as he saw his friend freaking out over his feet. He couldn't help but smile as he saw the joy Gon emitted joy and rubbed his cheek against the plump sole.

The young assassin looked over at cop who was watching Gon in shock. Killua smirked as he put his hands behind his head and wiggled his plump toes.

"Heh, look at how much he loves my sole! Squirt you should follow his example or my sole are gonna get dirty!"

Gon looked over at the man in shock. "You gotta smell his feet! If not then Killua's soles are gonna get messed up!"

The cop wasn't sure what to be more shocked at. That he was one step away from becoming paste or that the giant's friend wanted him to live just so that he didn't mess up the soles. He figured he didn't have a choice, so he followed Gon's actions and stuck his face in the sole.

The man gagged as he sniffed the chessy musk in the squishy sole. Gon on the other hand eagerly sniffed up the strong scent and cuddled up to the foot like a pillow. What wasn't there to love, Killua's musky feet was warm and smelt sweet and the soft soles were lulling him to sleep by how comfy they were.

Killua looked at the two differently. For Gon, he'd smile and laugh at his friends behavior. But for the cop, he wears a cruel smirk and constantly reminds him how he's in control

What's next?
1532122121.title: Double Service

choices: Crushes his head In his Toes!
Orders him to Lick the Toe Crevice!
15321221212.content:
Flexing his thick toes above the duo, Killua focused his attention on the cop. "Come on, you'd better start putting some effort in or I'm going to crush ya!"

"Yeah! Killua deserves your respect and stuff!" Gon cheerfully declared. Killua grinned in a predatory way down at the insignificant officer of the law. The man was tearing up and crying like a baby, he was panicking...good. Killua lowered his foot over the cop, who screamed and wailed "P-please! Don't crush meee!"

Killua chuckled darkly as the officer was submerged under his boyfoot as it was now flat on the ground. He hummed as he felt the hysterical squirming beneath the sole. "You're like a bug...you can't even get my foot off of you...some law enforcement this place has!" Killua boomed and licked his lips.

"I bet he's suffering a lot under there! Not everyone appreciates your foot smell like I do, Killua!" Gon excitedly said, Killua blushed and chuckled. "Yeah but that's a good thing! It means these insects are suffering more and you're having fun!"

Killua dragged his foot down until the officer's tear-stained face was aligned perfectly with his plump toes. He sneered down at him as the poor man whimpered and looked up into those merciless eyes.

Killua then...
15321221212.title: Killua's Cruelty

choices: The cop manages to finish the toes
153212212122.content:
"Alright listen up, my toe gaps are feeling kind of dry. So do me a favor and moisturize them.", Killua ordered to the tiny head peaking up from his plump toes.

The cop was both clueless at what to do and afraid as the heavy squishy weight pinned him to the ground, so he just looked with the pathetic fearful look at Killua. This was the wrong move as the foot increased it's pressure and knocked the wind out of the cop as he was smooshed more. Killua sneered as he was a second from just crushing the bug.

"Man your dumb! Use that tongue of your and lick up my toe gaps!"

The cop struggled to speak as his chest had trouble rising from the large pale sole compressing. "P-please....an..ythi..ng but that..."

Gon puffed his cheeks as he leaned against the soft sole. "Hey stop being ungrateful to Killua!"

Killua's eyes darkened as he smirked toothily. "He's right, I'm being generous giving you a second chance. Now start licking or your gonna be a splat on the road!"

With no choice, the cop tilted his head down to face the musky gaps giving off waves of heat and cheddar. He began gagging just by opening his mouth before swallowing it and sticking his tongue out.

As he ran it over the warm and tender flesh, the cop cringe as the salty sweat and cheese that was baked in the toes attacked his taste buds. The gunk gathered up and as he could only move his head, the cop was force to gulp the gunk down.

Killua closed his eyes and hummed as he felt the wet streaks between his toes, cooling down the warm raw skin. The big toe gap soon felt moist and somewhat clean. The cop stopped and panted as swallowed the last of the crevice's gunk. Killua smirked as he cracked open a eye.

"Hey I didn't say you could take a break! You still got the rest to go.", Killua said wiggling all his toes.

The cop paled as he had to lick three more toe gaps. Meanwhile, Gon was enjoying the warm and plump sole he leaned against and took up the endless musk.

What was next?
153212212122.title: The Toes Or Squish

1532122121221.content:
Eventually, after so much torture, the cop finally finished his task of licking away Killua's toe jam. The white haired boy sighed and relaxed back against the building, rattling the entire structure. "I guess you did well enough, and I'm a man of my word...so get outta here!" Killua released the cop, who quickly skedaddled off down the road in terror.

"That was so much fun, Killua!" Gon cheered, Killua grinning at his friend's enthusiasm.

"Hehe, we can agree on that!" The Zoldyck boy said as he gathered up his socks and purple shoes and slipped them back on his enormous cheesy feet. "Awww!" Gon made a pout.

Killua rolled his eyes as he stood up to his fifty foot height. "Relax, Gon...the foot cheese has to be kept fresh for more giant fun!" Gon and Killua shared a laugh at the white haired giant's joke.

It was then that a tingling was felt throughout Killua's body. "K-Killua? Are you okay? You look freaked out!"

"I...I dunno! My body feels...weird-WHOA!" Killua yelped as suddenly his body began to expand. "Killua! You're getting BIGGER!" Gon shouted excitedly, eyes wide in awe.

Killua's eyes were wide as well, the building behind him was pressed on by his expanding rump.

Soon, Killua towered over everything but the tallest buildings at a whopping 100ft tall! "Whoa-ho...I am HUGE!" Killua's voice rumbled over the city, it now had a deeper quality to it that surprised the Zoldyck.
1532122121221.title: The cop manages to finish the toes

15321221212211.content:
Gon looked up in awe, his friend was big before but now the spiky haired boy could hardly see Killua's face as the Zoldyck rose into the sky. The ground tremored simply from Killua shifting his sneakered feet, luckily Killua remembered where his friend was as he saw the green speck in front of his foot.

Killua grinned as he put his hands on his hips. "Hey Gon bet i look different now!", the booming voice rattled and even shattered windows from the amplified voice.

"Yeah your like a titan now!", Gon yelled still in awe.

Killua playfully pulled on his ear. "Huh what's that can't hear you down there little guy!"

Gon pumped his fists as his eyes seem to sparkle. "Yeah your so big i bet everything is just a squeak to you!"

The Zoldyck soon crouched down, making the ground crumble more beneath his feet. Killua placed his large palm on the ground beside Gon, the spiky haired boy of which who quickly hopped on. Unlike before where he fit right in the center of the palm, Gon now sat on two fingers like a pea on a palm.

Killua gave an amused grin once he brought Gon to his face. "I think I'm gonna mark some territory as my stomping ground. Wanna front row seat?"

Gon grinned furiously nodded soon being moved and placed on top of Killua's head. The greenette used the white hair to pull himself up and gaze down to the city before Killua.

The giant smirked as without warning he took a long step forward and completely crushed a building under his foot. Killua sneered as he swiveled his foot over the wreckage. "Hehe barely took any pressure!"

Killua began to take his giant stroll, hardly looking down as things ended up in the way of his giant stompers. At this side anyone in his shoes shadow were squished into a red splat. Audiable crunches rang out as Killua had his cruel fun crushing the city beneath him.

Soon....
15321221212211.title: Killua's Rampage

choices: Killua Is Suspicious...He thinks You're a Tiny Spy or Assassin!
Killua Thinks You're Some kind of Bug For Now!
15322.content:
https://images.8tracks.com/cover/i/009/2...

You weren't sure what happened, one minute you were watching your new bluray of Hunter x Hunter and there was a blinding light!

As you opened your eyes and unshielded them with your hands, you saw you weren't in your home anymore...you were outside on a sidewalk! But that wasn't the most shocking thing....EVERYTHING WAS HUGE!

"What's going on!?!" You yelled at the top of your lungs in horror. Just then, you saw quite a horrifying...yet at the same time exciting sight. An absolutely ENORMOUS white haired boy on a skateboard...headed right towards you!

It was Killua! And he was about to run you over if you didn't move or do something! Sweat was visibly coating the boy's body, he was wearing a black sleeveless shirt as opposed to his usual attire.

So, just as the oblivious Zoldyck was about to turn you into a smear under his purple shoe...you jumped as high as you could!

You somehow managed to cling to his noticeably sticky ankle, you could detect a strong odor coming from below you...his sock was dingy and it was obvious the youngster hadn't changed them in awhile given to how his feet could be smelled from even outside of his shoes.

You cringed as you could detect the unmistakable stench of foot cheese...that was when Killua skidded his skateboard to a stop and locked his eyes on the puny thing that clung to his ankle.

It was weird...it was a tiny bug for all intents and purposes..but he could sense it like it was a human. Narrowing his eyes, he reached down and plucked you up by the back of your shirt.
15322.title: Killua Finds a Tiny YOU!

153221.content:
Killua smirked as he brought you to his eyes. "Heh, what kind of tactic is this? Planning on sneaking up on me to get a shot at me?"

You paled as the Zoldyck boy looked at you with cruel eyes and his teeth bared in a michivious way.

"W-wait I'm not trying to do anything-!"

Killua didn't seem to listen as he suddenly threw you into the air and snatching you in a fist. The white haired boy kicked up his board and chuckled as you grunted from the soft flesh imprisoning you.

"Squeak what ever you want, but you'll spill in a bit.", Killua brought you to his toothy smirk. "It be best if you do, otherwise someone's gonna get squished!"

You grunted as the fist tightened around you. "ACK, I-I'm not a assassin or anything!"

Killua's smirk widen, looking to the side he lifted his arm to expose his hot pit. He'd wore a tank top since the weather is on the hot side. The sweat forming was notable and it was about to be put to use.

"I've got a place for you intill you decide to finally break. Of course it'll take some breaking to do so!"

You stared in shock as Killua brought you to his wide and wet looking pit. The steamy sweat and hit your nose and was shoved in as you were slapped against the greasy skin. The hot skin consumed you as Killua hummed and pressed you deeply into the smelly pit.
153221.title: Killer Suspicion

choices: Killua went to the gym to start his workout.
Killua ran into Gon on the way.
1532211.content:
"Please let me out-" Killua pressed you into his soft armpit and chuckled.

You got a mouthful of salty sweat as Killua tormented you.

"Honestly, I don't really care who you are, I might just keep you as a little pet until I get bored and squash you." Killua mused.

You couldn't speak as Killua's body odor infested your nostrils, it was overwhelming and you felt as if you were about to faint.

Suddenly, Killua took his hand away and left you stuck to the wet pit.

"But now it's time for my workout, have fun in there, pit bug." Killua grinned and slammed his arm down, squeezing you in his nasty pit.
1532211.title: Killer pits

15322111.content:
Killua made his way to the gym, occasionally squeezing his arms to his sides to squash you in his smelly pit. You were compressed by the soft walls of flesh and stink.

"Alright bug, we're here." Killua lifted his arm and peeled your body off of his pit "Nobody's here, lucky!"

"Let go!" You demanded.

Killua simply squeezed his fingers together, causing you to yelp in pain.

"Don't tell me what to do, I still don't know what your hatsu is but obviously you can't change back, you're mine now." Killua smirked before raising his arm again and slapping you into his pit.

Killua whistled as he walked over to the weights and grabbed the biggest one he could find.

"Get ready runt, you might end up as a little red splotch under there by the end." Killua lifted the weight up and peeked underneath his arm, smirking devilishly as he lowered the weight and squished you under his arm.

Killua continued to lift the weights, squeezing you each time as his pit became smellier and smellier.

"You better start licking in there if you don't wanna drown in sweat!" Killua laughed.
15322111.title: Killua went to the gym to start his workout.

153221111.content:
You groaned as the mushy flesh of the pit squash your body up. The two walls momentarily lifted their pressure when Killua lifted his weight and then lowered it to smush you once again in the musky prison. The Zoldyck's cruel taunts made it no better.

As Killua flexed his bicep, he suddenly gained a more toothy smirk as he lowered his arm and squeezed extra hard getting a muffled yelp of pain.

"You know squirt, I wasn't joking about you licking. I better feel your tongue cause I'm sweating buckets!"

You paled as the flesh consumed you and Killua made his demands. The oniony skin wasn't bound to taste good.

"Hey I'm waiting! You better start licking or I'm gonna crush you like bubble gum under my shoe!"

The threat in addition to the pit smothering let you know Killua meant buisness. Choosing your life over being stubborn, you stuck your tongue out and took a big pick cringing. The musky sweat made you gag and feel bile rise as you licked the musky skin and even swallowed the clouded sweat.

Killua chuckled at the tiny licking he felt. "Good nice to know my bug obeys his owner. Let's just hope your not mush by the end.

Soon...
153221111.title: A Zoldyck's Pit

choices: Killua Taunts His Prey Inside his Armpit
Killua Peels you Out...More Torture Ahead!
1532211111.content:
Killua grunted noisily, imagining his voice was a booming roar for the runt, he wanted to make this bug suffer under his power. His pits made squelching sounds as they opened and closed with each lift.

Licking his lips seductively, Killua once more addressed his hostage. "You sure are puny compared to me...my pit must be like a giant cave to your pathetic ass!"

Indeed, Killua's voice was a booming thunderous sound to the insignificant bug that was you. You whimpered as you kept licking whenever you weren't being smashed into the reeking, sweat lake-filled hollow. You were starting to feel as pathetic as you looked, you knew the giant Zoldyck was a cold blooded killer and had a serious sadistic streak.

You began to wonder if he'd ever let you go...much less live.

After what seemed like hours, Killua placed the bar back on the rack and sat up with a sigh. "Mmmh...I love working up a good sweat!" Killua sighed as he toweled off his forehead..intentionally leaving his underarms out.

Standing up and stretching his supple arms over his head, his nose twitched as he was hit by the sour b.o he'd built up.

"Whew...I don't envy you little maggot!" Killua snickered.
1532211111.title: Killua's Well Earned Sweat

choices: Killua keeps you in his pit
Killua takes you out for more torment
15322111111.content:
Doing some sit ups was not only a way to taunt the little runt but also work out some more. Killua smirked as layed down and started to lift his torso up and down.

The Zoldyck's cruel eyes would follow the sour stench to its source and chuckle as he found you smooshed into his armpit. Your body was pressed deep into the squishy skin and was drenched in sweat.

"You nice and warm bug? I wouldn't want something sick getting squashed on me!", Killua cruelly taunted as he felt more sweat beginning to shed.

"Hope your getting used to my pits, you feel pretty good there so expect more of that stink. Don't worry I'll take you out eventually....that is unless I crush you during this exercise.", Killua said in a nonchalant tone.

Fear was hitting you as you breathed in the musky b.o of the pit. The sweaty grease was gluing you to the warm and odorous pit and the arm had squashed you a good inch into the musky pit.

"Maybe I'll throw you in my shoes next, or maybe I'll just crush you under my shoes then!", Killua smirked as he was thinking of all the ways he could torment you next.

Soon....

155211.title: Izuku Midoriya

choices: He gets stuck in the doorway to 1-A's homeroom!
He hits his head on the ceiling!
1552111.content:
It was an early morning in the halls of U.A. High, about an hour before the first bell would ring. Izuku Midoriya was wandering through the halls on his way to the Development Studio, he wanted to see if there was anything he could utilize there to harness more of his inherited quirk: One for All.

"I hope there's something Hatsume can offer...that isn't TOO out there." Midoriya murmured to himself, remembering the time he almost got turned into a pretzel by one of Hatsume's inventions. As he approached the door to the studio, Hatsume burst out and greeted him enthusiastically...startling him of course.

"HELLO! FINALLY YOU'VE COME TO TEST OUT MY NEW BABY!" Hatsume yelled. "Gaaagh!" Midoriya yelled and staggered back.

"W-what? Test?" Midoriya had arranged this meeting with Hatsume...but she'd not mentioned any sort of test!

"Of course! It's to power up your quirk! Come here!" The pink haired female dragged him inside quickly. Before Midoriya was a large device that resembled some kind of microscope in structure. On its side was a keypad and monitor, it had a glowing rounded end that was aimed directly at Midoriya as he was placed on a platform that was marked with a bullseye.

"U-Uh...w-what's going on?" Midoriya stammered.

"This baby right here..." Hatsume patted the side panel of the large device, "Has been crafted in secret from Mr. Powerloader! It's meant to combine essences of various known quirks...into another person! All I have to do is select a random quirk to zap you with...and then do the zapping...and you'll get the benefits of having TWO unique quirks! It's GENIUS I tell you! This could change everything!" Hatsume rambled and laughed maniacally.

Midoriya sweatdropped, not liking the look of this ray..or the thought of being electrocuted.

"B-but I just need something to boost the quirk I already-" Midoriya began to protest gently, only for Hatsume to shriek: "STAND STILL! HERE WE GO!" And pull a lever.

Instantly a green beam of energy came out of the ray and zapped Midoriya, making him flail comically and yell as he was electrified.

The machine sparked and began to smoke, "M-my baby! No no no no!" Hatsume hit the emergency shut off as the ray's loud rumbling died down.

"What the heck is all that racket!?" Power Loader demanded as he entered the room. "Hatsume! What did I tell you about testing your experiments on other students?! And what is THAT thing?!" Power Loader demanded of Hatsume.

"Ohh...my head..." Midoriya got up off the ground, dazed.

"You should've come to ME first, Midoriya! Or at least informed me you had a death wish!" Power Loader snapped at the green haired boy.

"S-sorry...I'll be going now..." Midoriya said, feeling a tad funny. "You need the nurse? Nah...you're fine." Power Loader shrugged off the feeling...it was the boy's own fault for letting this happen.

Soon after, Midoriya was walking to class...it was still early so most of his fellow students hadn't arrived yet. He stood outside the doorway to class 1-A and as usual was daydreaming and muttering to himself....however this was interrupted when...
1552111.title: Midoriya's Mishap!

15521111.content:
Izuku was about to enter the classroom when he felt his shoulders being held back. Coming to his senses, the freckled boy looked at what was holding him and let out a yelp of surprise.

"Ah, Midoriya good morni...", the class rep Iida Tenya had come over at the sound of Izuku's voice and promptly stopped at the sight before him.

Izuku's frame was much larger then the last time he saw him. The greenette's head almost touched the top of the door and his shoulders were hitting the sides. It looked like Izuku was standing taller then All Might!

"I-ida-kun! I..i don't know what happened!", the giant teen was starting to panic. However, he quickly stood back as the edges of the door seem to crack with his movement.

Iida was at a loss for words. He blinked suddenly when....
15521111.title: He gets stuck in the doorway to 1-A's homer...

choices: Midoriya and Iida try to figure this out
155211112.content:
A short time later...

Ochaco Uraraka was deep in thought, mulling over a dream she'd had last night about her classmate Izuku Midoriya. Her dream involved some sort of King-Kong type scenario, only instead of Kong...it was the gigantic Midoriya!

She blushed red as a tomato as she remembered how big the boy had been, and how they'd 'eloped' as it were...going on a honeymoon involving lots of cuddling and him holding her literally in the palm of his hand.

She felt her cheeks burning as she continued down the hallway.

"How did this happen?!" She heard Iida's voice exclaiming from the doorway of class 1-A's homeroom. This was followed up by Midoriya's voice, she smacked the sides of her face a bit and shook off the blush. "Come on girl, get it together..." She whispered to herself before she sild open the 'A' shaped door.

"Good morni-" What met Ochaco's eyes was quite the bizarre sight.

A seemingly 8 ft tall Midoriya, sitting hunched over on the floor in front of a regular sized Iida. Both boys looked up and Midoriya sheepishly said: "H-Hi Uraraka..."

Ochaco's face went deadpan and she seemingly started shaking. "Uraraka! Are you alright?!" Iida asked worriedly.

She flopped inside the room in a dead faint up against Iida.

"I must've scared her..." Midoriya said guiltily.
155211112.title: Uraraka's Encounter with a plus-sized Midoriya!

choices: He gets visited by a classmate
1552111121.content:
Izuku was brought out of his brooding when he felt his body tingle. Standing up he gasped as his body began to grow even taller!

The greenette quickly bolted out the door, not taking notice of the ground now shaking with each of his steps. Tenya gently laid Uraraka on the floor before looking out of the door to see his friend running.

“Midoriya! Please wait!”

Izuku continued his sprint, giving panicked glances up at the ceiling and watching it inch closer. He also felt his uniform begin to tighten and heard some rips.

Izuku widened his eyes at the familiar figure up ahead. “Aizawa-Sensei watch out!”

The tired hero looked up hearing his student, only to feel the ground shake and a large wind blast him. Looking over his shoulder at the large fleeing figure, he sighed before fishing out his phone.

Izuku ran into the back of the school, having to bend over to get outside. Stopping for a breather, Izuku took in his current state. His uniform was torn with the jacket unbuttoned and the shirt looking ready to burst. His pants cut off at the knee and squeezed his thighs.

Strangely Izuku didn’t just get big in height. His muscles seem to be more bulky then what they used to be, with his biceps, pecs, and thighs looking bigger. Patting his stomach, he felt what appeared to be a eight pack. The tingling sensation return and Izuku rushed over to a groove of trees in the distance. As he got closer, there were more rips and by the time he got to the groove, his chin was above the trees and getting taller.

The clothes felt tight and made Izuku cringe as the tight fabric squeezed. The pain stopped and the giant sighed. But wait, if the pain was caused by the clothes. Izuku looked down with a burning face.

Within miles everyone heard a loud embarrassed echo.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
“I must say Midoriya-kun, this is quite the predicament.”, said principal Nezu.

Gathered outside were the principal, a few teachers, and all of 1-A. All of them were looking shocked at the same sight, The top of Izuku’s head sheepishly peeking out from behind the vegetation. In front of the spectators laid the remains of Izuku’s uniform.

“Is there anything that can be used to.....cover young Midoriya.”, said All Might with a hindered smile.

While it had been a challenge, something was given to Midoriya. A few white covers were secured as much as possible by Sero’s tape before Izuku slowly picked the makeshift garment up.
