The floor looked a bit...further away than usual. "Wait...Midoriya seemed a bit taller too...and I heard a rumor that he was involved in something with Hatsume's lab." Denki thought.

"Wait...did she do something to him and it's effecting me?" Denki may be a bit of a goof at times but he wasn't dumb...at least unless he overused his quirk.

He drooled as visions of him towering over everything like a king entered his mind. "All the chicks would dig me and all the guys would be sooo jealous! I'd be a giant hunk!" He was surrounded by sparkles as he swooned.

"Are you okay in there?" Mineta's voice asked as a knock on the door was heard by the sparkyboy.
15521113111113.title: Meanwhile, with Denki...

choices: He decided to go visit the other guys and show his size
155211131111132.content:
As the door opened, Mineta gasped as he looked up and saw himself not at Denki's waist like usual. Rather he was looking at the knees of him. On top of that Denki's clothes were looking more clung onto his body as if he suddenly increased in height and mass.

"D-dude what the heck happened to you!", The grape boy yelled in surprise as he saw Denki looking down from higher.

Denki grinned. "Check it out, I was checking on Midoriya and the same thing happened to him. Rumor has it that he was involved in a accident with Hatsume, suddenly the dude's taller and now you've got me!"

"So you and Midoriya suddenly got some sort of growing sickness?", Mineta asked thinking of the situation.

Denki grinned as he lowered his body and sat on the ground, lightly shaking it that made Mineta grab onto the door to steady himself.

"Yeah dude think about it, who knows how big I'll get. For all we know, tomarrow I could be standing over the school, all the chicks are gawking up at me and wanting a ride on the electric titan!"

Mineta clenched a fist as he thought of the scenario. His friend looming in the sky, all the hot girls admiring him as he felt them in a palm.

"Ah man your so lucky!", Mineta felt both jealousy and joy for Denki as he could pick up the bigger size and scent of his friend.

Denki grinned before.....
155211131111132.title: A Envious Secret

1552112.content:
Now here's a quick choice before you continue. You could proceed with a scenario where Izuku finds someone tiny.

Or, you could go with another choice where Izuku actually has a quirk from the beginning of the series that let's him shrink others. An alternate universe of sorts. He may still be his gentle self or he can develop a taste for being a mean giant

Which will you choose?
1552112.title: A Quick Choice

15521121.content: Which tiny ends up encountered by Izuku?
15521121.title: Let Izuku find someone small

155211212.content:
Your name was Izumi Midoriya, the younger twin brother of Izuku. You had your differences from your brother, such as despite being younger you often had an unfiltered mouth. Speaking your mind and not being afraid to curse someone out as well as give compliments when their needed is your motto.

While size was a difference between you and Izuku, it went beyond a few inches. Although manifesting a quirk upon birth is rare, you never really bragged about it. After all having a quirk of being a inch tall wasn't note worthy.

You luckily had a very wonderful family with both your mom and brother taking good care of you and raising a tiny son the best they could. Izuku while a protective brother did have his moments of obliviousness, not seeing you on the ground or bed. Getting squished was a common action but Izuku was always quick to apologize profusely, not to mention the boy's often smelly stompers grew on you.

Now then where does this tale of a tiny brother begin?
155211212.title: Izumi Midoriya, Tiny Brother

choices: Izuku Obliviously Makes it to U.A.! You're in for a cheesy day!
1552112122.content:
Despite being so small, there were several things about you that most people wouldn't expect. First of all, your voice was perfectly audible and not squeaky like a mouse. Which was lucky because that way your insults and swears could be heard by the people they were directed towards!

Then there was the most important part; you were incredibly durable and even strong for your diminutive size. You were able to take an oblivious Izuku stomping on you, even with his big red shoes on!
As far as strength, you were able to hold your own and clobber even the meanest of bullies. You were agile enough thanks to your size and once you launched yourself at some jerk like Bakugo's stomach...the wind was knocked clean out of him!

So when it came time for your beloved big brother to set out to U.A. You were eager to see him off alongside your mom.
But your curiosity about what U.A. was like was too great to resist. So without hesitation, you clambered into his fresh sock for the day.

You had basically camped out in the cotton confines of your big bro's uniform. You made sure you woke up earlier than him, filling your pockets full of some snacks for the road.

It's also worth mentioning you had a big appetite that was larger than your inch-high body. You lay perfectly still, vertically beneath the already perspiring arch of Izuku's foot.

You admired how thick and meaty your big brother's feet were. They were very, very plump and soft. You admired them for their shape and after so many times of accidentally being stepped on...you treated it as a sort of game or in-joke between you two.

"You didn't just pack action figures, right?" You heard your mother questioning your big bro at the front door.

"No, now I gotta go..." Izuku huffed at his mother's pestering.

"Izuku." Inko stopped him right as he was heading out, he was putting pressure on the foot that you were under!

"It's lucky his soles are so thick...he probably doesn't even feel me." You thought to yourself.

Your mother tells Izuku she's very proud of him, you smile...your big bro certainly needed the confidence boost.

Izuku smiled and bid farewell, going out onto the hot sidewalk to walk to the campus. Instantly the soles began to leak more and more sweat onto you, and your prison began to smell like funky cheese.
1552112122.title: Sneaking to School

choices: The quirk assessment!....with a tiny listener
Izuku soon feels something under his foot
15521121222.content:
Izuku smiled as he jogged towards the school he's been aiming for and the place he'd finally get his chance to become a hero. His steps were audible as his clunky red shoes stepped down onto the ground.

As he approached the train, the freckled boy suddenly frowned as he remembered not seeing his brother when he woke up. He wasn't sleeping on his pillow like always and Izuku made to check the ground as he stepped. Izumi was nowhere at home, Inko said he may have gone exploring outside as he usually enjoyed doing.

You hummed as you felt weightless for a moment before the large plump sole squished you back down to the firm insole. The air in the space began to become clouted more and more with a cheddary odor, sweat started to squelch around you each time you were smooshed beneath Izuku's sweaty feet.

The pressure began to lower and cone crushing down at a fast rate as Izuku bounced on his feet. The plump soles began to envelop you each time Izuku leaned his weight onto your tiny form. You smiled as you breathed in the warm cheese, the familiar bittersweet stench made your nostrils tingle as the warm putrid odor squeezed out with the sweat.

As Izuku absentmindedly bounced on his feet his mind wandered to his brother. Growing up, despite your size difference you always stood up for him yo matter the odds. Even if Kacchan stepped on you, it was nothing as you lifted of the fit with incredible strength. Izuku felt somewhat guilty about it, he was the big brother yet his younger and tinier sibling protected him whenever he was in trouble. And in return he squished you like a bug, though you still gave him kindness and was never angry.

Izuku smiled as he clenched a fist. "I promise Izumi...I'll become a hero and be the big brother you deserve!", among his nervousness a flow of resolve filled Izuku as his train arrived at his stop.

More steps of heavy chessy sweet followed, each one quicker as you were repeatedly squished unknowingly by Izuku. You nuzzled you face into the smooth and sweaty sole, enjoy its warm and plump skin creating an enclave of your body as the pressure smooshed you in more.

You could hear muffled voices through the plump sole, you beamed as Izuku seem to be friendly with these new classmates. Class seem to be beginning, though through the squelches you could hear presumably the teacher already setting up an exercise despite being the third day

The cheesy funk began to get thicker and you coughed as the potent stench fumigated around the plump soles and gunky toes. Your brother did always garner smell easily, to his distraught and your enjoyment.
15521121222.title: First Day...With A Stowaway

choices: Izuku Feels You as you Squirm!
155211212221.content:
Mr. Shota Aizawa was a stern man it seemed, he escorted the class out to the grounds. Uraraka expressed worry that they'd miss 'orientation'. Aizawa however, didn't feel the same way. He explained that they would be partaking in some sort of physical activity to gauge the students capabilities.

"That's what I'm talking about! Using our quirks as much as we want!" Sero gushed.

"This looks fun, huh? You've got 3 years to learn how to be a hero, it's not going to be all fun and games." Aizawa warned. "Today you'll participate in eight physical tests to gauge your potential. Whoever comes in last has none..and will be expelled immediately."

The outcry from the students of 1-A was quite loud, and you felt your giant brother tense up.

"Aw shit. His quirk is so wonky that he can't just use it right off the bat. This is so unfair!" You swore, being careful not to squirm or let Izuku feel your mouth moving. You didn't want him to find out you were in here...and possibly throw him off his game!

I'll just have to cheer him on! You can do it, big bro! You mentally cheered for him.

The first test was a 50 meter dash. You had to control yourself from squirming in excitement as your older brother waited his turn. You could tell he was nervous but the thought of his big powerful, increasingly cheesy feet stomping on you repeatedly was at the forefront of your mind.

It eventually came Izuku's turn, his feet were leaking copious amounts of sweat. Though whether it was from his nerves or the heat of the day you didn't know. Izuku crouched down on the starting line, putting his weight onto his plump toes and ball.

"Ready? GO!" The automated starter called out. Izuku took off, his soles pounding you deeper and deeper into his thick flesh.

You grunted as the weight he was stomping on you was quite immense...but you couldn't deny this was fun. At least it didn't hurt thanks to your toughness!

"7.02 seconds!" The machine called out as Izuku passed the finish. Your giant bro leaned over, huffing and puffing. His feet were sweating bucketloads, and his shoes were so squishy on the insides! You were literally in an ocean of cheddary foot sweat and it was soo cool!

=Test 3: Standing Long Jump=

You braced yourself, feeling weightless for a second as your enormous brother took the leap. He came down with his full weight on both feet for a second. You felt it like a gut punch, but the softness of Izuku's soles and the fact you were practically one with them softened the blow.

Izuku fell on his rear and grunted. You now felt weightless again before he got up. "Damn, bro...you're really getting a workout!" You mumbled, of course it was muffled and you were basically mouthing into his foot flesh.

=Test 5: Ball Throw=

Izuku stood in the circle, looking at the ball nervously. You knew this was essentially his last chance to get a good score on ANYTHING. Izuku reared back and prepared to use One for All in his entire arm, only for nothing to happen as the ball uselessly flopped to the ground. "Uh..what happened?" Izuku gasped as his quirk seemingly didn't activate.

"I erased your quirk." Aizawa growled. "The judges for this exam were not rational enough! Someone like you should never be allowed to enroll here!" Aizawa scolded.

"Wait..you did what to my-...Wait I know you! You're the hero who can cancel out other people's powers! The Erasure Hero: Eraserhead!" Izuku gasped, slightly fanboying despite his intimidation.

"Did you intend to break your bones again? Count on someone else to save your useless body?" Aizawa glared.

"N-no!" Izuku was suddenly gripped by Aizawa's scarves and pulled close. "No matter what your intentions, you would be nothing but a liability in battle! You're worthless if you can only throw a single punch before breaking down!" Eraserhead yelled.

By this time you were furious, how dare this grumpy jerk talk to Izuku like that! You couldn't help yourself, squirming in your anger.

"Sorry, Midoriya..but someone like you can NEVER become a hero!"
155211212221.title: The Quirk Assessment...With a Special Guest

choices: Izuku can't wait to take you out
The end of the first day comes
1552112122211.content:
It seems your angry squirms were far larger then normal, Izuku while intimated by his new teacher felt a faint tingle against his sweaty sole. Mindlessly he leaned and grinded on the foot thinking a piece of debris had fallen in. Your ranting grew muffled as the plump sole squished down harder, knocking the breath out as the cheddary fumes were shoved in.

"I restored your quirk, you have two more tries, hurry up.", Aizawa stated firmly as he deactivated his quirk and released your nervously sweating brother. You grumbled as your brother swiveled his foot to immobilize you under his sweaty fumes.

Izuku looked at the ball in his hand, he thought over what Aizawa said. The drawback of the quirk was a lot and using his full arm was bound to show the same damage as the exam. As he contemplated the throw that would show his quirk the tingling against his foot returned.

"Why is there a bug in my shoe now of all times?", Izuku internally vented as he leaned onto the squirming, desperate to squash the bug distracting him from the test.

You felt the pressure increase as Izuku put his weight onto you, the sole squelched as it pressed you between itself and the insole. While you'd be overjoyed to be swimming in the stinky sweat of your big brother's chesse, you understand why the pressure suddenly increased. "Huh, ah man looks like i been found ou-t ACK- GEEZ big bro you're really good at stomping when you put your mind to it!"

Izuku blinked as the squirming against his big foot felt different, like something was...talking against..it. The greenette's eyes dramatically widened as he reconized that feeling.

"I-Izumi!", Izuku yelled in his thoughts as he realized the squirming he'd been squashing was his brother!

"Midoriya what's the hold up?", The erasure hero asked both irritated and confused at the shocked expression of the greenete.

Izuku blinked as his teacher brought him out of his thoughts, additionally his classmates where looking curiously as he had a peculiar expression all while mumbling.

"S-sorry I'll go now!", Izuku flushed as he bowed his head. Aizawa sighed before telling him to hurry.

As he drew his hand back, Izuku felt you against his sole again. You smiled as you rubbed the plump sole pinning you down with the sweaty weight. "You can do it big bro, go on be the best hero!" You cheered against the soft and cheesy sole squashing you.

Izuku smiled. "Izumi your encouraging me aren't you, like always...I won't give up i promise!", feeling the rush of his gifted quirk Izuku began to focus that into his fingers as he propelled his hand forward. With a yell he launched the ball, sending it flying with a burst of wind.

You cheered on your brother. "WHOA GO Br-Mmpf!", well you were silenced again as Izuku was pushed onto his foot had you not been durable you'd be flatter then a penny. The meaty sole squashed down as Izuku stood on the foot above you, sweat covered you as the weight splashed it against the insole.

It was a success, albeit the greenette's finger was throbbing and red as the drawback was forced through it. While you were initially scared upon hearing your brother got last place, relief hit you as it all turned out to be a logical ruse by Aizawa.

While Izuku was eager to take out his brother, he needed to take a trip to Recovery Girl before returning to class. You smiled as you slipped out one of your snacks, though slightly downtrodden due to your chips being crumbs now.
1552112122211.title: Tiny Encouragement

15521121222112.content:
"Uuugh, I'm so tired..." Midoriya groaned as he trudged down the entrance path of U.A. You of course were still present when your older brother went to Recovery Girl.

Sheesh, his first kiss is from some old lady? You thought with a shudder. So now your poor big bro's finger was healed, but he was exhausted due to the side affects of the nurse's quirk.

"How's the finger doing?" You heard a voice ask Izuku as your brother suddenly stopped walking. "It's fine...thanks!" Izuku said nervously. He was always so awkward, you smiled into his sole.

"Heeey wait uuup!" A cheerful female voice boomed above. You felt Izuku tense up when the girl spoke and thought his name was 'Deku Midoriya'. You sniggered a bit, causing Izuku to press down on you. He obviously felt you laughing.

"D-Deku?! N-No y'see...that's just what Kacchan calls me to make fun of me.." Izuku sweated nervously all over you down there.

"Oh I didn't know I'm sorry! Ya know Deku would make a great hero name! Plus, I think it sounds kinda cute!" Uraraka proclaimed.

You felt Izuku's foot heat up hotter than it already was, you could just picture your older bro's scarlet face as he yelped: "Deku it is!"

"Paradigm shift! My whole world is upside down heheeheheh!" Izuku covered his face and giggled like some sort of schoolgirl.

You couldn't help but think of how much you were gonna tease him about his new 'girlfriend' later.

******

Izuku made it home, parting ways with Uraraka and Iida half the way. Now he opened the door and immediately saw their mother wailing amidst several tissues.

"Mom, what's going on?" Izuku gasped as he shut the door and popped his shoes off with a waft of steam coming out of the red footwear.

His socks were hugging his feet so tightly with their sopping wet cotton, you could both swear you hear 'squish' sounds with each step he took towards your mother.

"Oh Izukuuu! Thank goodness you're hoome! Izumi is missing!!" She sobbed.

Aw shit...how could I be so careless... You thought guiltily. "M-mom! It's alright, he sorta...went to school with me." Izuku explained.

"WHAAAAT?!" Inko shrieked. "H-He's in my sock, he's probably regretting his decision now." Izuku tried to soften the possible punishment your mother might dish out.

"Ugh! You boys and your gross game. I was worried sick!" Inko shouted right at Izuku's big socked feet. It was a rather funny sight, Izuku chuckled slightly.

"Well, I'm sure you're tired from your hard day. I'll get dinner ready since I was too upset to start on it!" Inko huffed at Izuku's foot.

"S-sorry ma!" You yelled up at her, somehow getting your face dug out from Izuku's meaty sole.

"Ehehehe, I'm gonna go to my room and rest." Your big bro went to his room and began to peel the socks off.
15521121222112.title: End of a Rough First Day

choices: You decided to help your brother's feet unwind
155211212221121.content:
Izuku sighed as he sat on his bed, reaching down he began to peel away the now soaked fabric. As his plump sole was revealed the greenette flushed at the strong cheesy stench he began to smell coming from his foot. For whatever reason, Izumi was never bothered when he ended up beneath his large feet, almost like he enjoyed his odorous soles.

Finally peeling off the sock showed the large plump sole, smeared sweat covering the flesh slightly pink from the smothering heat. Sure enough in the ball of Izuku's sole was his brother firmly squashed into the flesh.

"Hey big bro.", Izumi nonchalantly greeted eating a protein bar both flattened and covered in grimy sweat.

Izuku quickly reached down using his thumb and finger, pulled his brother out with a POP and onto his palm. Cupping his palms around his brother Izuku brought him to his face looking worried.

"Izumi are you ok! I didn't step on you too hard right?", you brother fretted over your state, covered in his sweat from hours of constant stomping.

You smiled finishing your protein bar with a nice cheddary musk topping. "Calm down big bro! You know me I'm tough your stompers haven't hurt me before, plus your last person I'd get pissed at for stepping on me."

Walking up to your freckled brother's face you reached out and rubbed his nose. You rubbed the back of your head as you sheepishly looked off. "Plus I'm the one who crawled into you socks..."

Izuku smiled as he set you on the pillow before laying on his stomach. "Thank you, for encouraging me back there even if i kept squishing you...", Izuku flushed he then hummed as he rubbed his chin, a curious expression on his face.

"But why would you climb in my socks of all places, you could've climbed in one of my pockets and not have to get stepped on all day?"

You chuckled as you put your hands behind your head and layed back. "Big bro that'll be lame, i wanted to spend the day in your cheese!"

Izuku flushed as his eyes widened. "M-my cheese?", unconsciously Izuku wiggled his large toes. His foot odor had always been an embarrassing topic, just because of how much he sweated not to mention smooshed Izumi.

You grinned closing your eyes. "Yep your feet are great bro! They always show me how strong your become when you stomp me, and the smells awesome the cheese is unlike anything I'd ever smelt.", you smiled warmly opening your eyes. "Plus...the smell makes me feel safe."

Izuku felt his eyes water, his brother was always uplifting him but this whole time Izuku was helping Izumi by stepping on him. Smiling Izuku scooped up Izumi and hugged him to his cheek. "Thank you Izumi, i didn't know i was helping you whenever i squished you. But I'm i am!"
155211212221121.title: Brotherly Bonding!

choices: Izuku Tells You About One for All
1552112122211212.content:
"No problem! It's the least I can do to help you along!" You grin at Izuku's close face as you are hugged into your older brother's freckles. Izuku felt a few tears form as he wiped them away, "I'll do my best!"

"I know you will! You'll make an amazing hero, big bro!" You cheer as Izuku finally stops smush hugging you into his freckled cheek.

"T-thank you...you encouraging me today really helped!" Izuku said emotionally.

You nod, "I'm glad I could help in some way. I want you to succeed!" You say firmly as you clench your fists in determination. Izuku nearly started bawling again, but held it in. "Thank you...I'll make you proud!"

"I mean, you developing a quirk this late in the game...it's gotta be a good sign or something!" You said thoughtfully.

Izuku gulped a bit, he wanted to tell you the secret so badly.

You had encouraged him all the time, you believed in him. Izuku opened his mouth slightly, croaking a little bit as he struggled with this indecision.

"Huh? What's wrong, Izuku?!" You yelp, hopping up and down on his palm.

"Are you choking?!" You squeak fearfully, ready to do a makeshift Heimlich on your giant brother.

"Izumi um...I have something to t-tell you..." Izuku began to say...

You tilted your head, "What's up? What is it?" You ask, glad that your brother wasn't having some sort of choking fit or whatever that just was.
1552112122211212.title: Brotherly Love

choices: You fall asleep before he can tell you
15521121222112122.content:
Izuku nervously gulped as he looked down at you, for always encouraging him and helping you should know why he suddenly got a quirk. But...what if you felt betrayed? You had promised him they'd both get into U.A. even with his size and him being quirkless.

What if you didn't trust him anymore?

"I'm sorry Izumi! Please don't feel hurt by this...", Izuku fought back his tears as he slowly began to speak about his mentor's power passed to him.

However before he could say anything, a knock suddenly came from Izuku's door. Inko poked her head in smiling, unaware of the anxious moment. "Dinner's ready i know you two must be hungry after that first day."

You grinned as you stood up. "Ah sweet I'm starving, a lotta my snacks got too squished."

Izuku internally sighed in relief as he delayed the secret being revealed, putting on a shaky smile he nodded. "Y-yeah me to!"

Your big brother carried you to the table though his plump soles created wet slaps now that the socks were off. Izuku flushed as he thought of you being under those steps all day, even if you liked it he still got embarrassed.

Sitting at the table were three delicious looking bowls of katsudon. Well one was a small sauce bowl that was still bigger then you, so that always guaranteed leftovers. It sat next to Izuku's that casted a shadow over you.

"Thank you for the food!", you and Izuku gave a itadakimasu before beginning to end the one of many yummy meals your mother makes.

Inko smiled at her boys before gaining a worried look. "Izumi..i know you want to be with your brother but please next time could you ride in his bag. Oh no what if the U.A staff arrest you for trespassing!"

You mother grew a worried look as she widened her eyes and went over every bad scenario thst could happen. "Th-they might label you a national criminal, what if take you?! N-no I'd never let happen Izumi!"

A sweatdrop formed on your head from your mother's worried ranting. Still, she was right getting caught sneaking into U.A definitely wouldn't be fun. But it wouldn't be the last time you did.

"Mom it's ok, I'm a good hider then never catch me. Plus next year when it's my time I'm try out for the entrance exam. Izuku got his quirk in the time of action so he proved the impossible is possible!", you grinned pumping a fist.

Inko wipped her eyes before smiling. "I'm still amazed...despite all the hardships you still have grown into amazing people. I'm so proud to have you to as my children."

The dinner was cheerful and more lively as Izuku talked about his first day. It was dinner to celebrate the future, from the troubles in the past growing into gateways of prosperity. Izuku while enjoying the dinner still had the dark thought at the back of his head, he had said he was a late bloomer and spent many days training for his quirk.

"I'm sorry Izumi..i know you hate fake people. I don't want you to feel betrayed please."
___________________________
After the yummy meal, you both moved to Izuku's room. Laying down, your brother set you on his firm chest, feeling the sweaty pecs pushing against the shirt.

The strong b.o and slight musk from your brother's pits hit you. It wasn't bothersome of course, it showed his strength and power to protect you.

Izuku lightly rubbed your head as he took a deep breath. You were his brother, you wouldn't just go babbling it knowing the significance of One for All. Maybe you wouldn't be mad at the secret, Izuku didn't want a rift in his family.

Next...
15521121222112122.title: A Delayed Secret

15521122.content:
In a certain world Izuku Midoriya would be born without a quirk, being one of the few people in society that didn't possess a superpower. He would grow up striving to become a hero despite the odds and eventually be given the chance by inheriting a quirk from the No.1 hero All Might.

This was not the same world.

Izuku Midoriya had first discovered his quirk when he was four years old. He had been hanging with his friend when a middle school student starting picking on them. Bakugou had immediately started threatening to blow the bully up and Izuku panicked and held his hands up in worry, unaware of thier glow.

The next thing he knew the middle schooler was standing before thier shoes, the size of an ant. Both boys were shocked at the now tiny bully, Bakugou laughed and rose his sneaker over the older boy only for him to regrow and scramble away in fear.

That was the day Izuku found out he could shrink others.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Izuku was ecstatic that he had a quirk, but couldn't help but feel worried. As he grew up he always would shrink down others when they asked him, some asked him to step on them with his large feet. Being a giant made Izuku think of how powerful he could be, Bakugou always told him that he could literally crush a villian.

His friend didn't miss out on his quirk as well. Bakugou and his junior high class all wanted to be shrunk by him. Some even asked to rub his feet, which Izuku worried about since his feet did get a little stinky.

He also was more assertive as he would shrink someone down and threaten to crush them if necessary. Not to mention the one time he shrunk a bully down and 'accidentally' left him on Kacchan's seat just as the ash blond sat down.

Izuku was gentle but also enjoyed being a giant a lot.

Right now Izuku was.....
15521122.title: Izuku The Size Controller

choices: Use him as a seat cushion
155211221.content:
It was the end of the day at Aldera Junior High, and only two students remained in a certain classroom. Only one was visible though.

Izuku Midoriya sat at his desk writing in his No.13 Hero Analysis Book. His large red shoes rested beside his chair and had his damp socks sticking out. The greenete had his two large feet up on the desk as he leaned back and happily wrote. Izuku normally wouldn't put his feet up, but it was the best way to get up close to his feet.

Speaking of, on the right sole now was a speck climbing the mountain of plump flesh. Katsuki Bakugou smirked victoriously as he neared the toes of Izuku, the foot stench getting stronger. The ash blonde like others always took a chance to be shrunk and get close to the freckled boy's massive stompers. Bakugou got to enjoy Izuku's feet and also work out by scaling the towering foot.

Izuku peeked over the book top to see his friend reach the crevice of his toes. Smiling, Izuku put his book away and leaned forward.

"Ah cool you made it Kacchan!"

Bakugou sniffed up the stench and chuckled. "Hehe, well duh Deku! Man how long do you keep those clunkers on?"

Izuku blushed lightly. "U-um...not long! It just gets cold and I want my feet...to stay warm."

"Heh, whatever I beat my climbing time. And as thanks you can play giant do what you want!"

The giant thought it over, Bakugou was willing to let him do something.

Izuku....
155211221.title: A Normal Day For A Size Controller

choices: Bakugo Manages to Avoid Him for Awhile!
1552112211.content:
Izuku gained a confident grin and reached down to his toes and plucked Bakugou up, bringing him to one of his gargantuan eyes. "Well I guess I should get to stomping this little bug!" Midoriya boomed in a pretend 'evil' voice.

Bakugo grinned, "Yeah! Practice for when you're a pro!"

Lowering his plump feet to the floor, they made wet slapping sounds as they impacted the granite. Midoriya placed Bakugo in front of his feet and stood up with his hands on his hips. "Well well! Looks like a puny runt got in!" Izuku wiggled his thick toes, fanning stench at Bakugo teasingly.

"Guess I'd better squish it!" Izuku said as he hovered his left foot above Bakugo and flexed his meaty toes.

"You'll have to catch me first!" Bakugo yelled as he raced across the floor. Izuku giggled and stomped after him, "Fee Fi Fo Fum!" He boomed.
1552112211.title: Decided to stomp Bakugou

15521122111.content:
Bakugou but all his energy into his legs and even propelled himself forward using his quirk. The ground shaking booms behind remained loud and were accompanied by the sound of Izuku's plump feet slapping the floor.

Izuku simply strolled at a normal rate as the speck at his feet only moved about a foot within a few seconds. Izuku giggled as he felt the cool ground against his warm sweaty sole. He decided he should stop humoring his friend.

Taking a step longer then the last, Izuku's large foot hovered over Bakugou. The ash blond looked up at the sudden darkness, only to see the sky full of Izuku's sole about to fall on him. Before he could activate another explosion, Bakugou was soon pinned to the ground with the sole smooshing him into Izuku's stomper.

Izuku laughed. "Hehe, I squished the bug! Just wait villians, you'll be joining him soon.", Izuku grinned as he lifted his heel and lightly grinded Bakugou into the ball of his foot.

Izuku closed his eyes and hummed. The feeling of Bakugou's now minuscule body squashed into his foot made him think of the future. Him next to All Might, a shrunken villain quivering at thier feet soon ready to be crushed beneath thier feet.

The boy suddenly opened his eyes and gasped. "Opps, I'm still smooshing Kacchan!"

Meanwhile under Izuku's sole, Bakugou was enjoying himself. Despite the pressure of the squishy flesh he was inhaling the strong sent stuck to Deku's sole. The boy always wore his big red shoes and rarely changed his socks that looked glued on. Bakugou grunted as the thick cheese filled his nostrils and warmed him in a sorta mini sauna. If Izuku ever got rid of his foot stench, Bakugou be pissed.

Soon the pressure was lightened as Izuku sat on a desk and rested his foot on his knee. Bakugou was stuck to his squishy sole face first and looked imbedded in the flesh. Using his thumb and finger, Izuku pulled his friend out with a loud peel sound.

"Man you sure know how to use those feet!", Bakugou yelled as he panted covered in sweat.

Izuku rubbed the back of his head and chuckled. "Yeah...it feels good when I step on something."

Walking back over to his desk, Izuku began pulling on his worn and damp socks. As he gathered his things, Izuku thought of where to put Bakugou for the walk back. He and his friend were going to Izuku's house since they weren't really allowed to have size fun at school.

Izuku put Bakugou......
15521122111.title: Izuku The Squisher

choices: Skip to Izuku in his Room..Peeling off his Footwear!
Izuku's Long and Sweat Ridden Walk Home...
155211221111.content:
Izuku grinned and brought Bakugou up to his face, "Kacchan! You want some more foot time?" He asked cheerfully. "Sure! What did you have in mind?" Bakugou asked excitedly.

"I'll put you in my shoe while I walk home!" Izuku declared brightly, Bakugo shivered in excitement as he was lowered to that steaming inside of Deku's right shoe. The boy had already pulled on his rancid socks so all that was left is to slip on and tie the clunky red shoes!

"I definitely owe you a foot rub today!" Bakugo called up, causing Deku to blush and giggle.

"You'd rub these GIANT feet anyway! Little man!" Izuku teased as he lifted his dingy right socked foot up above the shoe and wiggled those sopping wet toes..before sliding the appendage in.

Bakugo had the sense to rush to the extremely stinky toe section of the shoe...besides...what better place to absorb his pal's stink than the toes?!

Tying both his shoes on tight to his reeking socked feet, Deku gave his toes a playful wiggle and giggled as he felt his tiny friend beneath them.

"Well..it's a hot day today! I hope Kacchan doesn't mind...." Izuku chuckled as he grabbed his backpack and notebook and set out to walk home.
155211221111.title: A Mile in Deku's Shoes

1552112211112.content:
As he walked out of the gate to school, Izuku wiped the sweat from his forehead. The weather in Musutafu had the summer rolling in and bringing heat. The uniform hadn't changed to the summer ones, so Izuku was feeling the heat. Sweat ran down his body, especially his plump feet currently squashing Bakugou.

Izuku giggled as with each step his sole smooshed Kacchan into his squishy sole. The cheddary sole pinned Bakugou's body and squished him nicely, the toe gap sent bursts of foot odor up the ash blonde's nostrils and made him sweat gallons. The sole rised and let the squishy sole rest on him only to come down and squash Bakugou into the insole with a squelch and splash of sweat. Bakugou grunted from the pressure before laughing and whiffing the endless scent.

The greenete stopped in his walk as he saw an All Might poster hanging up on a store window. Izuku grinned and looked at a weed growing out of the sidewalk. A small smirk grew as Izuku imagined the weed was a quivering villain. Lifting up the foot with Bakugou, Izuku stomped and flattened the weed and grinded it intill it was crushed into the sidewalk. Bakugou experienced the full force of the squashing force.

Izuku giggled as he squashed the 'villian', he continued on his way further squashing his friend into his toe gunk.

Soon....
1552112211112.title: Izuku's Fun Walk

choices: Izuku Slowly And Sensually Peels his Socks Off!
Inko Knocks at his Bedroom Door?!
15521122111121.content:
Around the time Izuku got home, he was thoroughly drenched from the heat and his feet felt like he'd dunked them in a pool with his shoes on. Opening the front door he would smell the aroma of his mother's delicious cooking.

"Mom! I'm home!" Izuku called out as he deposited his book bag on the hook by the door.

"Welcome home sweetie!" Inko Midoriya cheerfully greeted her son a he walked back to his room and shut the door. He turned on the box fan in the corner and flopped down on the bed. He took off his uniform and tossed it in the corner, leaving himself in a pair of shorts and shirtless.

"Now...time to check on Kacchan!" Izuku cheerfully exclaimed as he leaned over and untied his red shoes.

Prying them off to reveal his glued on and extremely soaked socked feet. The smell of foul cheese filled the room as the young greenette sighed at the air on his stinky socked appendages.

Looking down at the socked sole he giggled as he saw Bakugo clinging to it and having his face buried under his toe bend...sniffing up the precious aroma.

"You sure like my feet, Kacchan." Midoriya said with a giggle as he peeled Bakugo off.

"Sure do! They could be your greatest weapon against villains once ya shrink them down to nothing!" Bakugo cheered.

"Why don't I peel these things off..." Izuku grinned.

"Do it slow! Like a strip tease!" Bakugo said almost lustfully which made Izuku blush crimson.
15521122111121.title: Izuku made it home

choices: "Up for a round of heroes and villians?"
155211221111211.content:
Izuku chuckled despite the embarrassment he also felt. "O-ok!"

Reaching down to the tip of the damp sock, Izuku pinched the wet fabric and began pulling the sock. The fabric stretched and squelched slightly while sweat was squeezed out. Despite the tugging, the sock barely rolled down his heel and limping hung off his toes.

Changing his tactics, Izuku stuck a thumb into his sock at the heel area and pulled. The damp cloth was slowly pulled off revealing the dreanched peach sole, ripe with odor. Izuku hummed and wiggled his large toes, sending waves of cheese. The greenete bounced his developing pecs as he gazed his friend looking up in awe.

Bakugou had convinced him to start working out in addition to training his quirk. Izuku now had a good set of muscles that tempted others to be shrunk even more.

Moving onto the other sock, Izuku began to slowly pull off the musky fabric. The plump sole squished as Izuku pressed his thumbs into the flesh. The foot was soon free, ready to released.

Bakugou looked in awe the gigantic feet the size of buildings. The meaty soles spread thier smelly and cheddar aura. The ash blonde thought of all the various spots he and others had been squashed into the stomper. Bakugou smirked and approached the hot soles.

"Alright Deku...
155211221111211.title: The Foot's Slow Reveal

choices: Bakugo Has to Give Deku his 'Reward'
Deku Shrinks Bakugo Further for Intense Foot Fun!
1552112211112112.content:
Izuku grinned excitedly, "Sure! Can I be the hero again?" Bakugo chuckled, "Yeah, you always are! It's more fun that way, right?"

Midoriya smiled and placed a finger against Bakugo, growing him to the size of an action figure as opposed to a mere insect. "Good thinking! This way I'll be able to move around better! I'll win for sure this time!" Bakugo declared confidently. Deku chuckled and stood up, wide bare feet flat on the floor on either side of Bakugo. "I don't think so! Us heroes never lose!"

Bakugo laughed maniacally like a stereotypical villain, "You won't win this time, Deku!" Bakugo launched himself up into the air with his palm-explosions. Deku lifted his foot and stomped down, but the agile little Bakugo dodged and flew through Deku's room. "Wow! You're doing better this time, Kacchan!" Deku complimented.

"Duh! I couldn't let you beat me ALL the time! Besides, at U.A. I can't let you show me up!" Kacchan cried out. "Wait..what are you doing?! You're supposed to be a hero and I'm supposed to be the bad guy!! ACT LIKE IT!" Kacchan roared, causing Deku to wince...even at toy size his friend could be intimidating.

"You won't escape the mighty Deku's feet, villain!" Deku roared as he flopped back on the bed and hoisted his soles in the air.

Bakugo was confused...until the soles closed in from either side and caught him in the pillowy soles' grip.

"Haha! Caught ya!" Deku declared as he lowered his footy trap down to the floor and sat up. "Your crime spree is over villain! It's time to teach you a lesson!" Deku said in a stereotypical heroic-voice.

"You'll never stop me! I'll just break out of jail!" Bakugo madly cried out.

Deku laughed like he'd heard All-Might do many times, "You're not going to prison! You're going to be my foot prisoner! I'll keep an eye on you and you'll be forced to smell my POWERFUL foot stink forever!"

Deku couldn't keep up the act when Bakugo looked like he was about to get a very embarrassing nosebleed. He parted his feet...
1552112211112112.title: Giant Heroes and Tiny Villains

15521122111121121.content:
"W-well then I'll release you! But...only if you service my heroic FEET!", Izuku finished in a flushed voice in a failing attempt to keep his hero act.

Bakugou simply gave a loud laugh with a smirk. "HA, jokes on you I love these fuckin feet!"

The ash blonde threw himself into the right sole of Izuku, pressing his body into the plump sole intill it caved in. Bakugou began rubbing the soft flesh while inhaling the chessy stink that was released as he pressed against the sole. The heel area was a bit more ruff but was still tenderized by the shrunken boys rubbing.

Izuku hummed and closed his eyes at the tiny hands massaging his warm and stinky sole. He had once been embarrassed about his feet and the smell they garnered. But after everyone asked him to shrink them and either step on them or if they could explore his soles, Izuku grew into all the aspects of being a giant. It did still get embarrassing when he saw just how much his friend liked his feet.

Back at the feet, Bakugou soon reached the toes and the source of a lot of the chessy musk. He couldn't help himself and planted his face into the big toe and take a whiff. The heavy odor smelt amazing to Bakugou and made his potential nosebleed grow more possible as the stinky smell helped give off a scope of just how big Izuku was. He eventually made his way over to the left foot to inhale even more endless odor and rub the moist and squishy soles. Inhaling the scent was one thing but Bakugou couldn't help his temptations and stuck his tongue out...

Izuku felt the front of his pants tighten a bit and began to flush as the rubbing grew faster and he felt wet streaks across his sole that were warm and lapped up any sweat.

What was next?
15521122111121121.title: Reward For A Size Controller

155211223.content:
Ok so quick choice here.

So you can go on with Izuku having a shrinking quirk and go into hero training.

Or, you could go down a different story route. The concept of villian Deku is very popular and deserves some macro treatment. So what if the League of Villians had a cute greenette with a shrinking quirk on their side?

So which will it be?
155211223.title: Other

1552112232.content:
While the other kids really enjoyed Izuku's quirk, others weren't as keen on the sizeshifter.

Parents of the other kids viewed him as a menace for supposedly putting their children in harm's way. Izuku was always very gentle when he shrunk someone, but those instances were ignored. The angry parents demanded Izuku be removed from class or they would press charges. The school not wanting any risks had to tell Inko Midoriya that her son was no longer allowed to attend school.

This was a shock for Izuku, who cried after he was told he couldn't go to the school he loved learning from. Katsuki was very vocal with his frustration on their playdates, saying how he wanted to kick the ass of whoever was responsible.

Unfortunately, this wasn't the end of the drama. Inko started recieving multiple harassing calls and emails, shaming her and her villian son. She would always smile and hug Izuku, saying she was ok but Izuku could see how much stress was put on his mother.

Feeling guilt, Izuku fled. Running away to where he wouldn't bother anyone. If he was gone then maybe his mom would stop getting the hate and his class would be happy. But running away was the first thing, now Izuku was cold and sitting in a alleyway at 8 years old.

His new life found meaning on the day he was faced with danger. A dirty man had entered the alley out of breath the distance sound of sirens had called out. Seeing the shivering little boy against the wall, the man gave a crooked grin as he thought he found a hostage.

Izuku had yelped in fear at the scary man reaching for him, when a familiar flash lit up the darkness. The man looked in shock as the kid was now towering over him and his shoe was the size of a bus to him.

The crook began running off into the alleyway as the sudden shift in size shocked him. He stopped when a shadow covered him, causing him to look up in confusion at a sky that looked the sole of a shoe-!"

CRUNCH

Izuku looked in shook as the fleeing dot suddenly disappeared beneath a large red shoe belonging to a leg coated in black. The newcomer was a strange one, dressed in a black outfit with an assortment of hands on his outfit and having blue like silver hair popping out.

Shigaraki looked down at his shoe, a grunt escaped him as he lifted his heel and grinded the shrunken man into paste. "Gross."

Izuku held his hands as the stranger approached him, red eyes peering through the hand on his face.

"Kid....what are doing out here?"

The greenette sniffled. "I caused trouble for everyone. All the adults are mean to mama now because of my quirk!"

The stranger was silent as the child began tearing up at the memories. Hearing the sirens closer now the stranger held out a hand, strangely bending his pinky towards his wrist.

"Well...was there a hero to stop all this?", the stranger asked in a raspy voice

"Huh?", Izuku blinked away his tears as he looked at the palm. After a second, he slowly placed his smaller hand in the dry one.

Shigaraki soon grinned wildly as he and the kid walked into the alley, once again stomping on the squashed remains. "Kid, your quirk can do a lot. How about you be my support unit?"

Izuku smiled and looked in awe at a sudden purple portal forming at the end of the alleyway. Shigaraki was full of glee as he knew that they could now literally crush the hero society.
1552112232.title: Villian Deku

choices: Midoriya Needs a Couple of Puny Insoles for the Walk Home!
15521122321.content:
-Seven Years Later...-

Izuku was groomed by Shigaraki just as All For One had done for him. Through the course of feeding Izuku's resentment and hate for the supposed 'hero society' that had shunned him...Shigaraki molded the greenette teen into a force to be reckoned with.

Midoriya used his quirk to great effect, handing out punishment for traitors and captured heroes alike. The boy's large feet were put to use to the point where his fellow villains feared those mighty stompers with their unchanged socks.

Izuku was now 15 years old, and sitting in the bar which acted as the League of Villain's hideout...sipping a strawberry daiquiri through a straw. Non-alcoholic of course...all they'd need is a drunk Midoriya using his quirk recklessly.

Turning to Kurogiri, "So when are you guys gonna let me go on a mission?" Midoriya asked with a slight pout.

"Well..." Kurogiri began, until Shigaraki entered the barroom from his mysterious back room where he conversed with his 'master'.

"Don't worry little brother...we'll soon launch our attack on the USJ...and strike down the Symbol of Peace." Shigaraki assured his 'little brother' Midoriya.

"Awesome!" Midoriya cheered excitedly, like the excitable teen he was.

Midoriya had grown powerful for sure..not only did he have full control over shrinking things and people to whatever size he wished, now he could grow himself and others as well here lately!

Shigaraki grinned, the Hero Society wont' know what hit them...

"In the meantime, we have a gift for you to keep you occupied..." Kurogiri spoke up. Midoriya was dressed casually in a white shirt and sweatpants...as well as his steamy red sneakers.

"Really?" Midoriya's eyes lit up like a child. Giran stood up and took a puff from his cigarrette, having been quiet til now.

He opened the door to reveal two colorfully dressed heroes who were restrained and tied together on two chairs.

"These two were caught spying on us...your brother thought you could use some entertainment and take them back to your place. Dispose of them when you're done." Giran chuckled darkly.
15521122321.title: Deku the Size Villain!

155211223211.content:
Izuku's eyes lit up as he hopped up from the barstool and ran up to Shigaraki. "Thank you Tomu-chan!"

Shigaraki lightly patted the curly head, making sure not to his pinky touch. "You deserve it little brother, now you should head on home and rest." The chapped smile of the villain grew as he leaned down. "You might need some insoles for the walk back."

Izuku brightly smiled as he nodded and made his way over to the trapped heroes. The two men had been hopeful when they first spotted the young greenette, thinking he'd persuade the villians to let them go. They were wrong as Izuku jogged over with a mischievous smile and held his hands up as they glowed.

The two heroes seem to vanish as their bindings fell to the chairs and floor. However looking closer, in the center of each seat was a hero now a inch in height. Izuku giggled at the shocked faces before he quickly snatched both of them in a fist.

Izuku took a seat on one of the seats and used his other hand to start pulling off his worn shoes. A pop sound was audible as Izuku's wet socks popped out and visible streaks of steam floated out. The young villain smirked as the heroes pathetically squirmed in his fist, little did they know of the smellier prison waiting.

The size shifter quickly tosses the two men into the separate shoes. He then slid his large feet into each foot, giggling as his toes knocked the heroes into his chessy insole. Izuku hummed as he felt each inch tall hero get squished underneath the area of his toes.

An inch was the default size for Izuku, just right to squish but he could always shrink them further. The greenete smiled as he stood up and felt his soles squash the pathetic squirming and engulfed the heroes in his plump feet.

Izuku soon walked to the entrance of the bar with heavy steps before turning back to wave. "Goodbye everyone, I'll be back tomorrow!"

It was strange, Izuku was a very sweet boy. But that could turn into playful cruelness in a matter of seconds.

The heroes were going through a chessy hot hell at the moment. The soft weight on top of them would lighten momentarily before crushing them back into the ground. The lucky thing about Izuku's feet was that they were very plump so he could stomp on tinies and not immediately turn them to paste. So Izuku enjoyed his walk with his comfy insoles no worry.

Soon Izuku arrived at his new apartment, Shigaraki's master had been kind and given Izuku a place to live. All the young villain needed to do was get groceries with a allowance he was given. Izuku was really grateful as he also was given a lot of playtoys.

Entering the the living room was an assortment of things such as model cities and multiple pairs of footwear. On a shelf was multiplied notebooks containing info on heroes.

So what fun was first?
155211223211.title: A Young Villain's Gift

1552112232112.content:
Izuku flopped down on the couch with a satisfied grunt, propping his chunky red shoes up on the coffee table. "Whew, that was some walk! Even though the sun is going down...it's still pretty hot out!" Izuku giggled, waving his feet back and forth.
Midoriya smiled widely as he felt the pitiful squirmings of his toys. He leaned forward and began to untie the laces, with a satisfying woooosh, the shoes were pulled off and the air kissed the enormous feet.

The socks of the young ex-student were like a second skin, glued on so well that one could make out each individual rounded toe. However, most important and notable of all...were the individuals smooshed into the arches of the socked feet.

"Ahhh!~ That feels niice..." Izuku sighed before hoisting his right foot onto the opposite knee...and laughing loudly. The tiny hero was flat as a pancake and stuck in an indent into the socked sole. Grinning toothily, Izuku peeled him off...and did the same for the next foot.

Holding the dazed and now 'marked' puny heroes in his fists, Izuku chuckled. "Hehehehe, I'm excited to play with you both!"

The hero in his right fist whimpered pathetically, "P-please kid...don't do this!" His response was a sharp squeeze from Izuku, and a pouty frown. "Don't call me kid! I'm a villain you know! I've got a lot more going for me with Tomu-chan than I EVER did trying to be a hero!"

Izuku looked over to his scale-model city and gained a mischievous grin. Young Midoriya stood up, the tinies clenched in his fist.

His socked feet made squishy sounds as he traversed across the hardwood floor...Izuku liked leaving sweaty footprints all over the apartment. Looming over the city, Izuku placed the tiny heroes on a rooftop that they would never survive a fall from.

Squatting down, Izuku set to work peeling off the rancid and well worn socks. "Let's play Deku-Zilla!" Izuku grinned widely.

The socks were yanked from Izuku's feet, and the two tinies would peer over the sides of the roof down to see the absolutely massive bare stompers. Izuku's feet were wide and meaty, the soles spectacularly plump and thick, his toes were plump...and above all...a rancid cheesy stench wafted up to the heroes...and they could see grime around the giant's toes.

"So what do you guys think of my BIG feet?" Izuku began to raise a foot up in the air for them to see his sole..
1552112232112.title: Rampage of Deku-Zilla!

choices: Izuku draws out the fun, taunting the heroes
15521122321121.content:
The heroes remained silent too in shock and caught up in the sudden chessy air. This wasn't the right response as Izuku narrowed his eyes and clenched his fists.

"Hey you know what I hate more then heroes? Quiet bugs!"

Izuku brought his plump sole down fast and blocked his childishly angry face as the chessy sole was close to crushing the building and heroes!

Thinking quickly, one hero grabbed his fellow hero and jumped off the roof, putting out his hand a yellow platform appeared and caught them. Just in time as Izuku crushed the building flat under his large foot.

Izuku laughed as he grinded the rubble under his sweaty foot. "Hehe, so you do have some fight in you!"

The greenete rose his foot, dropping debris now coated in sweat and a chessy odor. Izuku watched as the platform shattered and the heroes fell to the ground. The giant smirked as he set his foot on the heel so that it loomed over the tiny heroes.

Izuku smirked as he heard the pests coughing from his cheese funk. "I like bugs who try and escape, it makes squashing you so much more fun!"

The heroes felt the strike of fear motivate them to out run the stomp, hearing the wet slap and crunch.

Izuku watched as the bugs fled into the model city, he was going to have to save up his allowance. Because he was about to flatten the model.

"That's right, run from Deku-Zilla! Run before he stomps you to paste!", Izuku grinned impishly as he slowly stomped after the heroes.

The giant teen stomping after them, and the plump cheese soles rising and stomping wasn't a sight the heroes wanted to look back to.

Soon...
15521122321121.title: The Chase Begins

choices: Midoriya Crushes Dynamo...No One Likes a Tattletale!
155211223211211.content:
The mini heroes split up, if even one of them could survive this brat's rampage...they could get help and report to the other pros!

The entire model city quaked with each wet slapping stomp Izuku made, leaving moist footprints on the street. "Come out! Come out! You can't hide from Deku-Zilla!" The giant greenette boomed as he peered inside a skyscraper with his enormous eye.

As each individual hero stayed quiet...at least one of them was starting to break. Dynamo was always more style than substance, more of a flashy celebrity type hero to be fair. So when he heard about this secret spying mission to gain intel on the League of Villians he couldn't pass it up!

"An opportunity to gain fame and glory as the one who took down the LoV? Count me in!" The flashy pro had boldly proclaimed...much to the annoyance of those he was teamed up with.

"This isn't about gaining notoriety-" One of the other pros, Lizolfo, a lizardman hero, had scolded him.

"Nonsense! EVERY opportunity as a pro is a chance to gain fame and notoriety!" Dynamo had disregarded his fellow pro's concerns.

Dynamo was cocky, he didn't plan on keeping with the 'surveillance' side of things. He'd bust in and take down the LoV's leader himself!

Unfortunately, his brashness was exactly the reason they got caught! So now here he was, quaking in his red boots and pretty sure he'd soiled his white costume, hiding in a model skyscraper as the gigantic teen stomped closer and closer.

He'd seen Lizolfo dash across the street into the opposite building. "I...I can't be wiped out here...not like this...not by some oversized brat!" Dynamo ranted to himself, his infamous ego taking a nosedive.

The shadow of Izuku Midoriya overtook the building, and Dynamo turned with horror to see the enormous eye staring right in at him!

"Found you!" Izuku's voice boomed, rattling the windows.

Using his jetboots, he quickly propelled himself through the building's halls, just as the colossus' hand plowed through the walls where he'd just been hiding.

He saw Lizolfo peering out from an alley across the street, perhaps he could divert the giant's attention to him instead?!

As he was pondering this diabolical plan, he smashed through the window, propelled by his thrusters, and ran smack into Izuku's clutches!

"Got ya!" Izuku cheerfully exclaimed as he clenched Dynamo in a fist. "W-wait! Kid! Hold on! I can tell you where the others are!" Dynamo yelled out as his ribs began to feel like they were cracking.
155211223211211.title: A Flashy Pro Reveals his True Colors

choices: Izuku brought him to his feet
1552112232112111.content:
Izuku halted in squeezing his fist, raising his eyebrow at the flashy hero's words. "Huh your gonna give up your pal like that?"

Dynamo trembled in the firm grip but tried to put on a confident grin. "Y-yeah I can tell you where he is and you can have all the fun you want!"

From across the street, Lizolfo narrowed his eyes. Dynamo had gotten on his nerves from his claims of what a hero should but he wouldn't go so low as to leave him to Izuku's smelly stompers right?

Crouching down, Izuku plopped his rear on a building completely crushing it and sending tremors through the artificial mini city. Bringing his fist to his face, Dynamo looked into the childishly cruel green eyes.

"So you'd really give away your other pro hero?", Izuku smirked as Dynamo soon began yapping.

"Yeah he's over across the street, go stomp him have fun! Now that I told you could you let me- ACK!"

Dynamo yelled in pain as Izuku suddenly clenched his fist tightly and put pressure on the tiny's rips. The giant only glanced at the fleeing figure of Lizolfo, Izuku stayed sitting and tormented the ensnared hero.

"Tomu-nii was right you bugs, all of you just selfish and fake! I'll deal with your friend later but now....I'm gonna treat you worse then a bug!"

Loosening his fist a little, Izuku soon reached in and lightly squeezed Dynamo's boots. The jets on the footwear soon sparked and crumbled between Izuku's thumb and finger.

Chuckling Izuku soon gripped the hero again. "Your boots are the source of your flight, dont want you escaping!"

Dynamo felt dread fill him as....

15521331.title: Katsuki Bakugo

155213312.content: Who's the small one here?
155213312.title: He encounters someone tiny

choices: "How about you give me one of your massages."
1552133121.content:
(Ok a big note here so buckle up kiddies! This here is a AU with a good number of factors, one being that Bakugou is older then Izuku by five years. So just as Izuku gets into highschool, Bakugou is already a pro hero. The biggest one here is that Izuku actually has a quirk, one that makes him only a inch tall and very durable. Bakugou is older, so in my mind he's taller and a bit more muscled.)

Izuku sat on his kitchen table waiting for the arrival of his babysitter. It was embarrassing as he just got into highschool and he still had to be watched when his mom went to work. Though he couldn't blame her, having a inch tall son caused some concern.

The sound of the door opening made izuku stand up in excitement as the sound of heavy footsteps came into the kitchen. Soon he saw a towering ash-blond man dressed in a more casual version of his hero outfit. Including a black tank top with a orange X that squeezed the firm muscles and black pants that clung to his toned legs. He still wore his mask and as Izuku was covered in a shadow red eyes looked over the large pecs at the green haired boy.

A toothy smirk grew as Bakugou saw the tiny boy. "Hey Deku, it's been I while since I've seen my squirt!"

Izuku smiled despite the looming giant. "Hi Kacchan!", the next thing he knew, Izuku was being enveloped in the orange palm of Bakugou's gloved fist. Bakugou chuckled as he pulled the front of his tank top forward.

"How about giving your big buddy a hug!", Bakugou grinned as he bounced his pecs and moved Izuku towards the crevice and pushed the tiny boy in between his firm muscles.

Izuku soon found himself being squeezed by Bakugou's pecs. The massive heartbeat rang out and the smell of his manly b.o crinkled his nose. "Mmf Kacchan you smell!"

Bakugou smirked as he began to leave the kitchen. "Hey it ain't my fault I got called up during work to watch your tiny ass!", adding a quick pec flex to get a groan out of the tiny.

Izuku sighed but smiled as he nuzzled into the firm muscles. Growing up, Bakugou had always watched him and been his big buddy. During his junior high years he'd been a bit of a bully and viewed himself as top dog, treating Izuku like a bug. Izuku spent afternoons being squashed under Bakugou's feet and even sat on while the ash-blond mocked him.

But going through high school and becoming a hero, Bakugou mellowed out and began acting nicer to Izuku. He still acted big and put Izuku in size situations, but Izuku came to like his big friend's smells.

Bakugou soon arrived at Izuku, he gawked as he walked in and saw all the All Might merch. Looking down at his pecs. "Damn Deku your still a hero fanboy?"

Embarrassed mumbles came out of the muscles. Bakugou made his way over to Izuku's bed and laid down, sighing as the bed creaked under his weight. Fishing Izuku out of his pecs, Bakugou placed him on top of his abs and placed his hands behind his head.

"So Deku...

1552133312.title: Other option

choices: Raito Attempts to Get Denki's Attention...as The Giant Peels Off His Socks!
15521333122.content:
https://i.imgur.com/GJZau4y.jpg

OC and drawing belong to Creator9
------------------------------

"So Kaminari, I hear your big brother is coming in tonight." Jiro said to her electric classmate in the cafeteria one afternoon. Kaminari grinned, "Yep. He's kind of a big deal...."

"Oh really? How so?" Momo inquired as she took a bite of her lunch elegantly. "Well...instead of choosing to become a pro hero, he formed a really cool rock band. They're pretty famous." Kaminari boasted.

Jiro's jaw dropped, "No..no way! Your brother is...."

Kaminari smirked, "Yeah, he's Raito of the hero metal band: PainBrake!"

"Who'd have thought you'd have such a cool older brother..." Jiro muttered.

"H-hey! What's that supposed to mean?!" Kaminari blurted.

"Oooh I've seen pictures of him! He's super cute!" Hagakure butted in.

"Sooo dreamyyy..." Ashido swooned, "His dance moves are pretty good too!"

**After School**

Denki walked through the door of his house and called out: "Mom! Dad! I'm home!" Popping off his school shoes with a sigh, steam emitted from the insides of the brown footwear. Denki's socks were visibly wet and adhered to his big feet. "I can't wait to get outta this stuffy uniform." Kaminari loosened his red tie and undid the buttons on the uniform to let his sweaty torso breathe.

Unknown to Kaminari, his older brother had already arrived! His mother was preparing a large dinner...and his father was trying to get her to calm down and stop overdoing it.

While Mr. and Mrs. Kaminari believed Raito to be resting in Denki's room...nobody knew what had happened.

"W-what the hell?!" Raito yelled out, he stood amidst a sea of carpet in Denki's room....he'd shrunk! Raito's mind immediately went to whether this was a hallucination or not...but then he remembered that weird guy who bumped into him at the airport.

"Guy was really shifty...maybe he has something to do with this....I hope it isn't going to effect little bro!" Raito always did care about his little brother a lot..it'd been awhile since he saw him last.

That was when the floor began to quake beneath the tiny Raito...and the door swung open to reveal his colossal 'little' brother.

"W-woah....he's certainly....changed since last I saw him...." Raito gulped as the sweaty socked feet of his giant brother shook the floor and were headed right toward him!

"Aw crap! I gotta move!" Raito yelped out as the squishy sounding socked feet thoomed towards him. "I gotta change into something more comfortable." The giant boomed to himself, his voice sounding like a deep rumble to Raito.

Prying off his jacket and tie, Denki left them draped over a chair at his computer desk. Now leaving himself in his school pants and a visibly sweat dampened white dress shirt...and some very sweaty and odorous socks.

Raito blushed as Denki slipped his pants down to reveal his boxers, the cocky electric boy kicked these into the corner and sat his sizeable rump down on the end of the bed.

Raito breathed a sigh of relief, he wasn't going to get stepped on it seemed. But now he had to get Denki's attention!
15521333122.title: Raito: Elder Kaminari Brother

choices: Denki felt squirming under his foot
Denki changed into more casual clothes
155213331221.content:
Raito scratched his head. "Well the little guy's definitely gotten bigger since last time!", the blond awkwardly chuckled before sighing not feeling any less nervous. "Ok bad joke, still gotta get bro's attention."

As Raito started jogging up to his now giant brother, Denki sighed as he wiggled his toes in his stuffy socks. Raito stumbled as the front of the socks hitting the ground, produced noticeable shakes.

"I should've brought a change of socks, i was sweating up a storm during today's exercises.", Denki chuckled as he tapped his soles, producing small wet slaps and unintentionally causing Raito to trip as he felt the earthquake like shakes.

Raito rubbed his head as he face planted. The brother chuckled as he looked up at the looming form of his brother. "Man Denki you could take out a villain just by tapping those bad boys. Ughh or maybe just knock em out with the smell."

The elder Kaminari suddenly gagged as the odorous fumes spilling out of the socks hit him. A vinegar and salty stench throughout coating the large feet, Denki had certainly always had his smells but this one a MUCH bigger scale.

Denki hummed as he put his foot on his knee. "Raito never really complained about my smell, I'm sure i skip out on a shower!", the blond proudly grinned before grabbing the ankle of the glued on sock. "Alright let's let you bad boys breath."

Pulling on the sock, you swear there was a peeling noise as the fabric pulled away to show the glistening sole. Sweat was smeared all over the plump and meaty sole, a stronger wave of vinegar stench was unleashed and made the steam being emitted practically visible.

Raito finally jogged up to the feet, covering his mouth with his red jacket yet falling to keep the putrid odor out. Looking up as just as Denki peeled his sock off and let out a sigh of relief.

"Denki hey I'm down here, bro can you hear...", Raito had yelled up but widened his eyes as he saw Denki move his foot off his knee and directly hold it over him!

The elder Kaminari couldn't even yell as the large sweaty was brought down. Raito was thrown to the floor and vanished as the foot easily squashed him to the floor. Plump foot flesh pinned Raito down and squelched as warm and putrid sweat was splashed out.

Raito was completely buried under the ball of Denki's foot, enveloped in the warm sole. The elder brother cringed as his nostrils directly inhaled the vinegar musk, making them burn as he was soaked with the sweat.

"Da-damn Ok Denki looks like you got me, now c'mon let your big bro out!", Raito thought, he couldn't be made at Denki but the sweat was really strong here.

Denki meanwhile grinned as he peeled off his other sock. "Man i can't wait to tell Raito about U.A! I wanna see what he thinks."

Soon...
155213331221.title: A Kaminari's Socks Is Another's Enemy

choices: "Hehe...actually class ended a few minutes ago."
1552133313.content:
You felt a mix of emotions storming inside, half nervousness and half excitement. Who wouldn't be excited to be attending U.A high school and land a spot in the Hero Course?!

The problem is travel, and not travel as in car or train. But to the classroom itself. But that's the cons with having a quirk that made you a inch tall.

Walking to 1-A had been a challenge, covering the long distance and avoiding students that didn't even look down to see the tiny student on the ground. You were beginning to become discouraged even more as the 1-B teacher Vlad King stepped over you and didn't hear your pleas for help.

After what felt like hours, you finally arrived at the door for your class. The towering door put some curiosity in just how tall your classmates would be. Now, how would you get in?

The ground soon began to shake, and you sighed as you prepared to dodge another sole. However, the shaking stopped as a shadow loomed over you.

Looking behind you was the large brown shoes of the uniform. Looking up past the towering trouser towers you saw a young teen was looking at you with bright golden eyes. The boy had spiky yellow hair with a black lightning bolt like streak.

The giant grinned toothily as he crouched down and placed his palms on his knees.

"Hey you must me the new transfer student right?", the giant asked.

You summoned your confidence and spoke as loud as you could. "Um..YES I AM!"

The lightning giant chuckled and scratched his head. "Man Aizawa said you had a quirk that dealt with size, but I wasn't expecting this!"

The giant stopped his scratching as he grinned. "My names Kaminari Denki, nice to meet you."

You smiled at the greeting before nodding and introducing yourself. You looked off nervously before looking back up.

"I'm sorry to ask this Kaminari-Kun, but could you help me inside the classroom please?"

Denki smiled before saying.......
1552133313.title: A Small Transfer Student

choices: "You look like you'd be fun to mess around with" (Denki is teasing and playful)
"So I can squash you in private" (Denki is mean)

Denki reached down and wrapped his hand around you, bringing you up to his grinning face "Sorry little dude, class already ended."

"What?! I missed my first day?" You sighed.

"Yep, I saw you on the floor and decided to come introduce myself... but since class is over I guess I can take you home." He smirked.

"Really? Thanks! I don't know how I would have made it out of here and back to my house."

"Huh? I was talking about my house." Denki chuckled.

"What? Why?" You asked nervously.
15521333132.title: Out of class

choices: Kaminari Puts You in The Shoe!
Kaminari Puts you Inside His Sock for the Trip!
155213331322.content:
"You look like you'd be fun to mess around with!" Kaminari said with a cheeky grin. You paled, "B-but..." Kaminari chuckled and ruffled your hair with his finger. "Aw don't worry, shrimpy. I'll take you to your house...eventually." The electric boy snickered.

"E-eventually?" You gulp. "Don't worry, if we lose track of time I'll let ya phone your folks. You can tell 'em you've made a new friend!" Kaminari said confidently. "Now..where to put you for the trip." Kaminari said thoughtfully.

You were nervous as the blonde boy thought it over. Somehow you got the feeling that he wasn't being malicious. He seemed more like a jokester than anything else.

With a snap of his fingers that sounded like a clap of thunder to you, Kaminari cried out: "Got it! I'll put ya in my shoe!" The boy grinned deviously as you trembled.

"I-In your shoe? But..you'll crush me!" You wailed.

"Nah I won't. Don't worry, I'll take it easy..besides these babies are pretty soft...buuut..." Kaminari trailed off. "But..what?" You whimpered pitifully.

"The smell is gonna be pretty bad." Kaminari said sheepishly but with a hint of amusement. You squirmed in the goofy boy's grip as he squatted down and began to pry his school shoe off.

With a mighty tug, his heel popped out and the rest of the foot followed. "Yeaaah...that's nice." Kaminari said in joy, it felt good since he hadn't had these off all day.

You swore you saw steam emitting from the depths of his uniform shoe..and the sock looked like a second skin it was hugging his wide sole so tightly.

And just as Kaminari had mentioned, the smell hit you. It was an awful stench! It stunk like he had fermented his feet in vinegar for a year! The electric boy grinned as he saw your discomfort.

What happens now..?
155213331322.title: A Mischievous Electric Boy

choices: Denki takes his time walking home
1552133313222.content:
Denki sighed as his large foot was freed from the confines of the brown shoe. Stomping around all day had his sole baking in his sweat, squelching as almost countless drops of sweat shet.

The giant chuckled as he saw you gagged at his potent sweat fumes, using his thumb Denki ruffled your head. "Come on squirt it can't be thattt bad!", leaning down to the foot being hugged by the ratty sock, Denki took a sniff.

Denki stuck out his tongue in a joking manner. "Eck! Never mind, feel kinda bad for you little guy."

You cringed as the vinegar musk hit you like a heavy cloud. You suddenly were brought up and placed on top of Denki's spiky hair. Denki grinned as now that both of his hands were free he could peel off the painted on sock. Grabbing the heel of the damp fabric, Denki began to peel it off like a sticker, trails of sweat coming off.

The musky stench grew 2x as the glistening plump sole was revealed, looking slightly pink from how hot it was in the shoe. Denki hummed as finally with a wiggle of his gunky toes, his large fuming foot was free. Reaching up, Denki plucked you off his head with a michivious grin growing.

"Alright shrimp your cab's ready!", Denki said holding up his sweat ridden sock by the ankle, letting the sweaty steam flow out.

You gagged. "Y-your putting me in your sock?! Can't you just carry me in your pocket.",you pleaded, though in a more annoyed then terrified voice.

Denki chuckled. "C'mon dude, i want ya to be warm before we chill. Just take a nice whiff of my smell and you'll learn to love it!"

You yelped as Denki released you and plummeted straight down into the musky sock, the landing was soft and squelched as you landed on the damp fabric. Half dry and gooey gunk was splattered around you and fumigated the vinagar musk like a fragrance. You felt your nostrils tingle as you breathed in the potent stench.

"You nice and cozy squirt? Cause i think it's time to go.", Denki grinned as he wiggled his toes before beginning to slid them back into the wet socks.

You groaned as you coughed, watching the large toes come closer. The big toe was bigger then you and showed as you found yourself being pushed into the sock as the stinky toe smashed against you. The gunky toe jam's odor hit you as the sweaty and soft sole passed over stopping with you under the meaty ball of the foot.

Denki sighed as he stood up, feeling his plump sole completely envelope you in it's flesh. It was a strange yet nice feeling. Your groans were muffled as the vinegar sweat was smooshed onto you as you felt the pressure dramatically increase. True to his words, Denki's soft feet didn't immediately crush you but it felt like a smelly heavy blanket was pinning you down.

Sliding his large foot into the brown shoe, Denki created loud thumps for you as he wacked the insole with his wiggling toes. Grinning toothily Denki began to make his way home, eager to 'welcome' his new classmate.

Soon...
