1552133322.title: Todoroki finds someone tiny (you)

choices: Fuyumi and Natsuo surprise You by Bringing Shoto!!
15521333221.content:
As a young boy Shoto Todoroki endured all kinds of cruelty at his father Enji Todoroki's hands. Being the son and so called 'masterpiece' of Endeavor meant he was groomed to surpass the No. 2 hero one day. Shoto was isolated from his siblings and made to only focus on the harsh training and the few moments of free time he had with his loving mother.

Fuyumi, Toya, and Natsuo were deemed failures by their father and were not permitted to interact with Shoto. There was one sibling who consistently defied that decree however. That would be you.

Your name was Yuki Todoroki, and the reason you were deemed a failure was because you were around five inches tall. You might as well have been born quirkless since your quirk was so ineffective at your size. You were a teenager when Shoto was still a kid. For once you actually had found a bright side to your puny height.

It made it quite easy to sneak around, and you found that you were quite durable and resilient. You underwent a sort of training all your own, maneuvering through the house and finding various ways to get around. So it was that you would sneak in to see Shoto and cheer him up.

The poor kid was almost always down in the dumps or crying from your wicked father's treatment. You made it a routine to sneak in to play with him every day if you could. However, it would usually end the same way if you were caught by your father.

Your father would roughly 'escort' you out and yell at Shoto. But Shoto sometimes would cleverly hide you and you were allowed more time with your little brother. On more than one occasion you spent the night in his room, snuggled up with him and comforting him.

This was all before the incident where your mother lost it and scalded Shoto with boiling water. You weren't sure what to think, how could your mother do something so horrible? But deep down you didn't blame her entirely...you blamed HIM.

Your father may be the Number 2 hero but he was a cruel and abusive man. The straw that broke the camel's back was when he sent your mother away to a mental hospital AND sent you away to live with a distant relative.

Endeavor paid off the relative whom you'd never met to NEVER contact him or any of your siblings. You were cut off from the only family you'd ever known and dumped into the arms of some relative you didn't know at all.

Over the years your hatred and resentment only grew. The sole target of this hate was your father. You at times thought about hiring a villain to assassinate him.

But that could only do harm, especially if the villain lost. Then you'd be in trouble with the law and any hope of meeting up with your family would be lost.

So when you were around 21 years old and had your own place, you sought out your siblings. Arranging a meeting with Natsuo was easier than you thought. He had moved out some time ago to go to college, being the second youngest. Toya had died at some point, apparent suicide.

Fuyumi was also easy to get a hold of, since she was the eldest of your siblings. It turned out your 'condition' wasn't exactly unheard of in the world..so luckily for you as time had passed there came more acceptance and even accommodations.

You had a smartphone that was just your size even! You scheduled a meet-up at a local diner. It had been years since you had last seen any of them...
15521333221.title: A Very Small Sibling

155213332211.content:
You sat on the diner chair at the window booth, tapping your foot against the table nervously as multiple giants conversed at the tables around you. The literal small plate of bread and butter you ordered as an appetizer was untouched as you were too invested in your thoughts to even eat.

For the first time in years you were going to meet your siblings again, the cold feeling of isolation was too familiar and being able to meet some of your family could give the warmth you desired. The smiles of your brothers and sister....of Toya. They were all you had those years being away, you'd rather remember that then the distraught faces as you watched them leave.

"Yuki?", a masculine voice called out as a shadow was casted over the table. Looking up your eyes widened as the familiar white haired head of Natsuo loomed over, his bulky form casting the shadow. Your brother had a surprised look as he examined you, well you had grown your hair out a little not to mention working on a computer did give you a bit of dark circles.

"Natsuo, hey.", you smiled as you stood up. The two of you silently looked at each other, taking in the differences that happened over the years. Your brother was older and more mature looking. Natsuo soon smiled before wordlessly setting his palm down before you, with no hesitation you walked onto the warm surface.

The white haired boy slowly brought you up and the next thing you knew, Natsuo hugged you to his firm chest. "It's been a while huh?", you nodded as you returned the hug. "Yeah it has..."

Pulling you away, Natsuo grinned. "Sooo, how have you been?", You felt more at ease soon sitting down on the palm. "I've been good, i have a place to myself, got a job designing video games. I heard your a college kid now?"

Natsuo chuckled and rubbed his head. "Heh yeah, i moved out as soon as i could, just cause i couldn't really bear it there.", the boy's tone took a slightly distasteful tone as he looked off.

You felt a tinge of anger as you thought of your torn family. Your father was now the #1 hero and your family was still broken, the reason all this happened was because he wanted a perfect hero child-

"Ah I'm sorry for the wait Natsuo!", a familiar voice called out. You shook your head, slightly disturbed at the negative thoughts that hit you. Looking up you felt positive again as walking up was your older sister, looking more mature as well.

Fuyumi widened her eyes as she saw you standing in the palm of her brother. "Y-yuki.", you smiled and waved. "Hey it's been some time sis."

The eyes of the red and white haired girl seem to water slightly as she smiled. Cupping you with her hands, Fuyumi hugged you to her soft cheek. You chuckled as you couldn't help but tear up a bit as well. "I held onto hope..that we would get to meet you again.", Fuyumi sniffled as she smiled and set you back on the table.

You warmly smiled as you took in both your siblings, maybe the phrase "a new chapter in your life" wasn't a bunch of bull. "Thank you, both of you for accepting my calls first off. And second, thank you for not forgetting me."

Natsuo looked at you seriously. "Yuki we'd never shun just because of what HE said.", Fuyumi looked over with worry at her brother's tone before coughing into her fist.

"Also we aren't alone!", she said trying to bring back the happy mood. It seem to work as Natsuo grinned and nodded. You were confused as both your siblings moved to the side, you however felt shock and...happiness fill you as another shadow was casted over.

Looming over was Shoto! So different then before, his sad childlike face now looked hardened and his scar no longer bandaged. Your little brother despite his chillded face grew a small small as he looked at you.

"Yuki-nii.", Shoto said slightly awkward from all the years he gone without saying that name. You were silent before raising your hand palm out. Shoto blinked before doing the same with his hand.

"Shoto?", you asked quietly sneaking the room after being able to avoid your father and the staff.

Sitting on his futon with his knees to his chest was your brother. You felt your heart sink at the think bandage on his left side, walking up your brother gasped before scooping you up into his small yet giant hands. "Yuki-nii, he did it, she's gone cause of him...and your going away to!"

You nodded slowly looking down before forcing a grin on your face. "D-don't worry! I promise one day I'll come back. When i do we can watch you becomea hero together ok?"

Shoto sniffled before slowly. You and your younger shared a hug, maybe for the last time you sorrowfully thought. Hopping onto the ground held up a palm.

"How about a high five, to being the best hero."", you smiled getting Shoto to smile through his sniffles and lightly press his palm to yours.

Shoto lightly pressed his palm to yours...a little too hard as you were shoved onto the table. The three bigger siblings gasped and just as Shoto began to apologize you let out a chuckled.

"Man you definitely changed after all these years! Well in high fives at least!", you grinned sitting up.

Shoto blinked before smiling again before reaching down to scoop you up. You soon were hugged into the crook of your brothers neck. "Yeah, thank you for not forgetting Yuki-nii."

Next....
155213332211.title: A Sibling Reunion

choices: Todoroki started slipping off his shoes
15521333222.content:
It was the end of another day at U.A, students began to make their way home from their teachings in heroics. Unknownst to the staff and students a...small threat was within the school.

Your name was Fen a seemingly normal person by photo, but your were actually the inch tall villian named Minu. The reputation you had was ironically small as both heroes and villians have little knowledge of you, due to your size hiding was easy.

Getting picked on and literally stepped on by your peers led you to villiany. Lately you were given a job by the League Of Villians, you didn't really care about society or if All Might was defeated so why not join?

BOOM

You cursed as you were blasted back by a large red object crashing down in front of you. Still being durable was good but getting stepped on wasn't fun. You glared up at the freckled giant smiling above as he jogged out to meet his friends shaking up the ground with his stomps.

"Stupid giants, alright the class schedule is probably in the principal's office.", you sighed as you managed to run in just as the towering door closed behind you and blasted you with air.

Shigaraki had given you a mission to find the schedule of the classes to plan an attack. You couldn't fail, your credibility...and life was on the line.

"You understand your mission..right?", Shigaraki said his red eyes blaring down at you from behind his blueish hair.

You tried not to stutter as you sat in the shadow of the hooded giant. "Ye-yep don't worry boss I'll get the schedule no problem!"

Shigaraki's dry lips formed a grin as he suddenly pinned beneath his palm. You yelped as the cold skin weight like a heavy blanket on top of you. The blood seem to cool in your veins as the giant held a thumb above you.

"Good, but if you fail.... then i won't need my quirk to turn you to dust."

You shivered at the recent memory before making your way into the school. The biggest struggle so far wasn't giants but just how far you had to travel!

After 30 minutes you seem to have only traveled a few halls, it didn't help that you had forgot a map and were basically hoping the next door would be the office.

You stopped to take a breath, standing now before a door that could tower over normal sized people labeled 1-A. A sort of melancholy filled you, a future of you being Fen the hero not Fen the villian.

Just as you were a out to resume your trek, fear hit you as the gigantic door slid open. Looking up your eyes widened as from a pair of large white shoes was a tall boy with half red and white hair. A cold face not currently looking at you, now all you had to do was sneak away...

Todoroki blinked as something out of the corner of his eye caught his attention. Down near the toe of his shoe was a small speck. The boy narrowed his eyes and wiggled his toes in his stuffy show, feeling sweat squelch as his soles pushed against the insole.

You paled as you looked up, seeing Todoroki now looking at you. Soon the dark undersole of the white shoe ascended into the sky as the giant lifted up his leg. Running away didn't do anything as Todoroki stomped down and crushed you to the floor. You yelped as the heavy weight was put on you along with the dirty shoe sole, intense pressure came over as Todoroki began to swivel his foot over you.

Todoroki raised an eyebrow as the "bug" he stepped on wasn't crunching with his foot grinds. Lifting up his foot, the giant widened his eyes as upon looking closer he saw the "bug" was in fact a tiny person!

You let out a breath as the crushing pressure was relieved. Looking back up you gulped as Todoroki reached down, you soon found yourself enveloped in a warm sweaty palm before being brought to the cold eyes.

"So i was right, you aren't a bug.", Todoroki calmly said not shocked at stomping a tiny human.

You glared at the giant as you struggled in the fist holding everything except your head. "Erggh let me go you damn hero!", dread however filled you as you thought over your words.

The mismatched eyes of Todoroki narrowed as he clenched his fist tighter, getting you to wheeze. "Just as i thought, a villian. Your so incompetent that even at this size your caught. Before i give you to the authorities I'll show you how pathetic you villians really are."

You shook in fear as....

choices: You spent the rest of the day in Monoma's pit
1552133333312.content:
In was another day in the school of future heroes known as U.A highschool. Class 1-A was chatting amongst themselves as finishing the lesson early had given them free time, as well as naptime for Aizawa.

Among them was a student who wasn't always noticed. That student was you Fukase, unlike others with a transferable quirk or super speed your quirk was being a inch tall. You had gained a spot in class due to your high grades, though this was for a week to see if you could make it in the class.

Of course being tiny had it's issues, you lost count of how many times you ended up under the large white sole of a certain greenete's shoe (though his sincere apologies made it hard to be mad). Luckily high invulnerability was part of the quirk meaning you could be squished and not end up like a bug.

"Kase-kun you ready for lunch?", the voice of your temporary classmate boomed as he leaned over with a warm smile. He was one of the many classmates you got along with and helped you get places with your size.

Grinning you shook your head. "No you can go on ahead, i need to look over the notes for today!", Izuku frowned a little before smiling. "Ok but make sure to eat before the class starts!"

You smiled as the freckled boy rushed over to his friends and left the classroom. Stretching out your arms, you began to flip through your tiny accommodated notebook.

It was more then 15 minutes you spent reviewing the notes, wanting to remember everything taught. You soon were brought out of your concentration as the desk lightly thudded shaking you. Looking up, Aizawa tapped the desk with his finger.

"You better hurry if you want to eat kid.", the teacher said in his gruff voice. You nodded, putting your things away before being plucked up. Confusion hit you as instead of carrying you out, Aizawa set you next to his large boot. "Wait aren't you going to bring me there?"

Aizawa grew his infamous grin as he began walking towards the door shaking you up with his steps. "You didn't think i was gonna be your cab right. If your going to be a hero you'll need to get places on your own. Now, better hurry up before lunch ends!"

You blinked in shock, you sighed as you realized he was right. Being unnoticable and indestructible wasn't going to get you anywhere if you couldn't arrive on time. So the next three minutes were spent just getting to the door and crawling under it. Now came the hallway....

"Oh what's this?", a cocky voice suddenly boomed as the ground shook in the rhythmic style of steps. Before you could look up, you were thrown onto your butt as a giant brown shoe stomped down in front of you. Rubbing your sore rear, you were thrown into the air again as another brown shoe crashed on the other side of you.

Looking up past the towering legs you saw the giant in question was blond giant stretching into the sky. The boy was smirking as his eyes were slightly shadowed by his bangs.

Monoma felt his smirk grow as he saw your speck form between his large feet. Tapping his foot shook you up as his plump sole squelched in his humid shoes. Squatting down so that his firm thighs flexed and his pants hugged his round rear, the blond leaned forward.

"I've heard about you, the bug of the great class 1-A! A lot of people could've been in your place, and all it would take is for them to crush a bug.", Monoma boomed getting you to sweat from the cocky and threatening tone.

The cocky face was soon blocked as Monoma reached down and grabbed you in a warm fist. You yelped as the giant stood up and brought you to his smug face.

"Since i don't have the opportunity to put the Oh so amazing heros beneath me, I'll savor doing it to you!", the warm and loud breath of the blond blasted you as his eyes grew more intense.

Pulling down his tie and unbuttoning the top of his shirt, Monoma licked his lips. "I'll keep you somewhere nice and warm until i can have my fun.", you widened your eyes and struggled against the firm fist as it descended to his now exposed and muscular chest.

You coughed as upon coming within radius a strong sweaty stench hit you. High b.o waves from the smeared sweat on Monoma's body, class 1-B must have been training earlier as sweat dripped from the firm pecs. However you were soon brought to the side of Monoma's body and the b.o scent became more...sour.

Monoma chuckled as he lifted his arm, feeling the heavy and rank air flow freely. You coughed as a stronger and thicker odor hit you, more sour and humid that made your nostrils flare up at the intense waves.

Noticing yput coughs the blond giant hummed. "Oh what's this, i thought the mighty class A could take a little smell. Let's see you endurance for a true hero's stink!"

You paled as you were soon greeted by the greasy and fuming armpit of Monoma. The blond hairs were matted down and sour steam could be seen emitting from the skin. Loosening his fist, Monoma smirked as he slammed you against his pit and began to rub his palm around.

The squishy and warm wall slapped you, unfortunately a drop of the greasy sweat landed in your mouth. You accidentally swallowed the foul liquid and felt bitter from the sour sweat being smeared over you as Monoma squished you around. Darkness soon took over as Monoma removed his hand and lowered his arm, smooshing you in a hot cavern.

Monoma smugly grinned as he adjusted his shirt, feeling the faint speck in his warm and wet pit. He already felt eager to show you how beneath him you were, but best keep you warm for now.

Next...
1552133333312.title: The Bug Of 1-A

choices: Use the mighty class A as his cushion
15521333333121.content:
You didn't care about missing lunch at this point, it seemed like you were in the greasy and rank darkness for hours! The warm and putrid odor of the armpits sour sweat burned your nostrils as you breathed it in, it feeling thicker then normal oxygen.

Monoma grinded his arm against his side with each step, this unfortunately meant you were now pressed into the squishy rank pit, practically getting absorbed into the sweat glands. Not only were your clothes going to smell like sour sweat for who knows how long, but the bitter liquid actually slipped into your mouth. You couldn't even gag as you'd essentially drink the sweat squelching out.

Monoma smirked as he returned from class, feeling the faint squirming against his pit be squashed with a simple squeeze. He felt at the top of his game, squished into his pit with his hard earned sweat was one of the mighty class 1-A students.

"Hey Monoma?", his classmate Kendo had asked walking by. "Some members of 1-A were asking about a classmate of theirs, Fukase a tiny guy. Have you seen him at all , he wasn't at their class?", the orange haired girl said rubbing her head in worry.

The blond hummed as he crossed his arms, putting pressure on the student in question. "Hm no i don't think i have, hopefully they do soon~", he said seemingly friendly, though he fought the urge to make a smug remark about you not wanting to get wacked by his classmate.

Kendo sighed. "I see, maybe they'll hopefully find him soon.", the class soon grew more quiet as everyone went to their seats to begin the lesson.

Monoma grinned as he looked down at his armpit, feeling a tiny speck admist his greasy and putrid skin. "Sorry insect, but i want to to show you the true crushing power of 1-B. So you'll be spending more time with me, your new giant....friend.", Monoma deviously thought.

The day soon continued on, luckily there weren't any other physical lessons to further heat up the pit. Still, Monoma found ways to make the pit squishing worse. While passing Todoroki in the hall, he gave a patt on his shoulder telling him good luck in finding you.

Todoroki accepted it, albeit confused about the sudden nice gesture. Unaware Monoma tapped his neck, particularly on the left side.

The blond then activated the fire side of the quirk he copied, though not enough to make flames but to heat up his body. This caused the already warm pit to heat up as sweat began to pour out of the glands, drenching you in the putrid rank stench.

Monoma cockily grinned as he felt the drops dripping from his pit. "I hope you don't drown, it be such an embarrassing defeat for 1-A to be matched by someone's sweat! Take it in, this is where you belong and i won't just use my armpits to show it.", a shadow fell over Monoma's eyes as he smirked toothily.

Walking back to his dorm, Monoma eagerly swayed his arms to squeeze you as he thought of the other ways he could humiliate you. Arriving in his room, the blond hummed as he threw off his jacket, smirking as the sides of his button up were soaked in sour stench and liquid.

Slipping off his shirt to show his muscular torso, Monoma decided to...

15523221.content:
Your name was Rin a new hero who recently joined the scene. Having graduated from U.A you were ready to take on the world and fight villains.

Or so you thought...

Being a new hero you admitted the excitement went to your head as you believed you could beat any foe. Your quirk allowed you to heat up parts if your body, to the point where you could produce fire from your skin and delivery devastating attacks.

It had been a quiet night, you were patrolling as you wanted to use as many hours as possible, just to get the full hero experience. Hearing communication coming from a alley, you rushed over suspicious of the late night chatters.

In the alleyway three punk looking men were chatting. One with a mohawk raised his eyebrow. "Why the hell are we scouting when we could be breaking skulls?"

A man with pointed ears and tanned skin tched. "The boss wants a hero, for whatever reason i don't know."

"What are you three doing?", Rin said dramatically pointing at them. The group looked confused at the bombastic hero. "The hell?"

Rin smirked as he flicked his nose. "It ends here villians!", erupting his fist in fire, Rin charged forward with a battle cry. The trio didn't move or look intimidated, the mohawk glance at the third member a purplenette.

The purple haird villian held out his hand, producing a flash. Rin yelped as he covered his eyes and fell onto his back. The hero suddenly felt faint as his vision blurred, he could vaguely see the trio standing over, looking like giants from this ankle.

The tan man smirked. "Huh whatta you know our hero came right to us!"

Rin groaned as he sunk into unconsciousness.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Waking up Rin immediately felt distraught as the concrete ground he had passed out on was now that of wood. There wasn't a breeze of cool air and the atmosphere felt like that of an inside one.

"Oh finally up hero?", a voice boomed down from above, it was raspy and had a mocking tone. Booming loud enough to seem as if it came from hundreds of feet above. You thought maybe it was a intercom, perhaps you were taken to a warehouse.

Suddenly a large object crashed down in front of you, a large force of impact sent you flying back a few feet. The object in front of you appeared to be a red...shoe.

Looking up, you felt dread fill you as from a long pair of black cloaked legs leading up to a literal giant sitting on a bar stool. From the top through shaggy blue tint hair was a pair of red eyes looking down at you with disgust.

"Right where you belong, the hero scum is just dirt to get trampled! Consider yourself lucky you'll be the first bug i crush.", the red eyed giant sneered as he eerily grinned, resisting the urge to raise his foot and squash you.

You shook as you felt fear, true fear. Before you wasn't just a giant but you recognized the look of this titan. Recently there had been a attack at U.A, luckily no one pershished. But they tell the other heroes to be on the look out for a villain that resembled this giant.

Shigaraki narrowed his eyes as he suddenly bend down and reached for Rin. Using his thumb and finger, the giant plucked up the speck grinning widly as the hero squirmed. "Oh can't talk, that's no issue I'll have you squeal when your duty as my toy begins!"

You were in fear and dread as you were held before the face of the league of villian's leader Shigaraki Tomura.

"Now then my toy, let's....

155331.title: Codename: Kids Next door!

choices: Suddenly, a younger girl with pigtails comes in.
1553311.content:
"Ow...my poor head." A young brown haired girl named Jacqueline cutely groaned as she looked around and saw that she is in…a very cute bedroom filled that's full with adorable toys! But as she looked around, and the girl quickly noticed that everything that is…gigantic. And then she noticed a bunch of shoes that belong to a girl her age. They were awfully cute, and the owner has a very good taste.

But the thing that really amazed her is the size of them. Not the oblivious "Wow I'm so tiny" way, but in a "Do these actually belong to human?" Linda of way. Even if she is normal size, they would still be pretty darn gigantic. But strangely enough, they are strangely alluring to her. And the one closest to her was a yellowish green flipflop with pink straps that has a colorful red rose in the middle.

Suddenly a big shadow is looming over her. With unease filling her belly, the girl slowly turned around and saw a gigantic Japanese girl around her age. Her hazelnut orbs that beamed with such friendliness and gentle curiosity that it made the girl's tension just fades away. And her big smile is just warm sunshine in physical form. She wearing a baggy green colored long sleeves which covered her hands entirely. And she is wearing some rather snug looking black leggings. And finally, her long and high arched bare feet…are pretty much proving your assumption is very correct. But weirdly enough, the sight of the girl and her feet made your cheeks rather warm.

"Heya I'm Kuki Sanban! What's your name!" The named girl happily greeted her guest. While being totally uncaring to said girl's size.

"My..name is Jacqueline Marsden.Nice to..meet you Kuki." Jacqueline meekly replied to the girl. The tone of her voice is a clear indication that she is a little perturbed by the girl's sheer friendliness and warmth.

"Nice to meet you! Want to play some games?" Kuki happily questioned you with an eager bubbliness just dripping in her voice. Jacqueline just nodded in total surprise.

Kuki squealed in delight and turned her back to her new friend. She's going to find the best game for them to play with!

Jacqueline on the hand turned her attention towards the sandal. A rather bizarre curiosity compelled her to get closer to it. Once she just got close, she inspected. The sight of the massive and deep imprint is simply jaw-dropping. It truly showed the scale of Kuki's feet. And it's dark color is making her cheeks is even warmer.

As the girl brought her face close to the shoe. She was blindsided by the stale but surely still strong aroma of sour cheese, stale corn chips, and very faded fruits.

"Um...Jacqueline..what are you doing?' Kuki questioned with confusion on her face. The embarrassed girl quickly removed her face from the shoe. Then worry and shame came on her Kuki's face as she comes up with a possible answer. "Do my shoes smell that bad?"

Due to the hyperactive and fun-filled lifestyle of a KND operative. You tend to be very smelly in certian places. A lot of her fellow operatives use this "places" to gross each other or more importantly use them as a weapon against adults and such.

But she is not one of those kids.

"Oh-oh, it's not that. They just so...big like your feet!"The girl halfway lied to the bigger girl with shakily smile.

Kuki's eyebrow twitched at the "big feet" remark. She bit back the urge to insult her guest about her own feet which are way too little.

"But they're also..very cute too!"The girl quickly added with genuine honest. The comment made Kuki produce a big blush, and strange quivering expression.

The comment made Kuki feel weird. But in a good but fuzzy way.Suddenly her smile came back stronger than ever! She got a most wonderful idea for a game. She sat down on the floor and crossed her feet in Jacqueline's direction. Her long toes and their amateurishly rainbow-colored nails pointed directly at her.

"Since you think they are cute. Then let's play a game with my feet!"Kuki playfully exclaimed to her new friend. The girl kinda eagerly nodded, and slowly walk to them. She really wants too see them up close and personal right now.

But what happens next?

155332113.title: Other options!

choices: They Get a Look at their New Colossal Captain! (Unaware)
1553321131.content:
The Going Merry was anchored on the Grand Line one evening. Things were going quite well for the crew, they'd just arrived on the Grand Line around a week ago and Nami had her Log Pose so she could navigate these waters.

Zoro was napping on the floor, Usopp was tinkering with some gadgets for his slingshot and Sanji was cooking up some food.

Luffy sat in his usual spot on the goat figurehead of the ship, looking out at the horizon and enjoying the wind on his face. "SANJII! I'M HUNGRYYY!" The Straw Hat captain bellowed.

"You just ate!" Sanji shot back from the kitchen. "I did?" Luffy questioned curiously. "You're just going to have to wait until supper is ready!" Sanji snapped as he stomped back into the kitchen.

Luffy whined and sat there pouting...until clouds covered the sun and cut off the sunshine beaming down. "Awww! Is it gonna rain?" Luffy grumbled.

"Relax, it's just a passing cloud...doesn't even look like a storm." Nami sighed.

Almost as soon as those words left the navigator's mouth, a strange mist seemed to envelop the Going Merry. "Uhh, what's going on?" Usopp questioned. "Come on, this is creepy!"

Zoro was snoozing away as the strange mist covered the ship like a fog. It slipped into the kitchen where Sanji was stirring the pot of stew. Everyone seemed to feel strange..except for the happy go lucky captain.

"Hey guys! This is weiiird!" Luffy cheerfully exclaimed as he turned around...only to notice that the three crew members who were out on deck just seconds ago had vanished.

"Huh?" Luffy leaped down onto the ship, causing an enormous earthquake for his unnoticed and confused crewmates.

Sanji was in the kitchen, standing on the counter at a miniature size.

Nami was standing out on deck alongside Usopp and the still snoring Zoro. They were confused until they were knocked off their feet by the booming voice and subsequent earthquake.
1553321131.title: The Shrinking Mist

15533211311.content:
Zoro rubbed his head as he got up. He was about to complain when he noticed the area seem different. This was proven when he gawked as the wooden floor now seem to go on for miles. In the distance he could make out two familiar figures that looked like Usopp and Nami, they both were looking forward and up with shock. The look soon fell on his face as well.

About a mile away to them was a towering mountain with the red and blue clothes of thier captain and his straw hat head at the top turning in every direction.

"Hm Guys! Where'd you go!?", Luffy called out in a booming voice that was amplified of his usual voice.

"Oi down here!", Zoro called as he began dashing up to their now giant captain. Getting closer, Zoro saw Luffy's face in the sky looking around quickly.

"Zoro wait!", Nami called out panicked.

"Huh, What's...", Zoro froze as he saw the reason for the navigatior's cry.

Looking up, Luffy's face was no longer visible. Instead filling Zoro's sky was the sole of Luffy's sandal, coming down at a fast speed. Despite the impending stomp, Zora took notice of the dirt in the treads and even what looked like pieces of crushed bugs.

The swordsman finally took action and jumped to the side just as Luffy stomped the ground. He stayed laying down as the foot rose and passed over him and with booming steps, now Zoro was right between the captain's giant feet.

Zoro brought a hand to his face as a strong odor reached his nose. On a ship where the sun shines, people was bound to sweat. But Luffy took the cake for the most produced sweat. And the cheesy musk was surrounding Zoro as he was between the stompers of his now giant captain.

"Oi Luffy down here!", Zoro tried yelling up despite the smell making him cough.

Soon...
15533211311.title: A Tiny Crew And Thier Captain

choices: Stick with Zoro as he Suffers..Unnoticed.
155332113112.content:
Luffy crossed his sleeveless arms and made a pouty face. "Oh I know! We're playing hide and seek!" The goofball Straw Hat captain grinned that enormous grin of his and giggled.

Zoro meanwhile was doing something he certainly wasn't having 'fun' with. "Get moving! You're the most athletic out of the three of us!"

"You can't be serious!" Zoro had exclaimed.

"Get climbing!" Nami roared, Usopp was curled up into a ball and rocking back and forth: "We shrunk...we shrunk...this has to be a dream..."

So now Roronoa Zoro was climbing on the mushy and extremely rotten cheese smelling toes of his captain. "Goddamn it, Luffy....I'm gonna MAKE you bathe every day once we get out of this!" Zoro groaned.

His face had turned green from the constant exposure to a raunchy pirate's foot odor...he had to swallow his vomit a few times as he finally stood atop the big toe.

Standing up straight, pushing back the rising bile in his throat he hollered out: "LUFFY!!! DOWN HEERE!!!"

However at that moment Luffy took a step forward to begin looking for his 'hiding' crew. This caused Zoro to lose his balance as the foot went into the air to take a step.

"W-whoa-wAAAaaAH!" Zoro wailed as he fell off the side of the big toe..and ended up down on the strap of Luffy's sandal.

He didn't have time to react...before Luffy's toe space had smushed into him and pinned him against the strap...and the hell that was Luffy's toe gap.
155332113112.title: Climbing a Pirate Captain

choices: Continued to look for his crewmates
1553321131122.content:
Despite the titanic flight and fall of the straw hats swordsman, Luffy continued scanning the deck with his signature toothy grin.

"HAHA! You guys are really good at hiding!", Luffy strolled forward and put Zoro in hell with his slimy toe gap.

Every step made Luffy's foot slide forward and press his toes against his sandals strap. Zoro's yells became muffled as his back was pressed against the strap and the toe gap came forward at full speed and squashed him into the warm and moist flesh. The bile in the swordsman's throat rose again as the cheddar aroma was stuffed into his nostrils and the moldeness attacked his taste buds.

The gap's sweaty flesh engulfed Zoro as Luffy wiggled his toes and sent whiffs of odor out. The captain was still oblivious to the musky torment he delivered to his green haired crewmate. The strap was stretching from how much Luffy was pushing against it and stuffing Zoro in a pillow of gunk and cheese.

Meanwhile, Nami felt dread as the titan Luffy neared them and shook the ground with his stomps and spread his smelly aura. Seeing Usopp still panicking over the situation the navigator tried urging him to go.

"Usopp we need to move!", all Nami got was more rocking and mumbling. Fed up the orange haired girl bonked the long nose man's head.

"I KNOW WE SHRUNK! And that why we have to move!", Nami roared getting Usopp out of his panicked trance.

Just in time as Luffy had turned thier direction and started to stomp over. The two crew members began running away from the sandals of doom.

Luffy....
1553321131122.title: Sandals Of Doom

choices: Luffy Belches and Blows Sanji Away!
15533211311221.content:
Nami and Usopp ran as the giant sandals stomped dangerously close behind them. The sky darkened as the sandal passed overhead. "WAAAAH! WE'RE GONNA BE CRUSHED!" Usopp wailed in complete panic. Nami at this point was shrieking and almost out of breath.

Thankfully it seemed luck was on their side as the sandaled foot slammed down in front of them to finish its step. Luffy's booming voice caused them to clamp their hands over their ears. "NAMIIII! USOPP!!! ZOOOOROOO!!"

Zoro meanwhile was suffering unhholy amounts of toe gunk and rotten cheese stench. "Ugh...when I get back to normal he's soo deaaad!" Zoro thought as vomit filled his mouth to once again be swallowed.

Luffy's stomach soon rumbled, and the air headed boy soon ventured to the kitchen. "If he's too busy hidiiing...he can't yell at me for stealing some meat!" Luffy giggled as he entered Sanji's culinary area. Sanji was standing on the counter when he saw his gargantuan captain enter.

"LUFFY!!! OVER HEEERE!" Sanji screamed. Luffy seemed to look directly at Sanji and wander over, a blank expression on his face.

"Luffy! Yeah! It's m-" Sanji started toe exclaim, only for Luffy to grab the sides of the pot of stew and begin guzzling it down like water.

A tic mark appeared on Sanji's head as Luffy's belly began to swell like a balloon.
15533211311221.title: A Break from Hide and Seek

choices: On a discarded piece of food
155332113112212.content:
"LUFFY I-!", Sanji was about to blow a fuse when the captain suddenly slammed down the empty pot and opened his mouth.

A deep and powerful belch released from Luffy's wide mouth as he held his stomach. Sanji yelled out in surprise as the hot breath launched him back into the wall. The chief luckily landed on his feet against the wall and hopped back onto the counter as the blast of belch died down.

Luffy grinned and patted his stomach with both hands. "That tasted really good! Mhh but I'm still hungry!"

The captain began fishing through all the food storage and eating anything he could find. Sitting on the floor, Luffy closed his eyes and happily ate the food while letting out occasional burps.

Sanji gritted his teeth, he almost completely forgotten being shrunk as he saw thier supply of food being inhaled by thier straw hat captain.

"LUFFY WE"RE NOT GOING TO HAVE ANYTHING TO EAT!", Sanji held a surge of energy as he started sprinting towards the edge of the counter.

Blond chief's launched himself from the counter, aiming a kick at Luffy. Only for him to end up......
155332113112212.title: A Captain's Feast

choices: Luffy Finds Usopp and Nami! But no Zoro...
Luffy feels something in his toes!
1553321131122123.content:
Luffy blinked as he heard a squeaky voice and suddenly felt some kind of bug land on his nose! Going crosseyed to peer at it, he gained a confused look and let out a rumbling: "Huh?" The Straw Hat captain lifted his hand and pinched the bug between two soft fingers.

Sanji squirmed and wiggled around, yelling at his gluttonous captain in his squeaky voice. "Weird...this bug looks like Sanji!" Luffy's voice boomed as he peered closely at the 'bug'.

"I'm not a bug you dolt!!" Sanji screamed angrily, causing Luffy's eyes two widen. "Sanji?! Why are you so small?" The Captain was dumbstruck at first..then gained a wide grin: "I must be HUMONGOUS to you! Is that why everyone disappeared?"

"I guess so, poor Nami must be terrified right now!" Sanji wailed.

Meanwhile down between Luffy's plump toes, Zoro was being baked in the hot cheesy atmosphere of the goofball captain's toe crevice.

Zoro was weary of being squeezed and drenched by the grimy pirate boy's sweaty and rancid toes. He'd give anything to get out of this.

He felt his prison rattle once more as he felt himself squeezed into the jam filled cavern of Luffy's toe gap. Luffy got up and walked out on deck to find his presumably shrunken crew.
1553321131122123.title: Discovery and Laughter

15533211311221232.content:
Luffy had thrown Sanji onto his shoulder and began stomping out onto the deck when a sudden itch in his big toe gap occurred. The captain wiggled his appendages in a attempt scratch the itch but only got strange....squirming in return.

Plopping onto the deck, Sanji yelped as he grabbed the vest to avoid flying off. Luffy reached down to the source of the itch and pried off his sandal with a audible peeling sound. Bringing the sweaty sandal to his face, Luffy observed to see if he could find anything that would disrupt his feet.

Sanji covered his face as the salty sweat drenching the footwear emitted a strong scent that stung his nostrils and eyes. Luffy didn't seem bothered and was about to slip the sandal back on when the itch occurred again. Reaching into his toe gunk, Luffy pulled out a soft and squirming creature but bringing it to his eyes the captain saw a familiar face.

"Zoro!"

The swordsman's panted as fresh air was finally available. Looking at Luffy's giant face he was about to give a piece of his mind.

Luffy suddenly closed his eyes and let out a loud laugh, blasting Zoro with a storm's winds.

"HAHA You were in my toes all this time Zoro!", Luffy toothily grinned as found the idea of Zoro being stuffed in his chessy toes hilarious. "You smell just like my feet!"

Luffy threw Zoro on his shoulder next to Sanji, who scooted over as the chessy odor of thier giant captain came off him in waves.

Standing up, Luffy began stomping around the deck again trying to find the remaining small crew.

Soon...
15533211311221232.title: Zoro The Itch

choices: Luffy Decides to Have some 'Fun' With Them!
The Crew Tries to Talk Sense into Luffy!
155332113112212321.content:
"Do you know where Usopp and Nami are, Zoro? Are they in my toes too?" Luffy asked with a giggle. "No! They were somewhere on the floor....I just hope they're alright." Zoro answered gruffly.

"I hope whatever did this to us is reversible..." Sanji groaned. "I dunno...being a giant to you guys is kinda cool!" Luffy's joyful tone rumbled.

"WHAT?!" Sanji and Zoro squeaked angrily. "Aww, c'mon guys! We can have so much fun! I wonder if there's a way I can get bigger and be like..a GIANT pirate!" Luffy's imagination was running wild..this was bad.

A sudden squeaking from down at Luffy's sandaled feet gained the giant goof's attention. Squatting down he grinned widely, "Found you! This was a reaally cool hide and seek!" Luffy boomed, causing Nami and Usopp to cover their ears.

"IDIOT! We didn't do this for some hide and seek shit!" Nami yelled...or rather...squeaked.

Soon after, Luffy was sitting in the kitchen and gorging himself on food...not like Sanji could stop him after all. "So whaddya guys think of your new GIANT captain? Hihihihee..." Luffy giggled.

The tiny crew was all gathered on a table next to the mountain of food Luffy was devouring.
155332113112212321.title: Luffy finds Nami and Usopp

1553321131122123211.content:
After gulping down the large mouthful of food, Luffy loud out a large belch that seem to vibrate the air. The straw hat crew were knocked down from the powerful loud boom.

Luffy found this funny as he smiled a toothy grin had loudly laughed. "HAHA! Being BIG is a lot of fun, my burp knocked you guys down!"

Zoro rubbed his head as he clenched his teeth at the loud booms. "Oi, knock it off would you!"

Luffy's grin didn't falter as he closed his eyes and scooped up everyone in his palms. He brought them up up to his toothy face as he grew a gleam in his eyes.

"Ne Min'na, let's play a game!", Luffy excitingly boomed blasting everyone with a large gust of air.

The shrunken crew had their hair blown stick up when the strong wind settled.

"Why would we play a game if we're stuck like this!", Nami yelled clenching her fist.

Luffy laughed creating booms that had the crew covering their ears. The captain suddenly squatted down and placed his crew on the ground.

The shrunken pirates looked up in a mixture of fear and confusion as Luffy stood up to his looming height. The captain laughed as he put his hands on his hips.

Luffy wiggled his toes getting the chessy scent to spread. The crew had groaned from the strong odor but were brought out of it as Luffy laughed again.

"You guys try to outrun me ok?", the straw hat excitedly explained.

The straw hat crew all widened their eyes as Luffy suddenly lifted up his foot, blocking his toothy grin with the sole of his sandal.

Everyone began sprinting just as the foot stomped the ground. Luffy laughed before lifting his other foot.

"What kind of game is this?!", everyone ran fast, panic in their viens from the huge sandals stomping.

Soon...
1553321131122123211.title: Luffy's 'Fun'

choices: The Jam-Storm Continues as Luffy Wiggles More!
15533211311221232112.content:
Luffy made a pouty face, "Hmm, this is fun and all...but I wanna stomp around BAREFOOT! Shishishishi!" Luffy gave his trademark snicker and stretched his rubbery arm down to his right sandal.

The crew's eyes widened in horror, being stomped under their captain's sandal was one thing...but actually being pinned under a gigantic, smushy, and clearly VERY,VERY cheesy sole would be a nightmare!

"W-wait, Luffy!" Usopp yelled out, not that Luffy was listening as he began peeling those glued on sandals off.

Nami cringed and clutched her hands over her mouth, feeling rather sick. The sound was like a sticker being peeled away, and when the sandal came off with a POP...Luffy gave a rumbling sigh.

"Ahhh...nice to set these GIANT feet free!" Luffy cackled and caused them to cover their ears. As the giant sole filled their sky, the pudgy toes wiggled and flexed...Zoro cried out: "LOOK OUT!"

Gigantic chunks of toe grime and jam the size of boulders had begun to plummet down to them.

"Oh gawwwd! How long's it been since he's had a BATH!?" Nami roared in a disgusted rage.

"By my count, it's been two weeks!" Sanji yelled as he attempted to kick away a boulder of gunk...only for it to seemingly swallow up his leg!

"What the hell?!" Sanji yelled in a panic, it absorbed the blow and stuck to the limb like some kind of nasty sponge!

"MMFMFMGH!" Usopp's muffled screams came from a big ball of toe jam that had landed on the poor professional liar.

"HYYYAH!" Zoro chopped a falling jam chunk in half, causing it to slice in two...but now his sword was coated in it..and both halves splattered him with grime as they smacked the ground.

"BWAHAHAHAHAHA! You little guys are having a toe-jam avalanche!" Their gigantic captain's voice boomed in amusement.
15533211311221232112.title: Bare Foot Rubberboy

155332113112212321121.content:
"Shishi, HERE COMES THE BIG BOULDER!", Luffy grinned as he started stomping his foot down again.

Sanji quickly limped away with his unstuck leg, Usopp meanwhile was pinned to the floor by the gunky jam struggling to escape the odorous jam. The ground darkening brought danger as the Luffy's large cheddary sole stomped the ground and launched the crew away.

Zoro groaned as he tried shaking off the chunks of jam that landed on him. "Luffy WHAT THE HELL!" The swordsman attempted to slice the gunk off of Sanji, finding the blade had actually been dulled by the gunk smearing it.

Luffy grinned toothily at all his tiny friends below. "HAHA you guys are really fast! Hmmm maybe shrinking made you faster!"

Nami was about to burst at the giant captain when she noticed that only Sanji and Zoro were before the large chessy toes with her.

"Wait...USOPP!"

Indeed the Straw Hat's sniper wasn't able to escape as the avalanche had pinned him to the deck. Usopp was now expressing the heavy weight of Luffy standing on him, the plump sole acting like a heavy blanket.

There was some fortune as Luffy's feet were more soft unlike a normal foot. The sole squished the gunk off of Usoop while molding the plump sole around him. This was evident as Luffy lifted his giant foot and the tiny was stuff breathing in the cheddary stench.

"AH I'M STUCK, MPF THIS IS WORST THEN SMELLY LUFFY'S FEET ON A NORMAL DAY!", the afro pirate struggled to escape as the gunk and sweat acted as glue to keep him stuck to the sole.

"I CAUGHT USOOP! HAHA now I just gotta get the rest of you guys!", Luffy cheerfully boomed as he got ready to stomp again after his fleeing crew as they saw their crewmate stuck to the sky filling sole.
155332113112212321121.title: Luffy Continues the Stomping Game!

choices: Ticklish Huh? That Gives Nami an Idea...
Luffy Goes after Nami and Sanji at Last!
1553321131122123211211.content:
"WAAAAAH! GET ME OFF'A HEEEERE!!" Usopp comically yelled as the sole was lowering more and more. "Alright that does it!" Zoro growled as he got his three swords ready.

Luffy saw his buggy moss haired friend getting ready to fight. "Ooooh! You wanna fight me?! This ought'a be even more fun than our spars before!!"

"We'll see how 'fun' it is for you when I slice your foot off!" Zoro leaped into the air towards the stinky sole above.

"Wait! Wait! You're gonna cut me!!!" Usopp shrieked in a panic.

"YAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!" Zoro let out a battle cry as he slashed at the sole. Usopp had his eyes squeezed shut, anticipating being sliced to bits.

To Zoro's surprise, his swords seemed to have absolutely no effect! "Wh-what the hell?!"

"Shishishi! That felt pretty good! Like you're scratching an itch I had or somethin'!" Luffy boomed before the sole impacted Zoro's face and pinned him underneath mounds of flesh alongside Usopp.

"Great..moss-head tried to play the hero!!" Sanji snapped as he was still trying to unstick his leg from the glob of jam.

"That's two down! Two to go!" Luffy giggled, propping his foot up on its heel to show off his two friends. Zoro was unfortunately face first in the cheddary sole..and his muffled screams of disgust were tickling Luffy.
1553321131122123211211.title: A Fun Time...For Luffy

15533211311221232112111.content:
Luffy grinned widely as he laughed, the feeling of his tiny crewmate squished into his sole wasn't just fun but it tickled his plump chessy sole. "Shishi hey that tickles!"

Now while this would be a good to flee from Luffy's playful rampage, seeing the giant captain's pause as he released his booming laughs seem to give the Straw Hat's navigatior an idea. In his laughter, Luffy was flexing the massive sweaty sole and with some reinforced shaking the squished crewmates may be freed.

Nami cringed as tickling the giant Luffy would require getting close and touching the overwhelmingly smelly foot. Yelling up the plan to Zoro and Usopp would definitely get Luffy's attention.

Finally Sanji managed to free his leg from the gunk ball, staining his suit leg with the smeared funk. Nami let out a breath narrowing her eyes as the fumes of the foot hit them.

"We need to tickle him.", Nami spoke seriously.

"HUH?!", Sanji asked springing up. "Nami-san we need to get away, the smell too much!"

A tick mark grew on the navigatior's head."I KNOW IT STINKS! We need to get Zoro and Usopp out, if we can beat this game then we won't have to deal with getting stepped on."

The chef cringed as he looked from the gunk staining his leg to the large looming sole. Luffy was still giggling as Zoro and Usopp frantically squirmed against the molds created in the plump sole.

The two remaining crewmates soon made their way over to the heel probbing up the foot. The air around Luffy's foot was heavy with the potent chesse of his warm foot, being so close increased the bitterness in the chesse by 3X the original.

Nami and Sanji began to rub at the rough and dirty heel, the sweat and smell seem to squelch out with the pressure being added. Luffy began to laugh more as he wiggled his toes a stretched his sole.

Soon....
15533211311221232112111.title: A Ticklish Plan

15533213.title: More Options

155332132.content: Who will be our giant team?
155332132.title: Multiple Giants At Once

choices: Sanji stomps through the city to get his captain back.
1553321322.content:
In the Grand Line, on an unknown island, two pirates from the Straw Hat Pirates had been separated from the rest of their crew.

"Ugh... what the hell happened?" Sanji grunted and sat up.

The blonde cook rubbed his head and looked around, not seeing anyone else in sight. Sanji stood up, his feet were bare and his suit was ripped up, he sighed and tore the ruined suit off, tossing it aside.

"That storm must've been worse than I remember... hope the others are okay." Sanji mumble and reached into his pocket, to his surprise he still had his cigarettes.

As Sanji lit his cigarette, he heard a scream coming from a forest area in the center of the island, it almost sounded like Luffy. Sanji quickly ran into the forest, following the sounds of screaming... or, upon closer hearing, roaring laughter.

"S-Stop! T-T-That t-tickles!"

"Luffy?" Sanji peeked through the trees to see his captain tied up in the center of a town... however, the town was tiny!

A group of tiny humanoid creatures surrounded Luffy and were poking him with tiny spears, but the rubber boy was only tickled by the small weapons.

"...What the hell?" Sanji was in disbelief, the tiny town's tallest building only came up to his knee.
1553321322.title: Luffy and Sanji

1553323311.content: Decisions decisions...at the end of the day I'm sure Ed'll enjoy it!
1553323311.title: Edward Elric

choices: Nothing Happens Yet..But Ed's Boots Feel a Bit Tight On the Walk Home
155332331111.content:
"I had no idea the famous Fullmetal Alchemist was who they sent after me!" The rogue State Alchemist, Isaac McDougal proclaimed.

"Um...I'm not him..I'm his younger brother Alphonse." Al said with a sweatdrop, despite the fact he was a suit of armor.

"Wait..you mean the little guy-?" Isaac had barely asked the question, when Ed furiously clapped his hands together and caused pillars to erupt from the walls, trapping his target.

"I had no idea the famous Fullmetal Alchemist was such a pipsqueak!" The Freezing Alchemist expressed his disappointment.

"DON'T CALL ME LITTLE!!" Ed roared as he made a new pillar erupt from the ground and send McDougal flying.

However, Isaac the Freezer didn't earn his State Alchemist certification for no reason...he quickly froze the pillar to ice and shattered it.

Alphonse brought up a wall to block an incoming ice spear. Taking water from his canteen, McDougal sent ice spikes hurling towards Edward. "Oh no you don't!" Edward quickly formed a shield with his automail arm.

"Automail..I get it now...you two committed the taboo!!" McDougal taunted. "Fullmetal saw red, rushing McDougal and beginning to pummel him out of rage for his mocking of their suffering.

McDougal gripped Edward's hand, his human arm. "Let's see what secrets it holds...Human Transmutation! I'll succeed where you failed!" McDougal shrieked.

"W-what? WAIT!" Edward tried to warn the villain, but it was too late. The familiar energy sparked around them and the eye and tendrils began to drag McDougal down.

"W-what is this?! What's going on?!" McDougal screamed in pain before vanishing.

"..Idiot...what were you trying to do?" Ed snapped, hating to see anyone...even a foe...go through what they did.

***Truth's Domain***

As McDougal was sent away into the Gate, Truth sighed thoughtfully. "Hmmm...I see an opportunity to liven things up with the little Elric alchemist. I do hope he enjoys this gift I'm about to bestow upon him, call it...Equivalent Exchange." Truth grinned his trademark grin.

..What happens?
155332331111.title: The Rogue Alchemist and the Taboo

choices: Felt the bed creak as he grew
1553323311111.content:
After witnessing the terrible fate to behold McDougal, Ed and Al were in a silent walk back to their hotel for the night. Seeing the familiar black arms drag the Freeze Alchemist do his doomed brought back memories of the night they committed Human Transmutation.

Ed sighed as he put his arms behind his head, trying to clear his head. As he walked the blonde boy failed to notice the noise from his ankle boots getting...louder. Rather Ed crinkled his nose as from underneath his red coat emerged a sour and warm smell.

"Ah man that's right been so busy i haven't gotten the chance to shower. Heh usually Winry would complain about the smell!", Ed chuckled as he remembered all the times his lack of bathing had him getting into squabbles with his friend.

"Brother, are you ok?", Al asked curiously hearing his brother's suddenly giddiness.

"Huh, oh yeah Al just smelling my delayed bathing!", Ed grinned as he took a curious whiff of his b.o emitting from his chest.

Al sighed as he watched his brother not caring about the smell he garnered from not bathing. While he dearly missed being able to smell, he was grateful he couldn't inhale the odor coming off Ed. The two brothers soon arrived at the hotel and made the way to their room.

Ed groaned as he took a seat on the bed, he certainly built up a sweat especially in the foot department. His insoles made splashes each time his plump soles stomped them. He could feel the heat building up from his feet baking in the thick soled boots. Ed raised an eyebrow as his boots felt...tighter, his foot felt more constricted despite his large shoes giving a good amount of space.

Shrugging Ed grinned as he gripped the ankles. "The dogs must be real steamy today! Better give them some air."

However upon pulling on his footwear, Ed grunted as his heel seemed unable to slip out. The alchemist clenched his teeth as he stretched his leg out and yanked fruitlessly to get the boot off.

Al sweatdropped where he sat at a desk, watching Ed struggle to simply pull off his boot. "Ed this wouldn't have happened if you bathed.."

Ed felt a tick mark grow before triumphantly smirking as he finally yanked his boot. "HA! Who needs bathing now?", Ed asked despite the strong cheddary fumes that began to flow off of his sweaty and plump sole.

The younger Elric sighed before resuming his reading. Meanwhile Ed managed to get the boot of his automail foot much easier. However as he hummed and wiggled hid gunky toes Ed rose an eyebrow as he held the boot next to his foot.

His foot in its entirety looked bigger then before, the length was longer and the arch looked higher.

"What the..."

Ed...
1553323311111.title: A Tighter Fit

choices: Ed's Dreams Are Of Being VERY Big...As He Grows In His Sleep!
Edward and Alphonse Chat about His Growth Spurt and Ed's Ego Swells
15533233111112.content:
Holding the boot closer to his fleshy and quite grimy foot, Ed blinked a few times. "My foot is bigger...maybe a few shoe sizes even!" Edward suddenly gained a wide grin. "I'm getting taller, FINALLY!" Ed cheered as he tossed the boot aside. Alphonse turned and looked at his big brother's celebration.

"Really? You know what that means then..." Alphonse said with an ominous air. Ed suddenly stopped cheering and shivered a bit.
"Winry...."

Winry would definitely clobber him for needing adjustments so soon...not to mention she'd give him a few extra whacks for not showering. "Uhh...maybe I'll get a shower tomorrow before we head out." Ed relented as he took off his red coat to leave him in his black jacket.

Visible sweat patches were present on the jacket's underarm area, at least of Ed's human arm. "Wow, I really sweated up a storm." Edward gave himself a quick sniff and cringed.

"Maaaybe you should shower now?" Al tried to reason as Ed hung up his red coat and began to take off his black jacket too. "Nah, it's been a long day." Edward tossed his black jacket to the floor with a splat!

Sighing in relaxation, Edward was now in his black sleeveless undershirt as he flopped back down to the bed.

"I wonder how tall you'll get..." Al wondered aloud. Edward chuckled with a cheeky grin, "I hope I'll be able to call the colonel a shrimp soon!"

What happens now..?
15533233111112.title: A Welcome Discovery

choices: A good spurt of growth happened
155332331111122.content:
Al hummed as he rubbed his metal chin, while Ed's height had always been a source of frustration and outbursts, he certainly was ecstatic. Still it was strange that this growth spurt came out of nowhere.

"Something on your mind Al?", Ed chimed as he swayed his plump and steamy soles back and forth, backing drops flick off or trail down.

"Oh sorry i must have been lost in my thoughts!", Al rubbed his head. "But brother growth spurts aren't just this spontaneous."

Ed hummed as he put his arms behind his head, chuckling as the sour odor from his pits floated to his nose. "Hey it might be random but i don't mind, hehe can't wait to show Winry and Granny. I finally got taller without that vile drink!"

Al tilted his head. "You mean milk?"

Ed's face grew disgust. "Blugh! Yeah see i knew I'd get taller on my own!"

The younger Elric sighed as he began to collect all of the papers of their research. Ed smugly grinned as he daydreamed, him victorious pinning the colonel under his gunky toes while he had comical tears coming out of his eyes.

"Just wait Al, I'll be squishing people in no time.", Ed grinned as he wiggled his cheddary toes and bend his legs in a stepping motion.

Al sweatdropped. "Ed your acting like you'll turn into a giant."

Ed chuckled as he took a sniff of his b.o scented shirt. "Hey who knows i might be bigger then Central!"

As the two brothers conversed neither of them seem to notice Ed's clothes becoming slightly more snug as well as his large sweaty feet starting to get taller.

Soon...
155332331111122.title: Growth In Size And Ego

choices: Edward and Al Try to Figure This Out
Someone Has Complained About the Noise from Their Hotel Room!!
1553323311111221.content:
Edward felt a tingling sensation, almost like he was experiencing an orgasm. Throwing his head back as the waves of pleasure hit him from who knows where, Edward moaned. Alphonse looked up and his eyes widened. "Um..brother..." His elder brother was expanding before his eyes, the bed creaked beneath Edward's growing form.

Ed was oblivious to this as his eyes were closed due to the extreme waves of pleasure he was feeling, his crotch stiffening in response. It was only when the bedframe collapsed beneath him did he yelp and snap out of it. "A-Alphonse?!" Edward yelled out, finally opening his eyes.

He saw the suit of armor that was his brother staring at him in shock. A clank of metal on the floor caught his attention, Edward...could feel a breeze on his left leg...and felt sweat gathered underneath his right arm! Looking down at the appendages, Edward's eyes widened.

His leg had apparently burst forth from within the auto-mail, and his arm had done the same! Ed and Al sat in silence for some time, Ed giving those toes on his rejuvenated and fully meaty foot a nice wiggle. "Brother...your limbs...and...." Alphonse said in awe.

"And I'm...HUGE!" Edward roared out, in his excitement accidentally knocking the bedside lamp to the floor with a shatter of glass.

Al sighed, "How did this happen?"

Edward swung his legs off of the floor, thick, squishy soles hitting the floor with a wet smack as he stood up...and promptly banged the top of his head on the ceiling.
1553323311111221.title: A Sizable Growth Spurt

15533233112.content: Who does Ed shrink intentionally or by accident?
15533233112.title: Ed Shrinks Someone!

155332331121.content:
Edward Elric wondered what went wrong.

One minute he and his brother Alphonse were grinning as the transmutation they drew glowed. They had hope that soon their beloved mother would be alive and well, life would return to their home in resembool.

However, in a dark series of events Ed watched as their attempt at human transmutation failed. Black tendrils grabbed both boys and Ed found himself facing a strange white entity that flashed him a chilling grin before he watched his leg vanish.

Ed was back in his house with his leg now gone. The boy laid on his stomach and looked around trying to find his brother, but he couldn't spot Al anywhere. The young Elric felt his heart sting as he desperately called out for his brother and just as he lost hope a squeaky voice called out.

"E-ed?"

Opening his eyes, Ed gasped as not only did he hear Al's voice but a shocking sight greeted him. Al was standing in front of him, alive and well.

But also only half a inch tall.

"Al?", Ed croaked out.

Alphonse hesitantly nodded, his eyes began tearing up as he sat down. Where his brother sat was a dirt imprint of his shoe now much larger then him.

"I don't know....what happened, mom isn't here. When we did the transmutation I found myself with some glowing guy... he smiled at me and suddenly he was standing over me as big as a mountain. I-I'm scared Ed!"

Al began full on crying as the full scale of the situation came at full force. Instead of thier mother a monstrous corpse was across the room, Ed lost a leg, and Al was now tiny.

Ed gathered his strength and slowly reached forward to scoop up Al into his palm. The older brother gently placed Al against his cheek and gave a smile.

"Don't worry Al, your big brother's gonna take care of you. I'll make sure your safe."

Ed kept that promise to heart. He would protect Al no matter the challenge.

Next...
155332331121.title: A Small Beginning

choices: Ed Teasingly Shows Al Who's Boss for That Remark!
Edward and Al continue to Tease One Another
1553323311212.content:
Alphonse soon got used to being half an inch in size after awhile. His brother took good care of him...but that didn't mean he couldn't use this height difference to get some fun once every so often! Given that Ed had always had a complex about his height, not to mention the fact that Alphonse had always been taller...despite being younger!

Edward still loved his brother and would protect him no matter what, but it became a sort of game between the two that Ed would get full of himself and brag about how big he was. There was also teasing between the two in a friendly way. Edward got his auto mail prosthetic leg and joined the military as a state alchemist.

Alphonse meanwhile trained to adapt his own alchemy and fighting style to his new size. It had been at least two years..and now Edward was fifteen years old.

Currently Edward and Alphonse were on a train and Ed of course was pigging out on food.

Splatters of food chunks were dodged by Alphonse as he sighed. "Brother...manners.." Al groaned. Ed frowned, "Manners snanners! I'm starving!"

Al rolled his eyes and went back to reading some notes on leads on the Philosopher's Stone. They were heading via train to a place that might have leads on the Philosopher's Stone.

"Brother, do you really think the stone could restore my size and your leg?" Al asked hopefully.

"Probably, but I gotta say..I've gotten used to being your GIANT big brother." Ed grinned toothily, chunks of meat stuck in his teeth.

Al groaned, "Maybe the stone can make you taller once we fix ourselves."

Ed's eye twitched.
1553323311212.title: Obligatory Elric Timeskip

15533233112121.content:
“Hey I don’t need that coming from a tiny!”, Ed let out his usual outburst that came with jabs made at his height.

Al couldn’t help but chuckle at his brother’s reaction. “Brother I’m at least small from the accident! Your just short.”

Steam may as well be coming out of Ed’s ears at his small brother’s remarks. He however grew a cocky grin as he wiped the food off his mouth. The blond giant leaned back in his seat, Al was confused as Ed didn’t go on a rant about his side. The tiny however yelped as two loud THUMPS shook the table and knocked Al on his butt.

Groaning, Al looked up to see that Ed had propped up his booted feet. The giant smirked as he swayed both his boots and saw Al sitting between them.

“I bet these guys aren’t short!”, Ed snickered as Al stood up and looked only a little taller then his heel.

The tiny chuckled as he looked up the red soles of the boots. Ed had jokingly waved his organic foot around him, giving him a whiff of that cheesy sweat. The scent was odorous and strong, but it was a feature of Ed that reminded Al of how his brother would protect him.

“Yeah pretty big....not to mention stinky.”, Al chuckled.

Ed grinned toothily. “Hey it’s that Elric cheese! You’d get some to if you followed my bathing schedule.”

Al sweatdropped. “I...think I’m good.”
15533233112121.title: Ed Teasingly Shows Al Who's Boss for That R...

155332331121211.content:
Edward grinned smugly, and adjusted his feet so the automail foot was behind the other.

Ed made a groaning sound and looked at Al.

"I think this BIG foot of mine needs some air..."

Alphonse paled and shook his head. "N-no brother, I was just kidding...no need to go that far."

Ed chuckled, grinning mischievously. "Aww, but it's soo stuffy...and hasn't been unleashed in hours!" Ed made a show of it.

"He makes them sound like a caged wild animal..." Al thought with a shudder.

Ed grunted as he pushed the toe of the boot up against the heel of the other. "Oooh maan, they're GLUED on!" Ed cackled before a moist POP rang out in their train car.

The Fullmetal Alchemist had thankfully rented a private car for this very reason. Playtimes needed privacy after all! Ed sighed long and hard as his steamy foot was released...right in Al's face!
155332331121211.title: A Fun Train Ride

1553323311212111.content:
The younger Elric immediately gagged as a powerful wave of hot odor hit him like a dessert wind. Growing up with Ed, Al grew accustomed to his BIG brother such as his b.o and sweat. The fumes of Ed's chessy sole was one that made anyone gag, especially an inch tall teen.

Ed sighed and grinned as he flexed his plump and chessy sole. "Ahhh that's better, man it needed some fresh air!"

Al coughed as the funky cheese stench filled the area around him. Ed didn't wear a sock as he saw no point in buying any if he only would wear one. The giant brother chuckled as he wiggled his toes feeling the gunk between the plump appendages get ground up.

"B-brother could you put that away?!", Al gagged as he squeezed his nose to keep the musky chesse out.

Ed smirked as he hummed. "Hey my foot needs its air! Not to mention I don't want my LITTLE brother to feel cold hehe."

If the brothers ever did find a philosopher stone then besides regaining his limb and regrowing Al, Ed would also get to have two feet he could stink up!

"Say Al, I did a good amount of walking today. Care to give my tired foot a rub?", Ed grinned crossing his arms

Al coughed but sighed. Ed probably wasn't gonna put his stinky sole away intill he gave it some pampering. Letting go of his nose and cringing as the chessy stench invaded it, Al pressed his palms into the sweaty and plump sole.

Ed hummed as he felt tiny hands starting to message his sole. This hadn't been the first time Al had pampered his fuming foot, the chessy stench was just another part of their brotherly relationship.

Soon...
1553323311212111.title: Ed's Fuming Sole

155332331123.content: Who else ends up tiny for any particular reason?
155332331123.title: Other

1553323311231.content:
(This is a collab chapter between CountDugula and Me)

Winry had been working on some kind of new automail with a special purple crystal she'd bought from a shop in Rush Valley. Ed had been crashing at her place since he'd regained his limbs and proposed to her that day. His arm and leg were human again but at the cost of his alchemy he brought Alphonse back.

So now, Winry was pretty shocked when the crystal started to glow and she was reduced to a mere 2 inches in height! "Oh nooo what the hell!?!" Winry squeaked at her new diminutive height.

A sudden rumbling roar made her jump, turning in the direction of the sound...she saw Ed, his hair out of its traditional braid and his large and visibly sweaty feet propped up on the coffee table...as the boy was asleep on the couch and snoring away which explained the 'roar'.

Winry felt a shiver run through her spine as she saw how big her fiance was, sleeping shirtless with only his black trousers on. His arms were draped over the back and made his toned muscles stretch out.

Winry was now close enough to the funky smelling soles to reach out and touch them...albeit reluctantly at that. "Grr...I HAVE to...even though this is soo gross..." Winry groaned and removed her hand from her face, turning slightly green as the steamy stench blasted her in the face.

Clapping his hands and placing them on the Human Transmutation circle he'd drawn on the ground...Ed soon stood in Truth's Domain..with the eerily grinning being sitting there before him.

"So...you've come for him?" Truth asked.

"Yep, my gate..." Ed thumbed behind him to the engraved gate that he now understood held his alchemy. "I'll trade you it for Alphonse."

Ed heard the voices of all his friends calling out for him and Al, "Heh, who needs alchemy when I've got them?"

Truth's grin returned, "Haha! You've got it! That's the right answer! You're the first one who ever got it correct!"

Ed smiled, "Well...where is he then?"

"Just a moment!" Truth held up a hand.

"What now?!" Ed scowled. "Don't act so grumpy, you've earned a little...reward. Getting the right answer and all...I'll give you a few perks. One of which is that your little brother won't be all skin and bones when he returns."

Ed raised an eyebrow, this was awfully nice of the other worldly being. "AND...you get to keep your alchemy...the third part of your 'reward' will be a surprise once you return. Now...take your bro home!" Truth vanished and Alphonse was seen...while still nude...his hair was neatly cut and he wasn't weak and frail.

"Huh...that was really nice of him...er...it." Alphonse admitted as he approached Edward.

Ed couldn't help but smile as his brother was back to normal at last..."Well...we'll just see what this third surprise he has for us is when we get back." Ed hugged Al.

"Ed...." Happy tears graced Alphonse and Ed's eyes as Ed covered his brother with his black coat.

"Al..." Ed said happily.

The bright light graced the two...and they were soon back at Central.

Colonel Mustang, Riza Hawkeye, Ling Yao and May Chang...along with the entirety of Central HQ felt the earth shake as two colossal forms seemed to land in their midst.
