The smell had a sweet tint and reminded her that Ed was back, leading her to blush as she smiled.

What was next?
1553323313111221112111221112.title: A Tender Rub

choices: Ed and Winry watch the Sunset Together
15533233131112211121112211121.content:
"Hehe, this is pretty ironic." Winry admitted as she continued to massage the giant soles. "Hm? What is?" Ed inquired curiously.

"You always had a complex about your height....now look at you." Winry chuckled as Ed gained a cocky grin.

"For your information it wasn't a COMPLEX...but you're right...now I'm bigger than EVERYONE." Ed bragged causing Winry to giggle.

"Whatever you say, I just think I'll feel even safer than I usually do with you around...since you're bigger and stronger than anyone now." Winry blushed, as did Ed.

"I'm glad I make you feel safe..." Ed admitted shyly as he gave his thick toes a nice flex. Winry smiled sweetly and did something that surprised them both, she planted a nice kiss on Ed's sole.

Edward's eyes widened but he soon gained an intrigued smile, "So THAT'S why you agreed to do it...you like these bad boys don't you?"

Winry blushed and removed her lips from Ed's cheesy sole, "W-what?! I-I....um...." Winry stammered and caused Ed to laugh.

"So now I understand why when we were kids you said you didn't like guys who were shorter than you..." Ed snickered and wiggled his eyebrows.

This caused Winry to pull a wrench and whack Ed's meaty sole with it. To her surprise however it caused the elder Elric to moan, "Looks like the only thing those deadly wrenches of yours are good for now is tenderizing my giant feet." Ed teased with a smirk.

"Oh shut up!" Winry pouted and shared a laugh with the giant Elric.
15533233131112211121112211121.title: Foot Rub and Romance

155332331311122111211122111211.content:
After they shared a laugh, Ed reached down and scooped up Winry. Laying down, the alchemist placed the mechanic in the center of his strong chest. Winry slightly sang into the crevice of Ed's pecs and was surrounded by the firm muscle and scent of her dear friend. Winry felt herself relax as the heartbeat rang out from Ed's chest.

"Well you did a good job rubbing, I don't think anybody could make me feel as relax as you.", Ed softly said as he rubbed Winry's head with his finger.

"I guess I'm going to have to get use to it. Not that I mind.", Winry mumbled as she nuzzled against the large appendage.

Ed felt his face turn red, he wondered what the future would hold. Now that his and Al's goal has been accomplished he wondered if this would be his life. Being the giant of Resembool and going to help out the military if needed. Though one thing stayed in his head, he was with Winry and felt his heart burst as he thought of a future of them together. He wondered if children were possible, but that was a headache for another day.

As the sunset, Winry began to shiver slightly from the cool air. Seeing her discomfort, Ed laid his palm on the mechanic. Winry sighed as the light pressure and warmth gave her comfort and made her blush.

What was next?
155332331311122111211122111211.title: A Sunset For a Giant And Mechanic

choices: Ed Pops his Boots off of his RANCID feet!
Ed Starts Taking his Shirt Off..
1553323313111221112111221112113.content:
About a week later after Ed and Alphonse got settled in back in Resembool and gotten used to being ginormous (though Ed's ego had never been higher), Edward received a letter in the mail from none other than Roy Mustang!

"Heh, my little pit bug sending me fan mail?" Ed joked, Winry shivered at the mental image and read aloud of the letter.

"It says the Colonel has a new assignment for the Fullmetal Alchemist...he also goes on to say you'll really enjoy it and can use your new size." Pinako adjusted her glasses as she read it.

Edward's curiosity was peaked...

One Trip to East HQ Later...

Edward was wearing his usual black outfit as he wandered down the street. It never ceased to amuse him how the ground rumbled with his steps. His ego had swelled to tremendous heights, Ed was always cocky...but his new stature made him even more so.

Stepping up to the main gate, Ed grinned down at the guards stationed there and dangled his pocketwatch before them..which he'd enlarged with alchemy.

"Y-yes sir, go right ahead." The guards said nervously, Ed chuckled and stepped over the wall.

"Ah, Fullmetal...." A voice said from down at Ed's boots.

Ed grinned smugly, "Well well...last time I saw you you were licking my pit!" Ed said loudly, causing Roy to grit his teeth in agitation.

"I didn't call you here to gloat! I called you here because there's a situation...and my past..er..experience with the new you gave me an idea." Colonel sighed.

Ed raised an eyebrow, "You mean you were inspired by ME?" He mocked.

Roy groaned and waved Riza to bring the prisoners out, "I thought you'd have some fun...using your...unique methods to get information out of this prisoner."

A duo of rough looking men in prison uniforms and restraints were lead out before Ed, they looked up at the smirking blond teen fearfully.

"So..you want me to-.." Ed slyly grinned.

"There's two of them, you have two feet...two pits now too...you do the math." Roy strolled away along with Riza as they went back into the building...leaving their prisoners with the giant blond boy looming over them.

Ed grinned toothily, he hadn't showered in all this time..this was gonna be great!
1553323313111221112111221112113.title: Ed's New Assignment

15533233131112211121112211121131.content:
Grinning cruelly at the prisoners smaller then his feet, Ed thought of what he could do to have fun first. Best to start from the bottom right?

"Alright runts how about your giant warms you up a bit?", Ed began pulling his foot out of his boots by stepping on the heels.

Soon the large feet of the giant soon popped out with visible steam following. The ground shook as the giant slide the shoes aside with his foot before stomping the ground to knock the prisoners on their butts.

The men gagged as the strong rank odor hit them in a heavy aura. The thick cheese was suffocating as it made them gag and feel queasy from the rank stench as Ed wiggled his plump toes.

Ed crouched down and made a loud thoom as he sat down and created a crater. The alchemist smirked as he stretched his legs out and placed both his sweaty feet on both sides of the prisoners, cutting off any means of escape.

"How about I give you guys a sandwich~"

The men were confused at the offer, the rank feet suddenly slowly pulled apart. The prisoner's eyes widened as they caught onto what kind of sandwich Ed was gonna give them.

Ed brought both of his feet together with a series of startled yelps and a satisfying squish. The giant giggled at the puny bodies completely squashed into his soles, he slowly rubbed them back in forth rolling the men in his sweaty funk.

What was next?
15533233131112211121112211121131.title: Starting From The Bottom

155332333.content: How about some of these then?
155332333.title: Some more!

1553323332.content: So choose your path through this Victorian themed anime!
1553323332.title: Black Butler

15533233322.content: Okay then, choose your giant Victorian boy or girl!
15533233322.title: Growth!

choices: The Growth Stops, but Ciel Takes Up Most of the Study Now!
155332333221.content:
https://i.imgur.com/gsDm86c.jpg


Ciel stared at a almost disturbingly cute and affectionate card from Prince Soma and Agni. He sighed as he read it.

Dear Ciel, I know how lonely you get without me! So I've sent you this gift basket of some sweets that were said to be blessed by the god Krishna! Enjoy! - Love, Prince Soma Asman Kadar

Ciel crumpled up the card grumpily. "What on Earth is that fool thinking, sending me such revolting things!" The Earl of Phantomhive never was one for such mushy things.

"Well...he DID include a basket of these pastries, shall I dispose of them as well?" Sebastian said, teasingly holding up the basket of delectable looking sweets.

Ciel began to sweat nervously, looking away to avoid the no doubt smug smile on his demon's face. "Well...let me see what he sent first." The Earl murmured sheepishly.

Sebastian smirked and placed the basket on Ciel's desk. The Phantomhive boy had to admit, they did smell and look good.

The sweet loving boy couldn't help it, he reached for one that appeared to be a bun sprinkled with cinnamon. "You may have ONE." Sebastian reminded the Earl.

Ciel pouted but plucked the delicious cinnamon one out as the basket was carried off by Sebastian. "I shall store this in the kitchen. After all, we wouldn't want you spoiling your dinner." Sebastian said coyly as he departed the study.

The Phantomhive scowled at the door and greedily took a chomp of the bun. It appeared to be filled with some form of deliciously warm and oozing cream.

"I do not know what this is, but I shall indeed ask that annoying prince to share the recipe to Sebastian." Ciel said after swallowing a mouthful.

The Earl greedily ate the whole thing and wiped his hands clean on a handkerchief. "I suppose I should thank Agni next time I see him...as well as Soma." Ciel sighed, how he hated that sort of charitable nonsense.

Ciel's stomach suddenly gurgled, "Oh no...don't tell me that demon was right all those times he warned me about sweets."

Strangely enough, his stomach didn't hurt at all, but something far more troublesome than any tummy ache was about to happen.

The Queen's Watchdog felt his chair creak under him and suddenly felt his hips touching either arm of his office chair.
"What on Earth?!" Ciel yelped a bit as he stood up and realized he was around 7ft. tall already!

"Odd time for a growth spurt, I say. However, it has been quite some time since my last one. Perhaps some strange indian ingredient was in those-Ow!" Ciel's musings were interrupted when the top of his head bonked the ceiling.
155332333221.title: An Earl's Growth Spurt!

1553323332211.content:
Soon Ciel's chair cracked as its collapsed under the earl's growing form. Ciel hissed as he rubbed the sore spot on his head, his eyes widened as his chair and desk were now mere rubble beneath him and the paper work he slaved over scattered around!

"That was so ordinary sweet, and this not just a growth spurt!", Ciel cried out in distress as his body suddenly grew more, the boy had to lower his head as the roof started creaking.

Soon both of Ciel's feet the wall across from him, his arms were awkwardly bend as they pushed against the walls. Thankfully the growth stopped and Ciel sighed in relief, making the window rattled slightly from his amplified voice.

Ciel now was surely over 15 feet, his were bend and his arms were contorted to avoid making the walls collapse.

Sebastian heard strange noises as he returned from the kitchen and approached the earl's office. Knocking on the door. "My lord?"

Ciel's voice came from inside surprisly louder. "Sebastian, get in here quickly!"

Opening the door Sebastian hummed and raised an eyebrow as blocking the entrance seem to look like that of a giant dress shoe sole. "My lord i can not enter if your blocking it."

Ciel grunted as he lifted up his foot and set it a few few feet to the side, shaking the room as he set it down. The demon coyly grinned as he saw his master filling his study, nonchalantly looking up at Ciel.

"Ah it seems you finally grew taller my lord.", Sebastian smirked as Ciel clenched his teeth in irritation.
1553323332211.title: A Crammed Study

15533233322111.content:
"Oh be quiet, go fetch that basket!" Ciel ordered in his louder voice. "Master I'm sorry, but you'll spoil your dinner if you consume too many sweets." Sebastian chortled.

"This is no time to play coy, look at me! My desk and chair are destroyed, and that blasted paperwork is scattered all over!" Ciel yelled.

"That still does not change the fact that you will spoil your dinner." Sebastian said sternly. "I don't want to eat them. I want to see if we can find out what on earth was in them!" Ciel stomped his enormous foot.

There was a sudden knock at the study door, "Young master? Is everything alright?" Finny's concerned voice said from the other side of the wood.

"Sebastian! What's going on in there!?" Bard demanded as well.

Ciel and Sebastian looked at each other, and both knew the best course of action. Sebastian rushed over to the door and opened it just enough for them to see his smiling features.

"Nothing to worry about, a few things fell off the shelves that is all!" The demon cheerily informed the concerned staff.

"A few things? We have anything that heavy to make that much racket just by falling?" Bard asked skeptically.

Ciel bit his tongue from some witty retort, how dare they call their master 'heavy'!

"Get back to work! It's nothing to concern yourselves with." Sebastian ordered authoritatively, causing the trio to scamper away to their stations.

Upon turning around, Sebastian was holding the basket. Ciel scowled, "I thought I ordered you long ago to be careful about that magic of yours."

"I assure you they did not see me, and I thought this would be less troublesome than going downstairs around those three." Sebastian brought the basket of sweets inside the cramped study.

"Well? Do you sense anything?" Ciel demanded as he crossed his arms slightly.

"I do. It seems Prince Soma was not jesting when he said these were blessed by divine energy." Sebastian informed his lord.

"So why did that affect me in this way?!" Ciel growled, his voice rattling the window behind him.

"Master, if I may be so bold...perhaps Prince Soma thought he was doing you some sort of kindness. He does seem to want you to be happy after all." Sebastian stated calmly.

"How on Earth would that fool think making me this size would make me 'happy'?!" Ciel roared in frustration at the prince's apparent stupidity.

"Well, you did tell Soma that you wanted revenge on those who hurt you. Perhaps this 'divine' energy mixed with that dark desire and my demonic influence to give you-" Sebastian began before Ciel interrupted.

"Right, I'm supposed to stomp right after those bastards to their front door and kick it in? How incredibly short sighted." Ciel scoffed.

It was then that Ciel felt that familiar rumbling in his stomach, "Oh bloody hell, not again!"

"Perhaps instead of kicking their front door in...you could stomp the entire building eventually." Sebastian chuckled as he watched Ciel begin to grow through the ceiling of his study.
15533233322111.title: A Giant Earl

155332333221111.content:
The earl groaned in frustration as the floor boards snapped and Ciel was soon looking into the storage room above his study. Ciel brought his knees to his chest to avoid making any holes in the study entrance. Sebastian hummed as he nonchalantly dodged the large feet of his master flying by him.

"Bloody hell, i swear if my manor is damaged anymore that idiot is going to need divine help!", Ciel was loathing his current situation as he uncomfortably squeezed in on himself, the simplest of twitches could disrupt his already destroyed office.

Sebastian tapped his chin, after swiftly gathering the scattered paperwork that was flattened more under Ciel's shoes. Ciel's irradiated rambling was cut short as Sebastian suddenly appeared on the floor his head had burst through.

The demon butler had a devious smirk as he tucked the papers under his arm. "My lord consider this, as you are now and potentially may be even bigger later. The ones who wronged you in life are the lowest of human life. One would even call them....insects."

Ciel thought over the words of his butler, he was above others due to his success and wealth, now he was towering over the tallest of bastards who believe they can wrong him. A smirk soon grew on the earl's face as well.

"Ah yes Sebastian, they are insects! And perhaps a meeting with my foot is what they deserve.", Ciel grinned impishly as he pictured himself, raising a foot over the puny ants.

"Now how am I'm going to get out of this?", Ciel said twisting his head.
155332333221111.title: A Giant Epiphany

choices: Ciel Tortures the Wilford Family, For Information on the Other Conspirators!
1553323332211111.content:
A sudden and third surge of the tingling made Ciel widen his uncovered eye. "Sebastian...make sure the servants don't see me! That's an order!" Ciel boomed as he felt himself expanding once more. Sebastian bowed, "Yes my lord." The demon raced off and left the gargantuan lad to his growing.

Ciel felt his legs crashing through to the lower rooms and then to the foyer. "Those three had better be VERY distracted." Ciel murmured to himself, his voice becoming louder with each growth spurt. Ciel's head burst forth through the roof of his manor and he was able to see far across his property.

The earl's body had caused untold amounts of damage to the Phantomhive Manor. Over half of the stately home was now crumbled to ruins.

Dusting off his clothes of rubble, Ciel sighed and crouched down low. Being careful not to damage the mansion any further, he crept as best he could over to the forested area of his property. Part of the young earl was still grumpy about his mansion being damaged, but he now saw the bright side of his new size..and with it..power.

Coincidentally Ciel Phantomhive had been hearing underworld mumblings that a homestead out in the country had been purchased by the auctioneer who had sold the young boy to the cult in the first place.

One of the papers Ciel had been looking over was the deed to the property itself that he had 'collected'. Ciel could have just yanked the property out from beneath the man..but that wouldn't be very satisfying.

Especially since the documents detailed the man had a family now. A family...Ciel's family had been taken from him, and this bastard had the nerve to have his own!

The Phantomhive giant crouched down behind some trees and looked up to see Sebastian standing daintily on one of the limbs.

"It is taken care of my lord. Not only will those three work to restore the damage, but I laid the blame solely on Bard's explosives. I was so very convincing that even he started to wonder if he had left some dynamite around." Sebastian said rather braggishly.

"Very good, Sebastian...let's set out to that home that the auctioneer has been raising his family of insects in." Ciel grinned wickedly and stood up to his tremendous height.

"My my, by my estimation...you are 60ft tall my lord. The perfect height to show your power to these scum." Sebastian cheerily encouraged.

Ciel nodded, "Let's get moving." Sebastian hopped on Ciel's shoulder and the giant began taking thooming footsteps away from the estate.

*************

Kenndal Wilford was having a nice lunch with his family...the days of auctioning in the underworld had earned him a nice amount of money to settle down with a lovely property. His wife and son had no idea his dark past of course, and Kenneth would like to keep it that way.

That was when a quake rattled the whole house! "W-what on Earth was that?!" His wife asked worriedly, before another one, closer this time, knocked several plates off the shelves.

"I'm not sure...perhaps an earthquake?" Kenneth said in confusion, but deep down he had a rather ominous feeling about the series of quakes that were continuing.

The quakes stopped when the house was encased in shadow. Looking out the window his wife screamed and fainted, as Kenneth ran to her aid, he heard a deep rumbling voice...that somehow seemed rather familiar.

"Kenndal Wilford, your judgement has come!" Ciel boomed from outside the house, towering into the sky.
1553323332211111.title: Hiding in Plain Sight

15533233322111111.content:
Kenneth felt both confusion and dread fill him as he looked out the window, sure enough towering into the sky higher then any building was the boy he had sold off years ago.

"Father what was that?!", Kenneth's son a boy of sixteen asked.

The man couldn't even speak as Ciel smirked down at him, and sent small thooms throughout the home as he causally tapped his feet. "Mr.Wilford i believe we have unfinished buisness, would you perfer i crush you and your home now?"

Kenneth widened his eyes in fear before turning to his son. "S-stay here."

Ciel crossed his arms and scoffed. "Damn coward, holding up in your home!", he had the man responsible for his suffering and he wanted to see his fear have him beg pathetically. The earl began to lift his shoe hovering it over the home, one stomp would have the structure obliterated like sticks and squash the ants inside.

Sebastian tapped his chin, humming. "It seems you finally have an audience my lord.", sure enough Kenneth was coming out of his home slowly, growing pale as the giant dress shoe sole hung over.

Ciel smugly grinned. "Hello there Mr.Wilford, I'm sure i look much different then last time. Back then i was a weak child but now I'm more then capable of snuffing out the annoyances in my life."

The man couldn't even speak as the boy he once sold off simply as buisness now was a giant. Before he could utter any senseless words, the shoe above him suddenly lowered. The man yelled out as the firm bottom of the shoe pushed him to the ground pinning him to the ground and resting on his chest and rest of his body.

The giant earl lightly placed his shoe on the tiny, not wanting him to crunch just yet. Ciel sneered as he watched Kenneth let out panic yells. "Ah yes, right where the scum of the earth belong. Question is how long intill you break?

"There are 206 bones in a human's body master. I'm sure there's plentiful to break.", Sebastian smirked watching the pathetic struggles.
15533233322111111.title: An Earl's Revenge

choices: Ciel Puts Kenneth's Loved Ones In His Sweaty Stockings!
Ciel Unveils His Noble Feet to Torture Them!
155332333221111111.content:
"Quite right, Sebastian. Oh so many to choose from.." Ciel grinned impishly as he added a bit of pressure to the insect under his dress shoe. Sebastian smiled wickedly, he delighted in Ciel's cruelty..the more tainted by darkness the boy's soul became, the tastier it would be for him!

Ciel cocked his head to the side and gave an eerily innocent smile. "Shall I begin breaking your pitiful bones? Or shall you reveal to me the names of your business partners?"

"T-they were just...buyers...it was all merely business!" Wilford called out, only for Ciel's uncovered eye to narrow and the giant lad to scowl. "Business you say? No, I run a business...you deal in the kind of underworld filth that I as the Queen's Watchdog am sworn to erase!"

Putting more pressure on his foot, Ciel sneered before his eye lit up upon looking at the house. "Sebastian, bring the other occupants out."

"Right away my lord." Sebastian bowed and in a flash, brought Kenneth's wife and son out roughly. "So...the maggot has made a nest and reproduced into a little colony. We shall have to exterminate this infestation, won't we Sebastian?" Ciel said darkly.

"Yes, my lord..indeed." Sebastian replied. Taking his foot off of Kenneth, the man found himself able to breathe once more..but was horrified as Ciel stood above his family and had them in his crosshairs.

"It is only fitting that I make you suffer the indignity I suffered..my family was taken from me, so I shall take yours...in time." Ciel narrowed his uncovered eye and wiggled his toes inside his shoes.
155332333221111111.title: Ciel's Cruelty

1553323332211111111.content:
Ciel smirked at the family of Kenneth before both of his feet, he wanted to show what happens when scum try to live in peace after their sinful acts. From pinning down the man it seemed Ciel was nearly 80 feet, being able to cover a human with a foot alone.

The earl impishly grinned as he suddenly hatched an idea, Ciel chuckled as he stepped onto the heels of his dress shoes. A strange feature of Ciel was his large noble feet, despite bathing his soles always baked inside of his shoes.

"Oh you intend to use your feet, quite kind for insects such as them.", Sebastian smirked as he got a strong scent from the emerging feet, a potent and strong chesse stench even the demon admired.

Sighing at the feeling of his unconstrained feet, Ciel hummed before he plopped down to the ground and created a creator with a large seismic wave. Kenneth was thrown to the ground and coughed not only from falling but a strong odor spreading throughout the air.

Ciel licked his lips as he peeled off his damp socks, the plump and sweaty soles let out a aura of chessy fumes to be breathed in. The giant then grabbed a black sock and held the hem so that it be opened. Plucking up Kenneth's wife, Ciel chuckled cruelly as the woman finally awoke and let out another scream before Ciel dropped her in the sock.

Wrapping a fist around the son the tiny paled as he was brought to Ciel's face. The earl narrowed his eyes at the sixteen year old. "Your father isn't who he says, you'll eventually learn the truth but first I'll give you the honor of being imprisoned in my noble odor!"

The tiny yelled as he was dropped into the sock, his landing was softened with a squelch as the fabric released a spritz of sweat of cheddary musk. Inside the sock was a sauna like area filled with the heavy odor of sweaty chessy feet.

Placing both socks on the ground, Ciel smirked as he wiggled his plump toes. "Sebastian make sure they don't escape.", the earl ordered.

Sebastian bowed before smirking as well, in a matter of seconds the demon grabbed the opening of the socks tying them into a complicated knot. The two prisoners were now stuck in the socks, breathing in the dense cheddary funk.

Taking a sniff, Sebastian chuckled. "Enjoy your new establishments, courtesy of my lord himself."
1553323332211111111.title: A Cheesy Torment

15533233323.content:
The young Earl Ciel Phantomhive and Queen Victoria's loyal Guard Dog had found himself increasingly bored as of late. The Queen hadn't sent him a letter in over two months and now all he had to occupy his time were his dance, music and history lessons and paperwork for Funtom..as well as the occasional visit from Elizabeth.

Sebastian had talked it over with his master..he had formulated an idea.

He would use his demonic magic to 'reach into' the year 2018 and yank someone out into the manor who could provide his master with some amusement.

"You intend to kidnap someone to serve as my jester or something?" Ciel asked with a deadpan expression.

"You misunderstand me, sir. This will be a special case, he will take up relatively no space at all...and will be able to endure almost any game you shall come up with. Not to mention that he could be useful for keeping those three servants of ours in line." Sebastian said with an amused smile.

Ciel was still skeptical, but he was obviously intrigued at the idea of having someone from such a far away time come here.

"Fine...but if this goes poorly you will be cleaning up your mess...am I clear?" Ciel stated sternly as he went upstairs to his study.

"Yes, my lord..." Sebastian said with a bow.

It was around a half hour later and Ciel was in his study doing paperwork, when a soft knock came at the door. "Come in." Ciel called.

Right on cue, Sebastian entered wheeling a cart with an ice cream sundae in a dish. He knew Ciel had a sweet tooth and now was around the time of day he'd demand some sort of sweet treat.

Wheeling the cart around the side of the desk, Sebastian placed the dessert on Ciel's desk, smirking as the young lad's eyes were practically locked onto it unblinkingly.

"You're being awfully generous...normally you refuse to indulge me when I want a sweet." Ciel asked with suspicion.

"Your newly arrived plaything had a few recipes in mind after I informed him of your sweet tooth. It was his idea and seeing as he is going to be learning about the butler aesthetic from a master like myself...I decided you could test it to see if it was worthwhile." Sebastian chortled.

It was an ice cream sundae alright, but it appeared to be resting in some form of bread. "So he's arrived then?" Ciel inquired.

"Yes, come out and present yourself to your new master!" Sebastian called seemingly down at the cart.

Ciel almost mistook the tiny man who hopped out onto his desk as being some form of cricket. He could hardly believe his eyes...this was a tiny young man wearing a miniature butler's uniform!

"I-I am Nicholas....uh...sir." The tiny boy said sheepishly, this was a lot to take in...he'd been brought to Victorian Era and was expected to serve a young boy who could crush him in an instant!

"As for this treat, Nicholas I believe called it Fried Ice Cream." Sebastian stated.

"I did inform you he would take up very little space, did I not? And I think his size would be quite suited for any sort of game you wish to play...like a living figurine. As I said before, I have imbued him with increased durability and attributes...almost on par with myself. Though he will require training...in areas of etiquette as well." Sebastian explained.
15533233323.title: The New Phantomhive Servant

155332333232.content:
Ciel held onto his surprise look. Nicholas nervously gazed anywhere but above him as he played with his new white gloves.

The earl finally sighed and closed his eye. "Sebastian leave us, i would like to talk to our new house guest alone."

The butler bowed before giving a quick grin at the tiny man and leaving the study. Nicholas brought his gaze up as the ground shook with a thud. Ciel planted his elbow on his desk before leaning his face into his palm.

The earl had an intrigued look as he took in Nicholas's appearance. The young man had blond hair that looked to be dry and brittle, strangely with some blue streaks in them.

"So tell Nicholas, just how did my butler approach you?"

The tiny man rubbed the back of his head. "Well i just got back from a trip to Singapore-"

"I'm sorry where?", Ciel interrupted hearing the unfamiliar word.

"Uh...Singapore, asian and by malay- oh wait", Nicholas paused in his words. He was in the Victorian era, a lot of the countries he visited didn't exist yet!

"Well anyway... i had just gotten back to London when i suddenly blacked out! When i woke up, your butler was holding me in his palm like a doll. He said i had a purpose here, to entertain you...my lord."

Ciel smiled slightly. Yes he did have someone from the future, a small one at that. Still, Nicholas seem to be very interesting. Maybe he could liven things up.

The earl rose from his slouch before placing his hand in front of the tiny man. Nicholas hesitated before slowing walking onto the soft ground, stopping as Ciel's fingers curled slightly and he brought his hand to his face.

The large eye stared into Nicholas's. The true scale of his new position sank in.

Now, what did Ciel do?
155332333232.title: Getting to Know Nicholas

choices: While Ciel is eating...more history lessons!
Ciel is feeling mischievous and plops Nicholas into the ice cream!
1553323332321.content:
"You are certainly a tiny little thing aren't you...?" Ciel grinned smugly, rather liking the idea of towering over someone like this.

Nicholas nodded, "Y-yes sir..."

"I suppose you will need to meet the other servants...at some point. For now I wish to know who I am employing." Ciel placed Nicholas back onto the desk. "Tell me about yourself...as well as the future." Ciel said, it was more an order than a request.

Nicholas gulped, looking up at the titan of a boy...where to start?

"W-well...there's the moon landing." Nicholas picked a subject that he felt the boy would be quite intrigued by to start.

Ciel's eyebrow raised, "Go on..."

"Well...America builds a machine that by 1969 has taken men to the surface of the moon." Nicholas declared.

Ciel's uncovered eye widened...though he was obviously skeptical. "Do you have any evidence to prove you aren't lying?" His eye narrowed then...clearly if he thought Nick was lying...there would be punishment.

Growing nervous, Nicholas suddenly remembered the vague powers the butler had given him.

"You will be able to fetch your belongings and any items you wish to bring...provided my master deems them acceptable for you to keep in your quarters." Sebastian had stated.

Furrowing his brow in concentration, Nicholas closed his eyes and suddenly a wormhole opened above his head and a thick textbook entitled: "WORLD HISTORY" clunked down on top of him and pinned him to the desk.

"Oof!" Nicholas wheezed.

Ciel stifled a chuckle and lifted the textbook off of Nicholas, opening it to conveniently find it had a picture of Neil Armstrong on the moon with the American flag.

"Um..my lord...your dessert.." Nicholas pointed at the slightly starting to melt ice cream.
1553323332321.title: A Chat with the Earl Phantomhive

choices: Spit him out, he was only joking
Gulp him, put his new demon abilities to use
15533233323212.content:
Ciel soon gained a smirk, making Nicholas become unnerved.

"Yes i do think I'll indulge myself in your treat. But first, I'll add one more topping~"

Just as he was about to question him, Nicholas felt the back of his coat get lifted by Ciel's thumb and finger. The earl then dangled his tiny servent over the desert.

"Wh..what are you..AH!"

Nicholas yelled as he was released and feel into the creamy treat. His body became covered in ice cream and he thrashed desperately as he sank. He rose however as a metal surface emerged from beneath him. The metal had a path leading to the pale hand of his master, who was still smirking at him.

It finally dawned on Nicholas that the metal surface was a spoon and that his master's mischievous face only meant one thing.

"M-my lord what are you doing!?"

Ciel brought thr spoon to his face. "Sebastian brought you here to entertain me." The earl paused as he licked his lips. "And i must say, i certainly am~"

Ciel then parted his lips, revealing a red and warm chamber lined with pure white teeth. The spoon entered and Ciel closed his lips to drop the offering on his tongue.

With the sweet ice cream came a soft, moving body. Nicholas stared around in shock. The floor was wet and licked the sweet off of him, squeezing him and sloshing him around the mouth.

After being pressed against the roof of the mouth, Nicholas desperately called out. "My lord please! Let me out!"

The assault with the tongue stopped, letting Nicholas catch his breath. However, the muscle began to shift again.

What did Ciel do?
15533233323212.title: An Extra Topping

choices: The Two Nicks Become Ciel's Insoles!
155332333232121.content:
Suddenly the silver spoon entered the dark, wet cavern and scooped Nicholas onto it...exiting the cavern with its occupant.

Ciel grinned smugly at the puny, shivering and soaked young man on the spoon. How easy it would have been to simply swallow him whole...what power the young Earl wielded over this boy!

"T-thank you f-for...sparing me!" Nicholas shivered, both from fear...and the air of the room now chilling him to the bone due to how sopping wet he was.

Ciel's eyes narrowed and he licked his lips in a predatory way, the fear on Nicholas's face was priceless!

"Make no mistake...I would not be above devouring an insignificant morsel like yourself. HOWEVER, I weighed your value to me as my property or as a snack...and you hold far more value as you are now. You hold knowledge of far off future events, you could not only be useful...but your size is most amusing." Ciel stated with a cold look in his eyes as he turned the spoon upside down.

Nicholas landed on the desk with a splat, he looked up and jumped a bit as the spoon began to descend...thinking it was coming for him once more.

Fortunately for Nicholas, Ciel merely began to eat the special ice cream Nicholas had delivered.

Thankfully...the titan earl seemed pleased with the dessert.

"Mm...I believe I shall have you give this recipe to Sebastian." Ciel commented as he was clearly happy with his sweet treat....AND his newfound toy.

Soon the delectable sweet was finished, and Sebastian came back into the study.

Using his magic abilities, Nicholas had fixed himself and his uniform back to a presentable state after his trip with Ciel's tongue.

"Come my lord, it is time for your dance lesson." Sebastian stated.

Ciel groaned comically and slouched a bit in his chair, "My feet are still sore from yesterday's dance lesson..." The giant earl complained.

Sebastian smirked and opted for sarcasm, "We could always reschedule...I'm sure miss Elizabeth will be impressed by your staggering waltz's originality."

Ciel's uncovered eye flashed with annoyance, "Don't be so cheeky." He happened to glance down at Nicholas....and a brilliant yet wicked idea came to his mind.

"Sebastian, did you not mention that our 'guest' has demonic powers?" Ciel inquired of his butler, Nicholas didn't like the look in the giant's eyes.

"Yes, indeed I did...." Sebastian stated, looking at his pocketwatch to make sure they wouldn't be off schedule.

"I wish for you to remove my stockings, Sebastian." Ciel said, this was followed by two distinct clunks coming from the floor below.

Nicholas was quaking in fear by now...he certainly didn't like where this was going. Ciel's eye locked on to Nicholas, "Well go on! Split yourself in two!"

"B-but...I don't know how-" Nicholas began to say, until Ciel slammed his fist down on the desk, shaking it and causing Nicholas' heart to nearly jump into his throat.

"I am your master, are you questioning my order?!" Ciel bellowed. On cue, Nicholas split into two exact copies of himself.

Mocking applause came from behind him as Sebastian stood there giving a golf clap. "Well done...now if you'll excuse me." Sebastian stated as Ciel scooted his chair out a bit and turned to present Sebastian with his stocking clad feet.

"Pull them off, put him inside and then put them back on my feet. That is an order." Ciel said with a wicked smirk at Nicholas, though the order was at Sebastian.
155332333232121.title: Saved from Ciel's Belly

choices: Skip ahead to after the lesson
1553323332321211.content:
Both Nicholas fearfully watched as the demonic butler knelt down and began his task. Sebastian slowly pulled the dark stockings off of Ciel's feet, making the earl wiggle his toes as they felt the cool air. The butler then used his fingers on the left hand to keep the socks open.

Sebastian set his eyes on the pair, reaching over he grabbed them both in a gloved fist and brought them to his face. Sebastian gave a devilish grin at the small servants.

"Make sure your lord has the up most comfort. If not, then i may have to give you punishment."

The two shivered as they were each dropped into a sock. Immediately a chessy smell plagued thier noses. Ciel may be an earl, but he like everyone was a victim to foot oder.

Nicholas watched as his master's toes entered the sock, wiggling in anticipation. The smooth appendages passed over his head as the fabric was pulled up and began to press the servent against the sole. Despite the smoothness, the oder was more strong and was breathd in as Nicholas was placed in the middle of Ciel's sole.

After both socks were put on, Sebastian began to slip on Ciel's leather shoes. The earl smirked as Nicholas was pressed into his foot. Standing up, Ciel immediately felt the flesh of his sole engulf both of his servants. Giving a few experimental stomps, Ciel's smirk widen as he walked around his desk and smooshed Nicholas more.

Honestly, he could spend the next hour just stomping the tiny man. But alas, there was a lesson to attend.

As they exited the study, Sebastian gained a smirk of his own when he saw his lord stepping down harder then usual.

Now then, what happened next?
1553323332321211.title: His Servent, His Insole

15533233323212111.content:
Sebastian opened the door to the room used for Ciel's lessons in dance and fencing. The room was a wide open space, plenty of room to maneuver...and stomp all over a certain pair of living insoles while doing so.

"I certainly hope your enthusiasm and added comfort translate well into your performance today." Sebastian said lightheartedly.

Ciel chuckled and entered the room, making sure to put some 'oomph' into his steps just to be cruel.

Ms. Mayerl looked sternly at her student, he was right on time...despite his normally lackadaisical attitude towards these lessons...for some reason he seemed to be unusually enthusiastic today.

"I see you've decided to join us today, my lord." Mayerl snootily declared, despite him being on time...she had worked him hard yesterday...his feet would've still been sore today because of it.

Yet here he was, a pep in his step and ready to go. She smiled despite her usual stern demeanor, "I trust you are ready to continue practicing your waltz?"

Ciel grinned cockily, "Of course."

Soon the poor Nicholas twins were being pounded over and over by Ciel's weight. His feet were soft like the finest silks...but that only meant that they were mushy due to the sweat and were like being suffocated in a hot blanket...filled with ripe cheese of course.

Ciel couldn't help but stifle a small chuckle as he felt his feet heating up within his shoes and stockings.

Oh yes...this little future boy was going to make things MUCH more lively around the manor.
15533233323212111.title: Ciel went to his lesson

155332333232121111.content:
The lesson was filled with Ciel repeatedly squishing his servents beneath his feet. Not only did it feel good and make him feel superior, but by the end of the lesson his feet were far less sore then yesterday.

By the end of the lesson Nicholas was deep into the earl's sole, making an imprint.

"I must say my lord, it's nice that you showed enthusiasm in your lesson for a change.", Ms. Mayerl said as Ciel exited the room.

The young boy turned back with a small smirk. "Yes well, i was lucky enough to have the right shoes.", the earl did a quick step in place before walking back to his study with Sebastian in tow.

The thudding of Ciel's heavy steps filled the halls. Sebastian once again grinned at his master's behavior.

"So pray tell me, just how long will you keep him in there?"

Ciel scoffed and locked down at his brown shoes. "For as long as i wish. Who knows, maybe I'll wear my socks to bed tonight."

Arriving back in his study, Ciel did a few final stomps before sitting down. Placing his feet on the corner of his desk, Ciel tapped both of them making a clicking sound.

What would he do with his tiny servent now?
155332333232121111.title: Oh what to choose?

choices: Ciel Decides to Torment Them First...
1553323332321211113.content:
Looking down at his heeled shoes, Ciel grinned pompously as he imagined the pathetic specimens beneath them. "I must say this is turning out to be far more entertaining than I initially believed." Ciel chortled darkly.

Checking his pocketwatch, Sebastian smiled slightly. "You have some time before your History Lesson...I have made preparations for our new recruit to provide you with extra tutelage."

Ciel's smug expression faded slightly and he scowled at the idea of more lessons. This would of course be expressed by him pressing his feet down harder to take it out on his new 'tutor'.

"What possible good could knowing what happens centuries in the future do me?" Ciel scoffed, though he had to admit this could be quite interesting...that photograph of the man on the moon was definitely something he desired to know more about.

"With all due respect sir, this game of ours will be vastly improved if you are able to see so many steps ahead." Sebastian smirked, referring to their game of 'chess' in the pursuit of the boy's revenge...as Ciel so often compared it to a chess game.

Ciel sighed, "Very well. But you said I have some time before that...do you have any suggestions as to what I should do with these insects?"

Sebastian grinned wickedly, "I do, my lord. Please, allow me..." Sebastian kneeled before Ciel, the boy extended his legs and his shoes were popped off.

Slowly and gently, the stockings were removed and peeled away from the Earl's noticeably damp and definitely more odorous than before, feet.

Ciel's feet were quite the specimens, skin which looked as if it were chisled out of pale marble greeted Sebastian's eyes...as well as the two insignificant boys who were embedded within his master's pillowy soles facedown.

"It appears they are stuck." Sebastian chuckled and looked up at Ciel jokingly. "Shall I peel them away and inform them of their new task?"

Ciel grinned wickedly and nodded, the tinies were peeled away from the foul soles and gasped for air...clearly having been being suffocated.

"It seems our master desires a foot massage." Sebastian informed them. Both tinies looked up and behind them to see Ciel's ghastly feet propped up on their heels, presenting them with his soles with a smirk.

"A massage, eh? I could do with one." Ciel rested his cheek on his fist.

Sebastian placed the quivering twins before his master's feet, standing up and taking his leave. "Have a good time, master." Sebastian smirked before closing the door behind him as he went to the hallway.
1553323332321211113.title: Let Sebastian choose

15533233323212111131.content:
Both Nicholas looked at the giant soles in front of them. Above Ciel looked down at both of his servents, they were smaller then his feet.

"Are you just going to stand there? Because i can always put you back in my shoes.", the earl threatened.

This snapped the servents attention. "N-no my lord!", they said in sync.

"Well then stop gawking and give your master his message!"

Nicholas sprang into action, each one going to a sole. Even with the powerful oder they started thier task. The soft flesh gave into the hands of the servents, kneading the wrinkle free sole.

Ciel closed his eyes. This was quite the feeling, being respected and feared all while having someone beneath you. The little hands relieved him of any soreness he had previously. The rubbing soon moved up to his toes as Nicholas rubbed between his toes.

"Insects, i want you to kiss my feet now.", Ciel said with a malicious smile.

Not wanting to anger the earl, Nicholas began to press his lips against the soft toes. The taste of salty sweat and chesse filled his mouth, but the tiny servent would dare not show his disgust out of fear.

"Aren't you glad your lord gave you this task?", Ciel hummed out.

"Y-yes my lord!", both Nicholas's called out again.

Ciel chuckled and closed his eyes, contempt with his power over the servents.

What was in store for Nicholas now?
15533233323212111131.title: A Massage Suited For a Earl

choices: The Lesson on World War I Begins!
The Servants Are At it Again! Distractions galore!
155332333232121111313.content:
The time soon passed by, Ciel enjoying his oh-so-relaxing foot massage...as well as teasing the poor tinies with his gargantuan feet. The clock in the hall chimed, Sebastian entered the study. "My lord, your history lesson awaits."

Ciel's footwear was placed back on his feet, and Nicholas was magically transformed back into a single entity.

"I shall fetch a chalkboard from our usual lesson room-" Sebastian began to say, deeming it would save time to just have the lesson within the study itself rather than have Nicholas make the long trek through the hall.

"No need, I got it." Nicholas waved his hand and a chalkboard appeared already written upon.

"Do not be so careless as to use your powers..." Sebastian said dangerously narrowing his eyes.

"Sebastian is correct, you are using them too loosely, you'll attract suspicion...and then you'll become a liability." Ciel sneered at Nicholas, who paled.

"Y-yes...of course sir." Nicholas gulped. Ciel's eye travelled up to the blackboard which had the words:

'World War I' at the top, and two sections labelled:

'Allied Powers'

and

'Central Powers'

Beneath Allied it was a list of countries: Russia, France, British Empire, Italy, United States, Japan, Rumania, Serbia, Belgium, Greece, Portugal and Montenegro

Beneath Central it said: Germany, Austria-Hungary, Turkey and Bulgaria.
155332333232121111313.title: A Lesson in History

choices: Skip ahead to after the lesson
1553323332321211113131.content:
Nicholas awkwardly held the large chalk as he drew out a map of 1915 europe. Clearing his threat, the servent began.

"Um so it's 1914, and the Archduke of Austria-Hungary Franz Ferdinand is visiting Serbia with his wife Sophie. However, while there they are assassinated by a member of a terrorist group called the Black Hand.

Ciel scoffed. "Typical, even in the future leaders face the threat of assassination."

Sebastian chuckled. "Well it seems humanity always plays thier petty tricks."

Nicholas began to draw arrows pointing from one country to another.

"Now Austria-Hungary was going to attack Serbia, but Serbia was allied with Russia. So Germany came in to help Austria-Hungary which in turn lead to the powers of europe becoming engrossed in World War 1."

Ciel for once was invested in this lesson. Who knows, maybe he'll give Nicholas a little reward for this.

Now then, what next?
1553323332321211113131.title: The Lesson on World War I Begins!

choices: Ciel Goes for the Giant Queen's Guard Dog Scenario!
Ciel Opts for the Invading Giant scenario!
15533233323212111131312.content:
Ciel had taken many notes during the admittedly amateurish teachings of the tiny Nicholas. He didn't receive an assignment to work on in his spare time.

Nicholas was too nervous as it was and he didn't think the earl would appreciate that sort of thing being forced on him...he'd most likely punish him out of irritation!

So Ciel was told to just study up on the textbook from earlier and 'class' was dismissed. Ciel plucked up Nicholas and carried him down the hall to a sitting room. The other servants and Sebastian had departed to purchase some fresh groceries for supper.

Which left Nicholas and Ciel all alone in the big manor. Nicholas was supposedly in charge of looking after the Earl..but it certainly seemed like the boy saw him as nothing more than an object or worse...an insect.

Nicholas sat on the wooden surface of Ciel's desk...the young Earl staring down at him with his uncovered left eye half lidded in boredom.

"Can't you do something to entertain me, midget?" Ciel snapped and prodded Nicholas with his finger.

Nicholas yelped and flopped backward, however...he DID have a few ideas for things they could do...some of which were at least less focused on tormenting him.

"W-well, master...I do have a couple intriguing ideas on things that you might enjoy doing." Nicholas said, a slight smile playing at his lips.

"Hm? Well do tell..." Ciel smirked darkly.

"W-well...you've seen those miniature model villages and such correct? And you've heard the folktales of giants and all that? W-well...I could create a fully functioning tiny city complete with insignificant small folk...right here on the floor for you to stomp around and torment..."

"E-each idea we could pretend in a different way..one I could create a seedy underworld city full of criminals that you, as a giant Queen's guard dog...need to exterminate." Nicholas explained.

Ciel licked his lips, "You are quite creative...I like it...I think I shall go with-"

"W-wait! I must remove your footwear first,, yes my lord?" Nicholas interrupted...regretting it soon after he saw the glare Ciel was giving him.

"Indeed...I can hardly wait to feel their insignificant lives ended by my noble feet." Ciel said smugly.
15533233323212111131312.title: After the lesson...It's time for Games!

choices: Crush the city slowly, enjoy the destruction
Crush all the humans he can find
155332333232121111313121.content:
"Hmm, I'll go with your idea. Have some fun all while taking care of future work."

Ciel picked up Nicholas and placed him in front of his feet. The servent was luckily able to pull off the leather shoes with his new strength. Grasping the socks, they wetted his hands with a squelch as he pulled them off. Ciel wiggled his free toes with a sigh.

"Now, create this city.", the earl ordered. Nicholas nodded and began walking to the center of the room, feeling the ground shake as Ciel followed him. As Nicholas stopped, he gulped as he was covered in Ciel's shadow.

Focusing, Nicholas summoned a miniature city about the size of Ciel's desk. The servent himself was a giant as the buildings went up to his waist.

Next Nicholas concentrated on summoning people smaller then him to fit the city. He was glad that the people to suffer Ciel's playful wrath would be criminals and not innocents.

Across the city, multiple confused voices squeaked out. Some had been in gang meetings and others had just pulled out thier weapon to mug a poor soul. Thier attention was brought up as they first saw a giant in a butler uniform, and shock turned into horror as they saw the Queen's Watchdog Ciel Phantomhive as a titan looming above.

Ciel smirked, he may not be able to see thier faces but he knew the insects must be horrified. The earl reached down and picked up Nicholas, placing the tiny man on his left shoulder.

"How would you like a front row seat.", Ciel asked with a mischievous grin. Nicholas quickly nodded, opting to stay silent.

The tinies watched wide eyed as thier sky was replaced with a pale sole that began dripping large drops.

"Farewell~"

Ciel brought his foot down heel first. He felt all the fake building crumble beneath his sole. He also took note of a additional popping.

The tinies snapped out of thier stupor and began to yell and flee wherever they could. One man gazed shocked as the white toe sat in front of him. A splash of red coated the ground as the man beneath it was claimed instead of him.

"How interesting, you're so small. Yet i can still feel your pathetic bodies pop."

Bringing his foot up, much debris fell back to the city. A good amount stuck to Ciel's sole due to his sweat. Particularly the red splat marks.

"I must say insect, this was a pleasant idea.", Ciel gave a sorta friendly smirk at Nicholas.

Now, how did Ciel have fun with his new city?
155332333232121111313121.title: Taking Care of Future Work With Fun

choices: Ciel Takes His Time Psychologically Tormenting His Prey
Ciel Crushes the Building...the First of Many
1553323332321211113131211.content:
Ciel's booming voice rattled the tiny criminals and gangsters to the very core..they had all heard the stories of the Queen's Watchdog...how he was unmerciful to those who he hunted...and now it seemed he had become a giant who could obliterate them all in an instant.

Ciel's narrowed and cold eye turned down towards the panicking city, he licked his lips as he spoke...his voice rumbling the city itself. "You are all nothing but vermin, rats who are feeding on the seedy underbelly of England. No, on second thought...you're even less than rats." Ciel sneered as he lifted his other foot, sticky with sweat and hovered it over a dirty looking building..no doubt a haven for drug deals and the like.

Feeling particularly cruel, Ciel merely rested the ball of this foot against the front of the building...his toes pressing up against the windows and fogging them up. "It seems I've found a nest of ants...how utterly insignificant you all are...compared to even my smallest toe."

Ciel was taking his time breaking these poor people down, he wanted to drive home how doomed they were...their despair would be delicious.

Nicholas smiled a little bit at Ciel, at least it wasn't him being tortured this time.
1553323332321211113131211.title: Crush the city slowly, enjoy the destruction

15533233323212111131312111.content:
Ciel's foot stayed planted against the building, holding the crooks inside at his mercy.

"Listen closely ants I'll strike up a deal. If two of you come out to be crushed, then I'll allow the rest of you ten seconds to flee from your executioner."

The group of criminals immediately began arguing, some claiming that they have the right to survival while others pointed thier fingers and said who shoud be sacrificed. The building shook and creaked as Ciel lightly pushed his foot against the structure.

"I don't like to wait.", Ciel mockingly said as he only imagined what was happening in the building.

In a rush the door opened and the two nearest people were pushed out into the open, both men with one in his late teens and the other in his thirties.

Both criminals looked up in horror as the earl smirked down at them. The pale foot removed itself from the house and hovered above them. However, rather then just crush them then and there the foot lowered and trapped the two in the crevice of Ciel's big toe. The earl simply smirked at the two as they started to choke up from the powerful stench.

"So, how does it feel? Thinking your so high and mighty for evading the law, only to end up here for my amusement. Your legacy shall be that the earl of Phantomhive turned you into a stain!"

The toes clenched together before the two could so much as yell. All that came out was the tiniest crunch.

The others believed that they could now escape the Watchdog's cruel fun. This was crushed just like the two as Ciel rested his foot on the top of the building and began to step down. The panicked cries were silenced as Ciel completely flattened the building and people.

The earl grinded the rubble beneath his foot and chuckled. "It seems i forgot to tell them to start running after the two were offered."

Lifting his foot, the building fell as Ciel stomped away.

The earl soon spotted...
15533233323212111131312111.title: At Ciel's Mercy

choices: Ciel takes his time before devouring his victim
Ciel swallows him whole right now!
Some other tinies are trying to rebel down below!
155332333232121111313121112.content:
Nicholas had to admit, this was kind of entertaining...especially knowing that these tinies were bad people to begin with...it helped with some of the guilty feelings. Using his magic and hoping Ciel wouldn't scold him for it..he summoned a bag of popcorn and began eating it as he sat on Ciel's shoulder.

As Ciel stomped through the city he suddenly became aware of a munching noise, glancing over he had to smirk a bit at seeing his tiny servant sitting on his shoulder eating popcorn like he was watching a show. "I take it you're enjoying this?" Ciel said, locking his eye onto Nicholas.

"Y-yes sir! You're awfully good at this!" Nicholas complimented. Ciel chuckled smugly, "Well I've had a lot of practice dealing with the underworld...only now I can exterminate them in many more interesting ways."

At that point a low rumble emitted from the earl's stomach, placing a hand over his abdomen and blushing slightly...Ciel frowned. The boy was hungry, obviously. Nicholas had a feeling the cruel noble was going to use this to his advantage with the tiny city though.

As if on cue, a tiny young boy a few years younger than Ciel tripped and fell in front of the colossal feet. He whimpered and turned around on his back, gazing up and up at the titanic Earl.

Ciel smirked a bit and licked his lips hungrily, eyes locked onto the street urchin. "You recall how I spared you from becoming my meal earlier, yes?" Ciel was speaking to Nicholas, but his gaze never left the trembling boy.

"Yes sir." Nicholas nodded, his guess was correct...he knew where this was going.

"It seems now I will get a chance to try human meat afterall." Ciel smirked and began to reach down to the now sobbing boy. The boy had obviously twisted his leg in the fall...he wasn't going anywhere.

"More like ant meat..." Nicholas joked, causing Ciel to frown. "Don't ruin it...the idea of these pests slowly dying within my belly is quite appealing."

"I'm sorry, master..." Nicholas quickly apologized. Ciel held the squirming and now hysterical boy up to his uncovered eye.
155332333232121111313121112.title: A Lone Human...a Lone Snack

choices: He sat down to trap the humans
He grabbed to rest to eat
1553323332321211113131211123.content:
Ciel had just began to open his mouth, when he felt a sudden surge of poking to his foot. Looking down, the earl saw a multitude of humans all attacking his toes.

The insects had picked up thier weapons they had on hand or used any broken wood to try and injure Ciel.

Ciel smirked and chuckled darkly. "Ah how cute. You vermin honestly think you still have a chance." The earl set his eyes on the tiny boy held between his finger and thumb.

"You don't have much meat on you. So I'll spare you...for now."

Ciel brought the boy over to Nicholas. "Look after him would you?"

Nicholas caught the boy in his palm. Seeing the state of the tiny, Nicholas took pity and gently placed him in his coat pocket.

The earl looked back down at the criminals with a smirk. With a simple flick of his toe, Ciel sent three flying back. They didn't have time to reciprocate as a giant pale hand came down and scooped a good amount up. Ciel opened his hand and saw numerous tinies scattered over his palm.

Ciel licked his lips. "Feel honored, your pathetic lives shall be ended by being a noble's snack~"

Opening his mouth wide, Ciel tossed the tinies onto his tongue. The earl started to slosh around the vermin, already starting to taste blood. Still, he'd rather they get to experience the digestive process rather then die quickly. Ciel let out a satisfied hum as he tilted his head back and gulped down the bugs, feeling thier struggle in his throat.

Ciel smirked as he patted his stomach. "Have a nice trip~"

The earl then caught sight of the remaining humans. Some had started to flee while others simply looked up in shock.

Ciel's body shifted as....
1553323332321211113131211123.title: A Crushed Rebellion

choices: Decrease the City to The Size of Ciel's Pinky Toe!
Only Decrease the City Slightly in Size
15533233323212111131312111231.content:
Ciel scoffed haughtily, "Pitiful insects who do not wish to accept their fate....enclose those trying to flee." Ciel's' command was simple and directed at you. Using your demonic powers, you erected a magical barrier which halted those running away.

The ones who were too terrified and mentally numb and unable to process the sight of the gigantic guard dog...were still standing there, some had fallen to their knees as in in prayer...a sight which fed the Earl's ego even more.

Ciel began to lower himself, upon seeing this...you summoned an ornate and extremely comfortable throne to appear underneath him. At first the Earl of Phantomhive was shocked that his descent was ceased..but grinned slightly at you as you said: "I cannot allow my master to sit on the cold dirty ground now can I?"

Ciel chuckled and nodded, "Very good...you're learning. Now...for this next step...you should increase the potency of my foot scent. It's no fun if my noble aroma has dissipated now is it?" Ciel smiled darkly and leaned his cheek against his fist casually.

You nodded, and mentally enhanced Ciel's already quite pungent foot odor...over ten times that which it normally was.

"You will make this city a tad smaller..including those within it...those remaining anyway." Ciel licked his lips in a predatory way, nearly salivating at the thought of these insignificant roaches being mere specks to him.

You....
15533233323212111131312111231.title: A Watchdog's Prey

155332333232121111313121112311.content:
Nicholas focused on the city, Imagining it even smaller then before. The fake city and all of its inhabitants shrank smaller and almost disappeared in the shadow of Ciel's sole. He then added extra aroma to the Earl's sole, intensifying the aura of cheese odor to the point where it reached both his and Ciel's noses. Ciel hummed in in approval before placing his heels in front of the city so that his soles loomed over.

Every inhabitant in the city was suddenly shrouded in darkness. Before anyone could question it they all began gagging as a thick scent of sweat and cheese plagued the streets. The cheesy smell could be tasted and stuck as the feeling of regurgitation hit everyone. Light suddenly blasted the city again as Ciel parted his feet. The tinies from their speck size could barely see the Earl's smirking face.

"See where you are now?", Ciel sneered. "You all are the scum of the earth, and now you are nothing but an inevitable stain on my sole. Mere insects to crush for my pleasure. Know that I will relish as your bodies decorate my feet!"

Ciel wiggled his toes as he could only imagine the terror he instilled onto the bugs.

The Earl decided to.....

choices: Ciel Responds in a Positive Way
