"Hmm...but not yet I don't think...I'm enjoying tormenting you insects too much to want it to end so quickly." Ciel's voice thundered in the micros ears, giving them a slight hope that they would make it out of this..but not much.

Instead, Ciel merely scooted his feet back, and spread his toes apart...lowering them until the city was surrounded on either side by Ciel's right big toe and second toe.

Due to Nicholas' magic, the area was even more horrendous than before...to Ciel...the tiny flecks of sock lint that were scattered in this toe crevice were inconsequential...but to the insignificant bugs...they were gigantic boulders of gross grime that hung above their heads, ready to fall down in an avalanche of toe jam.

"They should feel honored to breathe in the odor of a noble's feet." Nicholas chimed in, trying to butter Ciel up.

Always good to get on an employer's good side..especially when said employer is a giant spoiled brat!

How does Ciel respond...?
1553323332321211113131211123112.title: A Watchdog's Cruelty

choices: Nicholas gets to have some fun with the bugs
15533233323212111131312111231122.content:
Ciel chuckled as he closed his eyes. "Ah, nice to see you understand my position Nicholas."

Nicholas blushed slightly, given the current situation he still felt humbled by the words. Truth be told, watching the Earl terrorize the micros has been a very enjoyable show.

"Bring one up to my palm.", Ciel suddenly ordered his tiny servent, while unfolding his hand. Nicholas nodded before focusing and summoning a random man from below.

To Nicholas the micro was about one inch, but to Ciel he was a mere dot on his colossal palm. The man fell into one of the crevices in Ciel's hand.

The Watchdog smirked. "It never ceases to amaze me when I see just how puny you bugs are. I could squash you just by flexing my palm! But instead, I'll give my servent the honor."

Ciel turned to Nicholas and held his hand to his shoulder, signaling the surprised servent to get on. After he walked on and loomed over the dot of his palm, Ciel smirked again.

"Nicholas, crush this bug."

The tiny servent looked down at the dot before his polished shoes. Watching Ciel smush the others invoked a feeling of envy, an envy to do the same. A smirk also graced Nicolas's face as he lifted his right foot.

"With pleasure my lord."

The man looked up in horror as the two malicious faces were soon covered by Nicholas's sole. The leather sole pushed the tiny body into the sole and applied pressure. The last sound the heard was the snapping of his bones.

*Crunch*

Nicholas kneeled down and quickly used a handkerchief to clean the bloody stain. Ciel hummed in delight.

"Excellent job, were you perhaps hiding your enjoyment hmm?"

Nicholas blushed again at the Earl's words.

What was next?
15533233323212111131312111231122.title: Earning Brownie Points With Ciel

choices: Nicholas Has a Better Idea maybe?
155332333232121111313121112311221.content:
Ciel turned his gaze back to the miniscule city at his toes, he sneered down at is as if he were seeing a vile cockroach.

The city was still positioned before his colossal toe crevice with a toe on either side of it. "Hm...Nicholas...I want you to go down there with a magnifying glass and describe to me what is happening with the sniveling scum that are in this pathetic excuse for a city." Ciel ordered.

Nicholas nodded and summoned a magnifying glass that was his size. He quickly scurried down the chair leg and stopped before the gargantuan feet of his master.

Nicholas had to admit, Ciel did look imposing sitting above him...all the more reason he should serve him faithfully. Crouching down over the miniscule city, Nicholas brought the magnifying glass up to his eye and peered down at the ant-like criminals within.

"Tell me what you see...describe it." Ciel licked his lips in anticipation.

"It looks like they're gagging and clutching their throats. They're being overwhelmed by your noble toe odor, my lord. They're sobbing and some of them look like they're praying." Nicholas reported, Ciel responded with haughty, cold laughter.

"How pitiful...not like that will do them any good." Ciel sneered distastefully at the speck.

"Nicholas...I want you to pick it up and push it carefully into the skin between my toes." Ciel said softly with a wicked grin.
155332333232121111313121112311221.title: A City at an Earl's Feet

choices: Some fun with Ciel and Nicholas
1553323332321211113131211123112211.content:
"Right away my lord."

Discarding the magnifying glass, Nicholas rubbed his chin as he thought of a way to insert the city without obliterating it. A thought struck him as he squinted at the tiny city before him. The whole city began floating in one piece into the air, all the way to Nicholas's face. The servent smirked as all the bugs gazed up at him.

"It's time to give your life some worth, by becoming toe lint for my lord."

Focusing his mind, Nicholas moved the city and inserted it into the plump toe crevice. The servent increased the durability of the buildings, but kept the insects as they are. All of them gagging as the odor poured out of Ciel's foot, the chessy scent lingered over the city like a dome as the squishy flesh squelched at their insertion.

Above, Ciel watch with a smirking glee as his order was carried out. The Earl felt barely anything at all, only the tiniest of scratching. The sheer lack of disruption fueled the power boiling inside of Ciel. These criminals weren't even roaches, they were nats!

Reaching down, Ciel plucked Nicholas up by the back of his coat and placed him on his shoulder.

"So pathetic, but I must say......I feel very delighted from these bugs suffering.", Ciel sneered leaning into his right palm.

"Do you have any more requests regarding the insects my lord?", Nicholas asked smirking.

A chuckle rang from Ciel's lips. "Why yes little Nicholas. I'm sure my foot odor is keeping them warm a plenty. But I think they could us a 'blanket'."

Nicholas caught on before nodding. Soon a pair of Ciel's socks appeared in front of the Earl and servent. They were dark blue and had a few wrinkles, as well as some damp spots. The used socks lowered to Ciel's pale feet and began to slip on.

Ciel hummed as the socks covered his feet, already beginning to warm them. These bugs would experience the worst of his foot odor all while being mere specks.

What was next?
1553323332321211113131211123112211.title: Such Pathetic Bugs

15533233323212111131312111231122113.content:
A knock at the study door caused you and Ciel to look up sharply. With a mere thought, Nicholas had Ciel teleport behind his desk in his office chair, and the chair his Earl had been sitting on in the center of the room had vanished. Ciel's shoes were now on his feet, a fact that caused Ciel to smirk slyly and wiggle his toes a bit within.

This all took place within two seconds or so...Nicholas was getting the hang of these demon powers it seemed. "Come in." Ciel called out, Sebastian entering a moment after.

"It is dinner time, young master. I take it you are enjoying little Nicholas' company?" Sebastian said, smiling. Ciel chuckled, "He's quite talented with that magic you've gifted him with." Ciel stood up and stepped out behind the desk and began to walk to the door.

"I suppose we should introduce him to the three other servants?" Sebastian inquired as Ciel stopped his advance. "Hm...I suppose he will be employed here...and he could also keep an eye on them given how you tend to let Bard blow up the kitchens and Mey-Rin's clumsy mistakes as well as Finny's naivety get the better of you." Ciel said with a grin as he teased his butler.

Sebastian turned to the desk where Nicholas was standing, "Would you like me to return him to a more normal size?"

"No...I quite like the size he is at....I'm sure those three will be quite intrigued by him...especially once they hear he is from the future. I am sure he'll be bombarded with questions." Ciel deviously smirked at Nicholas, this was his way of 'hazing' the newbie...despite having already quite literally walked on him today.

"Very good my lord." Sebastian bowed as Ciel went downstairs to have dinner.

-Soon after-

Mey-Rin, Finny and Bard were gathered outside where Pluto was curled up and getting a belly rub from Finnian. Sebastian was approaching with Nicholas seated on his shoulder. "Uh...is that a giant dog?" Nicholas bluntly inquired of the giant butler.
15533233323212111131312111231122113.title: Meeting the Servant Trio

choices: They arrived to Ciel still eating
155332333232121111313121112311221131.content:
The three servents looked up as the demonic butler approached them. Sebastian was a force that always brought attention and slight fear with his presence. Thier attention was however drawn to the small figure on Sebastian's shoulder.

At first glance, the figure may appear to be that of a lifelike doll. These thoughts were discarded as they could see the "doll" moved it's head and blinked!

"Ah your all together, good.", Sebastian greeted them not reacting to thier shocked faces.

"S..sebastian...your shoulder!", Mey-Rin pointed a shaky finger at Nicholas who awkwardly scratched his cheek.

Sebastian simply glanced at the tiny butler and quickly used his finger to stop the scratching. "Ah yes as you can see we will be having another servent aid us in servicing lord Phantomhive. He is called Nicholas.", the demon calmly explained.

"Well that's one thing, but Sebastian....he's tiny! Even Finny's a giant to him.", Bard exclaimed scratching his head in confusion.

"It will be no issue, Nicholas will be able to assist me plentiful. Not to mention he does well at entertaining others.", Sebastian brought his gloved hand to his shoulder.

Without hesitation, Nicholas stepped onto the white palm. He was held before the three, feeling Sebastian's strong gaze above him.

"Now, I believe you should introduce yourselves."

The three servents quickly tried to compose themselves as they stood up straight in front of the demon and his tiny. Finny took a step forward first, smiling down at Nicholas.

"Hello, my name is Finnian! But you can call me Finny. I tend to the garden!" Nicholas smiled at the bright nature of the young servent.

Bard walked forward next, a friendly grin on his face. "I'm Baldroy, you can call be Bard. I work in the kitchen and really turn up the heat when it comes to cooking!", Bard chuckled out.

Nicholas could pick up a American like accent from the stubble man. He could also feel Sebastian tense up his hand slightly as heat was mentioned.

Mey-Rin came forward last and bowed. Standing up, she tried looking to where she thought Nicholas was, seeing multiple visions of the little servant through her glasses. "Oh..hello I'm Mey-Rin! I help out as a maid around the manor!"

Nicholas smiled, all three seemed to have very interesting character. However, confusion hit him as the large white dog on the ground was no longer there.

The tiny servent suddenly fell back onto the soft ground with a yelp as a new face suddenly popped up in front of him. The newcomer was a man with long white hair and red eyes, also a pair of small fangs. Despite the man bringing his face closer to Nicholas, Sebastian didn't move his palm or interfere in any way.

The white haired man sniffed Nicholas much like a dog would. The tiny butler looked in fear as the slit eyes stared intently at him and the large sniffs made his suit pull towards the nostrils slightly. The sniffing stopped and the dog-like man suddenly had a happy look on his face as he let out a bark like noise. Nicholas then found the large pale nose nuzzling him as the man closed his eyes and let out pleased growls.

"Um....good boy?", Nicholas slowly rubbed the nose and the man's moaned growls grew louder.

"Hmm, it seems Pluto's Taken a liking to you.", Sebastian stated amused.

Pluto backed away, and Nicholas blushed as he saw the dog man was nude as his toned torso was exposed. Sebastian let out a small sigh.

"Now's a better time then ever to go inside. Hopefully all of us will be dressed soon."

Walking back towards the manor, Sebastian placed Nicholas back on his shoulder.

Once inside........
155332333232121111313121112311221131.title: The Servants and Nicholas Meet!

choices: Nicholas is Dominated by an Absolutely HUGE Ciel After Shrinking
1553323332321211113131211123112211312.content:
Ciel was sitting back and suspiciously smirking down at his shoes as he sat at the table in front of an empty plate. Sebastian glanced at Nicholas and then cleared his throat. Ciel jumped a bit and glared at the slightly smirking Sebastian. "W-what?" The Earl demanded.

"I merely came to see if you were finished dining, my lord." Sebastian chortled. "What ever do you find so interesting about your shoes this evening?" Sebastian grinned.

Ciel blushed scarlet, "N-None of your business!" He snapped as Sebastian collected the plate and used silverware and placed Nicholas on the table in front of his master.

"If you will excuse me...I shall place these in the kitchen for Bard and wait for your call when you are ready to retire for the night." Sebastian bowed and went out of the room.

"I guess you're not going to tell him about the city in your sock?" Nicholas smiled slightly at the gargantuan boy.

Ciel scoffed, "It's none of his business, as I said. I'm also curious if you can sense if they are still alive?" Ciel inquired.

Nicholas concentrated and sure enough he could sense the remaining souls of the criminals within the city between the boy's toes within his footwear.

"There's a good number of them still alive, my lord...though they probably wish they weren't." Nicholas grinned devilishly, causing Ciel to chuckle darkly.

"You give me quite the idea, make them un-killable for now....I want to extend their suffering for as long as possible. Perhaps they shall fester in there overnight...should I wish." Ciel grinned demonically and Nick chuckled.

With a single thought, the tiny prisoners were made durable enough that they wouldn't die from the heat or miasma of the Earl's toes.

Ciel sat back in his chair and sighed, "I am quite glad I have a servant like you."

"T-thank you my lord! That means a lot!" Nicholas chirped.

Soon after this Ciel called for Sebastian and the three of them ventured up to the Earl's bedroom. Sebastian dressed Ciel in his nightclothes and expected Ciel to ask him to stay there until he fell asleep. However, the tall butler was surprised when his master declared: "You may go perform other duties, Sebastian. Little Nicholas shall stay with me."

Sebastian was glad he wouldn't have to stand there for most of the night...that was never very enjoyable. "As you wish, my lord." Sebastian bowed and exited the room, closing the door behind him.

Looking down at Ciel's feet, Nicholas saw that the Earl still had his odorous socks on. "Are you going to wear them to bed, master?" Nicholas asked playfully.

"Of course." Ciel grinned diabolically.

"However...I do think I shall remove the sock which doesn't contain the city for now...I want you to shrink down quite small until you can fit in between my noble toes. I want you to praise me as if I am your god." Ciel said in a hushed tone, the power of lording over someone so small was addicting...and the boy wanted MORE.
1553323332321211113131211123112211312.title: An Earl's Bedtime

15533233323212111131312111231122113121.content:
"Right away my lord."

Nicholas felt a strange feeling at the order. Up intill now he'd been squashed during a dance lesson and rubbed those noble feet. The smell was starting to grow on him, but he was still blown by the proposition of being toe lint.

Ciel pulled off the sock to let his uninhabited foot breath and licked his lips as the cool air hit the damp sole. He watched in glee as Nicholas dwindled down from his already small size. Soon Ciel held up his pointer finger that had a single speck standing on top, he had to squint in order to see Nicholas standing in the creases of his finger. A devilish smirk grew as Ciel wiggled his toes.

"You should feel honored, your god is giving you the opportunity to be consumed by my noble toe gunk!"

Nicholas's ears rang as the colossal Ciel yelled out from his now god like size. Soon the air shifted around him and became filled with the familiar chessy foot odor of the Phantomhive earl. The massive toe gap was below the tiny servent, stretching out like a canyon and releasing burst of foul odor. The flesh platform soon tilted as Ciel dropped Nicholas towards the toe gap.

The tiny servent used his power to slow his descend and felt the air get thicker and more heavy with the chesse being tripled as Nicholas landed on the slimy flesh. He decided to please his lord.

"Thank you my lord! This is the greatest honor I could ever receive!", Nicholas said to Ciel in a telepathic message.

The earl smirked as he laid down. "If you're so grateful, prove it."

Nicholas kneeled onto the stinky ground before leaning down and pressing a kiss to the ground, getting a cheese taste in his mouth. Ciel seem to feel it as he chuckled and flexed his toes. As if to say "I want more".

15533233323212111131312111231122113121.title: His Servent, His God

choices: Nicholas Tells Ciel About the Future...Until Ciel falls Asleep
155332333232121111313121112311221131211.content:
Nicholas continued to kiss and even lick the moist area beneath him within the Earl's toes. Ciel was getting that feeling of absolute power and authority he had felt earlier...with the city in his toes. It was intoxicating, he wanted more of it! "Keep going, I want to hear you praise me...your god." Ciel said as he relaxed against his pillows.

"You're so much larger and more powerful than I could ever hope to be! Than ANYONE could ever hope to be! You could wipe me out with a single squeeze of your toes, it would be an honorable end...to be crushed by the almighty GOD Phantomhive's toe!"

Ciel grinned smugly, "You should be grateful I don't decide to end you right now! You amuse me....that is what's keeping you alive." His voice rumbled down to Nicholas.

Soon Ciel began to yawn, and announced: "That's enough for tonight, I need some rest..you may return to your former size."

Nicholas hopped out of the toes and onto the bedsheets, growing back to the size of a toy figurine. Ciel plucked him up and placed him on the pillow next to his face. The young Earl turned over on his side and looked directly at Nicholas.

"Will you....erm....I mean you WILL stay here...at least until I fall asleep...." Ciel said, suddenly becoming rather flustered and a slight blush on his cheeks.

It was easy to forget that his master was a child...so Nicholas was slightly shocked since usually Ciel seemed so mature and serious. "O-of course!" Nicholas blurted.

"Besides..I want to hear more about this future of yours..." Ciel said to Nicholas, blinking his eyes curiously.
155332333232121111313121112311221131211.title: Toe Worship for an Earl

choices: They wake up in the middle of the night
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
"Oh...well what do you wish to know about?", Nicholas softly said as he layed on the pillow and looked at the earl.

Ciel looked in thought for a moment. "You can start by telling me more of the wars to be fought."

Nicholas fiddled with his thumbs nervously. "M-my lord...I'm not sure if that will...be the most...uplifting subject."

Ciel frowned and pulled his blankets up. "I've seen many unappealing things, now tell me.", he ordered

Nicholas gulped before nodding. "Well in the future a lot of battles aren't the same that they may be in your time. People start wars and hurt people not involved just because of something like culture differences or because they want others to be afraid. Around the time I was born there was a war in the Balkans where the countries split up and people died based on their ethics and beliefs."

Ciel listened intrigued as Nicholas explained everything. He thought about it, wars being started just to implant fear and having factors be based on petty things.

"If I were to describe the future wars I would say they are the definition of destruction. Weapons are more advanced, with a single push a once living and thriving city can be turned to ash. People can die just by breathing and corruption plagues a lot of the countries I visited."

Nicholas clenched his chest at the sudden surge of emotions. Looking up, he saw Ciel's eyes shut as he peacefully breathed in and out.

"My lord?"

"....."

".........Thank you.....for allowing me into your service. I've come to enjoy actually being out of time and being in a more calm place."

Nicholas laid on the giant pillow and closed his eyes as he remembered how the earl went from a cruel giant to a sleeping child.

Ciel cracked open one of his eyes, he took in all of his tiny servent's words. Gazing at Nicholas he let out a sigh and drifted off to sleep.

Next....
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.title: A Conversation To Sleep

choices: Ciel FINALLY takes it! (Several tries later)
Nick Opts for a Lozenge or Something instead?
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
Nicholas was jolted awake by the giant Earl coughing and wheezing. "M-my lord?" Nicholas sleepily asked as the giant boy he was sharing a bed with sat up and started uncontrollably hacking.

It was pitch dark in the master bedroom, but Nicholas' keen new demonic senses allowed him to see in the dark as well as sensing his master's presence.

Conjuring a candle on the dresser, the room was illuminated well enough...and Nicholas followed up by summoning an ice cold glass of water from thin air. He knew he had to be careful with the magic thing, but it was just Ciel and him here and he couldn't let the boy choke to death.

"Here, drink up." Nick held up the glass of water to Ciel...only for things to get worse as Ciel retched up some sort of phlegm and bits of dinner.

Nicholas acted quickly in 'vanishing' the gross mess before it could stain the quilt.

Ciel thankfully stopped coughing for now...and was sipping the water.

"Are you alright?" Nicholas asked worriedly.

"I...I don't feel very well..." Ciel grunted as he flopped back against the pillows. Examining the boy closely, Nicholas could tell by the reddened nose that Ciel was ill and most likely had some sort of sinus ailment.

Pulling out a digital thermometer Nicholas hopped up on Ciel's chest and held it out. "Stick the end under your tongue."

"What is it?" Ciel groaned.

"Thermometer." Nick answered and Ciel did as he was instructed.

The boy earl nearly jumped out of his skin as after a few moments of silence the beeper went off. Pulling the stick out, Nicholas' eyes widened as he saw the 101.4 numbers.

"You've got a real bad fever." Nicholas informed Ciel.

"Oh....wonderful." Ciel coughed.

Pulling out some cough syrup and pouring it into a spoon, he held the spoon over to Ciel. "Take this."

"No...I hate taking medicine." Ciel found it in him to pout..and Nicholas was once again reminded that this was a child.

"Please my lord?" Nick sighed and tried to put the spoon in the boy's mouth..only for the boy to turn his head the opposite way.
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.title: Late Night Troubles

1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
After several tries of "please" and "no's" Ciel finally let go of his stubbornness and drank the medicine. The earl cringed as he tasted the liquid, he was confused as there was a fruity taste.

"Why..cough does it taste like....grape?"

Nicholas made the medicine vanished before summoning another glass of water. "The medicine from my time has a lot of fruity tastes so it's easier to take."

Ciel squeezed his eyes as he coughed again. "It wasn't as bad...cough!"

Nicholas looked concerned at Ciel. "Should I go get Sebastian my lord?"

Ciel shook his head before looking at his tiny servent. "I just want to sleep, now please...i mean I order you to sing for me."

Nicholas smiled before walking over and snuggling into the crook of Ciel's neck. The earl grunted in confusion before eventually relaxing.

The tiny servent thought over what tune he could sing. A familar one came up, one from when he was younger and his life had been simple and happy. A tune his mother sang when ever he had trouble sleeping. Nicholas took a deep breath before singing.

🎵"Moon river, wider than a mile
I'm crossing you in style someday
Oh, dream maker
You heartbreaker
Where ever you're going I'm going your way
Two drifters off to see the world
There's such a lot of world to see
We're after the same rainbow's end
Waiting round the bend
My huckleberry friend
Moon river and me" 🎵

Ciel's soft breathing soon filled the air and Nicolas hummed before drifting off to sleep.
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.title: Time To Sleep

The Day Proceeds and Ciel Finds Nicholas to Have 'Fun'
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
Before Nicholas knew it, Sebastian had rolled in and thrown open the curtains. "It is time to rise and greet the day my master." Sebastian gently said to the sleeping boy. Ciel slowly opened his eyes, blinking as he felt a strange weight snuggled into his neck.

"Ah, I see Nicholas has already arrived...how sweet." Sebastian said mockingly. Ciel's eyes flared open and he immediately flicked the tiny demon-hybrid off his neck. "W-what do you think you're playing at?!" Ciel snapped, remembering the events of last night..and refusing to acknowledge he and the puny servant were...snuggled up together.

Nicholas hit the floor hard and blinked a bit before Ciel swung his legs over the side of the bed and stomped both of his bare feet down on either side of him. "Let me make it clear to you, I am NOT going to lower myself to being friends with an INSECT just because of my moments of weakness last night! Are we clear?!" Ciel roared down at the bugboy.

"Y-yes, my lord!" Nick squeaked, intimidated once more by the titan of an earl. Sebastian chuckled, "Well...I suppose I should order my new co-butler to GET TO WORK!" Sebastian said authoritatively, like how he ordered around the servant trio..only at a giant level.

"Y-yes sir!" Nicholas yelped as he scurried out of the room beneath the door.

"Quiet." Ciel sneered.
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.title: An Embarassed Earl

choices: Gave a handkerchief and demanded a shoe polish
Popped off his shoes for a rub
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
Ciel huffed as he flipped through his paperwork, feeling like finishing one only led to 5 more sheets. He tapped his large brown dress shoes smirking as he remembered using his new puny servant as an insole.

Still, Nicholas was off trying to perform the duties that someone far bigger then him should do. Ciel would rather enjoy that entertainment as opposed to work.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Um I'm sorry for asking but why can't i just use my power to bring the blankets to the laundry room.", Nicholas nervously asked as he stood in the shadow of Sebastian.

The demon smirked down at the speck between his polished shoes. "Using your abilities for such tasks is rather poor taste. A servant should be able to accomplish simple tasks, now bring the laundry to be cleaned or i will be bringing you to Lord Phantomhive beneath my shoe."

Sebastian hummed as he stepped over the tiny leaving him with a basket of blankets. Nicholas sighed before lifting up the basket, his enhanced strength making it easy. Though making a simple portal would've been easier.

As Nicholas carried the large basket one inch at a time he thought back to his master. Crazy as it sounds befriending the giant would not be too bad, not only may that dial back his cruelty but maybe help be more open about his troubles.

"What are earth?", Ciel's booming voice hit Nicholas, looking forward the tiny saw the large shoes in his path.

"Oh hello master I'm just taking care of laundry!", the servant called up putting aside to be in the shadow of the looming Ciel.

The earl had an amused look as he saw the source of the moving basket. Ciel smirked as he suddenly reached down and grabbed Nicholas in a fist.

"You can do that later, i actually found you at the right time. Work is getting bloody boring and i need my insect to entertain me!", Ciel sneered as he looked at the head sticking out of his fist.

Nicholas paled as not only was he not getting his task done but he was in for more of the earl's cruel fun. Arriving back in his office Ciel unwrapped his fist having the puny demon-hybrid sit on his palm.

"Shrink down to a centimeter", Ciel coldly said narrowing his eye at his servent, giving a command without hesitation.

Nicholas felt fear fill him before closing his eyes and concentrating. He could feel the warm palm become more like a landscape as he shrank down.

Ciel showed his teeth with his smirk as his servant became a mere dot on his palm. "So puny, at this rate even ants would crush you!", Ciel's voice boomed down like thunder getting Nicholas' ears to ring from the soundwaves.

The earl hummed as he tilted his hand not even hearing the panicked squeaks. Nicholas yelled as he fell like a rock to the floor, his powers luckily made the fall like that of a few feet.

Ciel sneered as he lifted up his right foot. "What's this an insect in ny office? No issue i just need to crush it before it escapes!"

Nicholas yelped as Ciel brought his foot down completely putting him beneath the heel of his dress shoe. Ciel smirked as he began to lean onto his foot, desperately wishing to produce crunches from his stomper.

But alas, Nicholas stayes in tact. Groaning as the weight of the leather crushed him to the floor. Even as Ciel swiveled his foot he remained uncrushed.

Ciel scoffed before stomping back to his desk, Nicholas stuck to the heel like a sticker as with each heavy stomp Ciel slammed him to the floor.

Sitting at the desk, Ciel put his feet up before crossing his arms. "Quite a tough insect, I'm disappointed you weren't a symphony of crunches by now. But no mind we can still have fun.", Ciel sneered as he waved his feet.

The earl......
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.title: A Break From Work

choices: Ciel Enjoys His Feet Slowly Being Freed and Taunts Nick In His Booming Voice
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
With the waving of the earl's feet, Nicholas finally came unstuck from the heeled shoe. Nicholas let out an inaudible squeak as he fell onto the desk's surface.

Looming over him were the titan of an earl's mountainous shoes. Ciel had his feet crossed at the ankles on top of his desk, sneering down at the centimeter tall servant.

Ciel pressed the toe of his shoe against the heel of the other. Nicholas gulped, he knew what this was leading to. Finally, with an audible POP, Ciel's heel came out of the dress shoe.

The thin stocking was visibly soaked through, steam poured out of the mouth of the shoe as Ciel reached forward and gripped the toe of the footwear.

Ciel's face loomed above Nick like some kind of Victorian deity. Ciel took his time, his smug grin widening as he slowly pulled the loosened dress shoe off the rest of his humongous appendage.

"Fufufu, I do so enjoy your new size...you are far punier than ever before aren't you?" Ciel's voice boomed down to the 1cm servant.

Nicholas whimpered but gave a "Yes my lord!" This was despite the fact that the young giant couldn't even hear the tiny demon.

Ciel licked his lips and popped off his second dress shoe, placing them down on the floor beneath the desk.

"Now, use that significant strength of yours to remove my stockings. Then you shall rub my noble feet!" Ciel bellowed as he sat back once more in his office chair.

Nicholas gulped, the smell of foot cheese was barely constrained within the socks. "Thank goodness these are a fresh pair from this morning..." Nick whined as he approached Ciel's gargantuan right heel.

The insignificant human turned demon gulped as he looked up, up, up at the towering mountain of black stocking covered sole. The closer the speck sized boy got to the foot, the stronger the heat and stench pouring off of it became.

Walking into the admittedly diluted miasma, Nicholas thanked whatever gods there were for the stockings covering Ciel's colossal feet.

Stockings he was now tasked with pulling off...at 1 centimeter in height. Gulping, Nick took handfuls of the soggy stocking on Ciel's right foot. Nicholas cringed as what seemed like gallons of sweat oozed out of the fibers and ran down his arms.

Nicholas held onto the stocking, and began to walk backwards.
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.title: Precursor to Rub

choices: Ciel grew impatient and stomped his servant
1553323332321211113131211123112211312111.content:
Nicholas tried to yank the sweat filled sock as hard as he could, pulling to make more sweat squelch out. The cheddary fumes emitted like a fog and burned his nostrils. The looming odorous sole mocked him and put the power Ciel had over him show.

With another tug Nicholas managed to pull the damp sock off of Ciel's heel. Revealing the sweaty and smelly sole, the cheesy stench doubled it's smelly odor making Nicholas cough from the overwhelming smell.

Ciel smirked as his bug managed to pull off his foot cloth by the slightest bit. Nicholas already was puny, but being a mere speck before his titan foot just made him even more of a bug.

"Congratulations you pulled my sock off by a few inches. Took you bloody long enough, surprised you weren't buried in my noble smell!", the earl taunted as he lightly tapped his foot, shaking the ground to sent Nicholas to the desk's surface.

The earl leaned his foot forward, darkening the shadow. Nicholas widened his eyes as he thought Ciel was going to squish him. The giant chuckled as he held his foot over the tiny, enjoying the fear he put into his servant.

"Continue your task, I'm rather eager to crush you but i would like my foot rub first!", Ciel ordered with a sneer. Lifting his foot back up, Ciel wiggled his clothed toes.

Nicholas sighed but coughed at the putrid cheese stench, he wanted to get the sock to continue and hopefully finish this task.

Soon....

After a few more minutes, Ciel scowled and grit his teeth. "What is taking so long?!" He roared out before bringing his half-clothed foot on top of Nicholas.

Unfortunately for the minuscule servant, he had pulled the sock up to the arch. That meant there was more of Ciel's bare flesh exposed than covered.

This also meant that his reeking, silky soft bare sole came down upon Nick. Leaning forward and putting pressure on the invincible ant, Ciel sneered as he gripped the loosened toe of the stocking.

"As usual, I have to do everything myself." Ciel thundered as he yanked the sock off and then rolled down the other one.

Both black garments fell to the desk's surface with a disgustingly wet SPLAT! They towered in a pile next to the enormous feet that belonged to the Phantomhive.

"Hmph! I can't even feel you beneath me. You truly are insignificant!" Ciel boomed as he gave a smug smirk.

"M-Master? D-don't forget the city of crooks between your toes, ehehe..." Ciel would hear Nick's telepathic voice in his head.

Ciel scoffed, "If you're hoping to distract me from amusing myself with you...you're mistaken. AND WHO GAVE YOU PERMISSION TO USE YOUR POWERS TO SPEAK TO ME?!?" Ciel bellowed.

155332333312.title: Black*Star

choices: Black*Star Unleashes his Steamy and GODLY barefeet!

1553323333121.content:
"So, let me get this straight. You want me, the almighty Black*Star, to take part in one of your weirdo experiments?" Black*Star said skeptically at Stein, who had called him to his lab after classes for the day were over. "That's right." Stein answered as he rotated the giant screw on the side of his head. Black*Star frowned and turned to leave. "No way."

"You'll get extra credit, besides you haven't heard what it is yet." Stein calmly said. Black*Star stopped in his tracks just as he was about to reach for the doorknob. "Ugh, fine. But if it involves dissecting me-"

"It doesn't. This is something that I'm sure you'll actually like." Stein said as he rolled his chair over to his computer and pulled out a small vial of purplish liquid.

"So what? I have to chug that stuff? It's not even enough soda for someone as big as me!" Black*Star said cockily.

"I was just about to talk about that actually." Stein said, once again rotating his screw.

"How big you are now...is nothing compared to how utterly enormous you'll be when you drink this." Stein said, holding up the vial of liquid.

Black*Star raised an eyebrow, "What is it? Some sort of energy drink or supplement?"

"Not really, more like....well...I'll let you find out. However, you must remember....I'm giving you this experimental serum because it'll help you with a DWMA mission...this isn't a toy."

"Yeah, yeah yeah!" Black*Star swiped the vial from Stein and began to uncork it.

"You should probably go near the mission location before you drink that." Stein casually said.

Black*Star grumbled, "What about Tsubaki?"

"This is a solo mission, for you only. I'm sure you can handle it." Stein said, now having turned his back to Black*Star and begun working on his computer.

"...Ok...weirdo." Black*Star didn't bother to even mutter the last part, he didn't care that Stein heard him.

Black*Star didn't notice that Stein had gotten a creepy smile on his face as the teen left.

=One long trek on foot later=

Black*Star was covered in sweat from the blazing sun that beat down on him during his very long walk to the given location.

"Damn it, I'm gonna pound someone into the dirt when I get to this stupid village of witches! I'm freakin' dying...not that the great Black*Star minds getting a bit sweaty though!" Black*Star gave a weak version of his signature cocky laugh.

Once outside the gates of this supposed witch village, Black*Star reached for his bottle of water in his back pocket.

He saw it was empty and angrily threw it into the dirt, "Damn it! Oh, wait! I have that weird soda that weirdo gave me!" Uncorking the vial, Black*Star chugged it and belched loudly.

"Good stuff! Tasty! URRRP!" Releasing another monstrous belch, Black*Star suddenly felt his body tingling. "What the-...did that wack-job poison me!?"

Black*Star looked down at the ground, and his eyes widened as it quickly became very far away.

He towered over the walls of this village in mere seconds, his height that of 60ft. tall! "Whoaaa! I really AM big now! Bwahahahahaha!" Black*Star's booming laughter rattled the village's very foundations.

"Listen up, witches! I'm the great and all powerful Black*Star! I'm here from the DWMA to dish out some punishment!" The blue-haired teen's booming voice called down to the terrified townspeople and witches alike.
1553323333121.title: Black*Star: Stein's Guinea Pig!?

1553323333123.content:
You weren't sure what happened, all you remembered was falling asleep at night after watching your favorite episodes of Soul Eater. These episodes usually had your favorite character playing a main role, that character was Black*Star.

You also weren't sure what woke you up, but once you did you had discovered you weren't in your room anymore. Not to mention everything was HUGE! You were in shock at first, but then the laughing sun out the window caught your attention.

"Wait...am I....in Soul Eater?!" You gasped as it began to click in your head. Looking down at yourself you saw that you were no longer (thankfully) in your bedtime clothes but appeared to be some type of anime character and had on a casual outfit!

Pulling out your phone and opening your camera, you saw your reflection and sure enough...you were certainly 'animated'.

"Wow! Woohhhoo!" You cheered as you ran around in circles, not even caring that you were a mere 2 inches tall...at least until the incredibly loud sound of the door being literally kicked open was heard.

"YAHOOOO!" An incredibly loud and thunderous voice proclaimed.

You knew whose catchphrase that was! You turned around with a big smile on your face as you saw Black*Star at a tremendous height!

This must be his home, the blue haired ninja certainly looked to have accomplished his dream of 'surpassing god' at the moment...he was HUGE!

You were so star (hehe) struck that you didn't notice the ground shaking as Star went into the kitchen and got a soda.

The floor shook beneath you as Star's giant shoes thudded on the floor with each step. "BLACK*STAR! DOWN HERE!"

Does he notice you...?

The loud ninja didn't seem to notice you as he gleefully stomped over to the couch near you. Black*Star stretched into the sky and walked with heavy steps, a lone left over chip on the ground was given no mercy as it was crushed beneath the large grey sole.

You were a bit nervous after the audible crunch beneath the large shoe. However, a feeling of excitement also filled you as you secretly had a fascination with giants and you favorite Soul Eater character was now making the ground tremble as he once said.

The ninja took another swing of soda before letting out a loud BELCH and laughing

You walked over to the ginormous feet that rose like a building. Your nostrils crinkled as a strong odor was stuffed in, a thick foul chesse that was engulfing Black*Star's feet.

His soles looked tough and firm as he must've been barefoot almost every day. While the scent was strong you did giggle as you saw Black*Star's grinning face above.

Black*Star's eyes drifted down to a strange figure standing before his admittedly large feet. "Huh...?" Black*Star raised an eyebrow and leaned forward.

To you it was as if a mountain was literally moving towards you. Your body was encased in shadow as you looked away from the towering soles and saw the curious frowning face hovering over you. "U-Um....hello....?" You said, rather intimidated at this point.

"Whoa! A talking bug?!" Black*Star's voice bellowed down at you.

"Uh...I'm not a bug! I'm a person!" You called up to the loud giant. Before you could react further, Star plucked you up in his fingers and held you before his eyes.

Black*Star obviously was glad to finally be validated in his opinion of himself..he might have just found himself a tiny admirer who could really appreciate him!

"So...who are you?" Black*Star asked curiously.

"Um...well...I wasn't always this small but...I just thought this would be a great opportunity to see you as the god you really are!" You made up a lie on the spot...well...not exactly a lie.

1553323333332211.title: Asta

choices: Asta kept you between his large pecs
Asta took you out to put somewhere else
You started to slip out of the crevice!
15533233333322112.content:
Your name was Zana a fifteen year old boy, just that. You didn't really have a surname being an orphan and all. You grew up in a church in the village of Hage with others like you, children left alone by thier parents.

Growing up, you never really had much confidence in your magic. Unlike your friend Yuno who was gifted, you often did little feats with your power. Your magic was related to size, or the ability to shift it.

It wasn't that much for others. You could only grow other people about a foot at most. A real display was when you used your magic on yourself. You were able to dwindle down to a inch, and could see the world from a bug's prospective.

It may not be combat efficient, but it was fun being able to sit on others heads and be carried in a palm. Sure you did get bullied sometimes, and may have been on the receiving end of a stomp. But your friends always helped in times of need.

One stood out among them all, a spiky haired boy named Asta.

The teen was easy to spot with his loud voice and fast movement. Asta may lack magic but he certainly made up for it in muscle.

Asta spend a lot of time working out and you did keep him company sometimes. You'd even shrink and watch his hunky body from below. The loud boy always laughed and thought you just liked shrinking. But truth be told, watching Asta looming over you as a giant always brought a blush to your face.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Oi Zana!"

You were sitting outside, enjoying the weather when you heard the familiar loud voice. Looking behind you, Asta was jogging up to you with that signature grin on his face.

"Oh hey Asta.", you meekly said. "What's up?"

Asta pointed towards the woods. "I'm gonna go workout a bit! Wanna join me?'

You nodded and stood up before starting to walk towards the direction of Asta's finger. You were stopped as you felt your friend grab your shoulder. Asta looked at you confused.

"Aren't you gonna shrink Zana?"

You blinked before nodding. A tingling overcame you body as it glowed. The next thing you know your face was facing Asta's waist, then knees, and finally the white tips of his shoes slightly taller then you.

Looking up, you saw Asta's grinning face before it was replaced by his approaching palm that scooped you up and held you in front of his green eyes.

"Haha! I like when you shrink Zana!", Asta's loud voice said as it vibrated the air. "You look more cute like this!'

You felt your face head up as Asta reached his palm to his head and slipped you into his hair. As the silver haired boy dashed into the woods, you held onto his headband to avoid flying off.

Asta soon arrived in a clearing before grabbing you and putting your body on a nearby rock. You then watched in awe as the teen pulled his shirt off, exposing his toned biceps and strong chest with abs. Asta stretched his arms over his chest before scooping you back up.

"Yoshi Yoshi!, I'm gonna secure you now Zana ok?"

You nodded and blushed as you were brought to Asta's firm pecs. Whenever you shrank Asta always enjoys putting you somewhere on his body. He says it's fun and always feel more pumped having you stuffed somewhere.

Placing you at the top of his pec crevice, Asta slowly let go. You slid into the canyon of pecs before stopping as the two muscles held you in place. The pressure increased as Asta bounced his pecs and laughed.

The loud boy then laid on the ground before beginning to do push ups. He felt his muscles clench as he felt your small body.

Being surrounded by the pecs was on thing, but the accompanying sounds made it better. You not only heard Asta's heavy breaths but also his loud heartbeat surrounded you. It became warmer as the pecs squeezed you and sweat began to slip down the crevice.

Meanwhile as Asta was doing his pushups, he looked down at his chest. He grinned and laughed thinking of how his body was protecting you.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

After a while......
15533233333322112.title: A Big Friendship

choices: Your excitement shows.. encouraging Asta further
155332333333221123.content:
As Asta did his six thousandth push-up, his body had become quite slick with sweat. His nude torso glistened with perspiration and his forehead dripped salty drops onto the grass.

Needless to say the area you were in was no exception, you were soaked by a mix of the bigger boy's perspiration and your own.

You suddenly felt yourself sliding downward. Due to how slick his torso was, it was a wonder you hadn't come loose sooner. You squirmed as Asta grunted out his count with each push. "Six thousand twenty! Six thousand twenty one!"

You felt yourself plummeting to the ground. "Asta! Heeelp!" You yelled out, gaining the silver haired giant's attention just in time.

Holding himself up with one arm, he caught you in the palm of his other hand. "Whoa! That was close! I think its break time..."

Asta flopped on his rear and wiped his brow.

"Phew... I've just started and I'm sweating! Hehe, hope you don't mind. I think next I'll do some sit ups and you can go in my armpit! Wouldn't that be funny!?"
155332333333221123.title: Changing Places

choices: Asta took you out of his hot pit
1553323333332211231.content:
"Um....yeah haha!", you quickly answered trying to play off your excitement.

Asta grinned before lifting up his left arm, making sure to give his bicep a quick flex. He began to bring you towards the open armpit. You could smell the salty sweat coating the flesh and could see a few silver hairs sticking and wet.

Making contact, you blush as the warm and slimy skin enveloped you. The sweet smell mixed of the salt and onion like musk tingled your nostrils. You closed your eyes, humming as Asta pressed you into his armpit.

Meanwhile, Asta giggled at the feeling of you in his pit. As he began to quickly start his sit ups and flex his abs, you enjoyed the warm and smelly flesh squeezing you.

The sweat continued to pour down the teens build body, going into the crevices such as his pecs and abs. Asta's body began to glisten as he repeatedly flexed his muscles. All while laughing as he thought of his tiny friend being held in his armpit.

Soon.....
1553323333332211231.title: Hidden excitement

choices: ..we could strengthen you muscles by making you rub my feet!"
..we could push your endurance by squeezing you between my muscles!"
15533233333322112312.content:
It's been 15 minutes since Asta put you in his, to you cave sized, pits and he worked up more and more sweat, covering you with it in the process.
You enjoyed it in there, even though the smell could get rough with some time.. it made you feel safe being closer so the muscular boy than anyone else. Not only that, but the whole setting was calming to you. It was dark, slightly moist but warm, the feeling of the few hairs in Asta's pits brushing your body from time to time and hearing nothing but your giant friends muffled voice counting.

Soon Asta had finished his sit ups and lifted up his arm and you squeezed your eyes together because of the light rushing in.
"So here we go! That should do it for today!" the silver haired boy said before taking you out of his pit.
"Already, Asta? Since when do you stop after just push-ups and sit-ups?"
"Well I kinda listend to a conversation you had with yourself the other day, about how you want to become a magic knight, just like Yuno and I do and I thought I should help you by training you!"
"Yo-you heard that?? I-I.. that was just something.. you know?" you were at a loss of words, you face was bright red and you didn't know what to say. It's true, ever since Asta exclaimed that he wants to become a knight, you started to think about how it would be.
Your Magic wasn't anything you could use for combat.. yet, but you'd probably make a decent spy, or you could try and learn to grow others more than just a foot, giving them an advantage during a fight.. something like that.
But they were just thoughts, nothing you thought about doing for real..
Asta interrupted your thought with his booming voice, "You should become one! I think I'd feel pretty lonely without you, and I think your magic could come handy given the right circumstances! Just believe in yourself Zana!!"

Maybe Asta was right, maybe you could make it..
"Well Asta.. what kind of training did you have in mind?"

"Well I thought...
15533233333322112312.title: Asta took you out of his hot pit

choices: Asta lets you massage his feet some more
Asta thinks it's time to go back and puts you in his shoe for the way home
155332333333221123121.content:
Well, I thought we should first strengthen your muscles!" the silver haired boy shouted out.
"Your magic isn't really combat based, no offense or defense is given, so you need to build up some strength!"
What Asta said did make sense to you, at your normal height you were purely average, you had not a lot of power, speed or durability- and when you are tiny even less so. If you wanted to be of any use you'd have to become physically stronger!
"A-Alright! And what did you have in mind? Lifting weights?"
"No, nothing like that! With your shrunken form we have some advantages when it comes to training. Ever since I listened to you talking to yourself I thought about how we could train! My chest is big enough for you to runaround on it, my hand or even my finger are strong enough for sparing, and so on.
And with your first training session we can kill two birds with one stone." Asta sat down and leaned forward, taking his shoes off and thus reveal his feet, drenched in sweat from his workout.
"You are going to massage my feet! This way my feet can get some air to breath and some relaxation and you can strengten your arms!"
"Massage your feet? U-Uhh might I ask what other things you came up with?" you asked the Giant curiously and a bit scared.
"I don't wanna give away all of it, most of it should be a surprise, but I guess I can tell you some things. You got a couple of advantages that I don't have when it comes to training. With your small size you can practically train anywhere. Here out in the woods with me, indoors, etc. So some parts of your workout will be parallel to mine out here, you could run laps around my body while I do sit-ups, try and dodge my drops of sweat while I do push ups or massage me after my workout.
Other times you will train when we are at the orphanage- push my shoes around or dodge the feet of the boys and girls. So you can get stronger, faster and more durable in as little time as possible!"

You were amazazed about how much thought Asta had giving this, the training methods may be... exotic to say the least but you had to try it. Asta always managed to ignite a fire in you and made you feel like anything is possible.
"A-Alright! I'll do it, so that I can become a magic knight! And Asta, don't show mercy with me. If I try to chicken out of this, force me! If I try to give up, punish me! I want to serve the kingdom together with you and Yuno!"
"That's the spirit! So let's not waste anymore time, massage my feet!" Asta said with a big grin on his face.
"Yes, Sir!" You moved towards Asta's giant feet and put your hands against the moist skin.
The smell was nothing really new to you, thanks to your training sessions you experienced most of Asta's body odor first hand. Sometimes the smell stuck to you for days before you were able to completely wash it off. His feet were surprisingly soft, they had a few rough spots, but you were sure his feet would have a whole other feeling to them.
You soon understood why Asta thought of it as a training, at your size it was hard to push the flesh around and the moist skin didn't make it any easier for you.

While you started to get exhausted after just 10 minutes, Asta watched you with sparkling eyes- it felt great. Not only was it fun for him to see how someone tiny massaged his feet, it was relaxing. Not to talk about that he was actually helping his friend by having his feet massaged!
The giant boy happily hummed as he thought of even more training options for you.

1553323333332221.title: Mahiru and Kuro

choices: Suddenly there is a knock at the door
15533233333322211.content:
It had been a tough day for Mahiru, between school and making a quick trip to the store, the brunette was feeling tired as he stood in line to check out his groceries.

"Hopefully Kuro isn't munching on chips, I'd like him to have a real meal for once.", Mahiru sighed as he thought of his servamp, lounging around and eating junk food and dirtying up the apartment.

However as he was lost in his thoughts, Mahiru failed to notice a figure walking by. The kimeno clad man swiftly passed a shiny apple into Mahiru's basket his red eyes narrowing as he was gone within the next second.

Checking out his groceries, Mahiru smiled as he exited the store. Meanwhile Tsubaki watched with a sly smile as he chuckled. "I hope you enjoy my gift Mahiru Shirota, it will definitely give you a...different perspective."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mahiru smiled as he walked into his apartment, opening his bookbag he scooped out the snoozing black cat. "Kuro wake up we're home."

The cat yawned before sighing as it hopped to the floor. Walking over to a pile of pillows, the cat poofed before a familiar bluenette flopped onto the pile. Kuro yawned stretching out. "How long were you out Mahiru? I can tell whea nap goes on."

Mahiru hummed as he walked into the kitchen. "I needed to get ingredients for dinner and there was a sale so you know it was busy!"

The vampire put his hands behind his head as he lounged back, he could've gone for some instant ramen but Mahiru was being eager to cook a hot meal.

......not that he minded.

Pulling out the ingredients for a katsudon dish, Mahiru rose an eyebrow as among the groceries was an apple. It looked like it came straight from a fairy tale as it shined.

"I...don't remember buying this, why would i need an apple for katsudon?", picking up the fruit Mahiru didn't know what compelled him, but he took a bite out of the fruit. Mahiru's eyes widened at the fresh taste.

"Wow i didn't know they had these on sale!", Mahiru smiled as he took another bite. "I definitely should buy some mor-!"

The brunette suddenly gasped as a strange feeling came over him, a strange light headedness. Before he could sit down, Mahiru gasped as before his eyes the counter was now at the level of his eyes!

Second by second, the ground drew closer and the ceiling of the kitchen rose higher. Soon Mahiru stood in shock as the kitchen appliances now loomed into the sky like skyscrapers!

Mahiru yelped as suddenly the ground shook as the apple fell down beside him, almost flattening him like a bug.

"Wh-what is this?! How did i...was it the apple, what the heck happened?!", Mahiru yelled in panic as he looked up the looming counter.

"Mahiru you ok?", Kuro's voice boomed from the other room. Mahiru perked up as he heard his Servamp's voice. "Kuro quick get in here!"

The eve began to jog as quick as he could to the entrance of the kitchen, though the shrunken size began to show as after a minute of jogging, Mahiru only tredded a foot.

Stopping to catch his breath, Mahiru sighed. "I need to get to Kuro, i don't know how but maybe he'll know something!"

Before he could jog again, the ground suddenly began to shake. Mahiru tried steading himself as the ground shook like that of...steps.

"Mahiru?", the booming voice of Kuro boomed as he entered the kitchen. He held onto his tired look, though his eyes grew concerned as he couldn't find his brunette eve. Yet he wasn't feeling a separation so he couldn't be far.

Mahiru ran up and looked up in awe as the looming giant form of Kuro stretched into the sky. The vampire's black boots sat on each side of him, looking to be as big as houses.

"Kuro down here!", Mahiru yelled as loud as he could and waved his arms.

Kuro...

155332333333222222.content:
It had been a rough night for the greed pair.

What was supposed to be a simple investigation into the latest whereabouts of Tsubaki turned into a ambush. Licht had manage to subdue the subclass attacking with his piano, but one managed to make a hit on Lawless.

Surprisingly the Servamp wasn't hurt, but rather the strange magic caused a negative reaction in shrinking the vampire down to an inch.

This didn't seem to affect Lawless as he still held his high attitude. Of course Licht was now on essentially babysitting duty for his Servamp.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Hey Angel-chan wake up!", Lawless yelled enthusiastically as he hit the nose of the dark haired boy.

Licht blinked the sleep out of his eyes as he looked down to see the vampire sitting on his nose as if it was a seat. The Austrian boy narrowed his eyes as he sat up and plucked up the vampire between his thumb and finger.

"What do you think you're doing shitty Hedgehog! An angel needs his beauty sleep.", the boy said soon closing his eyes as his sparkly aura surrounded him.

Lawless grinned. "Aw come on Licht your sleep won't make you anything less then holy. After all you have your loyal servamp by your side, the dynamic duo Hyde and Lich-!"

Before the vampire could continue his monologue, Licht flicked him onto the ground beside his bed. The vampire couldn't even groan as Licht materialized his black boots, hopping out of bed and slamming his boot on the tiny vampire

"Shut up shut up you pesky demon, be like the bug you are and get crushed!", Licht said annoyed swiveling his boot and repeatedly stomping Lawless like a insect.

The vampire wasn't bothered as he grinned with each stomp of his Eve's heavy boot.

"Aw Licht-"

CRUSH

"I guess I'm your-"

GRIND

"Ladybug~", Lawless beamed before Licht flattened him under the heel of his boot.

Licht tched before sitting on his bed, keeping his heel on Lawless to pin him down. He still wasn't use to stomping on his vampire at this size, sure he usually stepped on his face but now being able to cover him with his boot was new.

What was next?

15533233333322223.content:
You weren't sure what happened as you stirred from the depths of unconsciousness. The surface below felt like that of a wooden table and it didn't run out as you stretched. Voices suddenly came from above, though they were booming and sounded like they were super high up.

"Eh, Licht-Tan aren't you happy with my gift?!"

"Rotten hedgehog, what kind of gift is this!"

Opening your eyes, you gasped at the looming sight before you. Two pairs of giant legs dressed in black and white led up to a pair of giant young men. The one on the left had golden hair with black tip and red eyes behind glasses. The right one had black hair with a white streak and strangely a backpack with wings.

The golden giant soon looked down at you followed by the cold gaze of the other. The giant with glasses soon grinned a toothy smile with fangs as he suddenly crouched down and brought his large face close.

"Ah your awake Tiny-Chan!", the cheerful voice boomed knocking you back. The toothy giant held a hand to his chest. "My name is Lawless the servamp of greed, and this is my heavenly eve Licht Jekylland Todoroki!"

Looking up at the so called angel, you simply saw a uninterested face. Suddenly Licht rose one of his legs and position his boot over you!

"Stupid hedgehog why'd you bring this annoying runt here!", Licht began stomping his black boot down with intend to crush you.

Just as the heel of the boot was about to flattened you, Lawless catched the foot. The vampire rather then angry, pouted at his eve.

"Licht-Tan! It was hard to get a tiny human, he can really be fun to play with!"

Licht tched and lowered his foot, stuffing his hands in his jacket pockets. "What can a bug do for an angel.

Lawless stood up, ignoring your present fear as he loomed over. "Well Licht-Tan, Tiny-Chan can...

1553323333332223.title: Other

15533233333322231.content:
In was the time of sunset and the Alicein household complimented it well. Sitting by the fountain of the wide courtyard, Misono had a small table with tea freshly poured. However, the purplenette declined taking a sip as he tapped his finger with a troubled look.

The bright butterfly that was his servamp soon perched on the armrest of Misono's chair. "You seemed troubled, you're not one to let your tea get cold."

Misono sighed as he put a palm to his forehead. His source of frustration came with a bad run in with Tsubaki's subclasses yesterday, he wasn't troubled for himself but what happened to his friend Mahiru. The brunette had rushed in not to mention wasn't as good as ge could be with his lead.

Mahiru had gotten a few injuries and luckily they got away. While he usually kept up his high front mannerisms, Misono was both worried and angered at Mahiru getting hurt due to recklessness.

"I swear he rushes in and dosen't even make sloth take any blood! He still knows so little about being a eve.", Misono ranted before softening his gaze. "I don't want to him...i can't."

As the sun set and the night sky pulled over, Snow Lily fluttered up before landing beside the seat of his eve in his vampire form. The blond hummed as he smiled.

"So you want Mahiru Shirota to be better trained as a eve, i knew you cared for him~", Lily closed his eyes with a grin.

Misono flushed. "S-shut up, and yes...i do wish for him to be a better eve."

The servamp looked off before suddenly pulling a small vile out of his pocket and setting it on the table. Misono looked confused at the honey like substance. "Lily what is.."

"This is a old formula your family locked up, even before i was serving you it was in the Alicein vaults. They say it could give who ever consumed it...a smaller perspective.", the vampire explained recalling past stories he heard.

Misono blinked in thought before thinking over what his servamp said. A different perspective, that could help teach Mahiru? Perhaps he could make a plan out of this.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Why do you think Misono called us this early?", Mahiru asked as he walked with Kuro on his shoulder.

The cat let out a small groan as he slumped tiredly. "I don't know, how troublesome we had to wake up early.", Mahiru sweatdropped as they only woke up at 8 a.m.

Walking up to the large Alicein manor, Mahiru couldn't help but still be in awe of his new friend's home. Before he could knock, the door opened and they were greeted by Mari and Yuri.

"Thank you for coming Mahiru and Sleepy Ash, Misano is waiting.", the subclasses said in sync.

The brunette awkwardly chuckled before nodding. "Yeah..no problem lead the way-GAH!", Mahiru groaned in pain as his shoulder still stung from the scuffle with Tsubaki's subclasses.

Kuro opened his eyes. "Mahiru i told you to take it easy.", Mari and Yuri looked concerned before nodding to each other. "Please come with us, Misono can help you."

The eve followed the two subclasses through the decorated halls. Mahiru was curious as to what the rich boy had in store, calling him out of the blue.

Soon they arrived at a wide lavish room, Misono had his hands clasped and three cups of tea were layed out on the table. Lily smiled as he saw the visitors arrive. "Thank you Mari and Yuri, and welcome big brother and Mahiru, please sit."

"Hey sorry if we're late, you kinda called outta the blue.", Kuro lazily said popping out of cat form.

Misono sighed. "I called you both here because we need to discuss your method of fighting. Or rather...your lack of strategy."

Mahiru frowned as he took a seat. "Look i know this is about that fight but i thought i could incapacitate Belk-"

"You nearly were killed, you are lucky the worst he did was bruise you!", Misono snapped as he hit the table. "Do you think the people care about you wish to see you another casualty of this war!"

Mahiru widened his eyes before unconsciously touching the bandaid on his cheek. Misono took a deep breath before relaxing into his chair, feeling faint already from that outburst.

"Look i just want to teach you not to be so reckless in the face of danger. But first why don't we have some tea.", Misono gave a small smile before picking up his cup.

The tension slowly vanished an Mahiru smiled as he nodded picking up his cup, not noticing how his and Kuro's appeared a different color.

Lily smiled as he leaned down. "Tea is always a warm welcome, especially when occupied by..", the servamp said beginning to slip off his shirt.

Misono spit out his tea. "Don't strip the tea's enough!"

Mahiru chuckled as he sipped the tea along with Kuro, a sweet honey taste hit his taste buds. "How this tea is amazing Miso-!"

Before the brunette could continue he suddenly felt weightless before it felt as if he was falling. The area around him looked like it grew in size and he was falling towards his seat.

Kuro lazily blinked as he feel, however he shrugged before falling back into a nap. Mahiru felt shock overcome him and he faint just before a sudden warm ground cushioned his fall.

Lily smiled as he quickly caught the vampire and eve, both fitting in the center of his palm. Walking back over to Misono, the servamp placed the now tiny pair onto his open palm.

Misono gave a determined look at the inch tall figures on his palm. "Now, i can teach you how to not treat a fight like child's play. I won't stop untill you show results."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
What did Mahiru and Kuro wake up to?
15533233333322231.title: Misono's Small Teaching

choices: Mahiru and Kuro Have to Fight Against Misono's Fumes Through the Maze!
155332333333222312.content:
Mahiru groaned as he slowly opened his eyes. "Ugh...what happened?" Slowly standing up, Mahiru looked down to see Kuro laying on the ground. "Kuro!" Mahiru cried out, getting the vampire to open his half lidded eyes.

"Must you always be so noisy?" The Servamp complained as he closed his eyes once more. Looking around, Mahiru saw they appeared to be in some sort of labyrinth.

"Where...are we?" Mahiru inquired aloud, looking up he saw their ceiling was made up of some sort of clear surface. There were holes dotted across the ceiling. But looking past that transparency...he saw they were indeed still in Misono's mansion.

"Alright..I give up...what kind of crap is this?! This isn't simple at all!" Mahiru complained.

"Correct." A booming...and somewhat familiar voice rumbled down to them.

Their prison shifted, and Mahiru felt as if the entire world was shaking and falling apart. Kuro remained dozing, either uninterested or uncaring about what was going on.

Mahiru fell on his rear and looked up to see none other than Misono himself...a giant!

"M-Misono!? What the hell! You're huge!" Mahiru yelled out.

The purple haired rich boy couldn't help but gain a smug grin on his face. He always had disliked being short compared to others. "This is how I intend to show you how to be a proper Eve..."

"By shrinking us? I don't get it..." Mahiru said doubtfully. Misono chuckled darkly, "That maze you find yourselves in has been built on to my normal footwear EXACTLY to my specifications! Consider this an endurance test...as well as a lesson in team work." With that, Misono lifted a visibly sweaty bare foot and slid it into the boot.

Mahiru and Kuro's maze prison was thrown into darkness for only a few moments, as the sole came to rest atop the transparent ceiling and press against it.

Miniature lamp posts lit up along the maze, Mahiru blinked. "Jeez, talk about attention to detail...wait...." Mahiru looked up in awe to see that..sure enough...Misono's colossal sole was pressed firmly against that transparent ceiling....and was beginning to fill the entire labyrinth with a cheesy smell.
155332333333222312.title: Misono's Maze

choices: Mahiru and Kuro are still lost in the cheesy maze
1553323333332223121.content:
The plump sole firmly pressed against the ceiling, a squelching noise rang throughout the labyrinth as sweat dripped through the holes. A thick odor composed of cheesy foot fumes began to fumigate, Mahiru coughed as the putrid odor was emitted from the sweaty sole squashed up against the wall.

"Misono this is insane cough!", Mahiru shouted only for the colossal sole to squelch more cheddary fumes. The brunette yelled out in shock as a bucket sized drop of sweat landed on his head. "Ah gross!"

Kuro groaned as he finally opened his eyes. "How troublesome, I'll accept getting squashed like a bug if it gets rid of this smell."

Mahiru coughed as he was covered in sweat, having the sweaty odor pop around him. "Misono let us out!"

The servamp looked up at the source of the stench. "I doubt he'll hear us now that his stomper's in the way, which means he's not letting us out anytime soon."

Loud thumps soon echoed throughout the labyrinth, this was caused by Misono wiggling his toes. This had a strong effect as his toe gaps let out the cheddar gunk stench, much more strong then the sweat pouring out of his plump sole.

Mahiru hissed as his ears ringed from the thumps, the cheddary was stronger now. The maze now felt like a humid city, warmth smellt odors heating them up. "I guess we have no choice, we need to get out of here!"

Kuro blinked before sighing. "What trouble, alright i rather not take a nap in some brat's shoe. So let's go."

The brunette gave a determined nod before jumping as a sudden barrage of sweat drops dropped where they stood. "Let's go!"

The swevamp and eve were in for a exercise as the looming sole mocked them and attacked them with it's rank smell.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Misono leaned his chin on his palm, his booted foot up on a footstool. He felt successful that his plan was in motion, Mahiru and Sloth would improve even if he needs to be their titan.

A boast to his ego followed as well, he felt it when ge wore his platforms and wasn't as short as before. But now he had two tinies in a maze beneath his foot, it made him feel powerful and that he had control over his friends.

"It seems they began.", Lily hummed as he looked into the platform prison, managing to spot the specks moving.

"Good, now if they strategize a plan then they'll be breathing fresh in no time.", Misono smugly smiled as he pressed his sole more into the boot. Feeling his plump sole squeeze out the sweat to create for the tinies.

The boy smirked as he looked at his boot. "Maybe i should have informed them that my feet get quite warm when confined."

Soon...

15533233333322231211.content:
Misono pressed his sole into the boot harder, making his sole secrete more foul sweat drops that fell like rain into the maze. Mahiru and Kuro dashed throughout the corridors. They were constantly being pelted by bomb like sweat droplets.

"Is it me, or is it heating up in here?" Kuro asked his Eve. "This place is becoming like an oven! Is Misono crazy?! He's liable to cook us alive in this thing!" Mahiru complained aloud.

Kuro flopped to the sweat soaked floor, "G-go on without me..." Kuro complained as he poofed back into his kitten form.

"Ugh! You can't give up already!" Mahiru scolded in spite of himself, this place really was heating up..enough to make both him and his servamp sweat themselves.

Picking up the cat, Mahiru placed the tuckered out feline onto his shoulder and continued trekking throughout the maze.

Not only was the heat increasing to overbearing heights...the stink of foot cheese was worsening by the second.

"Gross...I've heard of using cheese in a maze...but this is ridiculous!" Mahiru complained.

"That joke was horrendous..." Kuro whined.

"Oh shut it..." Mahiru replied as he took a left turn.

~~~~~~~~~~~~

Misono wore a smug grin as he flexed and wiggled his toes, feeling how soggy they were and enjoying how he was putting his friends through the ringer. Taking a sip of his tea, Misono waved Lily on.

The Servamp bowed obediently and brought over Misono's phone to hand to its purple haired owner. "I've taken the liberty of hooking up a live feed to the maze. You may speak directly to Mahiru and Kuro...words of encouragement...or otherwise." Lily explained.
15533233333322231211.title: A Maze with a LOT of Cheese

choices: Mahiru and Kuro manage to find the exit
155332333333222312111.content:
Mahiru cringed as a drop nearly hit him, as it splashed it released a pocket of odor. The brunette fluffed his shirt as he sweated himself, the fog of putrid cheese fumes heated him up like the Tetsu's onsen. A booming squish noise rang out as the plump sole stamped against the ceiling, letting another barrage of sweat drops fall.

Just as he was about to bold, Mahiru raised an eyebrow as he felt his phone vibrate. Taking it out he coughed as he gasped see misono's name pop up. Maneuvering through the fog of sweaty cheddar funk, Mahiru pressed against a wall and accepted the call.

"M-misono!?", Mahiru said covering his nostrils.

Misono sounded calm. "Hello Mahiru, i trust you've made your trek through the maze?", the purplenette made thooms as he causally wiggled his toes.

The brunette crouched down as he breathed in the putrid fumes. "Misono you need to let us out, it feels like a sauna not to mention, no offense your feet smell!"

Misono chuckled as he relieved his sole before pressing it back into the insole with a loud squelch!

"Understand me when i say i don't intend to let you two out. My foot's aroma will consume you unless you find the exit! I will wear this boot to bed if i have to and make sure my cheese fills the maze."

Kuro let out a nya as he curled up on his Eve's shoulder. "Just let us out would you, i can't take the best nap when it's in someone's shoe.

Misono grew a tick mark as he lifted up his foot an inch before stomping it down. While small, for the Sloth pair Mahiru went five feet in the air as the whole maze shifted before landing with a groan.

The sudden step had the plump sole release more drops, Mahiru yelped as puddles of warm cheddary sweat crashed around him.

"The only way out of this maze is by you two finding the exit!", Misono snapped. Suddenly a smirk grew as he pressed his sole to the ceiling swimming in his sweat. "Just for that I'll add more to this lessson. My sleep schedule may come into effect soon, but my sole with still give you my sweat."

Mahiru coughed as the cheesy air was magnified and making the air itself hazy with its aroma.

"If you two are not out by the time i wake up then i will give a punishment for your failure.", Misono said tapping his big toe.

"What come on Misono we can't spend the night in here, we'll be baked alive!", Mahiru said feeling panicked by both the prospect of staying a night in here not to mention a punishment.

Misono chuckled. "You two best hurry, if you are bothered by my feet now then I'm sure being my insoles is a different story."

The call ended and Mahiru widened his eyes, not only were they being heated up by their friend's cheddary fumes but now they had a time limit.

"An insole, how troublesome.", Kuro groaned as his nose got clogged with odor.

Mahiru stood up, cautiously walking out into the line of sweat drops. He needed to hurry or they'd be in for worst.

Next...
