155332333333222322.content:
It was a cool day as fall had reached the city, people were bundled up as the chilly air carried a breeze and shedded red leaves. Mahiru Shirota smiled as he strolled down the pathway and enjoyed the air.

The brunette was on his way to his friend and fellow eve's hot hotspring. Tetsu had invited him and Misono over to enjoy the warm baths admist the chilly weather. Kuro was curled up in his scarf trying to stay warm. "Nyahh, why couldn't we stay home, i could've enjoyed a warm nap."

Mahiru looked amused as he adjusted his scarf. "Tetsu invited us over after we've been held up as of lately. Plus...you know naps are better after a warm bath.", the eve smiled.

Kuro let out a hum before sticking his head out. "Mmmhh well you better pull me out if i fall asleep.", Mahiru chuckled. "Will do."

Mahiru suddenly yelped as someone bumped into his shoulder. A boy in white ripped clothes gasped as he furiously bowed his head. "Ah I'm so sorry!"

"Um it's ok! I was lost in my thoughts i didn't see you.", Mahiru waved his hands, awkwardly trying to stop the string of apologies coming out of the stranger.

The white clad stranger had comedically tears falling as he bowed one more time. "I'm so so sorry i can't believe myself!", the crying boy suddenly ran in the opposite direction that the duo were going.

Mahiru blinked slowly as he tried to process what just happened. "D-did i say something wrong?"

The cat servamp sighed as he sank his head back into the scarf. "S'probably worried about offending people or something, either let's go i wanna take the best nappp.."

Sighing, Mahiru began his trek again attempting to put that strange encounter behind him. Unknownst to him the stranger peeked his head out from behind a tree, looking at his disappearing form.

Elsewhere, a orange leaf fell to the ground, only to be crunched into pieces as a wooden sandal stepped on it. Tsubaki hummed as he brought the buzzing phone to his ear.

"I-i put the dust on the eve of Sloth, it should effect the next human he comes across."

Tsubaki cackled as he stepped on another fallen leaf. "Hehehe finally something interesting, i hope those eves have a grand time!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Ah hey you guys are here.", Tetsu smiled as he let Mahiru and Kuro into the nice building.

Kuro popped into human form as he yawned. "That walk took forever, couldn't you have used your lead."

"We got here in like 30 minutes and no i couldn't fly here we'd be seen!", Mahiru said his eye twitching at the laziness of his partner.

Old child hummed as he peeked over the broad shoulder of his Eve. "You managed to get Sleepy Ash out of your house that alone is a accomplishment."

Tetsu scratched his head as he went to his thoughts. "Misono got here not to long ago, i made snacks but the other customers got kinda hungry."

Mahiru looked curiously at the blond. "What do you mean got hungry?"

The shoji door suddenly opened quickly to reveal an agitated Misono. "He means he gave the food meant for us to the other guests! I swear this is why i didn't want to leave him in charge of the snacks."

Lily popped his head in not irritated like his eve. "Oh come now I'm sure we could just make some more, the hot springs won't cool down anytime soon."

Tetsu nodded and smiled. "Right I'll make some more! This time their for us got it."

The brunette sighed but chuckled. "Well help you out, it'll go a lot faster if we all help out. Kuro you go ahead I'm gonna take my stuff out."

Kuro sighed. "How troublesome, don't rake forever ok?", the vampire followed the other to the kitchen to prepare food for the second time.

Misono went to follow but rose an eyebrow as he noticed something shining of the brunette's jacket. "Mahiru...what's that on your back?"

Mahiru blinked as he took his jacket off. "Huh i don't know, it looks like glitter but it's glowin-wait what!"

The glittering substance suddenly began to intensify, Mahiru and Misono shielded their eyes as the light overtook them. As it dimmed the boys were now no where to be found.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tetsu hummed as he opened up the door to the room he reserved for his friends. "Mahiru Mr. Sloth was asking about you and Mr.Lust was worried about getting his clothes dirty cause he started to..huh?"

The blond blinked as the room was empty, Mahiru backpack was on the table. It was like they just vanished. Tetsu scratched his head confused before momentarily getting a whiff of a sour stench from his under arms.

"Oh yeah i haven't bathed today i was focused on getting everything ready.", the blond wasn't bothered by the smell not to mention his earlier push ups didn't help the sweat he shed.

Meanwhile Mahiru groaned as he woke from his faint spell. "What..was that?", Looking over, the brunette gasped as he saw his friend also unconscious. "Misono are you ok?!"

Coming over Mahiru gently shook Misono, the purplenette blinked before quickly sitting and looking around. "What was that where are we?"

Before the brunette could respond the ground suddenly began to shake, each second a loud thoom crashed into the ground and made the ground move like an earth.

"Eh what is that!?", Misono yelped as he stood up and nearly fell over. He and his fellow eve rushed around the building his wooden wall and around the corner. What awaited them was shocking.

Tetsu was standing over 200 feet into the sky, his toned body was as high as a mountain much more taller then usual. The thooms were a result of the large firm yet meaty soles of the giant stomping the ground, the smeared sweat slapping against the tatami floors.

Mahiru looked wide eyed at the sight. "T-that dust must've shrunk us but how when.."

Misono gridded his teeth. "I can't believe it....I'm shorter then before how is this fair!"

Tetsu hummed as he wondered where his friends went. He should maybe check out Mahiru's bag to see if he left a note. As he began walking over...
155332333333222322.title: A TALL Friend

choices: Tetsu readying another stomp, he spotted them!

1553323333332223221.content:
As he neared the table Tetsu's eyes suddenly spotted two tiny specks from the corner of the table. Now from the blond's height not only did the small forms look unrecognizable, but the squeaking that was his friends didn't even reach his ears.

Tetsu rubbed the back of his head as he rose an eyebrow. "Huh what kinda bugs are those? It's cold out so why would we have bugs.", wiggling his large toes and creating thumbs that shook the ground, Tetsu hummed.

"I should probably get rid of them, dad wouldn't want them crawling around.", Tetsu nodded before he began stomping over to the specks, now forgetting Mahiru's bag on the table.

Meanwhile, Mahiru and Misono had tried calling up to their friend only for him to not react. They had been hopeful after his blue eyes locked on them.

Misono sighed in relief. "Thank goodness, now we just have to tell him to look at your jacket. Hopefully he won't shrin-"

However the voice of Testu boomed down, more mightier then a intercom. Mahiru and Misono widened their eyes as Tetsu had seen them but thought they were invasive bugs. What he said definitely showed how dangerous this predicament was.

The blond began to walk over, the two boys yelped as from a step alone they sent tumbling onto thier backs. The already large soles were now bigger then houses as they carried the giant blond. Tetsu's sweaty soles smooshed against the tatami , a salty and strong scent coming from the firm soles.

The shaking stopped but as the boys looked up they gasped. Sitting in front of them was the round and large toes bigger then them, a vinegar salt odor flowed out. But looming high up Tetsu looked down at the dots before his large feet, he looked curiously as he tilted his head.

Mahiru coughed as the salty smell hit him, his nostrils getting burned up from the heavy odor. "Tetsu it's us, were not bugs!", he tried to yell up.

Tetsu however still couldn't hear them from his towering height. As he lifted his large foot, sweat glistened as it smeared across the firm yet meaty foot. Putting his hands on his hips, Testu frowned.

"Sorry little guys i can't have you crawling around, i promise I'll crush you quick ok.", raising his foot higher Tetsu smiled as stomping from this height should quickly squish the insects out.

Misono was frozen as he looked up in fear, a shadow of vinegar doom loomed over. The kind face of their friend was blocked by a foot that he intended to crush them under. The sole began to come down, intended on crushing them beneath it.

However, Mahiru snapped out of his shocked gaze as he quickly summoned his lead, grabbing Misono and flying them out of the stomping foot's path. Just as they escaped the shadow, Tetsu's foot slapped against the floor sending them tumbling of off of Mahiru's broom.

Tetsu leaned down onto his foot, he hummed confused as he felt the lack of anything crunching under his sweaty sole. Either he missed or those bugs were REALLY tiny. Sure enough lifting his foot showed a lack of bug carcass on his large sole.

"Mr. Bugs i promised to make it quick, my feet aren't scary. Well to me at least.", Tetsu began looking around trying to spot the fleeing specks.

Mahiru and Misono meanwhile were cringing as that fall definitely caused some bruises. The brunette rubbed his head. "Geez i can't believe Testsu didn't recognize us, even try and stomp us?!"

Before the two could discuss more the ground began to shake again. Both stood up in the case they needed to flee again. However as soon as they did a shadow casted over, looking up the cause was...

155332333333223231122.content:
The streets of Konoha were surprisingly desolate today... probably due to the major heatwave that had washed over the ninja village in the last week. While most shinobi were used to harsh conditions, the untrained residents of the town were more interested in staying in the cool air as much as possible.

You, however, were busy trying to get a handle on this new jutsu you'd found. An old scroll in your apartment had held an old script, and some drawings of hand signs you'd not seen before. No matter how many times you did the hand signs though... it didn't work. Nothing happened. Not even a spark of chakra or anything. At this point, you'd taken to idly performing hand signals as you walked around, wandering down the street to pick up some food.

As you slapped your sweaty palms together one last time, you sighed. Maybe you should just give it a rest... As you thought that, you twisted your palms together, a sudden puff of smoke erupting from around your body! You'd done it! Now to find out what this jutsu did...!

The smoke clouded your vision, you couldn't see through the thick white. It was weird, jutsu smoke usually dispersed almost instantly, unless a lot was produced... Waving you hand in front of your face, you tried to blow away the smoke... but it was pointless.

Meanwhile, Naruto Uzumaki was strolling down the dusty streets of Konoha, groaning from the heat. 'Geeeez... Someone tell the sun to turn it down a notch, will ya...?'

As he's walking forward, he the blonde jinchuriki notices a cloud of smoke in the street.

Each of his sweaty toes were the size of your body, tending as they supported the literal god strolling over you! Gaping in shock and awe at the collossal ninja, you have no time to dodge as his leather sole kicks into you, throwing you up under his toes! Your tiny body getting squeezed in under his sticky toes, groaning as the giant left you to swelter even more under the heat of his feet, trapped and dragged along for the ride...

Where's Naruto going?

Yukine looked at the possession in his hands, a nice looking skateboard that he grabbed no problem. He smirked as he sat against the wall of a building, he managed to get a good distance away from that god. Speaking of...

"Hey!"

The blond boy looked up and frowned as a few feet away was Yato. The god walked over and narrowed his bright eyes as he saw the small skate board in his arms.

"Did you steal something again?", Yato asked in a stern voice.

Yukine tched as he stood up and placed a foot on the board. "No, I found this in the trash! So its mine."

However, just as Yukine lifted his other foot up to skate away a loud CRACK echoed as the blond suddenly stumbled forward. The god and Shinki widened their eyes as gey saw the board had broken in half.

This was strange as the skateboard looked reinforced and new. Yato looked up to speak but gasped as he saw a difference in Yukine. The young teen was now taller then him by about two feet, Yukine looked surprised as he know had to tilt his head down to look at Yato.

"Damn I didn't think this would happen! The corruption is reacting differently, I need to stop it or who knows how big he'll get?"

"Yukine you need to confess now or els-"

What was next?
155332333333223233331211111.title: Yukine's Foot Fun

1553323333332232333312111111.content:
The Shinki was loving his new size, not to mention the feeling of a tiny human beneath his sole felt strangely relaxing. Still, Yukine could feel Yato's puny body but his sock prevented him from getting the full experience.

Placing his other foot down, Yukine brought the foot squashing Yato up. The teen laughed as the god fell to the ground from his plump sole. Gripping the end of his socks, Yukine slowly pulled the white cloth with dirt stains from his heel.

Yukine sighed as his sweaty foot was exposed to the cool air. The Shinki took a small sniff and chuckled.

"Hmn, these must have been on for a while!", Yukine tossed the sweaty sock over his shoulder. The sock actually made a small dent on a car from it's weight.

Yato groaned as he picked up the fumes of cheese stuck to his clothes. The god let out a loud EEK as Yukine placed his barefoot on the side of him. Yato could only look up in dread as his Shinki slipped off his other moist sock and placed his other humongous foot beside him.

The chessy odor from the feet spread and repelled anyone walking by. The thick scent was creating a visible haze as Yato caughed, inhaling the musk.

The god gasped as he saw the towering teen put his hands on his hips. Yukine smiled and rose his right foot. Yato could see sweat drops yet to fall and dirt already sticking to the crevices in the sole. The Shinki's face was covered but Yato knew Yukine was joyed as he wiggled his toes and rose the squishy sole higher before stepping down.

Yato was squashed by the thick and plump sole. The stomp produced a lovely squish sound and Yukine hummed as he lifted his heel and swiveled his foot to make more amazing squishes.

The god's muffled yells were silenced and awarded only with the bitter salty and cheddar sweat being swallowed by accident. Yato gagged as he felt sick at the gross sweat.

Yukine's smirk grew as he leaned onto the foot squashing Yato. He placed a hand on his knee, wanting to add extra force.

1553323333332232333331.title: Pokemon

15533233333322323333312.content:
(Takes place in Heartgold, at Victory Road before the Pokemon League)

Ethan winced as he was thrown back onto the floor of the cave. The boy groaned as he opened his eyes as he saw the pokemon holding his starter roll up, the last attack was critical enough to make them faint.

A shadow soon covered Ethan and looking up he was greeted by the sneering face of his rival. Silver stood over him pocketing the pokeball that made him the winner of this fight.

The red haired boy smugly grinned. "You honestly thought of facing the league? All our matches up intill this point, you must have had good luck to beat me. But now, you truly shown that you are weak."

Ethan sighed before standing up, he tried ignoring the verbal lashing as he began reaching to give Silver his Pokedollars for winning. However, Silver held up a hand and chuckled.

"Stop, I have no need for your money."

The capped trainer blinked in confusion, this gesture was either kind or Silver just didn't want any of his money. Ethan was confused further as Silver suddenly held up a strange cube. Silver smirked as a sudden bright light shoot out of the cube and had Ethan covering his eyes.

Opening his eyes, Ethan took a sharp inhale of breath as his environment completely changed. In front of him were two giant black shoes the size of houses!

Looking up, Ethan widened his eyes as Stretching into the sky was Silver now a giant! The long haired boy's face was suddenly covered as his palm started coming down. Before Ethan knew it his body from the neck down was enveloped by a warm fist.

Silver's smirk grew as he brought Ethan to his face, seeing only his rival's head sticking out of his fist.

"W-what....", Ethan was still filled with shock as Silver's giant face was before him.

"Glad to know that piece of junk still works. What's wrong wimp, I look different?", Silver mocked as Ethan finally somewhat snapped out of his shock.

"W-what did you do?!", Ethan yelled as he fruitlessly struggled in the firm grip.

Silver's eyes grew malicious as his smirk broadened. "When I said I would crush you, I wasn't just saying it to intimidate you. You've been a nuisance in my goals so with this match i not only won but decided to take a small prize."

The red haired boy showed his teeth with his smug grin as he.....
15533233333322323333312.title: Silver's Reward

choices: Silver rose his foot over him
155332333333223233333122.content:
Silver was already finding amusement just in watching Ethan pathetically squirm in his grasp. The boy's eyes narrowed at the ground, or more precisely his large feet, Silver chuckled as he decided to show just how beneath him Ethan was.

Stepping on the heel of his shoe, Silver grunted as he needed to tug with force on his foot to dislodge it from the black footwear. Was emerged was his black socked feet, the fabric glued on as a coat of sweat squelched.

A vinegary scent began to emit from Silver's soles. It had been a long walk here and his feet did get pretty warm cramped in his shoes.

After slipping off his other shoe, Silver stepped onto the cave floor with his soft yet firm socked soles. A wet squelch rang out as Silver's damp socks stretched and dripped out their sweat.

Ethan was brought out of his struggling as Silver began to lower him. The gold trainer groaned as he was dumped on the hard ground. The boy then coughed as a strong and odorous stench hit his nose, the source being Silver wiggling his large toes before him. Waves of sweaty stench and vinegary fumes flowed off and consumed the shrunken boy.

"What's wrong wimp, can't take a little smell?", Silver sneered as he began tapping his feet, letting more vinegar musk out and shaking up Ethan.

"Would yo-WAH! Put those away they stink!", Ethan yelped getting knocked onto his back.

Silver smirked putting a hand on his hip. "Your not in a position to give orders. Your my prize and right now i want my prize to smell all the walking i did!"

Ethan paled as.....
155332333333223233333122.title: Scent For A Gold Bug

1553323333332232333331222.content:
The next thing Ethan knew he was thrown onto the ground as Silver took a seat on the cave floor, sending a huge shake to the ground. Silver smirked crossing his arms and setting his large feet on their heels so that they towered over the shrunk trainer.

Sweat trailed down the soles in drops, letting out vinegary fumes as the drops smeared. The stench made Ethan's nostrils tingle from the overbearing potent foot stench.

"Alright bug, I've been walking all over Johto to beat you. My feet are feeling beat so why not give a rub?", Silver sneered as he wiggled his fuming and gunky toes.

Ethan coghed and widened his eyes. "W-what no way!"

Silver narrowed his eyes before suddenly arching his sole, his plump sole squelched as the foot lowered and squeezed sweat out. Ethan yelled out as the aura of foot increased and the sole came down in a stomping manner.

The sole however didn't squish the gold trainer as it stopped a few inches above his. The thick vinegar musk was like a heavy blanket increasing the heat and reeking odor. Ethan blinked through the blurry vision courtesy of the smelly stench making him tear up.

"Your lucky to be my toy, if not i would have no problem crushing you wimp!", Silver sneered as he lifted his foot up before lowering it to mock Ethan. "Now start rubbing or you can spend my match with the League in my shoe."

Ethan gulped as the giant plump sole hung over, numerous drops of murky sweat dropped and splashed.

He decided....
1553323333332232333331222.title: Rub Or Insole

choices: They went to the Pokemon League
Silver wanted to use the device again
155332333333223233333123.content:
Tickled Ethan. The boy could not breathe as the air from his lungs depleted from laughter.

“My prize for winning is a new pet.” Silver said with a smirk.

“I’m not a pet!” Ethan managed to get out though his laughter. Silver smirked as he let Ethan go. Ethan was able to catch his breath only to lose it by screaming for his life as he hurdled towards the ground. Ethan hoped this was a bad dream when the very same hand that tortured him saved his life.

“I’m not going to let anything harm my pet.” Silver said. “Only if my pet behaves however.” Ethan was in shock from the fall, and also in a bit of fear of the giant red-head and what could happen to him if he were to tick him off.

“But what about your size?” Ethan mustered. “You can’t be a Pokemon trainer at that size!”

“I know.” Silver smirked once again. “This is just to show your place and what happens when you misbehave.” Silver got his device, which blinded Ethan again. Once he opened his eyes, he was on the ground and Silver, back to normal, put a black collar around his neck. “That collar can’t be taken off until I do, got it?” Silver explained. Ethan had no idea how to react to his situation. He could make a run for it, or yell at him, but Silver would just use the device.

“Perhaps I can take the device from him if I wait long enough for the prefect opportunity?” Ethan thought as Silver pushed him.

15533233333322323333332322.title: Daigo Kurogami

155332333333223233333323222.content:
Beyblade tournaments were often the goal of bladers, they hoped to show off their skills and win the glory. However, there was a dark counterpart to this tournament, an underground event know as the wager game.

Beyblade matches were held in a secretive manner and prizes were given that normally wouldn't be in tournaments. Very large sums of cash, attachments to beyblades not released yet, and other illegal dealings.

A match had just ended, you were utterly destroyed in a match with Daigo Kurogami, a boy near your age. His Doomscizor D3 2Vortex Hunter easily defeated you like nothing. Falling onto your knees, humiliation and sorrow filled you. You were a kid of the street and finding a beyblade in the trash was a small piece of hope to your homelessness. But it was all for nothing...

"Ah what an amazing show! Very splendid job Daigo!", the announcer yelled out to the crowd gathered in this underground ring. Daigo walked over, his sharp eyes holding his usual cold gaze. The announcer soon took a strange cube like device and smirked as he pointed it towards you. "Now then, for your prize...

ZAPP!

You yelped as a strange energy overcame your body, you felt as if the space around you morphed and resized. As you opened your eyes, a strange booming happened to the ground. Looking up you gasped as from the bus sized black boots, like a moutain Daigo was stretching into the sky like a giant!

The boy's cold face loomed above staring at you like one looks at a insignificant ant they have yet to squish. The spiky haired boy's face was covered by his palm as he began reaching for you! You were frozen in shock as you were enveloped in the fist of Daigo.

You paled as only your head poked out of the warm fist. Bringing you to his face, Daigo's cold and sharp eyes bored into your now tiny form.

Daigo looked at you with...

15533233333322323333332332.title: Others

info.brief_description: All your dream guys and gals from various fiction formats get HUGE!
info.description:
Have you ever wanted to see your favorite anime, book, videogame, cartoon females and males grow into giants or be thrown into size related situations? NOW YOU CAN!

There are no restrictions to the pairings! M/M , M/F, F/M, F/F, F/M are all perfectly acceptable!

Shrinking AND Growing are fine! Just leave some pathways open for people to choose ahead of time.

RULES:

1. No one sentence chapters or poorly written ones. I'm no grammar nazi, but please make your chapters coherent and understandable.

2. Feet, sweat, odor, armpits, vore etc. are all not only allowed but ENCOURAGED! The ONLY things I won't accept are unbirth, scat and toilet.

3. Have fun!
